1.content: To start, choose an anime.
1.title: The start

11.content:
Your name is Erik. You’re 15-years-old, average build, blue eyes, and have messy blonde hair. You moved into town just a few weeks ago, and have since been regretting it. This is your 26th time passing the Sawada residence on your way home from school. Ten of those times had been uneventful, three had been full of explosions, four had been shootouts, five were rampages of dangerous animals, two you were still trying to figure out, and one was a mine trap. You could only hope it’d be an 11th uneventful pass and you could convince your parents to move before tomorrow came. That, or luck would continue to shine on you.

You looked away from the house and started to walk by, double checking the ground for nay kind of trap. There was no sounds coming from the house, so maybe no one was home. You thought you heard the second floor’s screen window open, but you dared not look. Then it happened. You heard a single gunshot and that was it. You didn’t even have time to hit the floor before your head went numb. You knew you’d been shot and you hit the concrete hard before drifting into darkness. It was a mistake moving here.

A little later, your eyes fluttered open. You were, form what you could tell, alive. However, your head hurt like hell and your vision was all blurry. You reached up with your hand to touch the spot were you got shot, expecting to feel blood. To your surprise, all you felt was your hair.

“What happened? I know I got shot, so why…” you began to say before your vision was back and a whole other problem presented itself. You were in a room…a gigantic room. Everything was so huge and you could only have been an inch tall. You crawled backwards in shock until you felt yourself crawl onto paper. You looked behind you to see a giant note of some kind, with a message in colorful writing. You stood up and backed way to see the entire message.

Ciao-su! Thank you for precipitating in the test of the new “shrink bullet” designed by the Vongola Family. You proved yourself worthy and here you are. Details on this bullet are sketchy, so I don’t even know if there’s a time limit or not. I hope to see results from your experiences. Take care, and always stay focused.
-Reborn

“What the heck is this?! ‘Shrink bullet‘? ‘Vongola Family‘? What’s going on?!” Before you can think, the door opens and your “experiences” begin. In walks...
11.title: Katekyō Hitman Reborn!

choices: Tsuna spots you and sees you as a small person.
Tsuna spots you and sees you as a bug.
111.content:
Tsunayoshi "Tsuna" Sawada, the 15-year-old 10th boss of the Vongola Family, gave a heavy sigh as he walked into his room and dropped his school bag on the floor nearby. Today hadn't been any easier than yesterday and the only thing he got to show for it was a D+ on his math test. The young Mafia-boss-in-training began walking toward you, looking over his messy room an muttering to himself. While they were just simple steps to him, to you each one gave off a loud boom that got louder as the sneakers got closer. You were about to dive out of the way to avoid being crushed when Tsuna turned and sat on his bed. He continues to scan over his room, as if looking for something out-of-place.

"I get the feeling something's wrong...: said Tsuna, speaking for his Vongola intuition. "I really hope I'm wrong..."

You look up at the looming giant. You never really spoke to Tsuna before, due to the strange activities coming from his house. You never expected him to be so...normal.
111.title: Enter the mob-boss

1111.content:
You continue to stare up at Tsuna, trying to figure out what to do next. His eyes move back and forth and you wonder if he'll notice you. Sure enough, his brown eyes lock onto yours in a stare. The two of you just stare at each other for a few moments before Tsuna lets out a scream, flips backwards on his bed, and hits his head on the wall. You wince at the sound.

"Ow, ow, ow, ow!" Tsuna sits up and holds his aching head with his eyes shut. After a few more moments he cracks one of his brown orbs open to look at you. He screams again and darts off the bed, dashing toward the door and leaning his back against it while shaking and staring at your miniscule form on his bedroom floor.

"W-w-who are you?! H-how'd you get i-in here?! Why are you s-s-so small?!" asked the junior-high student in a bundle. What's going on? You were the one who was shrunken to an inch, why was he scared out of his mind? You begin to explain yourself anyway, but your voice doesn't carry over to Tsuna. Realizing this, the young mob-boss gets down on his hands and knees and crawls over to you slowly until his face takes up your entire sight. And what a sight it was. "Are you some kind of mini-assassin come to kill me?!" You shake your head and start to speak again.

"My name's Erik. I live a few blocks down and I was on my way home from school." you begin to tell your story, telling him about getting shot and ending up in his room in this state. You mention the note next to you which Tsuna reads with careful eyes. After you're finished, you wait for the giant's response.
1111.title: Explaining yourself

choices: three rice balls to satisfy the boy's appetite!
a pair of chopsticks... some soy sauce.... but... where's the meat!?
11111.content:
"O-Okay..." Tsuna said, looking down at you. "I GUESS I can believe that... Reborn is always doing weird things to other people..." Tsuna got down, his head, staring at you with his big brown eyes. You just stared back, not sure what to even say at this point.

Suddenly, Tsuna's finger rose up, and poked you in the stomach.

"Ow!" You shout out, holding your tummy. Tsuna pulled back as well, scared by your sudden shout. "Wh-What was that for?" You asked, a little nervous.

"I-I was just wondering what you felt like!" He said. It appeared as if he was scared of you too, despite the fact he was much bigger than you. He sat on his bed, looking down at the ground. Just what on earth was he supposed to do with this one-inch boy anyway? He looked down at you.

You were just looking back up at him, wondering what he was going to do to you. Part of you wanted to run away and never come back, but you also knew that any sudden movement might make Tsuna think that you really WERE an assassin, and make him take action against you.

Just then, to break the awkward silence, Tsuna's stomach made a loud growl.

"I'm hungry." He said, chuckling nervously as he looked down at you. You chuckled with him, but you also knew that you'd make the perfect after-school snack for the little mafia boss. He stood up, making sure to grab you in his palm as he headed to the kitchen.. He didn't hold you too tight, so it was a comfortable ride. However, at the same time, you could feel your heart race. You didn't really mind that he was heading to the kitchen... But why was he taking you with!?

As Tsuna arrived at his destination, he set you down on the dining room table.

"Don't leave the table, okay?" Tsuna said, giving you a serious look. Although you wanted to bolt for the door, somehow you figured that maybe you'd listen to the boy this once.

Like a cat, you watched him as he moved around the kitchen. It looks like he was... Making something... But the question was, what?

Finally, after much suspense, Tsuna sits at the table. In front on him, you see...
11111.title: R-Really?

111112.content:
You watched the young Vongola placed a pair of wooden chopstick and a small bowl of soy sauce in front of him. However…no meat was to be found. At first you thought he had forgotten it and was going to get up again, but the teen remained seated and just looked down at you with a weird look in his eye. You started to get really nervous and your hands trembled a bit.

“Um…where’s the meat?” you asked, gulping to clear your throat. Tsuna looks at you for a few more moments before sighing and replying.

“Right in front of me…”

Your heart sinks and you just stare into his eyes. Your lips move as if to say something, but nothing comes out. Eventually you manage to get the words out; “Wh-what…are you t-talking about, T-Tsuna?”

“Did you think you could trick me? I’m always being tricked my mafia people like you and most of the time it almost kills me! Reborn is a crazy tutor, but even he wouldn’t just shrink an innocent guy right off the street! In that note he wrote “you proved yourself worthy”. He probably meant you’re a skilled assassin who he found sneaking into the house! That’s why he shrunk you!”

“T-that’s crazy!” you shout up at him. “I’m not an assassin! I told you; I was just walking hope from school!”

“Save it.” Tsuna replied with as he separated his chopsticks. “I’m hungry and I need to get rid of you before you return to normal or something. This way I can kill two birds with one stone.” Tsuna claps the two pieces of wood together and brings them down to you. You spin around and start running, not even thinking about where you were going to go. Tsuna, as skillful with chopsticks as any Japanese boy, easily grabbed you around the waist and lifted you off the tabletop. Your legs and arms flailed as Tsuna held you in front of his chest; the bowl of sauce just below you.

“This can’t be happening…!” you tell yourself as you grab the chopsticks and try to pry them apart. You had eaten with chopsticks plenty of times before. All those nights at the dinner table with your family. Who would of thought they’d be used to feed YOU to some boy?! “Tsuna…please don’t eat me!!”

The giant mafia boss ignored your pleas and quickly dipped you into the black sauce. You were submerged under the liquid and the familiar, strong taste filled your mouth until you closed it. After a few seconds in the sauce, Tsuna took you out and brought you before his face. Your clothes were drenched delicious sauce and you smelled just as good! The giant gave you a quick taste test with his tongue. As you hanged there, coughing from your little dip, you hoped he would find you disgusting and spare you. Unfortunately, Tsuna licks his lips with glee and crushed your hope a second later.

“Sorry about this…” Tsuna mutters before parting his lips and putting your tiny form into the hot cavern of his mouth. He uses his lips to slide you off the utensils, pulling the wooden sticks out…but not you. He closed his lips all the way and began swishing you around his mouth. You screamed as the tongue tosses you around and presses you into his teeth, cheeks, and gums. The sound of his moans filled the dark cave as he sucked on your body. It was almost scary to him how much he was enjoying his human snack! The delicious taste of the soy sauce just went so well with your natural flavor; even with your clothes on!

“Mmmm…” Tsuna hummed as your top half suddenly emerged from his big lips. He started sucking on your lower half, drenching it with even more saliva. You screamed up at him desperately, begging him to spit you out, but he seemed too transfixed on eating you and simply sucked you back into his mouth. You were really scared now. Tears were forming in your eyes, but it was hard to tell due to the salvia everywhere. The constant banging into his hard, while teeth hurt and your body was getting bruised up. Suddenly, the pink muscle underneath you rolled you next to his molars with your left arm right in top of one. Your eyes widened in horror and you looked up just as…

So good… Tsuna thought. It tastes so good…so succulent and meaty. Delicious…meat…taste…inside.

*CRUNCH*

It was Tsuna’s turn to go wide eyed. At first he didn’t quite know what happened, but then he heard you start screaming! You holler in pain as you looked to see Tsuna’s teeth clamped down where your arm used to be. He had bitten it right off! It now laid between his teeth; crushed and mangled. You choked as you sobbed and your other arm gripped the bloody stump. He was really eating you…chewing you up like any piece of food!

Tsuna, however, didn’t mean to do that. He was going to just swallow you whole and let his stomach deal with his troubles. But for a split second he had forgotten you were a human and bit down like he always did with tasty, soy sauce dipped meat. The usually gentle teen now felt his stomach start to twist as he broke out into a cold sweat. He dropped the chopsticks and brought one of his hands to his mouth. Your screaming was still going on…what had he even crushed? Your leg? Your arm? An unimaginable amount of guilt started to weight down on the boy. He needed to spit you out now! Maybe he could still treat you; plus his saliva should be helping to control the bleeding.

…but then again, he could also taste your crimson blood as it dripped onto his tongue. The blood mixed with the soy sauce and created an amazing flavor that Tsuna wanted more of. He just couldn’t help it; something deep inside him made him want to continue chewing and get more of that inside flavor. Besides…maybe he would do you a favor by putting you out of your misery.
111112.title: And Things Were Just Looking Up...

choices: Decide that the game is over. Ask him to take you home.
Decide to stay! Maybe this could be fun!
1111121.content:
Tsuna couldn't take the guilt. He couldn't take the sound of you shrieking in pain as your tiny arm was tossed down into the dark prison that was his stomach. Before you can feel even one more bit of pain, you black out in the hot, wet prison.

It wasn't until a few hours later that you started to awaken. Your vision was really blurred. You could barely hear, but in the distance, you could faintly hear some kind of chirp.

"Is this... Heaven...?" You somehow manage to choke out, very gently shaking your head. Then you can hear murmurs... They're somewhere nearby... After that, there's a dull click sound. You black out once more after hearing this.

It was a good while. Hours passed, as you remained knocked out on what you figured was a soft, white cloud.

Eventually you woke up again, everything pitch black. You managed to get the energy to sit up, and look around. "O-Oh my god! Am I blind!?" You think to yourself. You started to walk around, feeling your way around with your foot before taking each step. There were some ripples in this cloud, and each step was soft and squishy, the mateiral sinking under your every step.

Finally, there was a light that blinded you. You tried to cover your eyes, but with one of your arms gone, you were only able to cover one.

"OW!" You moan, falling on your back from the shock.

"O-Oh! Hey!" A voice called. There was a slight rumble as it approached you. You managed to sit up, and see a brown blue for a moment.

"Are you alright?" The said. You could see movement coming from it as it spoke. As you vision focused, you saw that it was Tsuna. Instantly, your eyes widened as you backed up.

"N-No!" You shout at him. "Get away!" As you did, you stood, and started to run to the other end of what you now saw was a bed. Certianly not a cloud. And this was no Heaven. If anything, it was Hell.

Tsuna crawled onto his bed, going after you. Soon, you were cornered, your back against his pillow. The only other choice was to jump off the edge of the bed. The giant-looking boy looked down at you. You looked back up at him. He was an intimidating force... Until...

He broke down in front of you, his adoreable brown eyes starting to well up with tears. "I-I'M SORRY!!!" He shouted. You have to cover your ears, or at least one of them, to keep from being deafened. "I'm sorry! I'm really sorry!" He went on, "I never meant to bite off your limb! I wasn't even going to eat you! I-I just wanted to REALLY teach you a lesson, a-a-and..." Tsuna couldn't even for the words anymore as he laid his head on the bed, bawling his little eyes out.

You were still pulled back, ready to fight or flee if needed. To see your tormentor in this state... How were you supposed to feel?

Looking up and down him, you finally feel at least a little bad for him, and rub his head. He sniffles, and sits back up, looking down at you. "I-I'm really sorry..." He repeats, looking down at you.

"Erm... I-It's okay..." You say nervously. With how emotionally unstable he was at his point, it was best just to swallow whatever pride you had and just accepted the giant's apology. Tsuna very carefully picks you up in his hand, and looks down at you.

"I'm sorry about your arm..." He finally says, looking at the bloody nub.

"My..." You look at the place where your arm once was to see a blood smeared bandage. "MY ARM!?!" You shout suddenly, before remembering. The dark prison... Your arm being crunched right off... The sickly squishy crunch it made as it was clamped off your tiny body.

"I'm sorry!!!" Tsuna shouted out in desperately as he looked down at you in his hand. "I felt really bad, so then I spit oyu out, and you were unconscious, so I wrapped you up in a paper towel to stop the bleeding and then I didn't know what to do, and I begged Doctor Shamal to come over, and he just made a SUGGESTION of what I should do, a-and..." Tsuna started to tear up again as he looked down at you, the guilt simply racking him. "I-Is there anything I can do?" Tsuna asked.

... This may just been your chance. You COULD ask Tsuna to set you free. Maybe even drop you off at his house. But... In truth... While this was probably the WORST day of your life, there was just something about today... It was exciting! Sure, you got an arm lopped off, but still! This was probably the most interesting day you've had since you moved here!

At this point, you...
1111121.title: The Amputation

choices: made a turn down an alley, ready to eat!
11111211.content:
"Tsuna?" You managed to say, looking at the brown haired giant. "Could you take me home?"

"Home?" Tsuna said, a little confused at first. "Uhm... Sure! Where is it that you live...?" Tsuna asked, looking briefly out his window. "I could take you home... If it's in this universe..."

Your eyes seemed to light up as you heard this. You were finally heading home! You were gonna be safe at last! Or at least so you hoped... As soon as this new dying will bullet wore off.

You got a little closer to Tsuna, to make sure he could hear you clearly. Shouting up your addresse, Tsuna had begun to put his socks back on to his feet. The boy picked you up in his hand, and started to head down to the stairs. Already out the door, you look back on this horrid household as a place you'd NEVER want to have to visit again.

Already getting comfortable, you look about as Tsuna has you gripped in his hand. Life might be a little harder as an amputee, but at the same time, there was always prostetic surgery... And besides, it was better to have one arm than none, right? Yeah... From here on out, things were really looking up! The sky seemed so much bluer, the grass so much more lush... Just everything in your life seemed to be so much brighter than it was.

Tsuna was walking onward, following the directions to your house as you had instructed. Somehow, he felt like this little favor would take away all the pain you had felt. Just then as he was walking down a street, he felt his stomach start to rumble again. He never had his snack! He got too caught up in trying to help you that he never got to eat!

To top it all off, Tsuna's hand also started to quake. You felt a little tingling sensation, as you could feel a little more power filling your body! Slowly... Very slowly, you were starting to grow back to your original size!

Tsuna looked down at you... His hunger was starting to take control of him as he had you gripped. He noticed you getting just a little bit bigger... He began to drool. He could easily down you right now... You could grow in his belly, making a nice, full meal out of you. With your little arm gone missing, you would hardly be able to put up much of a fight against the boy.

As Tsuna kept walking, he soon...
11111211.title: Happy Endings?

111112112.content:
"Is this it?" Tsuna asked, holding the action figure sized you in his hand.

"Yeah! That's my house!" You say, looking up happily. You can almost feel tears running down your cheeks as you finally make it home. Your heart is leaping for joy. There's such a knot in your stomach that you can't wait to get home.

As Tsuna soon enters, he has to keep changing the position he held you in. He went from carrying you like an action figure, to holding you in both arms as if you were a teddy bear. Then he had to hold you as if you were a baby as you grew to it's respective size. By the time he reached your room, you were the size of a small child... with one arm. The bandages had long since torn off, but the wound had at least closed up.

"You... Should probably see a doctor for that..." Tsuna chuckled nervously. You were about the size of Futa, and still growing.

You sighed. "Yeah... It'll be a constant reminder of what you did..."

Tsuna looked down, a little saddened at hearing that.

"B-But I know you didn't mean to!" You said suddenly, not wanting to see the little boy so sad. "Please! Don't worry too much about it!"

Tsuna looked at you, and gave a faint smile. It didn't make him feel better instantly, but it was still a start. With that, you give Tsuna a hug with your one arm. He hugs right back, smiling softly to himself. With that, the two of you say good-bye, and he's out the door.

The next day, you return to your regular life, learning to deal with things with only one arm. You parents took you to a doctor, and later today, you're going to get fitted for a prostetic arm. All will soon be as it once was.

"H-Hey!" A voice called. You turn, and see Tsuna looking down at you from your sitting position. "I didn't know you went here!"

You chuckle nervously as you look up at him. Back at your original size, you were a lot taller than he was. Part of you wanted to punch his face in for what he did to you yesterday. Another part of you wanted to reach out and become friends.

"Yup!" You chuckle nervously. "I've been getting a lot of attention since my arm went missing..." You smile deviously at Tsuna. "Any idea where it is?"

Tsuna blushes furiously, and before he can reply, a voice came calling for him.

"Tenth!" It calls. Soon, Gokudera, a kid you recognized in your class before, comes up to Tsuna. "Hey! Where have you been? We needed to talk to you ab--" Before you know it, he was leading Tsuna away from you, leaving you in peace.

Soon enough, class begins, and you're back into your same old routine you started since you got here. Now, however, you were just greatful to be alive.
111112112.title: Dawn of a New Time

choices: Tsuna shows you to someone else.
11112.content:
There was silence for a few seconds as you waited for Tsuna to say something. You were hoping he'd believe you, but your hopes turned sour as the giant boy frowned and glared at you. The glare, despite coming from this seemingly gentle kid, scared you a bit and made you back up a little bit. Tsuna noticed this and immediately placed his palm behind you so you couldn't back up any further. The soft skin against your back was nice, but it wouldn't last.

"I...I don't believe you!" yelled Tsuna, louder than needed and causing you to cover your ears in pain. "Do you know how many people have tried to kill me?! That note is probably fake, and you're just another mafioso!" Before you could voice a protest, the hand behind you folded around you and trapped you. The giant's sweaty palm squeezed you just enough to keep you in place and cause a little discomfort. The hand shook a little as the future Vongola leader stood up and started walking around his room. After about a minute, the hand opened again and you were roughly dropped into a glass jar. You landed with a thud and cursed at the stinging pain. Thankfully, nothing seemed to be broken. You got up and rubbed your arm as you looked around. Tsuna towered over you and gave you one last glare before turning around and leaving.

"I'm not in the mafia!!" you screamed as you banged on the glass walls. Tsuna ignored you and left the room. Cursing again, you sat down and started to worry about what was going to happen next. This was not a good situation. Not good at all.
11112.title: He doesn't believe you.

111121.content:
Tsuna was pacing back and forth outside his room. He was trying to think about what to do in this situation. He’d been attacked before, but his friends were always around or he’d deal with it while in his Dying Will form. This time he was alone and Reborn was no where to ask for advice.

“Ehh, what am I going to do? I can’t just let him go; he might try and kill me again.” he spoke to himself as he ruffled with his hair. “I could just call somebody and let them deal with it. Why should I be concerned about mafia-related problems?” Tsuna walked over to the phone and was just about to grab it when he stopped himself. “But…I’m supposed to be the 10th generation boss of the Vongola. I don’t WANT to be, but everyone’s counting on me. If I can’t deal with just one assassin, how is anyone going to respect me?” Tsuna pulled his hand back and began to calm himself. “I…I should deal with this myself. I have to.”

After a few minutes of self preparation for what he was about to do, Sawada marched into his room and right over to you. You were still sitting at the bottom of the glass jar and peered up at the giant boy. Hundreds of questions buzzed in your mind. What was he going to do with you? Was he going to be nice? Was there anyone else in the house? How long was this “shrink bullet” supposed to last? Were you going to live through this?

Without saying a word, the mafia-boss picked up the jar and turned it over so you fell onto his gargantuan hand. Quickly you started to back away from his massive body, but a quick curl of the fingers stopped your retreat.

“I don’t like it when people try to kill me.” he indicated outright, an angry look pasted onto his boyish face.

“But I wasn’t trying to--” you tried to deny, but Tsuna interrupted.

“Obviously, everyone else failed. You have to be dealt with to.” You didn’t like the sound of that.

“I’m telling you, I’m not--”

“You can’t just leave and try and kill me again. Therefore, I’ve decided I have to…”
111121.title: Tsuna deals with you himself.

1111211.content:
“T-teach me a lesson? What does that mean?” you asked, frightened that this giant might have something really bad in store for you.

“I…don’t know, exactly.” Tsuna replied, laughing nervously. “I’ve never done this sort of thing before.”

“Can’t you just let me go with a warning? I promise I won’t ever come back!” you plead, deciding that trying to convince this boy that you were no assassin was fruitless. Trying to get out of here was the only thing you needed to focus on.

“No way! If I let you go free like that, what’s stopping you from returning in a few hours to finish the job. I have to teach you not to mess with me.” Tsuna scratched his chin and thought hard. How was he supposed to punish this guy? He’s never punished anyone in his entire life! He sat down on his bed as he continued to think, but no good ideas presented themselves. “Arg! This isn’t my sort of thing! Maybe I should let someone else take care of it…” Tsuna sighed as he reached down and rubbed his foot through the rubber of his sneakers. You saw him do this from his palm and asked something you would defiantly regret.

“What’s wrong with you foot?”

“Nothing. I’ve just been on them all day. I wish someone would-” Tsuna’s eyes went wide as he looked from his feet to your tiny form. A smile spread across his lips as he got an idea. Before you could understand what you had started, Tsuna placed you down by his feet and started to untie his sneakers. After slipping his feet out of them, he proceeded to peel off his white socks next. Once those were off, his feet were free and Tsuna let out a long sigh. “Finally, my feet can get some room to breath.” Tsuna wiggled his toes a bit before bringing both his bare feet down in front of you.

“Tsuna? I don’t understand…”

“I want you to rub my feet, assassin. That doesn’t sound too hard, right?”

You were flabbergasted at his words. Tsuna lifted his feet so his fresh, sweaty soles were exposed to you.

“Do it right now, or else I’ll make you give me a backrub instead!”

The idea of giving this boy a foot rub at your size was humiliating, but the idea of rubbing his back was even worse! It would take forever! You immediately ran over to one of his feet and rubbed it vigorously. Your reach was limited, but Tsuna lowered his foot a bit to allow you access to higher areas. While you rubbed the sweaty foot, you had no choice but to breath the foul air around them. It was…not as bad as you expected. Tsuna obviously had good hygiene and bathed regularly. The only reason his feet were smelly now was because they were cooped up in his shoes all day at school.

As you gave the giant teen his foot rub, you looked past his gargantuan toes and looked him in the face. The young middle schooler had his eyes closed and a big smile on his face. Did this really feel that good, or did the idea of having so much control over you feel that much better?

After a few minutes spent on each of his soles, Tsuna finally put his feet down on the floor and looked down at you, still smiling.

“That felt great! Thanks a lot.”

“It’s not like I had a choice. Can I leave now?”

Tsuna shook his head and responded, “Not yet. I don’t think you’ve learned your lesson yet. While you were rubbing my feet, I though up another punishment for you. How does spending some time in my _____ sound?”
1111211.title: It Could Be Worse...

choices: He puts his foot in the sock for a treat for his servant
he thinks of another idea for his little toy
11112112.content:
"So how about it?" Tsuna says grinning at you. You can't believe it but the thought that crosses you mind is "Yeah that sounds okay". Why were you thinking like this? It was so strange, maybe it was that you were so small to this God of a boy that anything he said from now on was your job to obey.

"Yeah sure okay!" you shout up suppressing a smile. "AWESOME" Tsuna shouts loudly only to get a reply from his mother downstairs, "Tsuna who's upstairs with you?" "Ummmm nobody mom I just found something in my room is all" he replies. "Better not be so loud in the future haha don't want anyone else finding you" he says beaming down at you.

"But yeah back to my sock" Tsuna quickly says, he picks you up in his left hand and his sock in his right as he raises you over the opening and smiles once as he lets you go into the cotton prison. You fall past the heel of the sock and down into the toe section and land in a ball of cotton. You couldn't help but find the sm,ell appealing and soon found yourself taking deep sniffs of the foot odor stained fabric.

Tsuna's face appears over the opening of the sock and says "How's the smell little guy?". trying not to laugh. Both you and him were surprised at your reply, "It smells so good Master!". WAIT! Had you just called this boy who had made you rub his feet Master? The look on Tsuna's face was one of shock, but then changed to a smuggly satisfied grin. "Well i'm not used to all this I'm usually a nice enough person, but if you actually want me to be your Master, I really can't pass up this oppurtunity now can I?" he says to you. You proceed to yell up "I'll do anything you say from now on Tsuna".

As Tsuna smiles down at you he has an idea...
11112112.title: Coming around to a new way of thinking

choices: Tsuna puts his shoes on and goes for a walk.
Tsuna takes you out of his sock and does something else with you.
111121121.content:
“Stay still, little guy. I have a treat for you!” Tsuna says with a smile as you see his face disappear. You wonder for a moment what he means, but soon get your answer when something big enters the sock. It’s Tsuna’s foot! The Vongola wiggles his toes in anticipation as he slowly puts the sock on. You don’t try to avoid the foot and instead allow it to cover you. Tsuna’s sole presses your body against the white cotton of the sock and soon your entire inch-tall form is covered in sweaty boy foot. You take a deep breath of Tsuna’s foot odor and find the stench enjoyable. Why was that? This should gross you out, but you somehow find it pleasant. Was this some kind of side-effect of the Shrink Bullet?

Once Tsuna has his sock on, he props his foot onto his knee and inspects the bottom of his foot. A chuckle escapes his lips when he sees your small impression protruding from the sock. Having someone so much smaller than himself was starting to amuse Tsuna more and more. The middle school student lies down on his bed and relaxes, focusing on the feeling of your small body snuggling with his foot.

“You really seem to want to be my servant, so I guess I’ll forgive you for trying to assassinate me.” Tsuna tells you. He feels you happily nod and kiss his foot, showing how much you’ve changed from being in his presence. “Ohh, that feels good! Keep doing that.” Tsuna closes his eyes and folds his arms behind his head. You obey your new giant master and continue kissing his foot. It’s amazing how a single bullet could turn you from a normal teenager into a devoted foot kisser. You seemed to forget your past life and wanted nothing but to serve Tsuna.
111121121.title: A Little Treat

1111212.content:
Your eyes almost bulged out of their sockets when he said that. “K..k…kill me?! You can’t be serious!” Tsuna was equally surprised at what he had just said, shown by the hand that had clasped over his own mouth. Did he really just say he’d kill someone? It was so against his nature that it felt wrong to speak it. Nonetheless, the young mafia boss removed his hand and glared at you with angry eyes. He was really trying to be intimidating, though his sheer size was all it took to get you scared. You were so afraid for your life that you actually got to your feet and tried to climb over his fingers to escape. The giant Tsuna easily curled his hand into a fist and trapped you in the tight squeeze. Your one inch body was completely incased in his fist. His hand was all sweaty, probably from the nervousness he must be feeling.

“Anyway…” Tsuna began to say. “I haven’t decided how I’m going to do it. I could just crush you, that’d be quick. I could also eat you; that way I wouldn’t have to see you.” Your muffled protests weren’t reaching him, as he was too busy deciding on what action to take. You only hope Tsuna would get cold feet and change his mind. This couldn’t be how your life was going to end.

After a few minutes of being trapped in his hand, Tsuna finally came to a decision.
1111212.title: Most Efficient Action

choices: You taste great and Tsuna eats you right then and there.
You don’t taste very good and Tsuna decides to add you to his lunch.
11112122.content:
“Well…I am kind of hungry. I bumped into Hibari today during lunch, and my meal ended up in the trash…along with me.” Tsuna said, shuddering at the memory of mashed potatoes in his hair. You were shuddering far worse, though, since the giant had just decided to eat you! Tsuna’s hand opened, revealing your sweaty and panting form. Without giving you a breather, his other hand came down and pinched you between his fingers. You were completely overpowered and your struggles were useless. The giant teen brought you up to his face, and started to sniff you.

“Eh…you don’t smell very good. Then again, I’m not a picky eater.” Tsuna cracked a smile, which got bigger as he brought you closer to his lips. You thought he was going to consume you right then and there and started to panic. Tsuna slipped his tongue out of his mouth and , using a single finger, pushed you against the pink muscle and dragged you across his taste buds. The feeling of being pushed into something so wet and squishy, yet so powerful, was frightening. The giant brunette removed you from his tongue, a string of saliva connecting you to it. He apparently was taste testing you, something you usually did with new foods you’ve never tried before.
11112122.title: Taste Testing

choices: You reach the end and jump out, landing somewhere safely.
You’re too late and become a part of Tsuna’s lunch.
111121222.content:
Tsuna’s face becomes sour and you sort of feel relieved. “Ick…you taste like sweat. Gross.” Tsuna spits what remained of your taste into the nearby trash can and then looked back at your tiny form.

“So…” you muttered. “You’re not going to eat me?” Tsuna smiled slyly and brought you closer to his eyes.

“I didn’t say that. I’d still rather not see you die. If something taste bad, you just add stuff to it until it taste better.” Tsuna explained before trapping you in his fist again and exiting his room. You didn’t know what he meant, but suspected you weren’t saved from his ravaging stomach just yet. Tsuna entered his kitchen and placed you on the counter. He then reached for a knife, causing you to scream in fear and flee in the other direction. Tsuna chuckled and placed a cup over you, trapping you in darkness. You could still hear him outside of it. “Don’t worry, this isn’t for you. Just stay put until I’m done.” It’s not like you had much choice, so you sat on the cold floor and waited for you fate. A few minutes and several cutting noises later, the cup lifted up and was replaced with Tsuna’s hand. The cute-faced boy took one last, pitiful look at you. “Sorry about this, but it is your fault for trying to kill me.” Without a second thought, he dropped you onto the sandwich he was preparing. You landed in a mess of tuna and lettuce and tried to stand up. Before you got off your knees, the top slice of bread came down and pressed you into the grounded fish meat. To make it worse, the top piece of bread had mayonnaise on it which practically glued you in place. Your world shook and you knew Tsuna had picked up the sandwich. Fear and the will to survive took over and you struggled the best you could. The last thing you wanted was to be eaten by some mafia boss that mistook you for an assassin. You started to feel the back of your shirt peel away from the bread and hope filled your mind. Just seconds afterwards, the entire sandwich shook and made you gasp in surprise. Tsuna had just taken a bite of the tuna sandwich, thankfully not far enough to get you. You peaked through and opening and witnessed the young teen chewing, the audible sounds forcing you to picture yourself being masticated between his powerful teeth. You started to back away, deeper into the sandwich. The quake from before had dislodged you from the mayo and allowed you some movement. Your only thought being escape, you turned around and crawled as far and as quickly as possible. A loud gulp was heard behind you, followed by another shaking of the sandwich. You looked back in shock to see most of the sandwich was gone, either being chewed up in Tsuna’s mouth or melting away in his belly. This was your last chance, you had to reach the end of the sandwich before Tsuna could consume the rest of his lunch. But then again, what would you do when you reached the end? The only thing you could do was jump and hope you survived. You started up your crawl again, the other end of your edible prison visible. You heard that piercing gulp from behind you again and quickened your pace, which was quite difficult seeing as you were already tired and the ground was made up of a fish product. You forced yourself not to look behind you at that gaping mouth of Tsuna’s since it would probably freeze you in place and doom you. Tsuna got ready to put the last portion of his meal into his carnivorous mouth when…
111121222.title: Tuna and Erik Sandwich

1111212221.content:
As you reach out just a tiny bit further, Tsuna gives the sandwich a light squeeze, popping you right out. You're falling helplessly, your limbs flailing around a bit.

As things seem they couldn't get darker, you finally get a spot of lucky. Onto the counter you fall, and on this counter, is a soft, squishy sponge. You hit it, cushioning your blow, and saving you from a concussion. You look up to see the brunette finish off his sandwich, munching it noisily as he did. Knowing him, he probably mistook the sound of the crisp lettuce as your bones crunching between his pearly white teeth.

Tsuna finishd up the sandwich, licking his lips as he did. He turned about, and started to put away the bread, mayonaisse, and whatnot, not even bothering to look down at where you dropped. Grasping this moment, you dash behind the cup, hiding in the little shade that it provided for you. As Tsuna gets one last glass of water, he lets out a noisy burp.

"Whew! Excuse me!" He said as he stood alone in the kitchen, before patting his tender, flat stomach. "Sorry it had to end like that, little guy." He said, rubbing the spot, thinking you were in there. "But I'm not gonna let you kill me!"

With this, Tsuna walked out of the kitchen, leaving you all alone. This was almost too good to be true. Tsuna thought you were dead! If you play your cards right, you could escape from this mad house! Just find a way down from the counter, around the bend, out the door, and across the lawn! At least then you'd be out of here...

You peek out from behind the cup, to see Tsuna's hand, as it travels up the railing as he walks back upstairs to his room. Looks like the coast was clear. Slowly, you tip toe out from behind the cup, and look over the edge. Proportionatly, it looks like 100, if not 200 foot drop! Backing up, you scout the area to see if there's anything that can help you get down.

Suddenly, you hear a door slam open!

"Tenth!" Someone shouts, and sprints up the stairs.

"I'll be right there!" Another voice shouted, "I'm gonna get a drink of water!"

Quick as your feet can carry you, you dash back behind the cup. Gradually, you hear the footsteps getting louder and louder as the person approached.

"Oh! Hey!" The voice said. "Here's a cup!"

Your heart skips a beat. They couldn't mean... THIS cup? The cup that YOU'RE hiding behind!? Time move at a snail's pace, as you see a large, squid-like shadow come over your secret base.

As the cup is snatched up, your cover is blown.

"Huh? What's this?" The voice said, getting down closer to get a look at you. As you turn slowly, you see a tall male, with black hair, and light brown eyes. Unlike Tsuna, his persona seems to be much sunnier. You instantly recognize him. He's the star player of Namimori's baseball team, Takeshi Yamamoto. Unfortunately, you've never talked to him yourself... In fact, it's unlikely he even knew you existed.

"I-I..." You manage to stammer, overcoming your mild fear.

"Whoa!" Yamamoto pulled back a little. "Hey! It talks!" He pulled in closer, interested by you. "What else can you do?" He asked, smiling at you as he did. "Do you know any tricks?" He said, pushing another question. "Oh! Hey! Are you one of those... uhm... Those one things... The... Lepren... Leprecious..." He looked down, forgetting the little tidbit of folklore.

At this point, you...
1111212221.title: Saved... For now.

choices: You manage to talk your way out of this.
11112122211.content:
“L-Leprechaun…” you mumble, making Yamamoto snap his fingers.

“Yeah, that! Are you a Leprechaun, little guy?” the giant jock asked as he squatted down a bit so his giant face was leveled with the table. You took a few steps, having almost been eaten the last time a face had been this close.

“Y-yeah…that’s me.” you reply, laughing nervously. Maybe this guy was your ticket out of here! “I’m a genuine Leprechaun!”

“Wooow…awesome! Aren’t you supposed to be wearing a green suit and hat, though?”

“Uh…well…we stopped wearing those ages ago. Made us stand out too much.”

“Oooh…I see.” Takashi grins toothily. He really believed you were a Leprechaun. “The myth I read years ago WAS pretty old. So why are you in Tsuna’s kitchen?” The baseball player looks to the side and thinks for a moment before turning his brown gaze back at you. “And why were you hiding?”

“Well…you see…sonny…” you mumble as you rack your brain, quickly coming up with a story to tell. “There I was, just minding my own business, when suddenly a strong gust of wind lifted me up and blew me in here! I’ve been trying to find a way out…and you big lads can be pretty intimidating!”

“Heh, well I guess we seem pretty big to someone like you!“ Yamamoto chuckled as he looked at you carefully. His eyes observed the kitchen table, seeing that there wasn’t any way for a small guy like you to escape. “Looks like you’re in a pickle. How long have you been stuck up there?”

“Um…about…two hours?” you lie, randomly making up a number. The large swordsman is giving you a serious look and you begin to worry he might now believe you. Thankfully, his face returns to a bright smile and your worry lifts away.

“So you’ve been stuck up there for two hours? I’m surprised Tsuna didn’t notice you at all. Well, no worries, little guy! I’ll bring you to Gokudera and him and the three of us will help you get back to your village…or home…or whatever you live in.” The middle school student shrugs as he reaches a hand for you.

“W-wait! You can’t show me to them!” you shout just before the giant’s hand reaches you. The gullible jock blinks a few times before retracting his hand.

“Why not?”

“B-Because the more people who know about us, the more risk we’re in! We have to keep our existence hidden from humans.” you explain, looking up at the giant with worry. He probably thought you were worrying about the secrecy of your race, but in truth you were worried about being seen by Tsuna again!

“Ooooh, I get it.” the athlete folds his arms over his chest and nods. “You’ve gotta protect your pots of gold, right?”

“Uhhh…yeah, that’s it.” You giggle nervously again. You hoped he wouldn’t want a pot of gold in return, but he didn’t seem to look like the greedy type…

“Gotcha! If too many people found out about them, the economy would go out of whack!” The giant muscle head smiled at you and suddenly grabbed you. Even though he was being kind, his strong fist held you firmly and it was pretty uncomfortable. Takeshi brought you up to his handsome face and smiled. “I’ll just keep you in my pocket while I hang out with Tsuna and Gokudera.”

“W-wait a minute!” you shout, but Yamamoto has already stuffed you into his pocket. Prefect…you should of just asked him to drop you off in front of the house or something! You lie down in the pocket and listen as the teen pours himself a glass of water and gulping it down. After sighing happily, you hear his feet stomp against the floor as he makes his way out of the kitchen. Before he reaches the stairs, however, he suddenly stops…

“Hey, wait a sec…” Takeshi’s hand suddenly reenters the pocket and he scoops you back out. You’re held before his face again as he looks at you closely.

“W-what’s wrong?” you ask, your voice shaky.

“It’s nothing really, I was just wondering…why didn’t you use any of your magic to escape?”

“M-magic?”

“Yeah, magic. You Leprechauns have magic, don’t you? It’s how you protect your gold, hide from humans, and other tricky stuff. You must have something that could get you off a table,” The teen raises an eyebrow. “Don’t you?”
11112122211.title: Erik The Leprechaun

choices: A faint light... And a lot of room... Yamamoto took the pants off!?
111121222112.content:
You look up nervously, but using your brilliant mind, you just manage to think of an excuse as a spur of the moment.

"Well... You see..." You look down a little with a frown on your face. "I... Broke a few sacred rules back home..." You rub your arm nervously for dramatic effect. "And... Well, the elders got mad at me, stripped me of my powers, my gold, a-and banished me from my homeland."

Yamamoto looks at you with a slight frown, having a bit of pity for you. "I-I see..." He says nervously at the bottom of the stairs, scratching the back of his head.

You start to sniffle a little, ready to use one of your trump cards. "I-I never got to even say goodbye to my family!" You say suddenly, "Not even my girlfriend!" Holding your knees, you pull some crocodile tears, and begin to bawl. "She's probably in the arms of another man now! Sh-She probably doesn't even remember me anymore!" You cry out.

Yamamoto frowned deeply, feeling nothing but pity and sympathy for you. "I'm really sorry to hear that, little guy..." He says as he holds you tenderly. "I'll just give you a moment, 'kay?" He said, very carefully using his other hand to pet you. After that, he carefully puts you back in his pocket, and heads upstairs into the room with the others.

-Much Later-

You're waiting impatiently in Yamamoto's pocket. You can't quite hear what's outside, nor see much from this dark prison. The next thing you know, you feel a lot of rustling and movement. You look up to see...
111121222112.title: Erik the BANISHED Leprechaun

choices: You start to shrink even smaller!!
1111212221122.content:
Peeking out the opening of the pocket, you see Yamamoto’s hand but it’s not reaching into the pocket. You suddenly feel really light like you were in an elevator and the “floor” you were sitting on shifts. You tumble around for a bit before everything comes to a rest. You lay there in the pocket for a bit while you hear more shifting outside. You then start hearing Yamamoto’s booming footsteps, but they aren’t coming from below you anymore. They also seem to be getting farther away, so you quickly crawl out of the pocket’s opening (which is no longer above you, but more to the side like a cave opening). You emerge into the light and shield your eyes; everything blurry due to spending a lot of time in the giant’s dark pocket. You hear the sound of a door closing and you look behind you. After rubbing your eyes a bit you start to get used to the brightness again and see a closed door several yards away. You start scanning your surroundings and see that the pants you were in are now on the hard wood floor.

“Yamamoto?” you call, looking around for the young giant. You don’t see his hulking figure anywhere, which must mean he isn’t in the room. Looking around some more, you notice a bunch of other clothes scattered around. A shirt, a pair of socks, shoes, boxers…they were all the clothes Yamamoto was just wearing! Why did he…?

Suddenly, the familiar sound of running water appeared in the distance. Someone was taking a shower nearby. You looked up a bit at all the giant furniture and began to understand. You were in a bedroom, but it wasn’t Tsuna’s. Yamamoto had stripped all his clothes off without a care…you must be in HIS house now! Well that was real nice of him; being so nice to you and then dropping you on the floor while he bathed.

“Well, he didn’t look very bright…” you mutter to yourself as you put your hands in your pockets and start walking around the room. Yamamoto’s bedroom was surprisingly clean for a jock; the only stuff on the ground were the clothes he had just taken off. The room was decorated with baseball posters and several trophies. A wooden sword also hanged on a nearby wall, making you think Yamamoto was also interested in swordplay as well as baseball. He definitely wasn’t like the jocks you had met at your old school. He wasn’t mean and didn’t pick on anyone; he was kind and smiled a lot. The only reason people call him a jock was because he seemed to be a sports fanatic.

You paced around the room for a while longer, taking in the breathtaking sight of Yamamoto’s huge room. You never noticed before, but the ceiling was really high up…and the bed looked like a cliff! You were so tiny compared to how you used to be…

While you were observing your surroundings, you suddenly heard the door open. It was then you realized the sound of the shower going had stopped. You look over to the door and see Yamamoto entering his room; a towel wrapped around his waist. The boy’s hair and torso looked damp, but he wasn’t dripping wet which meant he had dried off a bit. You gazed at the giant teenager with awe; despite being in middle school the baseball nut had a pretty impressive build for his age. He was already starting to develop abs and his chest looked pretty pumped. You were brought out of your daze when Yamamoto began stomping closer; his bare feet making the floor under him rumble. The teen picked up his pair of pants and dug through the pocket you were supposed to be in.

“Eh? He isn’t there anymore…” Yamamoto mumbled as he dropped the pants and started looking over the ground for you. As he did, he stomped closer and closer to you, but you ran toward those dangerous feet and waved your arms. He knew what he was looking for, so surely he’d notice you.

“Hey! Yamamoto!” you yell up at the towering boy. Yamamoto doesn’t seem to react to your voice and he starts prodding one of his ears with his finger. Crap…he had water in his ears and couldn’t hear you! Well, at least he could still see you…
1111212221122.title: A New Setting

choices: Try to get his attention somehow
11112122211222.content:
You skid to a halt as Yamamoto continues to walk forward, his huge feet making a booming sound to your tiny ears as sole made contact with hard wood floor. Soon, you felt yourself getting knocked up into the air with every step, making it difficult to keep standing let alone make any progress in any direction. Yamamoto stops for a second, his brown eyes still focused on the floor, scanning left and right. This was ridiculous! He should still be able to see you! An inch tall wasn't THAT small...

Suddenly, he took another step and his massive left foot crashed down directly in front of you, the toe inches from your face. The force of the wind from that simple movement washed over you, bringing with it the clean scent of soap mixed with the natural odor of an active young man's foot. It wasn't overwhelming but it was VERY male and VERY much in your face. You barely managed to keep your feet, your body getting launched what felt like a few feet into the air, stumbling back slightly. You looked up at the incredibly huge big toe in front of you, which was taking up most of your vision. Beyond it, Yamamoto's body stretched upward like a god's rising high, high into the sky, the ceiling light shining down on him as though from heaven, his muscled torso glistening slightly in the glow. You gulped and looked forward, your heart jumping slightly. You were eye level with Yamamoto's toenail...

"Huh...I thought I could see over it just a second ago..." you mutter to yourself.

Suddenly, the toenail rises over your head! "W-what the?"

You look over your body in fear and see the ground is slowly growing closer, stretching out all around you, the humongous toe in front of you growing even MORE massive, the scent filling your nose and making you a little woozy. Up and out the tanned toe grew in front of you, the rest of Yamamoto's body becoming obscured by this single digit. You were truly becoming tiny...

"Oh no!" You stepped back until you could see beyond the toe, Yamamoto's towering form stretching even higher above you. His eyes were still scanning the floor, but how would he be able to tell you from the tufts of sock lint and dust? You waved your arms and shouted again, but if your voice was a mere squeak before, now it was surely impossible to pick up at all. You ran back over to the toe and desperately measured yourself. Judging by how enormous it was you figured your height to be around...a quarter of an inch tall! You groaned and fell back against the toe. Things just kept getting worse and worse!

Suddenly, Yamamoto's voice bellowed out over the room, sounding deep and powerful even though he was just speaking in a normal tone of voice. You could feel it vibrating in your chest. "Huh...guess he went for a walk or something..."

Yamamoto certainly wasn't the brightest bulb but he was now your only chance at survival. You got to your feet and looked around. There had to be SOMETHING you could do to gain his attention...
11112122211222.title: Just a LITTLE Problem...

choices: You end up on top of his big toe.
You end up between his toes!
111121222112221.content:
You looked for anything that could help you get the titan’s attention, but it was hopeless. Yamamoto’s floor was practically spotless; save for the dirty clothes he had discarded. Even if you did manage to find a pencil or something, what good would that have done? You were so pathetically small that it’d be impossible for you to even lift something like a pencil. However, you had to find someway to get the giant teen’s attention, or else…

Before you could even start thinking, the toe next to you suddenly rose high into the air. You craned your neck and watched in awe as the naked giant above you took a single step forward. The massive foot of the titan passed over you, crashing down in the distance. The force of the footstep was unbelievable! It shook the floor you stood on and you were sent at least a foot into the air! As you laid there on your stomach, you watched Yamamoto walk toward his dresser; each of his footfalls tremendous in power. They no longer made you lose your balance, but you could feel the tremors that were send through the floorboards. You had to get off this floor before it was too late.

“Hmmm…get off the floor. Get off the…that’s it!” you exclaim loudly. There was a way to get Yamamoto’s attention! He was the size of a mountain…which means you could climb him! Sure, it sounded like an impossible task, but what else could you do. Remaining on the floor trying to scream up at him will only result in a quick death.

Yamamoto was currently opening his draws searching for clothes to wear. At that distance he would probably be finished dressing himself by the time you ran all the way over to him. Instead you set your eyes on his bed, which was close by. The sheets were hanging over the edge…perfect! You could climb up that first and then jump to Yamamoto when he got close. You quickly ran over to the bed sheets and grabbed handfuls of the thick (to you) material. You weren’t exactly an expert climber, but you had done some hiking in your old town. You took a deep breath and started scaling up the sheets as fast as you could. If someone knew where to look and looked closely, they might of seen your speck-sized form scampering up to the bed.

You climbed for a couple minutes, not looking down but hoping you had made some progress. All of a sudden you heard what sounded like something falling the ground. You instinctively turned around and got a good look at Yamamoto’s bare ass. The towel that was once covering him was now on the floor. Your face turned red and you quickly hid it in the bed sheets to avoid seeing anything else.

“These’ll work!” you hear Yamamoto say as he slips on a pair of boxers followed by some black cargo shorts. You continued your trek up to the bed, but your face was still blushing and you couldn’t get the image of Yamamoto’s firm, muscular ass out of your mind. This wasn’t the time to be going gaga over your potential savior! He could also be your potential killer if you weren’t careful.

“That’s odd…” Yamamoto said as he fished through one of his draws; his torso still shirtless. “I wanted to wear the red one today, but it’s not here!” The athlete folded his arms over his chest and glanced around his room. His eyes eventually fell upon the shirt on his bed. “There it is! How’d it get there?” The giant shrugged and walked over to it. You instantly heard the booming footsteps as they appeared, growing closer and closer to you each time. You turned around again just as Yamamoto stopped before his bed. You gazed up at the towering giant as he grabbed the shirt off his bed and brought it up to his face to smell it. He wondered for a moment if it was clean or not, but ultimately decided he didn’t care and slipped it on.

“It’s now or never!” you say to yourself as you look for where you’ll be jumping to. To your surprise, you discovered you didn’t have many options! Despite all your effort climbing, you had only barely risen over Yamamoto’s toes! It might be possible to jump onto his big toe and from there you could travel over the rest of his foot…but you might also miss your mark and end up between his toes! How would escape if that happened? Deciding you didn’t have a lot of time to think about if before Yamamoto moved on, you gulped to clear your throat and leaped off the sheets. It wasn’t a long drop to Yamamoto’s foot, but where were you going to end up?
111121222112221.title: Attempt to climb Mt. Yamamoto

choices: You make it to the leg and start climbing
Yamamoto gets up to make a snack, forcing you to stop and hold on
1111212221122211.content:
Fate decided to be kind to you and you land, hard, on top of his big toe. Without wasting a single second, you dash forward, slipping and sliding on his toe nail, until you reached the skin of his foot. You climbed up on top of the cuticle and dashed along the bulbous part of the big toe, struggling over what amounted to a mountain of flesh (to your tiny size). Utilizing energy you didn't even know you had, you finally managed to reach the foot proper. At this point, with hundreds of feet of skin stretching to either side of you, you were far less likely to fall off. Your little heart beat inside your chest, your breath escaping you in harsh gasps as you laid perfectly still. You had completed the hard part of the mission. Now was the...actually equally hard, if not even harder, part of the mission: actually getting his attention. You groaned and looked up, Yamamoto's cheerful face just barely visible past his lean body, his shorts and shirt loosely hanging off his body. He looked so cool, calm, and in control. Too bad you knew just how spacey this guy could be!

Your heart jumps up in your throat as the mountainous teen suddenly starts moving, the foot you're resting on rising into the air before slapping against the floor with a resounding BOOM, the other foot following suit. There was literally nothing for you to hang on to, but, thankfully, Yamamoto had a straight step, his foot not tilting left or right. Every step still sent you flying into the air, only to crash back down on top of his foot and, after awhile, you were starting to feel dizzy. Soon enough, he stopped, allowing you to sit up and look around. Judging by the furniture, you appeared to be inside his living room. You looked behind you and saw Yamamoto sitting down, the T.V. flickering to life as he did so. You looked up at the screen, more gargantuan than any movie theater screen you had ever seen, and saw a huge man in uniform swinging a bat. Ah, so he was watching a baseball game and, judging by the scoreboard, it had only recently started. This was perfect! You had to use this time to try and get his attention!

Looking up at the seemingly endless landscape that was his foot, you realized that getting his attention would be quite difficult. Bending down, you slammed your fists as hard as you could against the top of his foot, succeeding only in hurting your hands. It was like punching steel! Your tiny fists wouldn't make any kind of impression on Yamamoto. Massaging your knuckles, you notice his legs. When you were more normal sized you had always thought his legs were hairless, but now you could see several strands all up and down his legs. Apparently, these hairs were too small to be normally seen unless you were looking very closely. You sighed. Well, you could try and keep climbing. choices: It was a group of guys you didn't recognize.
1111221112.content:
“Since the festival just started, it’s probably packed. Since everyone will be there, the pool won’t be as crowded as usual. Let’s go there first.” Tsuna suggested. Gokudera almost immediately agreed with his boss and called him brilliant. Tsuna just chuckled at the compliment.

“Don’t compliment him ever second!” you whispered to the giant from inside his spacious ear. “Once in awhile is okay, but not after every sentence he makes.” You heard Gokudera tsk softly so Tsuna wouldn’t hear him.

“I just need to change and grab my bathing shorts. Do you need to stop by your house to get yours?” the browned haired teen asked.

“No need, Tenth, I have mine right here.” Gokudera reached into his back pocket and pulled out a pair of swim trunks. Tsuna gave Gokudera a surprised and puzzled expression before mumbling an “okay” and heading up to his bedroom to change. Inside Gokudera’s ear, you face palmed.

“Why are you carrying your swim trunks with you? Who does that?” you asked.

“I’m prepared for anything! I thought the Tenth might want to go to the public pool today so I brought this with me. Now I don’t have to burden him by stopping by my place.” Gokudera explained to you as he pushed his trunks back into his pocket.

“Right…okay.”

A few minutes later, Tsuna came back down stairs wearing some shorts and a t-shirt. In one of his hands was a bright green pair of swimming trunks. The two males exchanged some words before heading out he door and into town. Along the way, you gave Gokudera some conversation ideas to use. The silver haired giant was reluctant to use some of them, but eventually gave in and was surprised at how interested Tsuna was in the topics. When the boys arrived at the pool, they were both laughing from a joke you told Gokudera. The day was kicking off to a good start.

The two of them entered the male locker room and, just as Tsuna had predicted, was completely empty. On a normal day it was filled with people changing.

“I’ll change over here and you can change here, okay?” Tsuna lead his companion to one hall of lockers while he walked off to a different one. Gokudera nodded as Tsuna disappeared from his sights. You began to listen as Hayato opened a locker and started to take his clothes off. A minute or two of rustling clothes later, the chain smoker cursed and you suddenly noticed his finger enter his ear. Before you could say anything, the gigantic digit picked you out of the ear…along with a big glob of earwax. Gokudera held his finger up to his face.

“I just thought of something, squirt. I can’t put you anywhere.” he told you. As you tried to unstick yourself from the earwax, you surveyed the giant’s half-naked body and realized the problem. No matter where Gokudera put you, you would probably be swept away by the water once he gets into the pool. “Maybe I can wrap some string around you and wear you as a necklace.”

“Then I’d be in plain sight…” you corrected him, finally freeing yourself from the glob.

“Oh, right. I guess you’ll just have to stay here.”

“You sure you can handle this by yourself?”

“I’ve been here with the Tenth plenty of times! You’ve been a great help so far, but I can do this by myself.”

“Fine, just don’t blow anything up.” you told him, worryingly, as he put you inside his locker…right next to his sweat-drenched shirt. “Ugh, why do I have to stay in here?!”

“Would you rather I put you here so you get sat on?” Gokudera pointed at the bench.

“Good point.”

“Gokudera, are you alright? I thought I heard you talking to someone.” came Tsuna’s voice from behind a few rows of lockers.

“I’m alright, Tenth. I’m all set so I’ll be right over.” the Storm Guardian called back as he rushed to join his secret crush. You heard the two talk as they exited the locker room and into the pool area. A few seconds later, you noticed that Gokudera had forgotten to close the locker in his rush.

“Oh well. It’ll be okay as long as no one…”

Before you could finish the sentence, you heard the doors to the pool open again and new footsteps enter the room. You cursed and hid underneath Gokudera’s clothes, taking in the full smell of teen musk. As you listened to the noises outside, you could hear the faint sound of dripping water accompanying the footsteps. Whoever had entered the locker room must just be coming back from the pool…
1111221112.title: Fun for Everyone...Except You

1112.content:
Tsuna taps his fingers a little, sighing. He really didn't know what to do with his life after getting such a bad mark on his paper. He looks at his pillow as he gets ready to lay down. Happening to look a little lower, he spots you... And sees you move.

"AAAH!" Tsuna jumps back, nearly falling off his bed. "Wh-What is that thing!?" He stammers, looking at you from the foot of his bed. He's shaking just a tiny bit as he gazes at you.

"H-Hey! You!" You shout, trying to get his attention again.

From this distance, all Tsuna hears is a loud squeaking sound. "Aw man... What kind of bug is that!?" He says to himself.

"I'm not a bug!" You shout out, looking angrily at the boy. You start to move tword him.

"Gross! I-It's coming right for me!" Tsuna shouts. He sprints out of the room, leaving you hanging.

"Aw man..." You look down, scratching your head. "Where's he going anyway..?"

Unfortunately for you, Tsuna arrives back shortly after, carrying a piece of paper, while holding something behind his back. You just look up at him in confusion. He holds an edge of the paper out, and filps you onto it! You jump and roll onto the sheet helplessly as you're then lifted from the floor.

"Aw, now what!?" You groan. Tsuna winces as he hears the strange squeaking noise coming from you. He sets you down on the table in the center of his room. You manage to get to your feet, only to see Tsuna weilding a large, brown object.

"Is that--" Before you even have another second to think, Tsuna slams the large shoe down on you. You scream out in pain as you feel the giant object crunch your weak little bones into pieces. The paper is suddenly stained in a sickly crimson red. All you can do is moan painfully, your muscles having their final little spasm. Looking down at you, Tsuna sees you still moving, and slams the shoe down on you again, this time putting both of his hands and pressing the heel down on top of you. You make a few more crunches, uttering your last, weak and pathetic groan, as the heel grinds into you.

Tsuna lifts his shoe from you, and sees that your body is squished of life.

"Phew..." Tsuna sighed. "That was gross... I've never seen a bug like that..." He said to himself. "Well, at least it didn't splatter on my rug!"

Tsuna crumples up the paper. It makes a soft squishing sound, which frankly, makes Tsuna feel a little sick to his stomach. He then tosses it into the waste bin in his room, and hops into bed.

"A nice nap is what I need to forget all about this..." He said to himself, pulling the fresh linen covers over himself. In a matter of minutes, the young Vongola heir is fast asleep, as your body is left to forever rot on a sheet of paper, a mere splatter of the former human you once were.
1112.title: Insecta Homo Sapien

choices: Ryohei thinks you're a bug, and slams his fist on you without a second thought!
Ryohei lifts the covers to see who it is.
Ryohei ignores it, and just goes about his business.
114.content:
Suddenly the door BURSTS off the hinges, slamming into the wall not far from where you are! "HEY!" A loud voice shouts, rushing into the room. "HEY! TSUNA!" He shouts, although he clearly sees no one here. "Huh... Where's the little guy hiding...?" He asked himself, looking around, peering into Tsuna's closet. "He better not be hiding out from me again..."

You knew who this was. Heck, the entire school knew who he was. Ryohei Sasagawa, the overenergetic captain of the boxing team. Truthfully, he was probably one of the last people that you wanted to see. Hoping to remain out of his sights, you crawl further back up the bed, trying to get away.

"Huh... Nothing..." Ryohei stood back up. He looked around for a brief moment. "Guess I should put the door back or something..." He walked over, and plucked the door up. Just as he did, he saw something moving under the sheets. At first he just dismissed it as nothing, but when he saw it shaking wildly with a little lump wandering underneath it, he knew something was up!
114.title: EXTREME!!!!!!!!!1

choices: Komui Lee (he forgot to tell you something)
12.content:
And to think, one week ago you were selling flowers at a boring flower shop in some boring town. You are James Arnold, 14-years-old. Four years ago your parents were killed by strange creatures called Akuma. You were rescued by a group of Exorcists from the Black Order and since then have always wanted to join them. One day, a man calling himself a General of the Black Order appeared before you. He presented you with your very own Innocence and offered you a place in the Black Order. You accepted without hesitation.

After giving you directions to the main Headquarters, the General disappeared and left you on your own. After traveling many miles, you finally arrived at the HQ and were taken in by your new family. It’s been two days since then and you’re currently waiting for your new anti-Akuma weapon to be completed using your Innocence. Finally, the door to your room opens and in walks the chief officer, Komui Lee.

“Sorry to keep you waiting, Mr. Arnold. Your anti-Akuma weapon has finally been completed.” announces the man as he hands you a small box. You didn’t expect it to be so small, and got even more discouraged when you opened the box to find nothing but a ring. “Don’t let the size fool you. Innocence is very powerful, once you learn to control it.” You thank him and he leaves you with a smile, closing the door on his way out. You inspect the ring in your palm. It’s a simple silver band with a white jewel engraved into it. Shrugging, you put the ring on your finger and reach out.

“Here goes nothing.” you utter under your breath. “Innocence, activate!”

The jewel glows with bright light, covering the entire room in white. You cover your eyes until the light dims. You notice your entire body is now glowing with the same light. Slowly, the room starts to get bigger and bigger. At first you think you’re making everything bigger, but then realize you’re the one getting smaller. You stop shrinking at two inches and the white glow vanishes.

“Well…this isn’t what I expected. Maybe I need to control it better, then I may be able to do other stuff with it.” You reach out your arm again and command the ring, but nothing happens. Confused, you try again…nothing. “Damnit, this isn’t good.”

As you continue fiddling with the ring, the door to your room suddenly opens. You’re greeted with the giant form of…
12.title: D.Gray-man

choices: He's right in front of you. Try and get his attention.
Better not risk it. Get out of the way.
Allen trips over something and falls forward. Oh shi-
121.content:
The door opened as Allen Walker walked in. You looked up at his giant form with both amazement and worry. Allen had been one of the first people you met when you arrived at the Black Order, and you really liked him. He was nice, funny, around your age, and someone who hoped to become friends with. But despite this, your only thought now was how easily Allen could crush you without knowing.

“That’s weird,” muttered Allen as he looked around the empty room with a puzzled expression. “I know I saw Komui enter to give him his anti-Akuma weapon. Where’d he go?” Allen scratched his chin with his arm, that at the same time, was his anti-Akuma weapon. His face lit up as he pounded that same hand into his other palm. “I get it. His weapon must allow him to teleport! Or maybe turn invisible.” Whatever it was, he was sure you’d teleport back soon (or appear suddenly to spook him if invisibly really was your power). Allen decided to wait in your room in the meantime. He started to walk forward, oblivious to your small form on the ground in front of him. His eyes glanced around the room, admiring the decorating you’d managed to do in the short time you were here.

The sound of Allen’s feet stomping across the stone floor alerted you of the incoming danger. Now was the time to decide whether to try and get his attention, or get out of the way before he got near.
121.title: Allen Walker

choices: Put on a jumping show and catch his eye
1212.content:
You broke out of your stupor and with stronger than normal motivation urged your legs to move move

You weren't aware of what you did, but you felt the air fly past you. The scenery, even though it takes up most of your view now went by. So much happened so fast that you forgot your footing and, strangely didn't land as painfully on the floor as you should have. The air was knocked out of you just as normally though.

"how..." That was when a loud boom accompanied by a shock wave that shook your being and made you bounce, did you realize what you had originally been running from. "Allen!"
You turned your head around to watch as he kept looking around your room, back turned towards you. He seemed to enjoy looking at the decor, trying to understand your personality probably.

The though of for what made you slightly happy. With that small bit of joy, you picked yourself up and dusted yourself off. "How do I get get his attention?" Without getting crushed.
You were no less bigger than his pinkie at best, and the slight dust he left on the ground fron his shoes were...

"...did I jump that far away!" From where you almost met your untimely death, the space fron you and the mark were roughly a normal foot from you. You turned and saw that you were just peeking out from under the bedframe. How?

Then, you looked down at your ring, and held the fist connected to it with your other hand. "So, this is what Innocence is capable of?" These innocence don't seem very innocent at all now.

"Geez," The giant stamped his foot down, even from far away it still made you feel like jelly. You watched him spin on his heel, sighing in the way only you knew Allen could. "where the heck did that guy go?"

"Allen HERE" you almost waved your hands in the air until you realized he wasn't looking at anything, and starting to walk where you were again!

You fumbled for a bit, landing on your rump, the tip of his shoes almost a breathes away from yours the scent of rubber invaded you nose. "I think ill just wait for a bit." They turned around quickly enough, and you heard the loud squeaking sounds of coils being compressed above. "I'll give it a few minutes then go. "

'Yes!' Quickly, not even questioning how you heard his voice so clearly from under the mattress, you jumped out into the open, and relatively stuck a two step landing, and swiveled to the boy.

His pants clad legs stretched up at an unreal length, elbows on the knees, and connected to his boyishly handsome face. The scar ever prominent near his thick white lashes. Which were closed because the cursed exorcist decided to hum some unknown song to himself.

You cup your hand around your mouth, and shouted. "Allen!"
Nothing. "ALLEN" you screamed, higher than you meant and nearly broke your voice. He just started bobbing his head.

"Hard way it is..." this was not going to be fun, but you needed his attention now. You steeled your resolve and-
1212.title: Better not risk it. Get out of the way.

1213.content:
Allen was getting closer, and if you didn’t move you were going be stepped on without him noticing. You were about to run to the left, and easy enough task, when suddenly you noticed Allen was walking toward something else. A small, bronze trophy was lying on the floor in front of him. It was a 3rd place fishing trophy you had won a few months back.

“Hey, look out!!” you shouted on impulse, but of course the giant Exorcist didn’t hear you. Instead his foot stepped on the bronze prize and knocked him off balance.

‘Woah!” Allen’s foot slipped off the trophy and into the air. The young Britain tried to regain his balance, but only managed to lean himself forward for his decent..
