After Soul joined up with Black Star again, the two buddies made their way toward the nearby park. Along the way, Black Star asked where you were and Soul replied that you were safe and sound in his pocket. The clueless Black Star had no idea Soul was lying and you were currently suffering under his smelly foot. Soul’s grin got a tiny but wider each time he stepped down on you and felt you squirm under his sole. Black Star never noticed anything wrong, as his friend always had that creepy grin on his face…

Eventually, Soul and Star reached the entrance to Death City’s park. Good timing too, as Soul’s grin was reaching its limit. Black Star put his hand son his hips and gave Soul a smile.

“Hey, Soul, how about a race to the other end of the park? It’ll help us digest.” Black Star said as he slammed his hand against his stomach where several pounds of egg and meat were still digesting.

“Or it could help us puke it up…” Soul replied sarcastically.

“Don’t be a smart ass! Are you game or what?”

“Fine, fine. Sounds like fun.”

“Good, in that case…readysetgo!” Black Star blurted out quickly before taking off like a bullet, Soul taking off a second later. It wasn’t long before Black Star, the more athletic and physically fit of the two, ran ahead and left Soul in the dust. The white haired pianist didn’t really care, however. He knew he didn’t stand a chance in a race with Black Star, but for once he didn’t care about winning. He knew that with every step me took, you were being pounded into his insole again and again. His running combined with the hot atmosphere of the park took its toll on Soul body, making the teen sweaty like crazy. Heat built up in his shoe as his feet began sweating, covering you with his perspiration. Your eyes began to tear up as the smell got worse by the second, going from horrendous to unbearable. Any fresh air in the shoe was quickly being eaten up by pure stink. If this continued, you may just pass out…or worse, suffocate.

After about eight minutes of nonstop running, Soul finally reached the opposite entrance to the park. Even though he wasn’t as fast as Black Star, he was still a pretty good runner and made it there in half the time it would take a normal person. The red-eyed Weapon collapsed on a nearby bench to catch his breath. As he sat there, panting like a dog, he glanced around for his friend. Surely he had gotten here before him, so where was he?

“Where did that muscle head run off to?” Soul asked himself as looked around, half-expecting him to jump out and attack him.

“Up here, slowpoke!” came a familiar voice. Soul looked up to see Black Star hanging from a tree branch and doing pull-ups. “You took so frickin long I decided to do some exercises while I waited.” The sleeveless ninja hurled himself off the tree, did a mid air flip, and landed flat on his feet. Soul clapped sarcastically and rolled his eyes. Black Star took a seat next to his friend and relaxed. You weren’t the only one who was being tortured with the stench of a sweating teen; Soul felt like he had just entered a football team’s locker room. He tried plugging his nose, but that didn’t seem to do anything against the Meister’s heavily sweating form.

“I think I’m going to rest somewhere else…” Soul mumbled as he got up and walked away. Black Star mumbled his own response but suddenly dozed off. Apparently, he was more tired then he thought…

Soul Eater Evans made his way into a secluded part of the park near some trees. The trees provided some great shade and Soul happily plopped himself against one. Now that he was alone, he could play with you some more…
13211112111122212221.title: The Race

choices: Doesn't Blame Soul...You're A Jerk and He Wants to Join In!
Wants to Ask You About It
132111121111222122212.content:
Soul leaned down and took the shoe containing you off, when he did this it was like a blast of hot cheesy steam blasted him in the face. He shivered and waved a hand in front of his face to try to fan away the smell. He couldn't imagine being your size and being trapped in there with his foot on a day like this.

Taking a deep breath, Soul lowered his face towards the opening of his shoe, he peered in, spotting you lying right where he had left you...though you weren't moving much. At first Soul thought you were dead and panicked, "Crap crap crap! I killed him with my foot! Star'll have my ass!" he thought while still holding his breath and going a bit pale at the thought of Star's wrath.

Then he saw your leg twitch a little. He took his face away and replaced it with his fingers. He reached into the slimy inside of the shoe and plucked you out by your ankle. He brought you up to his face, he was breathing now and caught a whiff of you. "Wow.....little dude smells just like my feet!" Soul muttered to himself. He noticed you were pretty beat up. He started panicking again. "If Black Star sees you like this I'll never get to play with you again!"

That's when Soul's brain hatched a wicked idea. He grinned evilly, showing off his razor sharp teeth.

Soul tip-toed over to Black Star, quickly catching a whiff of the blue haired meister's sweat and B.O. He grimaced, not wanting to touch him even to shake him awake. But his addiction to playing with the tiny you overwhelmed him and he touched Star's sweaty shoulder and shook it. "*snooooreee* Muh....Leeme 'lone!" Star said as he rolled over in the grass.

Soul sighed and kicked Black Star in the butt.

"Ouch! What the heck was that for!?" Black Star said sitting up and rubbing the sleep from his eyes.

Soul sighed, trying to hide his excitement. "Star....I have something to tell you about that shrimp of yours."

"Huh? What?"

"When he was with me he was making jokes about you....Mean jokes....He called you names and I was just trying to stick up for you..."

Black Star frowned. ".....Go on."

Soul grinned inwardly, he had him now.

"So I kinda.....punished him by putting him in my shoe during the race." Soul said sheepishly.

Black Star...
132111121111222122212.title: Soul's Trick

choices: The duo play with you in the park.
Black Star sticks you somewhere and the two of them go somewhere else.
1321111211112221222121.content:
Black Star just stared at Soul for a moment. At first Soul thought he was thinking of a way to kick his ass for putting his little friend in his shoe, but was soon corrected. Black Star suddenly erupted into laughter, falling onto his back and rolling around in the grass. Soul’s signature grin returned to his face; his plan was a success. Black Star got to his feet and wiped a tear from his eye.

“Hehe…that must have STUNK!” Black Star exclaimed while glancing down at Soul’s shoes. “I’d feel sorry for him, but he deserves it for cracking jokes about me! No one jokes about the BIG me!”

“It did stink. It was so bad, it knocked the poor guy unconscious.” Soul explained as he brought his fist before Star’s eyes and opened it to reveal your immobile form. The Meister peered closely at you, chuckling at your beat up appearance. He took a big sniff, almost strong enough to lift you off of Soul’s hand!

“Oh man, he reeks! Let me see him.” Black Star snatched you out of Soul’s hand and brought you up to his face. “You really had me fooled, bug. After I was all set on helping you, you go and make jokes about me behind my back.” The blue-haired assassin began shaking you roughly, uncaring of any harm he might bring you. “Wake up, little punk! I’m speaking to you!”

Black Star continued to shake you like an action figure until he heard you groan. He stopped waving his hand around and watched you stir awake.

“Ugh…what happened?” you asked as you opened your eyes and adjusted them to the light. You winced at the pain from your bruised body. “I feel terrible…Soul, please don’t hold me so hard, it’s starting to-” You stop when you notice that the one holding you is not Soul, but Black Star. “Black Star!! Thank god! You wouldn’t believe what Soul did to me!”

“I already heard. He put you in his shoe with his sweaty foot.”

“So he told you? It was horrible! I thought I was going to be crushed a few times, and the smell was unbearable! I thought I was going to suffocate in there.”

“Well, it’s a good thing you didn’t die, little guy.”

“Yeah…”

“If you had, I wouldn’t have had the chance to punish you too!”

“Yeah…wait, what? What for?!”

“What do you think? You thought you could make jokes about the guy who’s going to surpass God and get away with it? Tough luck, shortly!”

“Wha-? But, I didn’t…” Your eyes widened and you turned your head to see Soul grinning at you. He was clearly trying to suppress his laughter, but Black Star was too busy glaring at you to notice. “No, Black Star! He’s lying to you! I never said any of those things!”

“Ha! Why would Soul lie to me? He and I are good buddies, right Soul?”

“You betcha!” Soul replied before the two teens bumped fists.

“So, what do you say, Soul? Wanna show this jerk who’s boss together?”

“Sounds cool.” Soul looked down at you and grinned sadistically. You couldn’t believe this was happening. Black Star, the one person you though was your protector in this world of giants, was against you! All because of HIM. This was very, very not good!
1321111211112221222121.title: From Friend to Enemy

choices: You were inside Black Star's sock again, this time on purpose!
You were trapped in Soul's armpit.
13211112111122212221211.content:
“So…uhh, how do we punish him? I’ve only punished squirts who talk trash to me by beating them to a pulp. I can’t do that with this guy; he’ll probably die with one punch!” Black Star explained, excited about showing you your place, but not quite sure how to do it.

“Use your brain for once, idiot. You’re like a god to him. A big, sweaty, smelly god…with big feet.”

“Ooooh, I see. Big feet, eh?” Black Star grinned down at you as evil thoughts began filling his head. You watched, terrified, as the muscular teem sat down on the grass and placed you down on the ground before proceeding to take one of his shoes off. Upon instinct, you spun around and tried to run, but Soul was quick to block your path. The pianist sat down opposite of Star, creating a deafening boom as his butt made contact with the earth. “Make sure he doesn’t go anywhere, Soul. We wouldn’t want him escaping punishment.” Star said as he pried off his left shoe, exposing his socked foot. His feet were so sweaty and foul that you actually saw how the sock had become dirtied just by being around them. The Meister saw you staring at his foot and smiled. “You know all about my foot, bug. I bet that’s why you made jokes about me; because I made one mistake and left you in my sock. You should have just left things alone, because now you’ve made an even BIGGER mistake.”

Black Star slipped off his sock, releasing a gust of smelly air as he did. For a moment, you thought you saw the stench rise from his bare foot. You sniffed the air and caught scent of a familiar smell. You turned around just in time for Soul to bring his foot down on you, pinning you under it. You pleaded to Soul, but the cruel teen just smothered you with his steamy foot as he worked on getting his other foot free. Soon, Black Star had gotten both his feet free of their containers and asked Soul to bring you over to him. Soul gripped your small body with his toes and lifted you into the air. You were deposited onto the grass between the two giants, and as soon as Soul took his foot away, you were engulfed in the shadow of Black Star’s foot. You looked up at the foot as Star wiggled its cheesy toes in anticipation.

Black Star slowly brought his foot down upon you until the ball of his foot touched your nose. As soon as it did, your eyes bulged out of your head and you shouted in horror. Before you could get away from the unbearable smell, Black Star stomped down on you and pinned you under his gigantic foot. He cackled evilly as he rolled you under his sole like a ball, covering you with sweat and dirt. The smell was horrifying…much worse then this morning. You felt a moment of relief when he took his foot away, but it lasted just a second because his other foot came down to smother you some more.

“Don’t hog him.” Soul stated, prompting Black Star to take his foot off you and use his big toe to flick you in Soul’s direction. Soul ordered you to stand up, which was difficult for you to do. When you finally managed to push yourself to your feet, Soul positioned both his feet on either side of you and slammed them together. You were squashed between both his soles as he began grinding them together, causing you excruciating pain. As Soul continued to rub his feet together, he wiped his forehead with his sleeve and looked to see it soaked with sweat.

“I can’t stand this heat…Black Star, do you think anyone would mind if I took off my shirt?” Soul asked, pulling on his collar.

“Go ahead. I don’t think there are many people here besides us.” the blue haired Meister replied. Soul glanced around to see that he was right and proceeded to tug his yellow and black jacket over his head. Once it was off, he tossed it aside and leaned back with a sigh of relief. His lightly muscled torso glistened with sweat in the sunlight. Black Star glanced over at his buddy and snickered. “You should really hit the gym more often, Soul. You’re starting to get scrawny.”

“Shut up.” Soul spat. “Aren’t you going to take yours off?”

“Nah, this is nothing. You should see me after my daily workout!” Black Star laughed and then suddenly realized something. “Hey wait, I just remembered! I didn’t put any deodorant on today.”

“No wonder you smell like moldy cheese.” Soul fanned the front of his face as he caught a whiff of Star’s B.O. He then realized the smell wasn’t coming from his friend…it was coming from him! Soul lifted his arm and took a sniff of his pit. “Ugh! Looks like I forgot too…”

“Hmm…why don’t we put some on right now?” Black Star grinned at his friend.

“What are you talking ab-” the weapon began to say, before he noticed Black Star was staring at his feet. With a wicked smirk, Soul opened his feet up and plucked you out. At first you thought the punishment was over, until Soul tossed you though the air and you landed in Black Star’s palm. His tree-like fingers wrapped around you as he brought you to his grinning face.

“Your punishment’s just started, squirt! You thought my feet were bad, just wait till you get a load of this!” the ninja lifted his other arm up, exposing his damp armpit. Your face twisted into one of repulse and horror and you began squirming madly in Black Star’s fist. Unfortunately, the trained Meister had more strength in one of his fingers then you had in your entire body. You could do nothing but watch as Black Star moved you under his arm and pushed you into the sweaty pit. You screamed at the first hint of B.O. hitting you nostrils, causing some sweat to enter your mouth. You choked on the liquid, but this didn’t stop Black Star from moving you up and down his skin. Tiny blue hairs pricked your body as you were dragged all over the sweaty teen’s armpit. Star removed you from his pit after several seconds and moved you into his other sweaty hand. You breathed in the fresh air while you could, because you were soon plunged into the other pit and smothered with male musk once again.

When Black Star was finished applying his deodorant, he tossed you back over to Soul who caught you with his left hand. Smirking down at you, he said, “You ready for his, little man?”

You shook your head and tried to stop him, but like Black Star before him, Soul lifted his arm over his head and pressed you against his pit. Your eyes watered as the body odor made its way up your nose and everywhere else on your shrunken body. Soul wasn’t as bad as Black Star, but at this point you couldn’t tell the difference. Soul used you to soak up the sweat under both his arms before he was finished with you. You lied their, totally defeated and humiliated, in Soul’s grip. The white haired, crimson eyed male stared at you with not one hint of remorse.

“So my feet alone can knock you out, but the stench of both of us still leaves you conscious?”

The moment he said this, your eyes rolled into the back of your head and you passed out.

“That’s more like it.”

Later, when you came to…
13211112111122212221211.title: Unjust Punishment

choices: Star Takes You Out...Only to Put You In his armpit & lift weights
132111121111222122212111.content:
Your eyes opened, only to start stinging due to some sort of greasy liquid that seemed to drip into your eyes. Against your better judgment you inhaled, and your body seemed to convulse. It was a sour reeking odor, and you recognized something familiar in the tremendous stench. You forced yourself to take another small sniff, and your memory jarred, You remembered being in Star's sock and smelling something similar to this, and you definitely remember being foot tortured by him and having his foot shoved in you face and smelling it! You guessed you were in his sock which was in his shoe, yet you weren't being pinned down, you were surrounded by two walls of greasy flesh that once in awhile closed in on you from both sides and pinched your face between them. Shoving your face forward into a pile of unrecognizable mush.

It was dark in here, but you knew you were between Black Star's toes, and you knew what that mush between his toes that he kept forcing your head into was, it was his toejam! "Gross..." you choked out as his toes pinched your cheeks together, making you pucker your lips and make you seem as though you were kissing his toejam. Your lips were covered in the gunk, and your cheeks were filled up so that you looked like some sort of toejam chipmunk ready for toejam winter.

You were forced to swallow the mixture of lint, sweat, and who knows what else before you were forced to kiss his toe crotch again. You weren't being crushed underneath any of his weight for some reason, he didn't seem to be standing or sitting down. You tried to move your arms to try to stop his toes' attack, but they were glued to the cotton material of the inside of his sock by all that dried sweat.

Outside of your prison, Black Star was doing chin ups in the gym, he wasn't too concerned about his exercise today as he was making himself as sweaty and smelly as possible for more fun with you! Soul sure knew how to have fun! He was glad they were friends, He was even nice enough to tell him about the little jerk talking about him! What a guy! "I'll show you.....little....punk!" Star said getting angry at you as he kept squeezing you into his toejam again and again and again.

Since Soul had had his turn with you, he made Star promise to come find him when they could have more fun with the shrimp together, in the meantime, Soul was devising more ways to use their gargantuan bodies to torment you.
132111121111222122212111.title: Black Star's Sock

choices: Black Star heads for the showers to cool off.
Black Star uses you as his sweat rag.
1321111211112221222121111.content:
After his 500th chin up, Black Star felt some movement in his sock. The powerful meister let go of the bar and sat down on a nearby weight bench. He kicked off both his shoes and then tugged off his left sock (the one that didn’t have you in it). He brought the dingy sock up to his nose and took a big whiff of it. Instead of recoiling back like Soul might, he smiled in contentment.

“Ahh, nice and raunchy. That tiny jerk must really regretting his decision now.” Black Star laughed before tossing the worn out sock over his shoulder and tugging off his right one. Before doing so, he made sure to grip your head tightly between his cheesy toes. He discarded the sock brought his foot up to his chest. There you were, trying desperately to free your head from his meaty toes. The assassin laughed at your helpless situation before grabbing you by your kicking leg and dangled you before his face. “Hey there, small fry. I felt you wiggling down there! I was beginning to think my foot killed you.”

You adjusted your eyes to the light and looked around. Despite everything being upside-down you could tell you were inside of a gym. The smell of musk was all around you, mainly coming from the huge teen hold you. You also noticed that Soul wasn’t anywhere to be found…

“Black Star, you have to listen to me! Soul’s lying to you; I never said anything bad about you! I forgave you for leaving me in your sock!”

Black Star’s face twisted with anger as he spun you around and gripped you tightly in his fist.

“Are you calling my best friend a liar? Don’t you know when to stop talking trash about people bigger then you? I think you WANT to be pummeled!” Black Star made a fist with his other hand threatened you with it. You trembled in fear and whimpered.

“N-no…I didn’t mean…I just…”

“Shut up already! I’m tired of hearing your squeaky little voice!” Black Star shouted at you, unintentionally blowing stinky air in your face. His breath wasn’t the worse of his problems, however, as Star quickly raised one of his arms and slapped out against his pit. Hard. The impact was enough to knock the wind out of you, and it didn’t get any better as Black Star began rubbing you into the flesh. Once you stuck to his pit like glue, he took his hand away and lied down on the workout bench. You couldn’t see what he was doing, since your face was stuck to his hot flesh. You could only hear him grunt as he grabbed hold of the weight and lifted it into the air. When he brought it down to his chest, his bulky arm squashed you into his armpit. His muscles were so hard…it was like being stuck between a rock and a hard place. Every time he raised the weight up, you would be given a second of fresh air before his arm came back down again pressed hard against your back. You tried pleading with him again, but all this did was force some sweat down your throat. You were lucky your nose and mouth weren’t completely pressed against his skin or else you would have suffocated or drowned via his perspiration.

Black Star pumped iron for a whole ten minutes. He sweated so much during those minutes that a small pool of his body fluids began to form under the weight bench. His messy hair became soaked and his black shirt clung firmly to his torso, leaving little to the imagination. When he was finally done he put the weight down, sat up, picked up a nearby bottle of water, and gulped it all down.

“Ahhh, what a rush!” the exercise nut exclaimed as he crushed the plastic bottle in his hand and tossed it into the recycle bin on the other end of the room. He grabbed a towel off the floor and wiped his face with it, but when he removed it he found it soaked as if he had dipped it into a pool. “Hehe, looks like my sweat is too much for this wimpy piece of cloth!”
1321111211112221222121111.title: A Sweating Machine

choices: Soul Comes In...Star Is Seconds Away From Stomping You Underfoot
13211112111122212221211112.content:
Black Star heard a small whimper coming from his armpit, he lifted his arm, ignoring the odor that greeted him. He peeked in there and saw you of course, he had momentarily forgotten about you. He looked from his armpit to the cloth and got a nasty idea. He set the cloth down on the bench and sat down next to it, he peeled you out of his armpit and set you down on the cloth. "Dry off." He said trying to hide his smile.

You had no problem obeying that order! You used the dry areas of the cloth to dry yourself off. Once you were finished you looked up at Black Star, who smirked evilly down at you and snatched you up. "H-Hey! What are you-"

But you didn't have a chance to finish as Star brought his sweaty foot up and started rubbing you all over it. First he got the heel, then the sole, then the dreaded cheesy toes. Once both feet were done, he dried you off roughly with the towel, then rubbed you into his armpits. He was chuckling loudly, thankfully the gym was deserted due to school still being in session.

Once both pits got your treatment, Star set you down on the towel and began to put his socks back on. You had had enough though, and you were about to let Star know it!

"HEY!" you screamed up at the blue haired teen.

Star turned to you, startled.

"What the hell is wrong with you guys!? Do you think this is fun torturing me like this!? You guys are sick! And you stink!" You would've said more but the death glare Star was giving you stopped you.
13211112111122212221211112.title: Black Star uses you as his sweat rag.

choices: Soul comes up with a dire punishment for you.
You beg Black Star for forgiveness.
132111121111222122212111121.content:
“I wonder what Black Star’s doing to that shrimp.” Soul pondered as he walked through the streets of Death City. He took a sip from a soda he had just bought; it was the perfect thing to help him cool down. He arrived at the front of the city’s gym and glanced over the stylish signboard. “That guy is something else. A hot day like this would make any normal person want to relax in some air conditioning or visit the pool, but not him. He’d rather hit the gym and sweat till he floods the place!”

Soul pushed himself through the glass doors and made his way into the building. He walked through some doors until he reached the area Star said he’d be in. As soon as he entered, he caught whiff of the meister’s inhuman body odor.

“Ugh! This is definitely the right room, no doubt about that.” Soul muttered to himself as he glanced around the room. He spotted Black Star, the only person there. He was standing and Soul could clearly see that he had worked up one hell of a sweat. “Hey, Star, what are you doing? Where’s the pipsqueak?”

“YOU FUCKING PIECE OF FILTH!!” Black Star suddenly shouted, making Soul jump back in surprise. Shit, had he figured out that he was being lied to? “I’M GONNA CRUSH YOU LIKE A BUG!!!”

Soul figured out he was talking to you and glanced down at the floor to see you shivering in fear. Black Star already had his bare foot raised over you and ready to end you.

“I’m sorry, I’m sorry!” you beg like a little child who’s upset his parents.

“Stop talking!” Black Star yelled, glaring at you with murderous intent. Was this the same Black Star that had offered to help you just hours before? “You think you can talk to the great Black Star like that? Prepare yourself, because I’m about to turn you into toe jam!”

“Whoa, whoa!” Soul walked up to Black Star and touched him on the shoulder. He immediately regretted this, as he drew his palm back to see it covered with slimy sweat. “What happened? Your yelling really isn’t cool.”

“This ungrateful bitch talked back to me! ME! He called me sick and said I stink.”

“Well you do stink…” Soul muttered under his breath. “Sounds like our little buggy friend said something he shouldn’t have. I agree, Black Star, you should crush him like the bug he is.”

“Glad you agree, now watch what happens to those that insult the BIG me!” Black Star smirked down at you and got ready to stomp down with all his strength. Soul knew that if he did that, he wasn’t just going to crush you, but also cause massive damage to the gym…

“Hold on, Black Star. We’ve barely had him a day and you want to crush him already? We won’t be able to toy around with him anymore, and I’ve thought up a bunch of new ways we can humiliate him. Put your foot down and lets come up with a way to punish him.”

Black Star sighed and relaxed his foot. “Fine, but you better hurry up and think of something good, or else I’m turning Mr. Bug into Mr. Mush!”

Soul began to get nervous and began thinking of a way to punish you severely without killing you. If Black Star made a giant hole in the floor, he’d be the one who got stuck with the bill…

Meanwhile, at Black Star’s feet, you continued to stare up at the giant, intimidating teen with pure fear. He was really going to crush you, all because you lost your temper. You didn’t want your dreams to become a reality. You thought about the dream you had where Black Star sat on you. His ass had crushed you so easily…and now that could really happen! The smell of male sweat was the least of your problems in this gigantic world!
132111121111222122212111121.title: Saved by the Soul

choices: ...After The Game The Boys Want You to Service Them.
During The Game One of the boys sticks you somewhere
1321111211112221222121111211.content:
Soul smirked as various ideas worked their way through his brain. He whispered something in Star's ear who nodded as he listened to what was being said. Once Soul was finished Star had a big wicked smile on his face. "I think the first option would work great." Star said as both the giant's eyes slowly turned down to little you shivering in fear down at their feet.

Black Star reached down to pick you up, you thought he was going to crush you and ran off in the opposite direction. Your path was blocked by Soul's shoe! Who just grinned down at you and plucked you up himself. "You're gonna pay for running away like that, shrimpy!" Soul smirked.

Soul tucked you safely in his pocket, he wasn't going to torture you...yet. Black Star slipped his socks back on and put on his shoes. "Ready for our basketball game Soul?" Star said loud enough for you to hear in his friend's pocket. "Hell yeah!" Soul said slapping Star a high five.

You were horrified at the possibilities of being made to play basketball with these giants. Were they going to work up a sweat for you or use you as a ball? You had no idea. But you found out soon enough when the two boys entered the gym's outdoor basketball court. The sun was still blazing hot in the sky, perfect conditions for a game.

Soul took you out of his pocket and carelessly dropped you onto the court. You weren't hurt very bad, but you scraped your elbow a bit. You then heard a thumping sound, it made your ears ring, it was coming from behind you. You turned around, and just inches away from your head Star was dribbling an orange basketball.

"Oh shi-" You yelped before jumping out of the way as the boys began their game...What a nightmare!
1321111211112221222121111211.title: Soul's Dire Punishment

choices: Yes. You survive with only minor injuries.
No. Soul feels a crunch under his foot while he plays.
13211112111122212221211112112.content:
A nightmare indeed. All around you were the constant booming being caused by the giants’ feet or the giant basketball bashing against the concrete every second. Like the teens above you, you had to constantly move or face extermination via their stomping feet or the ball. Soul and Star were mostly focused on competing against each other and only occasionally glanced down to see whether you had been crushed under their heavy power or not. By some stroke of good luck, you remained alive for the first ten minutes of the game. There were a few close calls, though. You couldn’t count the number of times that basketball had almost come down upon you, missing you by mere inches. You felt like you were playing a video game where your character had to dodge a giant orb of doom while moving around the level. Unlike a video game, you only had one life and then it was GAME OVER.

“Time out, Black Star.” Soul said after seeing his friend score another point. He wiped some sweat off his brow and sat down on the court. “I need to catch my breath.”

“Come on, scrawny! We just got started!” Black Star replied as he spun the ball on the tip of his finger. Despite having just worked out, he didn’t appear as tired as he should have been.

“I’ll be ready in a minute.” Soul scanned the ground around him and spotted you directly next to him. You had seen that the giants were taking a break and sat down yourself to nurse your scraped elbow. Soul smirked and snatched you up before you could notice. “Hey there, shrimpy. Enjoying your punishment? It’s really dangerous down there, I bet. You could be crushed just like that!” Soul warned, snapping his fingers.

“Please don’t put me back down there! I’ll go anywhere else, just not there!” you plead, not wanting to end up a stain on the court that would just be washed off the next time it was cleaned.

“But this is supposed to be your punishment, shrimpy. The danger is just part of it! …however, since you said anywhere…”

Soul stuck out his right foot and began taking off his shoe. When he finally pulled it off with enough force, his sweaty foot was released and a breeze happened to blow the stench toward you and him. The both of you made a disgusted face…

“Man, those reek! They seem to get smellier each hour…” Soul comments before shoving you into his shoe. He presses you firmly against the sweat soaked insole, forcing a bit of the sweat to make it way into your mouth. You don’t have time to gag, as Soul quickly shoves his foot back into his shoe to once again trap his hellish smelling foot. He stands up, pressing you deeper into his shoe. You hiss in pain, not only from the pressure, but also from the sweat that brushes over your scrapped elbow. It stings and there isn’t a thing you can do to stop it…

“You ready?” Black Star asks, not noticing his friend stick you in his shoe. He thought you were still scurrying around the basketball court. The blue haired meister actually hoped you got smashed under the basketball; it’s what you deserve, after all.

“Yep, bring it!” Soul shouts before the two continue their game. You endure every step Soul takes just like before. You might be getting pounded into submission every second, but at least you weren’t going to die…

…at least, that’s what you thought at first. This wasn’t like when Soul was just walking down the street or racing in the park. He was really pushing his body to its limits in order to beat Black Star, unconsciously putting his weight on his right foot numerous time. The first time Soul jumped to block one of Black Star’s shots, you felt his entire weight come down on you and compress you into the shoe. Then, the second time…

“AAAHH!!” you scream in pain as one of your ribs crack under the pressure. The pain, the stench, the feeling of warm sweat dripping over your body. Soul knew that this was going to be a nightmare for you, whether you were on the court or in his shoe. “Soul, please stop! You’re hurting me!” you try screaming, but Soul is incapable of hearing you over the sound of his dribbling. He rushes past Black Star and tosses the ball into the hoop, scoring another point.

“Bullseye!” Soul exclaims while stomping down with his foot, pressing his sole against you again. A drop of sweat drips down his sole and makes its way into your mouth. You tear up a bit as you choke on the foul tasting liquid and are forced to swallow it.

Soul and Black Star play for another twenty minutes, both scoring right after the other. They’re both great players and anyone could win. Who was going to win wasn’t the important question here, however. The important question was…were you going to survive this?
13211112111122212221211112112.title: Off the Court and Into the Shoe

132111121111222122212111121121.content:
"Good game Star....Even though I lost." Soul says grinning as he slaps his buddy a high five.

"Yeah, Don't feel bad, Nobody could beat someone as big as Black Star!" Star says proudly as he grins.

Soul rolls his eyes, but decides to let Star have his glory, he's got something else on his mind. "Hey Star, You know where the twerp is?" Soul said trying to get you to move in his shoe, seeing if you were still alive.

"I don't see him anywhere!" Star said suddenly checking the bottoms of his shoes.

Soul tried to hide his laughter, "Check the ball."

Star did so, and still you were nowhere to be found. "Hmm....." Star hmm'd when suddenly Soul burst out laughing in a fit so big he had to sit down until he gained control of himself. "You have him don't you?" Star said coming to the bench and sitting down next to Soul. "...Maybe." Soul grinned evilly.

"Lemme guess...he's in your shoe again.....Probably dead." Star said without a hint of remorse.

"I dunno, lets check." Soul said and pulled off his shoe.

Star and Soul wrinkled their noses at the foul smell emanating from Soul's sockless foot. "Pee-u! Man....I'd hate to be him right now!" Star said holding his nose.

Soul grimaced and nodded as he held his shoe up, ignoring the odor, and reached in and plucked out you. Amazingly you were still conscious, just a little beat up.

"Hey there! How was it?" Star asked with a cheery smile.

You quivered in fear and didn't answer.

"Hey shrimp! My friend Black Star here asked you a question!" Soul said lightly shaking you.

You looked up at Star, and answered. "It was," Suddenly an idea came into your head.

What if you told them you liked it, and they didn't think it was fun anymore to torture you with their feet?

"Well?" Soul asked impatiently.

"It was.....cool!" You say trying to force a smile.

Soul and Star looked at each other in wonder. Soul had a feeling you were up to something, and he had a notion of what it was. So he tucked you in his pocket for a minute, and he and Star spoke quietly to one another.

"I don't get it, he likes it now?" Star asked bewildered.

"Don't be stupid! He's trying to trick us so we won't do it anymore!" Soul whispered back.

Star's eyes got big and then he glared at Soul's pocket.

"I have a plan on how we can break him and catch him in his lie.....Then we can punish him even worse!"

"Great idea!"

Soul grinned toothily and took you out of his pocket, he held you in his palm and informed you, "Since you apparently like the smell of our feet now...You wouldn't mind giving them a good rub would ya?"

You were horrified, but you tried to stay strong and go on with your plan. "S-Sure! I wouldn't mind at all!"

"Great! Then lets get started!"
132111121111222122212111121121.title: You Survive....But Now What?

choices: Soul's used to Black Star's attitude and hands you over to him.
Soul refuses and Black Star becomes angry.
1321111211112221222121111211212.content:
Without wasting any time, Soul placed you down by his feet and began taking off his other shoe.

“You don’t mind if I go first, right?” Soul asked his buddy next to him.

“Why not? If he really does like our feet now; he can have the best for last!” Black Star exclaimed, flexing his toes eagerly in his shoes. Those pair of shoes were the only things that were containing Black Star’s reeking feet.

Soul placed his other shoe down and stretched both his feet out at you. You took a step back as his smelly feet got closer. This movement was caught by Soul.

“Why are you stepping back, bug? Don’t you think my feet are cool?” Soul asked while wiggling his toes.

“Um…yeah. They’re really cool. It’s just…the smell of both of them is overwhelming. Can I perhaps rub one at a time?”

“Tsk…fine.” Soul spat as he took one foot away and held the other over your head. “Get rubbing, shrimp!”

You didn’t have to be told twice. You were all too familiar with these feet after being pulverized under them for so long. It didn’t take much to make you to press yourself against the sole and start rubbing. The weapon’s foot was hard under your touch, but also sweaty and damp. The smell burned your eyes line onions and the heat being emitted from sole was making you sweat yourself. How could anyone actually like this? Regardless, they seemed to be believing your act…you couldn’t stop now.

Soul relaxed on the bench while watching you like a hawk. He knew you were trying to fool him, so he knew you were currently in pain and only trying to hide it. He also noticed something else while watching you…he really enjoyed looking down at you from way up here. It was an intoxicating feeling of power! On the other hand, when you glanced up a few times at him, you felt puny and insignificant. At your size, Soul could dominate you with nothing but his cold stare!

“Time for the other one.” Soul announced as he tore his foot away from your hands and replaced it with his other smelly friend. You immediately got to work again, obeying Soul’s commands to “Go faster!” or “Harder!” Soul still didn’t seem satisfied with your humiliation, however, and moved his foot down a but so you were rubbing the area just below his toes. The sharp teethed teen grinned as he curled his toes around your head, squeezing it a little. You became startled by this and began to writhe. “Stop squirming and keep rubbing!” he shouted, squeezing a little harder to make you stop and get back to work. While you rubbed, he occasionally rubbed your head between his toes and even forced your face between them.

“Is it my turn yet?” Black Star asked, tapping his foot impatiently.

“A few more minutes…” Soul replied while he had his head leaned up against the bench.

“Does it really feel that good?”

“Oh yeah. It feels awesome.”

“Grrr…I’ve had it!” Black Star growled and pushed Soul right off the bench. As the white haired weapon fell to the ground, you felt a tug on your head and you were brought along with him. Black Star took Soul’s position and smiled down where you used to be. “Hey, where’d the shrimp go?!”

“What’s your problem, Black Star!” Soul yelled as he rubbed the back of his head. “You could of just asked me to move!”

“Ha! The great Black Star asks no one for permission! If someone’s in my way, I just push them aside! It doesn’t matter who they are, may it be man, woman, child, or God himself!”

Soul glared angrily at Black Star. He was his best friend, but sometimes that superiority complex of his could get out of hand. While Black Star looked down at Soul smugly, he spotted you kicking wildly with your head still caught between Soul’s cheesy toes.

“There you are! Soul, hand him over!” Black Star demanded, pointing at you. Soul looked down at you and then back at Black Star. Was he serious right now? First he pushes him away like trash and then he demands something from him? You, who could hear everything, wondered how Soul could put up with Black Star for so long.
1321111211112221222121111211212.title: Putting on the Act

choices: You admit your lie and face your punishment.
13211112111122212221211112112121.content:
“Fine, oh mighty Black Star.” Soul said sarcastically as he plucked you out of his toes. He was used to Black Star’s antics by now. This was the typical Black Star on a typical day. Nothing to be surprised about. Soul tossed you at the bigger teen and you watched the huge body of Black Star quickly approaching. You thought Star would catch you in his sweaty palm, but for some reason he did not. Instead, he simply watched as you smacked against his hard chest face first and rolled down his shirt to his lap.

“Ow…” you groaned as you rubbed your bruised nose. You felt like you had just run into a rock wall. You look up to see Black Star grinning down at you like a playful god.

“Hehe, not there, little man. You belong a little lower…” Black Star jokes as he plucks you off his crotch and deposits you back on the ground. You wince in pain as you land on your ass, but Black Star is already removing his shoes and socks and doesn’t notice your pain. As you finish nursing your bruised but, Black Star finished taking off his footwear and stomps both his large feet on either side of you. The resulting quake knocks you back to the ground, hitting your head against a pebble. You’re getting bruised and battered, and the torture hadn’t even begun yet!

“I got a nice treat for you, little man.” Black Star says as he lifts both his bare feet off the ground and places them in front of you. You gag at the smell and cover your nose with both hands. The smell is beyond horrific…as if Black Star’s feet are possessed and you’re smelling the evil. “Why are you covered your nose? Get over here and rub the feet you love so much!”

“Please…” you mumble. “One foot at a time…”

“Don’t order me around, pest!” Black Star shouts, glaring down at you. Soul, who’s seated himself next to Black Star, gives you a look as if to say “Just do it before he blows his top”.

You reluctantly approach both feet, which are side by side, and reach out one hand to rub the left one. You plan on rubbing one for a few seconds before switching to the other one, but you don’t even get to rub for two seconds before Black Star’s shouting again…

“You’re really starting to piss be off, shrimpy! Use both hands! Stop being so frightened or else I’m gonna crush you!”

You whimper and release your nose, allowing Black Star’s foot fumes to burn the inside of it. You place one hand on each of Black Star’s soles and begin rubbing vigorously. Your eyes are tearing up so much from the stench and sweat that you can barely see in front of you. Both of the gods see your miserable state but don’t say a thing. They know you’re putting on an act to trick them and play along for a little longer.

“Ahh, you were right, Soul. This feels great.” Black Star said as he stares down at you with half-opened eyes. Like Soul, he felt a sense of superiority when he looked down at your pathetic form. He was always feeling superior, but this was different. He was really lording over someone like a god. This was much better then being the nice guy and trying to help you. He was actually glad you had decided to make the mistake of cracking jokes about him.

“You’re a great little foot slave, little man. I think we’re going to give you a reward for this!”

“You are?” you ask as you continue to rub his feet.

“We are?” Soul asked, bewildered.

“Yeah! Since you seem to have a fetish for our feet, you can be smothered by all four of them at once!”

“Wha-?” You eyes bulge out of their sockets. All four of their feet…smothering him at once?

“What’s the matter, little man? Don’t you like the idea? You should, since you love our feet so much! Of course, if your lying about liking them…”

“…then we’ll have to punish you even more.” Soul finishes Star’s sentence, understanding his friend’s plan. You were now going to have to admit your lie to them, or keep on acting and experience ultimate foot torture. Being smothered under and between their sweaty feet…the very thought made you sick to your stomach. That amount of foot stench could very well be toxic! But if you admit you’re lying, they’ll get angry and punish you!
13211112111122212221211112112121.title: Can This Get Any Worse? Of Course!

choices: He knows you were lying and decides to stomp you underfoot!
He decides to give you a little rest.
132111121111222122212111121121211.content:
You have no choice, you had to except. Taking in all that foot odor may carry some risks, but upsetting the teenaged titans carried even greater risks! They might just punish you with a quick stomp, ending your puny life under their moist sole.

“I-I’m not lying! I love your feet and I’d love to be smothered by them!” you plea, getting on your knees before the two gods. Soul and Black Star grin at each other and then at you.

“Great! Let’s get started!” Soul announced as he snatched you away from Black Star’s foot and brought you back over to the basketball court. His meister friend followed behind and watched as you were dropped onto the hot, black court. It was fairly cloudy out, so the sun had not been beating on the court all day. You were thankful for that, since if it had been you’d probably of been burned severely! As you pick yourself off the black tar you suddenly feel the earth shake as Black Star takes a seat nearby. His muscular ass created such a loud boom when it hit the ground that you were surprised it hadn’t formed a crater! A similar boom shook the ground behind you as Soul seated himself on the court, grinning wickedly down at you the whole time.

“Let’s not waste any time, little man! Here come the feet!” Soul exclaimed as he brought both his bare feet into view. You watched the white haired weapon wiggle all ten of his toes and he slowly brought the feet toward you. You turned around just as Black Star did the same, his slightly larger feet ready to plow into you like a bulldozer. At the speed they were going you could of run away, but for the sake of keeping your lie believable you simply stood there and waited. After what seemed like hours to you, the four feet hit their target.

Your eyes widened in horror as your body was compressed between four walls of hard, sweaty skin. The two teenagers snickered with enjoyment as they began the smothering. There was so much pressure being forced upon your body that you couldn’t even tell where it was coming from! All you knew was that you were surrounded in sweaty, smelly flesh. You started to wish you could go back to rubbing their feet…

“Hehe, can you feel him squirming?” Soul asked his buddy as he curled his toes around your head, smearing your messy hair with his toe filth.

“Yup! He must really enjoy it in there.” Black Star replied as he pressed his soles into you harder. The pressure was unbelievable, but you gritted your teeth and tried not to scream. This was supposed to be your reward, therefore you couldn’t show any signs that you disliked it.

“On the count of three let’s pull are feet apart.” Soul said, looking up at Black Star. The assassin nodded in response, but didn’t look up from the mess of four feet before him. “One…two…three!”

On cue the two males tore their feet apart. You felt the sticky wall in front of you painfully peel away from your face, but your back remained stuck to someone. Through weary eyes you look up at the giant who’s foot you weren’t stuck to…

“Looks like he got stuck to your foot.” Soul said as he lowered his face to Black Star’s sole, seeing your miniscule body glued to it.

“I guess he loves my foot more!” the sweaty boy states as he stands up, putting all his weight on you. A small cry escapes your lips as the muscular meister stands on you. Soul also stands up, but keeps his eyes on you as his friend slowly grinds you against the black tar. After a couple minutes the teen gets bored and scrapes you off his foot, leaving you laying on your back and looking up at their towering forms.

“Okay, runt…” Soul started to say as he squatted down with his arms resting on his knees. The look he gave you…the way those red eyes seemed to just stare through you. You knew something was up…
132111121111222122212111121121211.title: Fitting Reward

13211112111122212221211112112122.content:
Soul glared at Black Star, he was sick and tired of having to put up with his friend’s superiority complex. It was always like this, Black Star was always acting all high and mighty and ordering everyone around, and normally, Soul would just shrug it off and comply with his best-friend’s demands nonchalantly, but today Soul didn’t feel like obeying the loud teen.

“Fuck you! Why should I hand him over when it was my turn in the first place?” Soul yelled at Black Star. “You should have just asked me for your turn with the squirt! Now I’m keeping him and you’re not getting a turn at all!”

“Soul…”

“No! You’re always pulling shit like this Black Star, and it’s about time someone put you in your place! You aren’t a
god, you’re human like everyone else, and you don’t get to treat me like your slave”

Soul stood there panting, catching his breath after having blown his top. He looked at Black Star, expecting him to start yelling his lungs out, and noticed that the teen was just standing there, perfectly still. Black Star was looking down at the ground, his eyes hidden by his blue lashes, anger radiating off him in waves.

Soul gulped at the heavy, tense atmosphere that filled the basketball court. He had never seen his friend like this before, it was starting to get on his nerves and, although Soul would never admit it, it was scaring the crap out of him.

“Black Star…?”

Silence

“Black Star I-“

“Shut up”

Soul winced at Star’s icy tone; he had never heard his friend talk like that. Black Star walked to where Soul was laying on the floor and glared down at him. Even though Soul was regular sized, looking up at Black Star in all his muscled glory still made him feel puny under the meister’s gaze, and it made the assassin look nothing short of a vengeful god.

“Now Soul, you’re gonna wish you never talked back to me, cause from now on you’re going to be my obedient little bitch, and I’m gonna make you like it.”
13211112111122212221211112112122.title: Star's wrath

choices: The Giants Have a Change of Heart
The Giants Comfort You....But Not Much.
1321111211112221222121111212.content:
"B-Black Star?" You pluck up your courage and decide to start apologizing to the giant meister.

"What do you want bug?" Black Star snarls, both he and Soul glaring down at you.

"I-I just wanted to say I'm really sorry...." You say.


Soul chuckles, "Yeah, now you apologize.....After you almost got squished!"

You ignore Soul for the moment and concentrate on Black Star, your only hope....

"Please Black Star....Forgive me!" You fall to your knees and plead with him, prostrating yourself before the blue haired teen.

"Blah blah blah..." Black Star mocks you.

Soul chuckles.

You look up and to both the weapon and the meister's shock. You're sobbing uncontrollably. Through your tears and wails Black Star and Soul can make out a few words... "Puh puh lease! Nuh nuh moore! I can't take anymore torture! *sniffle* Juh juh just crush me if you want..." You say hysterically.

Soul and Black Star look at each other, Even Soul at this point feels bad for you....
1321111211112221222121111212.title: You beg Black Star for forgiveness.

choices: Black Star brings you into the showers with him.
Black Star lets you take a bath in the sink.
13211112111122212221211112121.content:
You watch as the two titans look at each other and begin whispering. You can’t make out what they’re saying and your eyes are too blurry from your tears to see their facial expressions. You wipe away some of the tears and look up again to see Black Star squatting down and reaching a hand for you. You cry out in surprise and shield yourself with your arms, thinking he’s about to crush you with his palm.

“Calm down, I’m not going to hurt you.” you hear the tough-looking meister say. You look at his hand again to that he has it laid out in front of you with his palm facing upward. “Climb on.”

You swallow hard and do as he says. At this point, your afraid to say anything in the event it pisses Black Star off again. You climb over his fingers and onto his gloved hand; the soft texture us damp with his sweat. Once you’re standing on his palm, Black Star slowly brings you off the ground and raises you to his chest. You stare up at the two giants who stare back at you with blank stares. What are they planning this time?”

“Whu…what are you going to do to me?” you choke out, still sobbing a bit. You wait for Black Star to crack a grin and answer you…but…

“Nothing. We aren’t going to do anything to you anymore, so stop with the waterworks.”

“Wha…what?”

“I’m sorry.” Black Star blurts out, shocking you. “My anger can get the best of me sometimes. I don’t know what I was thinking. You’re not a bug I can just crush…you’re a human being, like us.”

You don’t say anything. You just stare at them.

“We were having such a fun time playing with you, we got lost in our fun.” Soul said, folding his arms over his chest and sighing heavily. “It’s not cool to make someone cry.”

“Soul…”

“We’re not going to torture you anymore. We were wrong to do all those things to you. Can you forgive us?”

“I…I don’t know.” you look down at Star’s palm. You can’t just forgive them so easily. This wasn’t like Star forgetting you were in his sock…they had really hurt you. On purpose.

“You don’t have to forgive us right away. Let’s focus on getting you back to normal and sending you back home, okay Lewis?”

You nod and sniff a little. You’re happy they suddenly had a change of heart. Lets hope it stayed that way…

“So, what now?” Soul asks, taking a seat on a nearby chair.

“I was planning on asking Shinigami-sama if he could help, but then we got sidetracked. Let me just wash up a bit and we can head over to Shibusen.”

“Whoa, whoa, whoa! Hold on, Black Star! Did you forget? We skipped out on school! If we head over there now, Shinigami-sama’s going to give us both a Shinigami Chop! That really frickin hurts! Let’s just stick with the plan and wait until tomorrow. We can say we were both sick.”

“You’re right…” Black Star looks down at his palm where you’ve seated yourself. “Do you mind waiting another day, Lewis? Tomorrow I promise I’ll take you to see Shinigami-sama.”

You slowly nod. “Okay…”

“Good, now, before we head out of here, I really need to hit the showers!” Black Star was about to put you down when he noticed you were soaked in just as much sweat as he was. “I bet you really stink…and these clothes look ruined.” The teenage ninja glances over to his friend. “Hey, Soul, there’s a toy shop a few blocks down from here. Can you go pick up something for him to wear?”

“What? You mean…like doll clothes? No way! A guy like me can’t be seen buying doll clothes; that isn’t cool!”

“Come on, Soul, it’s the least you could do for putting him through all that stuff. Just say it‘s for Maka or one of her friends.”

“Ugh, fine, but you’re paying me back.” Soul replied, clearly displeased with the idea of simply walking into a toy shop at his age. You watched the white haired weapon exit the room, leaving you alone with Black Star once again.

“Okay, little guy, how about we get you washed up? It’s be like you were never smothered with our feet or stuck up our armpits!”

“Please don’t remind me…” you mutter as Black Star heads for the locker room where the showers were.
13211112111122212221211112121.title: The Giants Have a Change of Heart

choices: Black Star had taken you out of the sink and was drying you off.
Black Star had gone into the shower. Soul was now the one keeping an eye on you.
132111121111222122212111121212.content:
Once Black Star reached the gym’s locker rooms, he moved over to the area where the sinks and showers were. There were five sinks, two of which looked pretty dirty. Black Star chose one of the remaining three and placed you down on the edge. You and Black Star just stood there, staring at each other, for several seconds. Why was he just standing there? Was he waiting for something?

“Well? Aren’t you going to undress? You’re not going to take a bath in your clothes, are you?”

“W-what? But…you’re…I’m…” You stuttered and started to blush. The blue haired meister saw this and started bellowing with laugher.

“Don’t be shy, Lewis! We both have the same stuff, right? Yours is just smaller…” Black Star joked, but noticed you were still reluctant to take off your clothes. “Well, I won’t force you. Take a bath with your clothes on if you want.” Black Star reached a hand over you and turned the nozzle of the faucet, releasing a stream of warm water into the sink (which was plugged). After that, he turned around so his broad back was facing you and walked away. While he was gone, you stood there and realized he was right. You couldn’t take a bath in your clothes…especially these sweat stained garments. Therefore, hoping you could undress and get into the water before he got back, you started pulling off your shoes and socks, followed by your shirt. It was hard getting the damp article off you, since it was clinging to your skin. When you finally did get it off, you immediately started unbuckling your jeans and slipped those off. Now you were only in a pair of black boxers, but when you started to pull those down…

“I’m back! Got a few things for ya.” Black Star approached the sink just as you lowered your boxers down, showing him your little, bare bum. “So, you decided to undress after all?”

Your face turned even redder as your spun around to face the giant assassin. You saw his eyes travel downward a bit and he started chuckling.

“Hehe, guess you’re REALLY small, eh little guy?”

“B-bastard…” you cursed as covered up your crotch in embarrassment. Black Star continued to snicker, but placed three items down as he did. The first was a tiny piece of soap, probably broken off from a whole one. To you it was plenty big, though. The second was what looked like the cap to a shampoo bottle with a tiny glob of shampoo inside. Finally, Black Star placed a towel to the side to be used when you were done.

“Everything’s here, and it looks like the water’s ready!” Black Star turned off the faucet just as the sink filled to the brim. You saw him make a motion with his hand, as if to say “hop in”. You gladly did so and lowered your nude form into the warm water. A deep sigh escaped your lips as the water soothed your heated skin. Already it seemed like the water was washing off all the sweat and stink…

“Well, time for me to take my shower!” Black Star exclaimed as he started to turn around.

“Wait!” you shout, stopping him. He turns around and looks at you, puzzled. “Can you…can you stay?”

“Huh?” Black Star raised an eyebrow. “Why? I thought you wouldn’t want me around after what I did to you…”

“I’m still mad at you…but I don’t want to be left alone. What if someone comes into the bathroom while you’re in the shower? They could find me and…”

“I get it, I get it.” Black Star walked over to you and kneeled on the floor. His large arms (which still looked sweaty and pumped from his workout) rested themselves on the skin while Black Star rested his chin against those. Once you were sure he wasn’t going to leave you, you started your bath.

First, you sank under the water for a couple seconds to wet your hair. Once it was soaked, you reached for the cap containing the shampoo…only to find that it was out of reach.

“Damn it.” you cursed, knowing you’ll have to get out to grab it. To your surprise, however, Black Star pushed the cap toward you with one of his fingers.

“There ya go, little buddy.” Black Star says, smiling. You silently thank him before reaching into the cap and taking out the glob of shampoo, which you used to scrub your hair. As you did this, Black Star noticed that you were a pretty good swimmer. While your hands worked on your hair, your legs kept you afloat. Once you were done spreading the shampoo around, you planned to dive back under the water to rinse…until Black Star scooped some water into his palm and poured it over you.

“H-hey!” you shouted with surprise as your hair was rinsed for you.

“Sorry, I wanted to help. Oh, looks like there’s still some more in there.” Black Star took another handful of water and, much to your annoyance, poured it over your head again. You felt so vulnerable…like a small child.

“That’s enough.” you tell the muscular teen before you grab the nearby piece of soap and start cleaning your body with it. Thankfully, Black Star never asks if he can clean you himself…that would be weird. After you’ve scrubbed your entire body, you felt the most clean you’ve ever felt since coming to this world. It made you really happy and you just sat back against the edge of the sink and closed your eyes. You planned to just rest your eyes, but you ended up falling asleep instead. Your body slipped away from the sink and floated on the water’s surface. The warm feeling all around you was heavenly, and the entire time Black Star was watching you carefully.

When you awoke, you discovered that…
132111121111222122212111121212.title: Bathtime With Your Giant Helper

choices: Soul and Black Star arrive at Shibusen.
1321111211112221222121111212122.content:
You were woken up by the sound of a shower running and some very bad humming. Your eyes traveled to the front of the sink where you saw two large, red orbs staring at you. You shout in surprise and flail in the sink, causing Soul to chuckle in amusement.

“Calm down, little guy, it’s just me.” Soul greets you with a wave.

“S-Soul? You’re back?”

“Yep, and look what I got for you.” The teenage weapon reaches into his coat pocket and takes out a tiny pair of jeans and a button-up shirt. They were probably part of some toy, but to you they looked like clean clothes you could wear.

“Thanks…” you say quietly as you climb out of the sink and spot a large towel left for you by Black Star. You grab one of the corners and wrap it around your wet, naked body.

“Is that Black Star in the shower?” you ask as you start drying off your body.

“Yeah. I told him he could go wash up when I got here.” Soul tells you before handing your new clothes to you. You grab them from his large fingers and immediately start putting them on. “Sorry, but they didn’t come with any boxers or socks. Is that good enough?”

“It’s fine.” you reply as you pull on the jeans, shuddering a bit at the feeling of wearing no underwear. After pulling your shirt on, Soul gently picks you off the sink and lets you stand on his palm.

“How do they fit?”

“Okay, I guess.” you respond, still not completely comfortable with talking to Soul yet. It was hard to get over all the things they had done to you…

Suddenly, you and Soul heard the shower clicking off nearby. One of the shower stalls opened and out walked Black Star, wearing nothing but a towel wrapped around his waist.

“Ahhh, that was refreshing!” Black Star exclaimed as he trotted out of the shower. When he spotted you in Soul’s hand, he gave you a smile. “Hey, Lewis! Did you have a nice bath?”

“Y-yeah…” you quietly say as you turn your head away from Black Star. Even though he didn’t mean you harm, the sight of Black Star’s naked, muscular torso sent chills down your spine. He was incredibly intimidating and made you feel even smaller and weak.

“So, what now?” Soul asks his meister friend as he leans against the bathroom wall. Black Star finishes drying off his blue hair and responds while opening his personal locker.

“We should head back to Shibusen and ask Lord Death if he can help Lewis. That’s what I was originally going to do…before I got sidetracked.”

“You realize that once Lord Death figures out we skipped class, WE’RE the ones that are going to get punished.”

“I know, I know.” Black Star says as he pulls a black, sleeveless shirt over his torso. The top was identical to the one he always wore. “Don’t you think we deserve it, though? We did a lot of bad things to Lewis…”

“I still don’t think getting chopped to death is cool…” Soul replies as he shivers at the thought. “Let’s try and come up with an excuse for our absence.”

With that, the two teens start discussing how they’re going to avoid punishment. While they talk, Soul slips you into his pocket and the two of them head out of the gym towards Shibusen. As they walked, you laid there in the large pocket and hoped Death would be able to help you. If he couldn’t…what was going to happen to you?
1321111211112221222121111212122.title: Clean Once Again

1321111211112222.content:
Soul loved this feeling. The feeling of you writhing on his tongue trying to avoid you eventual fate. He felt like an animal ready to consume live prey. Leaning back in his chair, Soul continued to suck and lick your rich tasting body until a trail of drool dripped down his chin. Black Star, who noticed Soul’s blissful state in the corner of his eye, stopped stuffing his face for a moment to speak.

“Man. Soul. I know it’s good, but it looks like you’re getting aroused from the taste.” he observed, pointing his fork in Soul’s direction. “Just swallow already.”

Soul snapped back into reality and glanced at Black Star. Time to do away with you, he guessed. He tilted his head back and you fell toward the back of his mouth. With one big gulp, you were swallowed and dragged down into the stomach. The muscular walls of the esophagus squeezed you down the tube mercilessly.

“Ahh…it’s so tight.” you managed to mumble. After a long period of forcing you down his gullet, Soul’s body deposited you into the hot stomach where all his food goes to digest. You land in a pile of partially melted eggs. Or was it sausage? You couldn’t tell. You staggered over to his stomach wall where you could hear the steady rhythm of his heartbeat and the muffled noises from outside. You were about to slam on the wall and demand to be let out, but the hole above you where you came through opened again with a squelch as chunks of chewed up food poured down upon you. You tired to run to dodge, but a pile of ham and eggs buried your left leg and forced you to the ground. Acid splashed against your face and you could already feel it start to tingle your skin. You screamed and tried to pull yourself free, but the weight of the rest of Soul’s meal was too heavy. More eventually came and buried the rest of you under mush, save for your head. That was drenched in what you believed was apple juice. Giving up hope, you just laid there on the stomach floor in defeat. You could feel your body and the chunks of food around it start to succumb to the acids. It was getting harder to breath, either because your lungs were being crushed or the fumes of the digestive acids robbed you of any clean air. Your last thought before you slipped into unconsciousness was the memory of your last dream. This was similar, but you weren’t waking up this time…

Soul’s plate laid before him empty. He rubbed his bloated stomach and belched loudly. “Best breakfast I ever had.”

“You got that right.” Black Star said from across him, picking his teeth with a toothpick. He glanced down at the spot where you were supposed to be and just now noticed you were missing. “Hold on; where’s Lewis?”

“Pfft, damn guy must have been fooling you. He must have only hanged out with you until you gave him a free meal, then bounced. So uncool.”

Black Star, being the gullible guy he was and unable to come up with any other reason, believed his friend’s lie. “That scumbag! How dare he trick me! If I ever see him again, I’ll have HIM for breakfast!”

Soul just grinned toothily as he patted his stomach.
1321111211112222.title: Into the Stomach with You!

13211112112.content:
You jump, wave, and scream as much as you can to get the boys to realize their mistake, but no change to their expressions causes any hope you still had to slowly diminish to nothing. The young men just smiled at you with cruel eyes.

“Man, that’s one ugly bug,” stated Soul Eater. “Look at it hop around and make those funny noises.”

“It’s kinda funny. I wonder what it’s saying…” Black Star said. He wasn’t really putting any effort into trying to hear the little bug on his foot.

“It was in your sock, so it’s probably telling you to wash your feet more. Did it stink a lot, little bug?”

Black Star chuckled. “You thought they smelled bad, huh? Well that’s not very nice. You need to learn to respect the feet of a god.” Black Star wiggled his toes, making you lose your balance and fall down. As the two boys laughed, the blue haired meister shook you off his foot and onto the hard pavement. Your body hurt from hitting the ground and your struggled to get back up. Suddenly, you noticed everything darken as you were consumed in a shadow. You looked back in absolute fear to see the bottom of Black Star’s other foot above you; this one with the shoe still on.

“This is what happens to insects that don’t respect me, both your size and mine! I crush them under my foot!” he yelled before slowly bringing the shoe down. Closer and closer it got until both the smirking faces of the boys were blocked by it. You felt the hard leather of the sole press against your back and you knew you were done for. The weight forced you to the ground until your face was pressed against its surface. Still the pressure increased and pain shot through your body. You started to cry and beg hysterically, but hearing your pleas was no longer possible for the boys. The last thing you heard was Black Star’s voice. A voice that seemed to come from an almighty deity above. A deity that lacked the brain power of the average human.

“Bye-bye.”

*CRUNCH*

Black Star felt the resistance under his shoe vanish. He swiveled his shoe back and forth, hearing a few more crunches before lifting it away and inspecting the bottom of it. He smiled and showed your remains to Soul.

“Don’t mess with the BIG me or you’ll end up like this, understand?”

Soul rolled his eyes and continued walking. “Put your shoe back on and come on. I’m starving.”

“Hey! Don’t ignore me, bastard!” shouted Black Star before wiping his shoe against the sidewalk and putting the other one back on.

Kid's compliments did flatter you a bit, but you didn't want to be stuck there all day. So trying to snap him out of his wonderland, you called out to him.
"Hey!"

He...
13332.title: Absolutely Perfect

133321.content:
At least you're not small enough to not be heard. Kid quickly shuts up at the sound of your voice and sets you down.
Though you got the reaper's attention, you thought carefully about what to say next. It could mean the difference between help or torture.

happened to pass by.

The four words alone struck fear into you. You were even more helpless against Kid then you would be with a normal person.

You quickly jumped out of the way before Kid brought his shoe down towards you. Which would have ended rather messily if not for your quick thinking.

"What a waste..." He muttered.

"Hey, Kid! Get out here!" You recognized the voice as Black*Star's.

Not a very average day. After scanning the area, you found that there was a small section of cardboard missing which was just big enough for you to squeeze out of.

You decide to...
