13531.content:
The most noticeable thing about the man is the stitches than wound over his face and clothes, and if that didn't give it away, then the large loose screw in his head did. It was none other than the mad scientist of the Soul Eater world, Stein.

Thinking maybe the madman could fix you, being a madman of science, after all, you figure trying to get his attention is the best choice. After all, you wouldn't want to end up getting accidently crushed by him or mistaken for a pest. But maybe being noticed by him wasn't the best idea either. You wouldn't want to end up as a test subject yourself...

After mulling it over, you decide to...
13531.title: Dr. Frank N. Stein

choices: "Alright, I'll buy that. It seems quite possible, actually."
"If you're going to lie to a man of facts, you should do a better job of it."
135311.content:
Deciding your best choice would be to get some help, you dart up by his head, running along his body until you're up next to him. But what to say? Still confused about the ordeal, you just shout for help. "Heyyy! Uh, Dr. Stein?!" He sits up some on the bed, having most likely laid down to rest his eyes for a moment after some work. He glances around, eyes narrowed, ears perked to detect the intruder.

"D-Down here!" You wave your arms, jumping right by him on the bedsheets. His head lowers and his gaze angles ever so slightly in your direction. You can't see his expression behind the glare on his glasses, unable to tell if he sees a person or a pesky insect.

But Stein was reasonable and figured the odds of a talking cricket were slim. His hands descends over you and snatches you up quickly, bringing you up to his face. "And just who are you?" He asks, his voice a bit too loud for someone your size. You shout back your name, which is replied with by yet another query. "How did you get here? And just how do you know me?"

Now that makes you pause. How were you to even tell him the truth? You were magically shrunk and teleported to his room, which just so happens to also be part of a fictional universe where you come from? He brings you a bit closer, waiting for an answer.There really wasn't anything else to say than that, though, so you digress the story.

After a few awkward moments of silence after your tale is told, Stein bursts out in laughter. "Shrunken, huh? And from another universe?" His grin is a bit unsettling, but maybe that was just how he smiled. His other hand reaches up to adjust the screw in his head, turning and turning until it clicks, and he replies...
135311.title: Hey! Listen!

choices: Hell yeah it is! Stay with Stein!
Nope. Get me out of this madhouse!
1353111.content:
"Thanks," you quickly reply, glad to have been heard out. Who knows what calamity could've ensued had he not believed you! The scientist laughs some more and gets up, carrying you over to a table and setting you down, after which he plops into his chair, arms rested over the back of it like always. He leans in and states, "So, I guess you're asking fro me to come up with a way to change you back and send you home."

Backing up some, as his voice is a bit too loud so close to you, you eagerly nod your head. "Yeah, I think it's best if I get back before I'm missed, y'know?" Back before you're missed? You think that over. Was your life back in 'reality' really all that great? Wouldn't it be better...if...

"You sure you wanna go back?" The doctor asks, seeming to know your doubts. After seeing the uneasy looks on your face, he chuckles and adjusts the screw once more, "I mean, I could use a little help around here from time to time. Not too much help, I mean, but just enough. It'd be like having a little lab rat--er, assistant."

Okay, now it's really tempting to stay. Getting to be at the aid of one of your favorite anime characters? And not to mention at your current size...your own possibilities could be all too grand. And wasn't this your dream? "Well...I..." you try to phrase that, but get flustered. This was what you wanted, right?
1353111.title: It's possible.

13531111.content:
"Actually..." you chuckle nervously, scratching the back of your neck, "...that'd be everything I'd ever wanted, Dr. Stein." The scientist smiles back at you, extending his index finger. You take it and shake it, as that's as close to a handshake you two can manage. "Glad to hear that," he grins, "Of course, if you'll be staying with me, I think I outta make a spot for you..."

After clearing out a cluttered shelf on the nightstand by his bed, laying down a few pieces of cloth for bedding, Stein places you in the makeshift room. "Seems big enough," you comment, and it was, probably about the size of your own room back home. "Thanks again."

"No problem," he waves his hand, "Gotta make sure my new assistant is comfortable." He pulls out a cigarette, lighting it and exhaling smoke as he thinks. "Hmm...I don't have much work for you to do today. I've already gotten everything I need done, really. Just gotta get ready fro bed myself." He yawns, and you stifle one yourself. "Being up for 30 hours straight can be tiring sometimes." 30 hours? Well, guess that isn't as long as the time you stayed up playing video games for two days.

He gets up, clicking the screw in his head a couple of times. "Be right back...unless you wanna come with me."

"Where're you going?" You ask first, to make sure. He shrugs, and answers...
13531111.title: Stay with Stein!

choices: ...stay in bed. You'll think about it in the morning.
135311111.content:
A shower...hmm...

"You could probably use one," Stein comments, adding so it doesn't make it seem as much as insult, "I mean, You wann feel refreshed when you get up tomorrow for some work. I already have plenty of ideas in mind..." Trying to think optimistically about the plans, you ponder it. I mean, when you woke up, you were right at his feet anyways. Maybe a shower could do. He extended his hand to you expectantly, waiting for you to step on.

Placing one foot in front of the other, you find yourself in the palm of the scientist's hand, a thought which sort of excites you, but you try to hide that. "Yeah! I-I mean, if you don't mind, that is." He chuckles and carries you into the bathroom, setting you on the counter and holding up a finger to tell you to wait a moment.

After turning on the shower, the drops raining down, he pauses, looking from you to the shower and back. "Hmm...Now that I think about it, it might be kind of difficult to hold you and wash myself at the same time." He switched the mode, and the water rushes out of the faucet below. "Hope you don't mind baths. And, um, hope you can swim. Wouldn't want you drowning." He tosses his coat aside and then proceeds to take of his shirt.

"Uh," you seem flustered, but shake it off. What were doing, gawking like that?! Besides, from what you'd read, Stein wasn't someone to show much true emotion, even stating at times he couldn't feel such things, so you knew not to take it that way, right? "Um, o-of course I can swim, heh heh." You watch as he starts to undo the pants, but then turns to you. "Well? Are you going to bathe in your clothes?" After staring dumbfoundedly for a moment, you reply, "Oh, uh, right."

A couple wordless moments later, and you're awkwardly exposed right in front of the giant, who is already in the bath now. He extends a hand to you, just a foot away on the counter. Once again, you climb on, wondering if he can really see anything of yours when you're at this size. He keeps his hand hovering under you, but lets you tread the water for the most part.

Looking up, the doctor actually looks rather calm. Then again, you'd read the manga and seen the series over and over, and know that he isn't all that insane, which is good for you. The other thing that takes your attention are the scars that trace over his body. "So," he says, "How much do you know about me?" You ponder whether he's secretly a midn-reader, but toss aside the paranoia and just answer the question.

"Well, um...you're a mad scientist, so to speak." That stuff from the forums and internet and your own knowledge and inferences pop into your mind, and you ramble on, You're prone to dissecting things. Kinda craz--er, I mean, subject to madness, at one point, after the whole, uh, madness keishin thing. Good meister though, able to make Spirit into a Death Scythe, and good at managing your soul wavelength." You chuckle, adding, "You're probably my favorite character, actually."

His emotion, which isn't blocked by a glare of glasses since those have been set aside for the bath, seems rather amused, actually, maybe just a bit suspicious. He playfully splashes you, which is more like the little mini-tidal-waves at big splash or some other waterpark. "Seems you've done your research." He reaches for the shampoo, lathering his hair as he continues, "That's good. You'll be useful, at least. I was actually considering dissecting you if you didn't work out." He laughs, and you nervously join in, although part of you takes that with some fear.

Getting a dab of the shampoo on his index finger, he guides you over with the other hand, and pokes your head, getting it coated in hairwash. You rub that in yourself, dunking your head under quickly to get it out afterwards. "Let's see..." Stein thinks, sinking a bit into the water, "What else to study about you..."

As he thinks, you find treading water that is practically like a lake to you becomes rather tiring. But his hand is over back by him. Casually, you swim over until you're at his chest, climbing on and resting. You look over your shoulder up at him, and find him looking back at you oddly. "Oh, uh, sorry, Dr. Stein," you chuckle, "Just got tired of, heh, not drowning." He didn't mind, right?

Blinking, he replies, "Oh, that's fine. I was just thinking." He leans back, permitting you to recline on him. Stretching and yawning, you move up a little more. Of course, your own mind was now wondering what he was thinking about. I mean, this was Stein you were talking about. If he's plotting something, it couldn't end well for you.

He moves suddenly, causing you to slip off and back into the water. Stepping out, he grabs a towel and wraps himself in it. You swim over to the edge of the bath, but find you can't climb up it. "Uh, S-Stein?" You call, heart skipping a beat, hoping he hasn't forgotten you, hoping you didn't make a wrong move. He holds up his hand, telling you to wait a moment.

A few seconds later, he returns, wearing pajamas with stitches on them, as well, and then reaches in and grabs you, placing you in a washcloth. "I don't think I have anything small enough for you to wear," he says, "But If you want, I could probably stitch something together. You laugh at his joke, and he laughs back, whether he gets it or not, as you dry off with the cloth. "That's fine, I'll just sleep in my clothes." After slipping back into your clothes, you get back in his hand and you both enter the bedroom again.

"Well, I've got to get up early in the morning, so get some rest." He lets you off in the little shelf he'd converted into a room for you. He also wraps around a bit of rope(well, string, really) around a nail that leads down right above his bed. "If you need anthing, just climb down and let me know, alright?" He smiles assuringly, "I'm a light sleeper, don't worry." You nod, and he lays down in his bed, which carries the same staple-stitched pattern as the rest of his home.

Climbing into your own bed, your drift off to sleep, barely hearing him wish you a goodnight, but mumbling back a response, before passing out.

You jolt awake, a cold sweat on you, panting heavily. Another dream. You look around the room. And sure enough, it's still your bed...within Stein's room, that is. But you'd had another dream. This one, of course with Stein. You start to wonder...maybe you should tell the scientist...but what good would that do, other than bother him in his sleep? After mulling it over, you...
135311111.title: Just a little wet

14.content:
You said goodbye to your friends and ran from the bus stop to your house. You were a normal 13-year-old boy named Adam. You liked a few sports and also watching anime. Your latest addiction was Marchen Awakens Romance, a series that’s very underappreciated in your opinion. You always dreamed of meeting the heroes of whatever anime you watched and joining them on their adventure. You also seemed to harbor a sort of crush on the boys, but never told anyone. Being in love with fictional characters seemed weird no matter how you looked at it. You didn’t have much experience with love anyway, so it doesn’t bother you that much.

After another uneventful day at school, you couldn’t wait to watch some more MAR. You went to turn your TV on, but it wouldn’t switch on. You become annoyed and tart pushing the power button furiously. Without warning, the TV turns on an a blinding light envelops the room. You feel yourself get light headed and you pass out.

“Hey, can you hear me? Wake up! Hello?”

You wake up to the voice, it sounding very close as if someone was yelling in your ear. You recognize the voice from the many MAR episodes you watched and stare up to see a giant…
14.title: Marchen Awakens Romance

choices: "You'll understand everything perfectly soon..." evil grin
"Big Bro here's gonna take care of you."
"I'll ask my friend Alviss to take a look at you."
141.content:
You try to open your eyes, but your vision was still blurry. All you could see was a huge round object with yellow spikes coming out from it.

"Hey little guy! Are you alright?" A huge voice was calling out to you.

You tried to sit upright and clear your vision. Scanning the floor of your surroundings you realized that you were sitting at an incredibly vast mass of warm surface. Looking further, it had all these weird creases which looked just like...

"SKIN?"

Then your eyes trailed off further to see several trunks of the same mass rising towards the sky. Then you turned your face towards something which you were unprepared from seeing and froze.

"Hello!" Ginta grinned with his casual warm smile.

"AGGGH!!" You fumbled as the face of the young teen surprised you.

You lied there in silence, still staring at the huge face. Then it clicked. That smile, those eyes, and that golden hair. It was Ginta Toramizu from the TV Show MAR which you were watching!

You were shocked, you couldn't utter a single word! In the awkward silence, Ginta, with his sky-blue eyes, was still intently observing you. Then he breaks the silence.

"DO YOU. UNDERSTAND. ME?" He questions as he makes all these gestures with his other hand.

You nod in reply, still in a state of confusion.

"That's great!" He says.

"Dont' worry little man..."
141.title: Realization

"Hey! It's alright, I'm just putting you inside my pocket for a while." He says half opening his fist while waiting for you to calm down.

142.content:
You slowly open your eyes to see a gigantic face right in front of you. The face was almost simian-like in appearance, then you realized... it was Jack, the goofy farmer! You were amazed at how small you were to him and were quite frightened. You began to back away doing a backwards crawl before turning around to run. It was then that a giant hand grabbed you up before you knew it, "Easy, little guy! I ain't gonna hurt'cha!" He held you in his hands and looked at you, making sure you didn't escape, but also making sure he didn't hurt you, "Where did you come from? How did you get so small?"

You're still shocked, but Jack seemed about as confused as you are. You responded with how you had no idea and how you thought that he might have been the one to do it, which was obvious that he hadn't. "How about you come with me? It's incredibly dangerous for you to be traveling around all by yourself. You could get hurt, or worse!" You look at him with a sense of joy and nod your head happily. You knew Jack was a good guy. Not necessarily the most careful, but he had the best of intentions. Also the fact that he was incredibly hot, especially at this size, was even more of a reason to stay with him. He grins, "Alrighty. I need to get back to work. I'd put you in my pocket, but it's full of ARMs. Might be a bit dangerous for you even in their inactive forms, so I think I'll keep you...
142.title: Jack

1423.content:
You heard what he said and you blinked and blushed. You had no idea if he said what you thought he said and had to ask, "Where did you say you were going to keep me?"

Jack looked away and chuckled nervously, "S-sorry, little guy! I...I guess I got a little ahead of myself! I've... well... I've always wanted to feel a little guy down there and since you're the only one around, I kinda wasn't thinking clearly. So if you don't wanna go in there, I understand."

You looked up into Jack's face and smiled. Though incredibly nervous as you were and as fast as things were going, you were also very intrigued by his proposal, "I'll... I'll do it! I'll ride in there, if it's still okay."

Jack looked a little surprised as well, but he smiled and, opening the waistband of his pants, he said, "You won't be disappointed little guy! It may smell a bit in there, but don't worry! Once I'm done my work on the farm, I'll let you out and we can talk some more! Have fun!"

You looked down as Jack lowered his hand toward the opening of his waistband and you turned beet red at what you saw. He lowered his hand just above the opening and you decided to dive on in. As you fell, he let his waistband snap back. You were now trapped in the dark confines of this incredibly attractive giant's underwear. The smell of the giant's musk was incredibly strong and incredibly enticing. It was like your own personal playground! As Jack got back to tending the farm, you were left to your own devices. You could certainly stay put and wait for Jack to take you out, or you could make his job just a little bit harder. Being entranced by the aroma of Jack's scent, you quickly decide on the latter, but what do you plan to do?
1423.title: "...in my underwear!"

151.content:
It was a normal Saturday like any other. There was no school to worry about and you’ve already finished all your chores. Your name is David, a typical fifteen-year-old who loves action. Your favorite kind of action was DBZ action. Everyday you’d watch Dragonball on TV and wish you could be like the characters in it. Strong, cheery, and carefree.

Today you ran to your room in time to catch the newest episode, but when you clicked on your TV you were met with a surprise. The TV screen turned completely white. Your first instinct was that it was in the middle of a scene, but you soon changed your theory when the TV itself began to flow. Thinking it was going to blow or something, you made a dash for the door just as an explosion of white light engulfed the room and you along with it.

It was a few minutes later that you came to. You opened your eyes and immediately noticed something was different. The room was unfamiliar in both shape…and size. Everything was huge and you estimated you couldn’t be larger than two inches tall. Before you could think about your next course of action, a set of booming noises appeared behind you. You turned around to see the feet of a giant walking casually in your direction. You recognized the feet, as they belonged to…
151.title: Dragonball Z/Dragonball

15111.content:
This plotline defers from the one started in Chapter 3.

You are a typical captain in the Red Ribbon Army. You don't mind killing anyone whether given an order or not. You aren't very high in the ranks, just your everyday captain in the RR. But this Goku kid, he was something else! Word was he'd just taken out the notorious Tao Pai Pai (Mercenary Tao in the dub). And now he was making his way to your squad's level! Needless to say you were nervous about what the superpowered kid would do to you when he got there.

"Don't worry men! There's no way he'll get past the other guys!" You say trying to encourage your small squad, who look like they're about to run away in fear just from hearing the noises of the fight. "B-But captain.....He took out everyone General Red put out for him! Even Tao Pai Pai! It's hopeless we're doomed! Run away!!" Screams a boar like soldier, who you promptly shoot on sight before he can ruin the operation.

"That goes for all of you!" You growl as the soldier's body falls to the floor. "I've got a secret weapon in store for that brat!" You say as you hold up a small pistol.

"B-But I heard bullets don't-"

"You fool! This is no ordinary pistol! This is a shrink gun designed to look like a regular gun, so I can catch him off guard!" You yell just as the kid smashes through the floor using only his hard head.

Everyone's eyes go wide as the kid, without hesitation, devastates your entire squad until only you are left. But just as he is about to come for you, you fire the shrink gun. However the sneaky brat pulls out a red stick and somehow sends the beam back at you like he is hitting a baseball!

The beam hits you, and suddenly you see everything, including the damn kid, getting much bigger.

Once the light is gone you find yourself face to face with a pair of gigantic shoes! You strain your neck to look up at see the boy grinning down at you childishly. "Heh heh! Didn't expect that did you! I don't know how you got so small but I think I'm going to keep you!" He says and snatches you up. You struggle in the iron like grip of the boy. He really is strong.

"But you are one of the bad guys, So it's only right that I should punish you until you learn your lesson!" Goku says as he stops to think about how to punish you. You gulp and shiver at what this gigantic kid could have in store for you.
15111.title: Goku And The Tiny RR Captain

"My feet are a bit stinky, you should have to smell them!" Goku said, grinning widely at the idea. He seated himself on the hard, metallic floor of the room and casually began slipping one of his giant shoes off. The kid seemed really relaxed, despite being in the middle of an enemy base. After getting the shoe off, he let out a long sigh as he wiggled his toes. “That’s much better. I haven taken my shoes off in awhile. Why did you have to make this base so darn big?”

Goku started to move you to his bare, dirty sole as you struggled fruitlessly. The boy’s natural strength combined with his size made it so your struggles didn’t even resister to the boy. Before long, you found your helpless body being shoved against the sweaty foot and dragged back and forth. You were giving Goku a foot massage, whether you liked it or not. Your face was pressed completely into the soft skin, forcing you to smell nothing but his reeking boyfoot. After awhile, Goku dragged you up to his toes and pushed your tiny head between his toes.

“Haha, smells nasty, doesn’t it? I hope you’re learning your lesson.” You screamed a response, but it was muffled by the kid’s toes. Finally, Goku removed you from his foot and carried you to his face again. “Well, that’s all for now. I better get out of here before they send reinforcements. I wonder where I should put you…”

As Goku ran through the underground base, you were forced to endure a world of nonstop shaking. Despite being neatly tucked between his toes, you were constantly tossed face-first into the toejam of the kid’s foot. It didn’t help that there was practically no light and the only thing you heard was the earth shattering boom each time Goku’s feet hit the ground. Occasionally you heard commotion outside as groups of unfortunate guards made fools of themselves by getting in the boy’s way. They would have better luck trying to top a steamroller. After kicking the 20th guard in the face (and you feeling the poor man’s nose shatter behind you), Goku came upon a large room with a few of the Dragon Balls nested on a pedestal.

“Ha, found them!” Goku laughed as he ran toward the golden objects. Suddenly, he felt a presence above him as he hopped to the side, just as a large mech landed with a loud boom.

“Damn, missed the brat!” cursed the soldier piloting the mecha. The mech, which Goku thought looked like a giant toaster with a head, pointed at the young boy. “This is as far as you get! I’ll avenge my fallen comrades and defeat you, boy!”

“Well, I guess I have no choice.” Goku said as he readied his fighting stance. The giant mech rushed at Goku and swung one of its metal arms at him. Goku ducked under the blow and kicked the arm from underneath, flinging it off its body like it was connected with glue.

“Damn you!” cursed the pilot again as he pointed his other arm at the kid, which sported a laser gun. Goku yelped as he dodged the lasers and started running around the room. “Hahaha, run you little brat, run!” While you were rooting for your underling, the increase in Goku’s speed wasn’t helping your condition. The shoe were shaking so much that you were afraid you might dislodge from the toe cheese and end up under the boy’s foot. If that happened, you were doomed in the next second.

Fortunately, Goku would end the battle before that happened. Dodging one last laser, the super-powered child jumped high into the air and began charging his signature move. The soldier noticed the sudden buildup of energy and attempted to flee. Unfortunately, the constant use of his laser gun had left his mech with no energy left to move.

“Shit, shit! No, ssssstttooooppp!!!!”

“HA!” Goku unleashed the Kamehameha wave, hitting the mech right in the bull’s-eye and rocketing it through the wall to parts unknown. Goku landed back on the ground and wiped his forehead of sweat.

“Whew, that was fun.” Goku giggled as he strolled over to the pedestal and grabbed the Dragon Balls. After all that hard work, he had earned his prize. You on the other hand had earned a mouthful of the kid’s sweat and a loss of dignity. Anyway, Goku was about to leave when…

15111211112212121.content:
You waited trembling with fear, as the oppressing environment of Son Goku’s gut seemed to close in around you. You had the sneaking suspicion that the boys belly was indeed contracting, having accommodated to its human meal and that it intended to process you like any meal.

“hmmm” you heard Goku consider his brow furrowed in deep thought. “I shouldn’t hurt people ….. but you’re a bad guy” he muttered to himself as though whether or not to turn a living being into waste was the greatest moral conundrum he had ever faced.

“ah huh”, your prison shook as Goku slapped his hand against his forehead in realisation. “It doesn’t matter if your good or bad now” The boy said a grin spreading across his face, instantly dashing your hopes. “You’re in ‘my’ tummy and what’s in my tummy is food and food needs to be eaten” Goku told you, a cheerful finality in his voice.

You wanted to cry out, to plead and beg but as if in response to Goku’s childish revelation the kids digestive system kicked into overdrive. The pool of acid and mush began to rise around you and while the smelly sack of muscle contracted and pulsated, throwing you all about and leaving you unable to speak.

His five minute dilemma over, the legendary monkey boy Goku continued on his way finishing up what was left of the Red Ribbon base. With each leap, kick and punch he not only took down Red Ribbon soldiers but his gut sloshed around speeding up the breakdown of one of their commanders. Those goons might have been humiliated, being beaten by a child but it was nothing compared to what you were suffering.

You weren’t sure how long you remained conscious. Perhaps you died instantly and this extended experience was your mind imagining your fate. Whatever the case when you finally lost consciousness you unfortunately had complete clarity on what was to follow.

Another base of bad guys defeated Goku left behind smoking ruins. He was thanked by the locals and offered a meal that he would pile on top of your liquefied remains. After his reward he once again set off to meet Bulma and Krillin.

As time passed the bulge in Goku’s gut, refreshed from his reward would slowly shrink until, with a deep gurgling the slurry was pumped into his duodenum. Goku felt this emptying of his upper gut but paid it no mind, merely placing a hand on his lower belly. After all this happened every day.

Your remains spent hours being squeezed with rest of the food through the small intestine. Millions of tiny villi sucking any and all nutrition out of you and the surrounding debris before moving you on to waste disposal.

It was slightly roomier in Goku’s large intestine, not that you could comprehend it. Thankfully you also had no way to smell the crap that his bacteria was working hard to produce. As you sludged further along, water was reabsorbed from you until you were a stinky brown log. You were bathed in foul wind rushing past you to be expelled by the boy. From your position you could hear the kids every prrrrttt and childish giggle at the stinky wind you gave yourself to make.

Finally you reached the end packing the monkey boys rectum as huge length of poop. The only question now is the circumstance of your release.

You watched the older Trunks slip one of his feet out of his boot. He wasn’t wearing socks and he wiggled his toes, glad to have them free of their confines if just for a few seconds. You thought you knew where Trunks was planning on hiding you, but hoped you were wrong. Your fears turned out to be true, however, when Trunks lowered his hand to his boot and quickly dropped you into the leather boot. No sooner had you landed on the boot’s smelly floor that Trunks started to put his bare foot back in. You screamed in terror and tried to run away from the quickly approaching sayian foot. If you could reach the end of the boot, you might have a chance. Unfortunately, you were just too small and slow to escape the older male’s gargantuan foot. You watched the toes pass you overhead as trunks pinned you under the ball of his foot. You were instantly brought down so you were lying flat on your stomach; your face pushed against he sole of the boot and your back being crushed from behind. You got a nose full of the sweat lingering at the bottom of the footwear.

Above, you could make out the voices of several DBZ characters. Most of them were praising trunks and congratulating him on his victory. It was an important moment in Dragonball history and you wished you could see it first hand. Instead, you had to listen to their muffled voices while being kept secretly under the moist foot of the newcomer. You tried to scream, hoping one of them would hear you, but was quickly silenced by Trunks who put some pressure on you. The movement made your lips touch the leathery bottom of the boot and you gagged. Smelling this young man’s foul sweat and now tasting it…it was too much. You felt yourself start to get lightheaded .

As he begins walking again, however, the raunchy smell overcomes you and you pass out between Trunk's slick and sweaty toes.

15132112.title: Trunks' raunchy boot

choices: Trunks puts you in his armpit as he works out.

151321121.content:
Trunks brought his foot down and dropped you on the floor. You watched as the large half-sayian brought up a chair and seated himself on it. He placed both his bare feet flat on the floor directly in front of you and flashed you a smile.

“Here’s the deal, bug boy: I have ten toes that have been stuck in my footwear for days. I want you to lick out the toejam from between each and every one of them.” Trunks commanded, wiggling his toes in anticipation.

“What?! But--”

“No buts! You will do as I say or I’ll squash you between my toes instead. You want that?”

“No, sir!” You yelled up at him, getting the message and running over to the first set of toes on his right foot. Trunks spread his toes for you and you got your first glimpse of his toe funk. It looked repulsive and you were going to lick it up? You stared at the filth for a few seconds, hoping Trunks would say he was just joking. Instead, the young time traveler grew irritated with your stalling and tapped his left foot against the floor. The tremors created from the simple movement threw you off balance and you fell face-first into the toejam. Trunks gripped your body tightly with his toes, intending not to release you until you did our job. Giving in to the giant, you stuck your tongue out and lapped up the gunk. Your tongue quickly felt like it was burning and your stomach, which was receiving the “food”, didn’t like it either. After a minute or so you had finished and Trunks released you so you could move onto the next space. You reluctantly did so and repeated the process. These two toes contained even more toe cheese than the other two, but you could only obey your master and lick it all up. You cleaned out this cleavage; six more to go.

As you continued with your job, you started to catch quick glances at your surroundings. You appeared to be in a bed room somewhere. You saw a bed, dresser, a door, and a couple windows. The shades were closed so you couldn’t tell if it was night or day. Looking up at Trunks, you noticed he had removed his jacket at some point. He was now only wearing his black muscle shirt, which clung to his body and showed off his defined torso and arms. The son of Vegeta was resting the back of his head on his arms and had his eyes closed. You didn’t think he was sleeping, so escaping would probably turn out bad for you.

By the time you had reached his other foot, the task became less trouble for you. Was it because these toes happened to carry less toejam than the others, or were you starting to get use to the smell and taste? Nonetheless, you breezed through the remaining spaces between Trunk’s toes. Finally done, you pulled yourself out of Trunk’s sweaty toes and collapsed on your back. Your body was covered in a mix of Trunk’s perspiration and your own. When Trunks felt you stopped licking, he looked down and smiled at you.

“Nice job, squirt. I didn’t think you’d pull through. Ready for some more fun?”

“No.” you weakly mumbled.

“Didn’t catch that, sorry. I think you said ‘yes’, so let’s get started!”
151321121.title: One Toe, Two Toe, Three Toe...

Without saying a word, Trunks grabbed you and brought you up to his face.
"wow, you clearly need a bath if youre gonna survive the next part..." he said with a malicious smile. you immediately knew where this was going. Trunks opened his mouth wide and dangled you over it, laughing at your erratic movements. He finally dropped you in and clamped his mouth shut. His tongue lapped over you, causing all his saliva to cover you completely. After about two minutes, he pulled you out and asked "did you enjoy your bath, bitch?"
Without waiting he dropped you on his now dry, yet still smelly sock.
"Im gonna need you dry if youre gonna do well in the next challenge..." he said evilly. After patting you dry with the musky sock, he removed his black muscle shirt to reveal a sweaty torso.

"Ready for my rank pits, kid?" he asked. Without waiting for a reply, he shoved you into his left armpit. The rank odor immediately overcame you, as you tried to scream. This only made it worse, as all of the sweat and stink from his armpit was forced into your mouth. Trunks clamped tightly to make sure you couldnt escape.

"Ready for the work out slave?" He whispered to you, hoping youd realize how much sweatier his pit would become after a good work out.

The work out seemed to last forever, as you merely sat there aborbing Trunks' pit sweat. After about an hour of pure torture, light flooded your vision and Trunks' sweaty face reappeared.

"Phew, by the way you smell, Id say i had a good workout." He chuckled loudly.
1513211211.title: Trunks' sweaty pit

Someone Knocks on the door of his room
15132112112.content:
Trunks lowered you til' you were about knee height, and dropped you with a thud to the floor. Then what seemed like an earthquake to you, as Trunks dropped on his butt to the floor. He took off his left boot, then his right, with a ginormous sigh of relief. He was wearing socks this time, which clung to his soaked feet and looked dingy and gray.

He wiggled his socked toes as he stretched out his legs to extend his sweaty clothed feet to you. His feet were on either side of you now. So much heat, so much smell it made you feel queasy, all from this teenage super saiyan's raunchy toes. He flexed his socked toes. "Come on kid, don't make this harder than it has to be...Be a good slave and smell my feet." Trunks grinned.

"Smell them!? W-Wouldn't you rather have a massage?" You stutter. You can already smell the scent of his overworked saiyan feet, and by all means you do not wanna smell them of your own accord.

Trunks' grin grew wider. "Nope....Get sniffing runt!" Trunks ordered.

You sighed and dragged your feet towards his giant left foot. Apparently you were taking too much time for the giant, and he proceeded to scoot his foot closer and closer to you until your face unknowingly touched his sock. You were given quite a shock at this, and unfortunately took a breath through your nose. You doubled over and gagged as Trunks laughed loudly above. It was horrendous, but you knew he couldn't have bathed at all during the long trip from his time.

"Not good enough," Trunks snarled as he scooted his feet closer, "I want three sniffs each foot. Then you can take off my socks and lick my bare soles."

You were shocked at how cruel the son of Vegeta was. First sniffing his socked feet, then licking the sweaty bare soles!?

However your will to live was more valuable to you than foolish pride, so you sighed and re approached the sock.
15132112112.title: Smelling Defeet

151321121121.content:
You sniffed the socked foot twice more, gagging afterwards and whipping tears from your eyes. Trunks grinned down at your suffering and just moved his other foot closer to you.

“Don’t pass out on me, runt. You still have another foot to sniff…then you gotta lick ‘em!” Trunks reminded you while he flexed his socked toes in anticipation. You wobbled over to his other foot and leaned against it. It’s soft material gave you some comfort, but you knew it wouldn’t last as you took the first deep sniff. You felt some sock fuzz clog your nose and you started to sneeze, trying to get it out. Maybe smelling it that close wasn’t a good idea. You gave the sock two more sniffs from a safer distance so only the smell entered your nose. It was more than enough to turn your face green and make you want to vomit…

“Good job, runt. Now you have to pull my socks off so we can get to the licking!”

You glanced over at Trunks enormous feet and then back at Trunks face. He wasn’t really expecting you to take his socks off…was he?

“Oh come on, you can do it. You look like a strong kid. Here, I’ll make it easier.” Trunks stated as he pulled both his socks down to his heels. The rest you would have to do. You hesitated for a moment before making you way toward one of his feet and gripping the end of his sock tightly. Taking a deep breath (complete with foot odor) you pulled with all your might. It was like pulling a cart full of boxes full of concrete bricks! You could do it, but was incredibly difficult and you were making slow progress. After pulling the sock a couple inches off, he were forced to let go and caress your arms. It felt like you were going to pull them off!

“Take your time, I got all day.” Trunks said as he rested his chin on his knuckles. You took a few minutes to rest before you continued to pull he sock off. The rank odor of his feet didn’t make the job any easier, but you knew it had to be done or else you were dead meat. After a while and a few more breaks, you gave the sock one last tug before it slipped off the giant’s toes. You were flung backwards and the sock covered your entire body. Trunks laughed hysterically as he watched you try to escape from under his sock. Not wanting you to suffocate under his odorous footwear, he plucked the sock off you to reveal your panting and fuzz covered body.

“That’s one sock, little man. One more to go.”

You groaned in pain as you forced yourself off the floor and toward Trunks’ remaining socked foot. Since the last ordeal had sapped your strength, it took twice as long and twice as many breaks until you had this sock off. Not wanting a repeat of before, you pulled this sock off slowly and carefully as to not become trapped under it. Once it was off, you fell onto your back to rest. Your body was covered in your own sweat and your arms were useless for the time being. You were glad Trunks didn’t want a foot rub…

“Nice job, kid. Now for the licking.” Trunks placed both his bare feet next to you and wiggled his toes tauntingly. You wanted to protest and beg Trunks for a respite, but one glance at the titan make you bite your tongue. The sight of his shirtless, godly form towering over you was far too intimidating. One wrong word and he might smash you into a pulp with his finger! You had no choice but to obey, forgetting your pride.

Now instead of those boring old action figures , I have a real live tiny guy to play with!” Trunks said reaching a massive hand to you.
You were in shock, so it was HIM who did this to you!? Of all people it was Trunks!? However you didn’t have much time to consider that fact as Trunks’ fingers wrapped around you and brought you up to his face as he inspected you.

Trunks sat down on his bedroom floor with you in his lap. You glared up at the titanic kid as he got comfortable. He kicked his boots off, revealing two dingy, sweat soaked socks. Their odor could be smelled from where you were sitting!

Mom said that was how dogs marked things with their smell to let other dogs know that it was theirs. Goten is always wanting to play with my stuff, maybe if I mark you with MY scent he’ll know to stay away from you! Hehe!” Trunks chuckled evilly as he stripped off his socks, revealing two very linty and very sweaty bare feet.
Trunks wiggled his bare toes as he placed you down at his feet, the smell got considerably stronger once you were close to them. As those big plump toes wiggled overhead, bits of wet lint fell on your head.

You knew this was going to be hellish….

You looked up to see a man with six dots on his forehead, he was bald and was wearing what you recognized as a Kame gi. You immediately recognized this as the shorty character Krillin from DBZ! However he was anything but short to you now. He was strolling towards you with his socked feet, with a look on his face that told you he was in a bad mood. "Man....Maron just left me like that....I can't believe it!" He said with a sigh.

His dirty socked sole was about to come down on your body, you were too stunned to move. You caught a whiff of something foul. You covered your nose and mouth, and just Krillin's foot began to touch you, he looked down. "Oh great...We have bugs now!" He said with a scowl as his foot retreated and he stared down at you menacingly. You gulped, clearly Krillin's recent dumping was going to be taken out on you.

Then he did something weird, he reached down and picked you up. You aren't one for heights and you got a feeling of vertigo as he brought you up to his face. "Aha! I knew you were a weird looking bug! Now I see what you are!"

"....." you decided to keep silent for awhile until he decided what do to with you.

"You look exactly like one of those jerks who Maron ran off with! This is great!" He said with a wild laugh.

"WHAT!? NO NO NO NO NO! I've never seen you before in my life.....except on tv." You muttered that last part.

"Nice try my little surfer dude. But you caught me in a bad mood....and now I'm afraid I'm gonna have to teach you a lesson about what happens when you mess with Krillin!" He did a pose with you in his hand as rose petals fell from nowhere.

"So...what should I do with you first?"

1513321.content:
You recognized the shoes, and sure enough when you looked up it was Yamcha that you saw. He was wearing a red, sleeveless gi with the Turtle School's emblem on the chest. You didn't want to get stepped on but your legs wouldn't move, you were in awe at the young man before you. Luckily his foot passed over your head and he sat down on a bench behind you.
“Whew….I did my best….But I guess that Hero (Shen for you subbies ) guy was stronger than he looked.” Yamcha said to himself. However, you couldn’t help but see the faintest hint of regret in his eyes. Regret that he wouldn’t even be runner up, he’d never have beat Goku though.
He always was a greedy one that Yamcha, his thief days may have been behind him, but he would never outgrow his love for money.
While you were thinking these thoughts, you failed to notice that Yamcha’s eyes were locked directly on you. Lucky for you, you were just large enough to be noticed as a small human instead of for a bug.

“What the hell?” Yamcha said as he checked to make sure no one was looking, and swiped you off the floor.
“H-Hey!” You yelled in surprise as you were lifted up to Yamcha’s boyish face.

“Wow….Are you for real?”

“Of course! I’m a person!”

“Hmm….a tiny person. Wait….This is too weird. I bet you could fit under my shoe!” Yamcha said, and decided to do just that! He set you on the ground before him, and pinned you underneath his shoe. “Ack! Get off me! This hurts!”
Yamcha grinned, he got another idea. He had always wanted someone to wait on him hand and foot. And Puar wasn’t gonna do it obviously, besides Puar was his friend, he wasn’t gonna do that to her.

Looks like you fit the bill though! Yamcha smirked as he lifted his shoe off you and picked you up lightning fast.

Yamcha flicked his long hair out of his face, “Hmph…screw this joint. I’ve found something much more interesting!”
Yamcha stuffed you into his pocket and caught a cab home. Nobody knew where he’d went, but assumed he was sore for losing and decided not to stay and watch the rest of the 23rd WMAT
Once Yamcha was at the hotel where they were staying, he went into his room, placing a do not disturb sign on the door knob.
Yamcha took you out of his pocket and placed you on his chest as he lay down on the comfortable bed. You were a bit shook up from the way you were being treated, wasn’t Yamcha supposed to be a Z Fighter? A good guy?
As you felt Yamcha’s chest rise and fall beneath your body, he suddenly sat up and you tumbled onto his crotch. “Heheheh…And you haven’t even bought me flowers or anything yet!” Yamcha guffawed.
You blushed as Yamcha leaned forward and began to fiddle with something out of your sight, he sighed a long sigh after he was done, and a foul smell reached your nostrils. “My feet are soo tired after all that fighting at the 23rd, think you could help me with that?”

Yamcha grinned as he plucked you off his crotch and tossed you to the end of the bed, where his very smelly and very sweaty and overworked feet were waiting and wiggling.
You landed between Yamcha’s feet, you looked on both sides of you. There was a sweaty sole to the left, and a sweaty sole to the right. They smelled horrendous as well.
You glared at Yamcha far ahead, while he just waited for you to begin…

15133212.content:
“How long are you just going to stand around? Start rubbing, little man!” Yamcha commanded as he relaxed back on the bed with his muscular arms folded behind his head. You continued to stand there, glaring up at the larger man. Your fists were clenched with anger. If he thought you were just going to be pushed around, he had another thing coming!

“No! I won’t rub your gross feet! Get someone else to do it; I’m out of here if you aren’t going to help me.” you shouted at him, surprising the older man a bit. You turned your back to the giant and waltzed on over to the edge of the bed. Hopefully you’d be able to slide down the comforter and be on your way. You never got that far, however, because you suddenly found yourself in the middle of a shadow. Before you could even turn around, something huge and smelly slammed into your back and forced you flat on your stomach. The large object, which was Yamcha’s foot, smushed you into the soft bedding and made you yelp.

“Not so fast, lil fella! You can’t just walk away after I told you to do something.” Yamcha chuckled and, with you still pinned under his sweaty sole, dragged you away from the edge of the bed. “Do you know what I could do to you, little man? I could crush you like a bug just for saying no to me…or maybe make a little snack out of you!” The young Z Fighter grinned and slapped his hard stomach with one of his hands. This made you cry out in fear and squirm harder, not wanting to end up a snack for this man’s gut. Yamcha picked his foot off his bed and brought it to his handsome face. You were stuck to the mighty sole thanks to all the sweat; a sight that made Yamcha laugh hysterically. After getting control over himself again, Yamcha peeled you off his foot and dangled you in front of his face. “I won’t do that just yet, though. This is a rare opportunity and I want to make the most out of it! Instead I think I’ll, just this once, rub my feet myself…but using you!”

You didn’t really understand what the giant martial artist meant, but you soon found out when he brought you over to sole you had just been smothered by. Before you knew it you were smashed against the damp, hot foot and rubbed face fist into it. Your muffed shouts were ignored as the much larger male used his meaty hand to drag you back and forth along his overworked foot. You squirmed and wiggled, but Yamcha’s fingers made sure to keep you in your place.

“Ahhh…that feels good…” Yamcha spoke as he rubbed you over the top of his foot. The skin of the foot was solid like a rock and the muscles underneath were full of power. You imaged all the people Yamcha must of kicked in the face with them and now you were getting up close and personal with them. It didn’t hurt as much as being kicked in the face, but it sure wasn’t comfortable. The sweat and heat of the foot washed over you, dampening your clothes and burning your nostrils. You groaned for him to stop, but he only tossed your minuscule body into his other hand so he could work on the other foot.

Why was Yamcha doing this? Didn’t he see you as a human? A human child, for that matter? Who knew the guy was cruel enough to take advantage of someone’s size like this.

“Just think, little man. If you had obeyed me, you would of only had to touch my foot with your hands. Now you’re getting the full treatment! Bet you wish you hadn’t been so naïve, eh?”

The muscular young fighter bellowed with laughter as he dragged you over his heel. You weren’t squirming anymore, already seeing how futile it was. Yamcha was already superhuman to begin with; you didn’t stand a chance of fighting back at your pathetic size.

“You know, you make a pretty good sweat rag, little man.” Yamcha said as he brought you up to his face. Your body was weak from the exposure to his smelly feet, but you were still conscious and capable of listening to him. “I think I’ll do this again sometime. In fact…” Yamcha grinned deviously. “My feet aren’t as sweaty as they used to be, but they’re still pretty hot. How about you cool them down with…say…your tongue! Yeah!” Yamcha giggled like a little kid as he imagined you licking his big feet. “If you don’t…I’ll keep using you as a sweat rag. The rest of me is still pretty sweaty!” To prove this to you, Yamcha raised his free arm over his head to expose his glistening, hairy armpit. Your eyes widened as you realized he was threatening to put you in there if you refused again. He wouldn’t do that…not Yamcha. He was a good guy! Using you to rub his feet was just an unfunny joke…he wouldn’t put you in that stinky hell…right?

Cursing, you picked it up and checked to see if it was still working. It wasn't. You cursed again and tried hitting it, like your dad always did. The screen flickered and you thought you'd fixed it, until a loud buzzing noise and flashing multi-colored lights told you otherwise. The display made your head hurt and soon you passed out.

You woke up leaning against something. It felt hard and rough, like a shoe. You soon realized it was a shoe. Jumping back in surprise, you took notice to the giant room around you and the figure that stood just above you. At just two inches tall, the figure looked like a god to you. Pass the giant's legs and chest, you discovered it was...
152.title: Full Metal Alchemist

choices: He sees you, but thinks you're a bug.
1521.content:
You'd recognize that boyish face and golden hair anywhere. The giant looming above you was the Fullmetal Alchemist himself, Edward Elric. He wasn't wearing his usual red coat, only the black shirt that was usually under it. The giant teen had an annoyed expression on his face, something that didn't come as a surprise to you.

"Al, did you find it yet? At this rate the store will close!" he yelled into the room next-door. A younger, more gentle voice responded.

"Just a minute. I know you left your wallet somewhere around here. Why don't you look for it?" You recognized the voice as Ed's younger brother, Alphonse. "Aw, found it! You left it in your dirty pants pocket." The door swung open and the human form of the Elric brother walked in with a leather wallet in his hand. You wondered why he was human and not a suit of armor, but didn't ponder the answer for very long. When Ed's brother walked in, Ed swung his foot around and unnoticeably bumped you with his shoe. The light impact set you flying several feet (to you) away from the Elric brothers.

"Good job, Al. Just take it over to the grocery store and pick up a few things."

"Why do I have to go, big brother? It was my turn last time, plus it's Sunday." he wined. "You know it's going to be really busy and I'll be gone for hours."

You rubbed your head after it hit the wooden floor hard and gazed up at the two brothers. They were both facing each other and you could compare their titanic sizes. Despite being a year younger, you noticed that Al was taller by a few inches. "I know, but after the incidence last month I don't think they want to see me for awhile...you understand."

Alphonse only rolled his eyes and mouthed a silent reply before leaving with the money. Ed waited until his brother was gone before falling onto the couch and relaxing. There was nothing like a couple hours of pure relaxation. Ed's eyes suddenly looked over at your direction while you stared into those golden orbs that you believed were staring at you.
1521.title: Meet the Elric Brothers

15211.content:
It took a few moments before Ed realized he wasn't seeing things. There was something tiny on the floor that look out of place to him. At first he thought it was a coin or some bug that was just asking to be stomped flat, but it was something else. Only when he got up from his seat and crouched down in front of the object did he find out it was a tiny human around his age.

"Whoa, what the hell?" Edward eyes gave you a curious stare that you somehow found intimidating. Maybe it was his face being so close, who knows. It definitely wasn't a normal sight. You only raised your hand slowly and mumbled a hello. The alchemist neither responded nor gave any indication that he heard you. Instead, his auto mail arm came around and pinched the back of your shirt. He then stood up to his full height and brought your little form in front of his handsome face. He grinned slyly as he looked at you. "Looks like you're having a bad day. Feeling a bit small?" You gave him an angry glare, but again he seemed to ignore you except for dropping you onto the palm of his human hand. "So what's your story? Some accident with alchemy or something?"

You tried telling him your story and how you got here, not really thinking that the teen probably wouldn't understand what you were talking about. But once again Ed was seemingly focused more on the fact that he had a shrunken human in his hand then anything said shrunken human had to say. Evil and sinister thoughts flooded Ed's mind...he just felt like being a bit bad. His thoughts were shown in his grinning face, which only made you frightened.
15211.title: The Future Looks Grim

choices: Ed Rubs You In His Armpits
Ed wants you to worship his feet.
152111.content:
Ed tosses you up and down like a ball while his grin gets bigger, devious thoughts filling his head. "I've always wanted a chance to be the big guy, and here you are....Question is...what to do with you..." he says as you fall back down onto his hand. You look up in fear at the blonde teen as he thinks of something to do to you.

"Hmm....What first?" Ed thinks out loud as he sits down on his bed.
152111.title: Ed decides to enslave you.

1521111.content:
"First of all...You are to call me Master Elric at all times. You will do anything I say. Got that shrimp?" He said poking you in the chest with his finger. You nodded quickly as he smirked down at you.

Ed just happened to be wearing his black tank top, black pants, and boots. He placed you on the bed next to him and stretched his arms out above his head. "Ahhh.....*sniff sniff*...Yech......Haven't had a shower in awhile." He said seemingly to himself as he sniffed under his human arm. He caught you staring at him and grinned, "See something you like?" He said gesturing to his body. You quickly shake your head and look away.

"Heh...." he smirked as he picked you up. "First order of business is breaking my new servant in. And the best way to do that is to get you aquainted with my god like body...."

Ed after a bit of consideration decides to...
1521111.title: Breaking You In

choices: Ed wants to play a game with you.
15211111.content:
“Well, no better place to start than the bottom, right?” Ed said as he dropped you back on the bed. While you were still recovering from the fall, Ed began untying his boot and slipping it off before tossing it away. The sound of the boot making contact with the floor distracted you for a moment, so you didn’t see Ed slip of his sock with a quick motion. When you turned your head back to the giant teen, you saw the sight of Ed’s gigantic sole coming down on you. You tried to run, but only managed to turn around before the foot hammered you in the back. You were pushed against the soft mattress. “Ahhh…that feels good.” Ed sighed, as if he simply put his foot down to relax it.

“E-Ed!!” you screamed up at him. “Please, don’t--mmmph!!” you weren’t able to finish as the elder Elric pushed you harder into the bed. If the bed wasn’t so soft, you surely would have been crushed like a pancake.

“I thought I said you were to refer to be as ‘Master Elric’? Did you forget already, shrimp?” Edward moved his foot so his big toe was directly above your head. Using that single toe, he began putting pressure against the back of your head. “Say it right before I pop your head like a grape.” You wanted to cry, but the pain left no room for tears.

“Mmmaspher…Elrif!!”

Ed laughed at the sound of you trying to speak. You were being muffled by the bed, so it didn’t come out clearly. He removed his big toe from your head, allowing you to speak.

“M…Master Elric!!” you yelled up to him. Your body was hot from being under his bare foot and you hope the giant would let you go soon. Ed instead gave a shrug at your obedience before covering you with his sole once more. This time he began rolling you under it, covering every inch of you in foot sweat.

“It’ll take a lot more than that to convince me, little slave. Keep it up, though.” Ed began scratching his chin as he thought up your next act of obedience, all why rolling you under the ball of his foot.
15211111.title: Foot Torture You

choices: ...that he was looking at you with satisfaction
152111111.content:
When Ed finally took the foot off you, it felt like a big relief. A few more seconds and you were sure a bone or something was going to get rolled out of place. You started to stand up, but stopped half-way when you noticed anymore would land you right against Ed’s monstrous foot. Despite having to reeking terror off your body, Ed was still hovering it over you like some dangerous predator. You looked at it for a few seconds before looking past it and into Ed’s grinning face. He had his arms folded over his chest and was looking straight at you, as if waiting for a show or something.

“M-Master Elric?” you said up to him in a confused voice. Ed chuckled as he watched your pitiful form shake, scared just by being so close to him. It was kinda cute.

“Don’t tell me your still shy of it? Even after all that? My foot gave you a good rub down, now he wants some love.”

“B-but…what am I supposed to do?”

Ed rolled his eyes, beginning to get a little annoyed. He held onto his patience, since a slave would have to be taught these kind of things first. “I don’t really care what you do. Rub it, lick it, kiss it if you want to. Just make me feel good and BIG.” Ed closed his eyes and laughed. So this was all just to stroke his ego? You had no choice, since defying him wasn’t an option. You carried yourself back to his foot and looked over it. You got closer and instantly felt the smell radiating off it. Trying to ignore it, you started rubbing his sole with your tiny palms. His sole was rough and covered in grime, which you could feel slide between your fingers like mud. It wasn’t so bad, once you got use to the smell.

“That feels good, keep going. Don’t be shy.” you heard him speak as the young alchemist relaxed on his bed. Making Ed happy was probably the only thing you could do right now that might benefit you. You got even closer to the foot and began rubbing higher while also licking the places you’d already rubbed. It tasted just like you thought: sweaty like a very active teenager. Ed must have felt you licking because he started moan from the feeling. He was mumbling something you couldn’t hear.

After a few minutes, your hands started to get sore and your tongue felt like it was about to fall out. You looked up at Ed again to see…
152111111.title: Not the Worse Job in the World

15211112.content:
You felt totally helpless under the gaze of the giant Edward. You knew he was thinking just how to “acquaint” you with Master Elric’s god-like body. Whatever he came up with, it could only be bad news for you. The alchemist still had his human arm raised into the air, letting the foul stench of his pit seep out into the air. Ed must have noticed this as his grin visibly widened to signal his decision. Without warning, Ed took the hand he was holding you with and slapped his exposed armpit, making a quick, squishy sound. Your tiny, two inch form made it easy for you to get stuck on Ed’s sweaty skin. The blonde, sweat-covered hairs entangled themselves around you as your clothes stuck to Ed’s pits like glue.

“Comfortable?” Ed asked with a laugh. Using a single finger of his automail hand, he gently pushed your miniscule form deeper into his armpit. To you it felt like you were being pushed against a wall by a force several times stronger than you. After your master felt you weren’t going to slip out, he put his arm down and engulfed you in darkness. You were being crushed between his muscular arm and torso. “Okay, slave, you just hang tight for awhile.”
15211112.title: Trap You In His Armpit

choices: Follow Ed's POV As He Dreams
Follow Your POV As You Try To Escape
152111121.content:
Ed let himself fall back onto his bed with a sigh of content. "Ahhh....." He loved knowing the fact that he had such power over another being. Especially with such a potent force as his own body odor. He had always been the small one. The one who was ridiculed for his size. Now it was as if he had been given a gift to finally show someone else how it felt.

With these comforting thoughts Ed drifted into a sound sleep.
152111121.title: Ed takes a quick nap.

1521111211.content:
Ed found himself in Mustang's office. Mustang was griping to him about something, Ed wasn't really paying attention.


Then Mustang said something about his height. Ed jumped up from the couch and started yelling at the colonel. "Who are you calling microscopic!?" Funny thing happened when Ed started yelling. Mustang seemed to slink down in his chair. Ed quickly hopped onto his desk "Hey! Don't sink down in your chair when I'm talking to y-" He didn't finish however...when he saw that Mustang was the size of his thumb sitting in his chair looking bewildered!

It took Ed a second to process this, and then he got an evil grin. "Well well well maybe there is a god....." he said as he snatched up Mustang and held him in front of his face.

"E-Ed! P-Put me down!" Mustang squeaked.

Ed laughed loudly causing Mustang to cover his ears. "You sound hilarious! But now I think its time you were shown who's boss from now on..." Ed said as he set Mustang down on the desk and began removing his boots.

"Ahhh...." he said as he lifted a sweaty sockless bare foot out of the boot. "I love the fresh air..." He said just as he scooted a chair up to the desk and propped his big sweaty feet up on the desk. Surprisingly, both feet were human, and both were very sweaty and smelly. "E-Ed! What happened to your auto-*gag*....mail?" Mustang said pinching his nose.

"Oh I was about to tell you when you were being a jackass.....We found it...Which means you're no longer my boss....You're a liability." He said as he wiggled his sweaty toes in front of the colonel.
1521111211.title: Sweet Dreams

choices: Mustang says something that makes Ed angry.
Ed does something else with Roy.
15211112112.content:
“Hey, Roy. My feet need a good rubdown. Since you’re right there, get to work.” ordered Ed as he wiggled his toes some more. Roy glared hatefully at the teenager.

“That’s Colonel Mustang, Fullmetal! And there’s no way in hell I’m touching your disgusting feet!” shouted the shrunken, older alchemist. Ed gave the small fry an unamused look.

“Whatever, Colonel Shrimp. I wasn’t asking, anyway.” Ed slammed one of his feet against the desk after saying this, knocking Mustang over easily. “Start rubbing or you’ll be doing it from underneath them! I’m the boss now.”

Roy gave another scowl , but admitted defeat. The tiny man started rubbing both of the boy’s feet. Trying to rub both of them evenly was difficult. Roy had to keep switching between the two, rubbing one at a time. His gloved hands were getting drenched in foot sweat as Ed relaxed against the chair.

“Take off those gloves. Your bare hands would feel muuuuch better.” ordered Roy. The Flame Alchemist didn’t want to touch those two monstrosities with his bare hands, but he had little choice in the matter. With a sigh, he took off his white gloves and stuffed them into his pocket before resuming his chore. Ed closed his eyes as he felt his former boss give him a foot massage. He could get used to this.

“So, Al and I were thinking of moving back to Resembool. We’ll be taking you along as well, of course. You can be the family foot slave.”

“I’m not being your foot slave, Fullmetal! Never!”

“Ooh? Well, if not a foot slave then how about an all-around slave? There’s not much you can do at that size, but we’ll think of something.” Ed could almost hear Roy’s fuming from behind his feet. He grinned as he pictured all the “fun” he had in store for the colonel.
15211112112.title: Ed Wants A Massage

choices: Ed Has Roy Smell His Foot Willingly
152111121121.content:
"I'm not going to be any kind of slave to you, Fullmetal BeanSprout!" Mustang shouted from behind Ed's sweaty feet. Ed sat up in his chair. "WHO ARE YOU CALLING SO SHORT HE COULDN'T BE SEEN WITH A MICROSCOPE!?" Ed yelled causing Roy's ears to pop as Ed lifted one dripping wet bare foot into the air and brought it slamming down upon the colonel. Roy screamed as he felt a rib or two break.

Ed was furious, Roy could fit in his palm and he still didn't respect him! That was the last straw. It was time Roy showed Ed how superior Ed was to him. And Ed had just the thing.

"So you still don't respect me!?" Ed thundered from his chair. Roy just grunted as he tried to push Ed's gigantic odorous foot off of him. "How do you like my new human foot colonel? It's nice and sweaty just for teensy weensy you!" Ed said as he increased the pressure on Roy just a bit. Not enough to break bones or anything, but to cause him to be in more pain.

"I've had it with you Mustang. It's time I got some respect from you. And I've got just the way for you to show you how low you are compared to the great Fullmetal Alchemist!" Ed said smirking evilly.
152111121121.title: Ed and The Beansprout Colonel

choices: Edward is laughing in his sleep and someone wakes him up.
1521111211212.content:
The Colonel scoffed through his grunts of discomfort, obviously not impressed with the giant Ed’s threat. “Ha! ‘Great Fullmetal Alchemist’? With your limbs back, that title no longer makes sense. How about the ‘Amazing Tiny Alchemist’?” Roy laughed to himself, even while Edward was applying pressure on him. The anger in the Elric’s face was unimaginable.

“THAT’S IT! I’ve had it with you!” Ed shouted as he removed his foot from Mustang and replaced it with his hand, grasping the Colonel roughly. The young alchemist hopped out of the chair and over to one of his discarded boots. Without saying a thing, Ed stuffed the shrunken alchemist into his footwear. Roy immediately got to his feet and rushed for the opening. He was too slow, however, as Ed’s bare foot blocked his only exit.

“Crap”. Roy cursed as he made a 180 and darted to the other end of the shoe. Ed’s toes wiggled as his foot slowly crept into the black boot. He gave the bean sprout colonel plenty of time to reach to toe section of the boot, since then the only thing he could do was watch fearfully as the giant’s foot got closer and closer. Eventually, the toes reached Roy and pushed him under them. The Flame Alchemist’s upper torso was caught between two toes while the rest of him was smothered by Ed’s sole. Outside, the elder Elric grinned as he felt the little bug caught between his toes. He wiggled them and forced Roy’s face between them, making him smell his cheesy toes. After getting both feet comfortably into his boots and forgetting about his socks, Ed started to leave Mustang’s office. His entire foot was weighing down on Roy, so he didn’t have to worry about accidentally crushing him. As he made his way through the military HQ, he laughed. His laugh was full of victory and pride. He ignored the personnel that gave him weird glances and strolled out of Headquarters toward home, laughing the entire time.
1521111211212.title: The Amazing Tiny Alchemist

Once Ed got back to the hotel, he popped off his boots with a suction cup sound due to the sweat. He looked inside the boot for the colonel, ignoring the foul smell of his own foot. When he turned the boot upside down and Mustang didn't come out, he wondered if Roy escaped. Ed then felt something on his right sole he lifted his foot up onto his knee and inspected it.

There Roy was, plastered to his foot with his head and upper torso caught between his second and third toe, his face directly in a pocket of toejam. Ed laughed and peeled Roy off, holding him up to his face as Roy glared with pure hatred at Ed. "That wasn't funny Ed! Do you ever wash those things!?" Roy demanded while struggling to escape Ed's fingers. "For your information I do in fact bathe.....Every once in awhile....Ha ha!" Ed laughed blowing gusts of air onto the colonel. "Now...How about you...
15211112112122.title: Edward’s dream continues.

“How about smelling my feet, Colonel? Hmm…I wonder if you still qualify as a Colonel?” Ed asked himself as he stroked his chin. Roy’s eyes twitched with annoyance.

“You’re days of ordering me around are over! No, shrimp, right now I’m ordering YOU to smell MY feet. This time willingly!” With that, the giant blond dropped Roy onto the floor, right next to his feet. It was a miracle his arms weren’t broken from all this punishment. That foot would probably really crush him. Swallowing his pride once again, Roy stood up and pushed his face into Ed’s sole to take in his stench. His face twisted with disgust, but he just kept sniffing like an obedient slave would. Ed watched his new slave fulfilling his task. He would never get bored with this. Never.

After several minutes of nonstop inhaling, Roy was ready to pass out. His face looked a bit green and his movements were wobbly. It was almost like he was drunk off the Elric’s odor. Ed decided he had enough of his feet and…
152111121121221.title: Obedience

choices: They Squeeze Him Between Their Feet
1521111211212212.content:
Roy screamed as the foot above him suddenly started to descend, he started to turn around and run away but at that point Ed stomped his foot down on his back, pinning him. "Hang on a sec...." Ed said as if Roy could go anywhere. But Roy decided that Ed probably was saying this in a mocking way anyway. Ed stood up and undid his black jacket. He tossed it onto the floor, leaving him in just his tank top.



"Ahh.....This feels great on a hot day like today...." Ed sighed in pleasure, then giggled at the tickling sensation beneath his sole as Roy struggled. "Going somewhere?" Ed said as he lifted his warm wet foot. "Now the only thing is where do I put ya next?"

Ed lifted up Mustang and grinned, but just as he was about to put Roy somewhere else Al came into the room. "Hey Ed I’m home!....Whatcha got there?” The former suit of armor asked curiously.. He came over to Ed and looked down at Roy with an eyebrow raised, “Is that….Colonel Mustang!?”

“Ha ha Yup!” Ed said laughing. Al looked at Ed, “What did you do!?” “Hey I didn’t do anything! He shrunk by himself! Now I’ve been paying him back for all the torment I’ve suffered! Wanna join me

"Oh really? What exactly did you do?" Said Al with a glance down at Roy and his brother's sweaty bare feet. "Heh heh heh....Made him give me a foot massage, then walked home with him in my boot with no socks on, then I made him smell my feet willingly!" Ed said wiggling his toes, producing a squishy sound.

"Eww gross....That must've been awful Roy.....Having to be around my bro's nasty feet so much...ha ha ha! Well I haven't had a bath with this body yet....So later on we can have a stinky contest!"

"Ha ha! You're on little brother!" Ed said ruffling his brother's hair. “Al…Please help me!” Roy called up to Alphonse. “No way, We don’t take orders from you anymore!” He looked from Roy to Ed, “Hey, Can I join you?”

Ed nodded as they both sat down on the floor.

Al sat down on the floor and removed his shoes, he then removed his socks which came off with sock lint flying everywhere. "Ahh....Feels nice to feel the fresh air..." Al said setting his sock lint covered bare feet in front of Roy.

Roy gagged, They were as bad as Ed’s.
1521111211212212.title: Ed and Al: Sharings Caring

choices: Ed lets Al play with Roy for awhile while he watches.
15211112112122121.content:
When the two brothers were facing each other, Ed dropped Roy between them. The shrunken colonel immediately tried to escape, darting away from the titanic Elric brothers.

“Still being disobedient, even after all that? You’re a tough nut to crack, I’ll give you that.” Ed said calmly as he lifted one of his bare feet into the air, ready to slam it down on the fleeing “fire ant”. Before he could make a move, another foot descended and hit the State Alchemist square in the back. The foot belonged to Al, who grinned at his success. Using his toes, the younger brother grabbed Roy and brought him over to Ed’s face.

“Looking for this?” asked Alphonse with a cheeky grin. His brother grinned back and laughed, blowing hot air at Mustang. Al brought Roy back to the floor between them and dropped him. Before Roy could make another escape attempt, another foot smacked him in the back. This one was Edward’s, who began rubbing him into the floor. Al asked his brother what he was doing.

“Making sure he sticks. See?” Ed lifted his sweaty sole off the apartment floor, which now had a shrunken Mustang glued to it. His sole was facing Al, who just stared at the colonel for a few moments before understanding what Ed wanted. Lifted his own foot into the air, he aimed and slammed it into Ed’s foot. For Roy, it was no longer about being squashed between a foot and the floor, but two sweaty feet at the same time. He was being crushed from both sides and could barely mutter a word. The brothers started rubbing their former superior against each other’s foot, covering him in foot sweat and odor. After about a minute or two, they pulled away with a sick popping noise. Roy was still stuck to Ed’s foot, to Al’s disappointment. Ed scraped Roy off his sole and onto the floor again. Both brothers apparently were apparently thinking the same thing as they both got their feet ready. Roy barely had time to open his eyes, which he shut during the entire ordeal, before he felt himself being crushed once again. The two Elrics had covered Mustang with their feet, rolling him between them as if they were little children again.

“Hehe, he’s like a toy.” Al stated.

“He IS a toy. OUR toy.” corrected Edward. They continued rolling Roy into a ball for several minutes before they decided to release him. Roy was red in the face and panting heavily. He stilled seemed to be able to stand, though.

“You sure we won’t accidentally kill him?”

“Of course not. He was once a high ranking alchemist before he became our slave. I’m sure a little sweat isn’t going to snuff him out. In fact, he probably wants more.” Ed smiled toothily, his little brother following. Roy muttered numerous threats under his breath as he weakly stabilized himself.
15211112112122121.title: The Big Squeeze
