"So, about that stinky contest...What will it be? Feet or armpits? I was gonna stick him in my pits before ya came in." Ed said grinning evilly down at Roy. "Wow...Like I said I haven't had a bath yet with this body..." Al said taking off his shirt and sniffing under his armpits. "Yuck....Get ready Roy! After you've smelled our B.O. you'll have to smell our feet!" Al snickered. Ed did the same as Al and sniffed under his arms, "Ahhh...Nice and raunchy...." Ed said with a cheeky grin.

Who goes first?
152111121121221212.title: Stinky Contest

1521111211212212121.content:
Without saying a word, Alphonse reached down and grabbed Roy off the floor. The younger Elric had decided himself he was going first. Edward didn’t voice any opinions, though. He could wait awhile for his turn, since he had had the post fun with him up till now.

“We both get ten minutes with him.” declared Ed. “Five with our armpits and five with our feet. Agreed?”

“Sure, sure.” muttered Al as held Mustang in front of his naked chest. “But you better be ready to lose. This body hasn’t had a bath in like…years!” Ed rolled his eyes. While is was true that his body had grown while in the Gate, it couldn’t have piled up odor all that time. He wouldn’t even be able to breath if that was the case. But it wasn’t like Ed was worried about losing at all.

After his brother had taken a seat on the couch and taken out his pocket watch to time the event, Al began. He gave Roy a scary smile before lifting his left armpit and brining Roy underneath it. The colonel struggled pitifully until he was inches in front of Al’s pit. He could smell the B.O. radiating off ir and grabbed his nose in disgust.

“Alphonse Elric! Put me down now or--”

“Or what? You’ll punish me?” Al laughed before stuffing the colonel into his armpit. The immense amount of sweat stuck to Roy like slime. Al took his hand away and Roy slowly started to slide down his skin. Before he got very far, Al used his index finger and smush the one-inch man deeper into his pit. He swiveled his finger back in forth, as if smearing a stain off his body. The colonel was helpless and humiliated. After a couple minutes, Al pinched Roy off his armpit, switched hands, and repeated the ordeal with the right pit. This time, however, he used his palm to slap his pit repeatedly. Every hit caused the flesh around his pit to ripple a bit and splash greasy sweat everywhere.

“Hey, Al, stop that!” shouted Ed as he threw an arm out to shield himself. “Your getting your sweat all over the room!”

“It’s not like it wasn’t already everywhere.” responded Al, who looked down at the small pool of sweat that had dripped of his torso during the last few minutes. Al obeyed his brother anyway and spent the last few moments of the first five minutes rubbing Roy into his pit with his palm. Ed told his brother that the first five minutes were up. Alphonse peeled Roy off his pit and got ready for the next half of his turn.
1521111211212212121.title: Al Goes First

choices: Roy Mustang, meet Edward Elric's pits.
15211112112122121211.content:
Roy knew what was coming next, and didn’t like it. Al had only five minutes with him, so maybe he could distract Al and take up some of that time.

“Haven’t I had enough feet exposure for one day?!” shouted the colonel up at Al’s boyish face. Al just grinned and shook his head.

“That was mostly my brother. You haven’t gotten to experience my feet alone yet.”

“Yeah, colonel runt.” spoke Ed from the nearby couch. “Once you’ve had a few days of this, you’ll be begging to worship our god-like bodies.”

“Cut the crap! You two are so dead!!” Roy’s anger had gotten the better of him and he resorted to threatening again. The giant brothers knew Roy’s feeble threats were wasted. Al decided the conversation had ended there and place Roy on the ground. The colonel, like always, made a mad dash in the opposite direction. Al’s booming laugher could be heard above him as he ran, following by the booming sound of his bar feet hitting the ground. One stomp shook the floor and knocked Mustang onto his stomach. Before the State Alchemist could get up, he felt the familiar pressure on his back. Al pinned Roy against the floor and continued to apply pressure.

“This is for yelling.” said Al as he pressed Roy firmly against the wooden floor. “And this…is for your fleeing habits.” Al began rolling the colonel under the ball of his foot, getting every inch of the man’s form acquainted with his sole. This continued for a few minutes until Al stopped. The floor appeared wet from the boy’s perspiration, and Roy looked beat. These teenagers were going to kill him with their odorous bodies. “And this…”

“That’s all Al, times up.” Ed announced as he got up off the couch.

“What?! That didn’t feel like five minutes!”

“Well, it was. Don’t worry, you’ll have plenty of time with him later.” Ed handed Al the pocket watch, who sighed when he took it. The younger Elric picked up his shirt off the ground and put it back on before taking a seat on the couch. Roy cracked an eye open and looked straight up into the smiling face of Edward. A hand soon blocked his sight as he was picked up and brought to Ed’s face. The older Elric lifted up his arm, the same arm that had once been automail, and took a big sniff.

“Oh, yeah. This is going to be great. If I remember correctly, these limbs have been in the Gate just as long as Al’s body. I don’t think they’ve been washed in some time either.” Ed gave Roy a sadistic, evil look. Roy was beginning to show signs of fear.
15211112112122121211.title: Alphonse's feet are next.

152111121121221212111.content:
“Damn it, Fullmetal! What you’re doing is completely inhuman!”

“Yeah, yeah. I never really cared for rules and all that.” Ed replied as he brought the colonel over to his armpit. Just as his younger brother had done, Ed pressed Roy into his sweaty pit until he was nice and snug. With the older male glued to his pit, Al put his arm down so Roy was squeezed between his arm and ribs. There he rolled his shoulders as if exercising them, giving the colonel a good rub down. Roy could feel the muscles of Ed’s upper arm crush him from behind. Worse of all, his face…no…his entire body was deep in a pool of sweat that had formed between the walls of flesh. He tried to breath but only got a nose full of the boy’s vulgar odor. He was going to pass out at this rate.

Fortunately (or unfortunately), Ed lifted his arm before that could happen. Ed looked at his armpit and was surprised to see that the colonel wasn’t stuck to it. He looked at his feet to see if the colonel had fallen around them, but didn’t see the bug anywhere. H felt something on his arm, though, and saw that it was the colonel. He had become stuck to his arm instead of his pit. Ed laughed at seeing the colonel stuck to the sweaty skin of his arm. He pinched the alchemist between his finger and thumb and pulled him free.

“You don’t look so well, sir. Maybe you should take a shower.” Ed sniffed his body and recoiled dramatically. “Whoa! Defiantly a shower! You smell like an over productive teenager…maybe two, in fact.”

Roy glared hatefully. “K…kill…kill you…”
152111121121221212111.title: Roy Mustang, meet Edward Elric's pits.

choices: Ed shows you to Al. The winner of that stinky contest was never decided...
Ed starts researching a way to shrink people using alchemy.
1521111211212212121111.content:
"And now…it’s time for the last part. I got something good for you planned, colonel.” Ed said as he held Roy tightly between his fingers. The man had given up struggling and just remained limp.

“Whatever…just hurry up.” Roy mumbled in defeat.

“What was that? I didn’t heat you. Oh well, I’m just going to get started.” Ed sat his butt down on the floor with a sudden and loud bang, spooking both Roy and Al. The Fullmetal Alchemist gave the shrunken man his hand on final smirk before dropping him between his two readied feet. As the colonel watched, Ed rose a single foot over his body and brought it down ever so slowly. Roy didn’t even try raising his hands to stop the sole and just let it fall on him. The sole hit him and pushed him flat against the floor. Ed then began to roll Roy under his foot in a circle. Ed was in such a power drive that he bit his lip just to help contain himself. It felt so good to have the man he despised so much under his foot, defeated and broken. He knew that if he kept doing this, Roy’s joints may eventually get pushed out of place. He stopped and lifted his foot a few inches off of Roy.

“Can you hear me, bug? I’ll tell you what. If you call me Master Edward, I won’t torture you any more. How does that sound?” Rot didn’t say anything at first and looked weakly at Ed. Being rolled under his foot had left him on his stomach, so he had to strain his neck to look the younger male in the face.

“…M…m…”

“Hmmm? What was that?”

“M…m-make me…shortly.” Roy smirked and spit in Ed’s direction. Ed’s face became enraged. His eyes dilated and looked like they were about to pop out of his head.

“I’m…going to murder you!” Ed shot up to his full height, never taking his hate-filled eyes off the colonel. Using his big toe, the blond alchemist gave the tiny alchemist a gently nudge. The simple nudge was enough to fling to colonel, a few feet away and onto his back. Not wasting any time, Ed stomped over to the fallen man and placed his foot down on him hard. Roy screamed in agony as Ed started to crush him.

“Brother, stop it!” Al screamed as he ran over to Ed and grabbed his arms. “You’re going to kill him!”

“Good!” was all Ed said he continued to press down on the man under his foot.

“Brother!”

“Come on…go splat already!”

“Brother!!”

“DIE!!”

“BROTHER!!!”

Ed woke up and almost fell off the bed. Al was standing over him and had to step back to avoid colliding with his brother’s head. Ed looked around as if he was in the middle of a battlefield. His face was covered in sweat and he was breathing heavily.

“Um…I just got home and I cam to check on you. Are you okay?” Al asked, a look of concern on his face. Ed looked back at him and smiled.

“Yeah…fine. It was just a dream.”

“Okay…I’m going to go put this stuff away.” Al said before exiting the room with the bags he was carrying. Ed scratched his head and sighed.

“Man…I really have anger issues.” he told himself.

“You can say that again.” came another voice. Ed looked shocked and this time, did fall out of his bed.

“Ow! Damn it, what was that! Where are you?”

“IN YOUR STINKIN ARMPIT WHERE YOU PUT ME!!!” you yelled up at him. Ed lifted his flesh arm and looked at his armpit. There you were, still glued to his pit and apparently forgotten.

“Oh shit, I forgot about you. How long were you in there?”

“You were sleeping for about a half hour…so just that long. Can you get me out now?”

“Right…” Ed peeled you off his sweaty pit and brought you to his face. “You were sure in there for awhile. You don’t look that bad either. Maybe you got used to it?”

“Of course not!” you responded with a shout. You weren’t sure if you were telling the truth, though. Ed shrugged.

“Well, you should. You’re still my slave, remember? I might put you in there for entire nights if your bad.” Ed grinned, similar to how he did in his dream and before dreaming. It may not be Roy, but this shrunken stranger wasn’t bad either. The question is…what should he do now? He got a lot of ideas from that dream...
1521111211212212121111.title: The End of Ed's Patience and the Dream

15211112112122121211111.content:
Ed clenched you in his fist as he got an idea. His dream had showed him how much more fun he could have with a shrunken person if he had other people in on the secret. He couldn’t hide the little guy from Al forever, so why not just show him now? Maybe they could start that stinky contest for real!

“Hey, Al! Come over here, I want to show you something!” Ed shouted across the room as he got off the floor. His younger brother opened the door connecting to the kitchen and peeked in.

“What is it, brother? I haven’t finished putting the groceries away.”

“Forget about that, I have something a lot more interesting to show you.”

Al sighed and entered the room, forgetting about the stuff he had to put away. The younger Elric approached his brother and stood in front of him; a few visible inches taller than him.

“Well, what is it, Ed?”

Ed opened his fist and motioned Al’s attention to the object in it. Al thought it was a bug before he got a closer look. His eyes widened in shock.

“Is that…is that a…” Al stuttered in amazement.

“Yep, it’s a tiny human. Cool, eh?”

“Cool? That’s awesome! Where’d he come from? How’d he get so small?” Al asked, his eyes lighting up like a child at Christmas.

“Don’t know. I just found him here in this room. I’ve been treating him like my slave ever since.”

“Ha, looks like it.” Al replied as he looked over your minuscule form. Your skin was beat red and your clothes looked like you went swimming in them. “What did you do to him?”

“Not much. I just left him in my armpit while I slept.”

“That must have been hell for him. I haven’t seen you take a shower in weeks. Plus, you never use deodorant!”

“You’re one to talk! You haven’t bathed since you got your body back!”

“I know, I’ve just been preoccupied with a lot of other stuff. Boy,, this apartment is really going to stink up if we don’t get cleaned up first…” Al worried as he sniffed the air, getting a hint of both the boy’s B.O. mixed into the room.

“That’s true, but before we do, why not use this guy to find out which one of us smells worse?” Ed suggested as he waved you in front of Al’s face by your arm; much to your discomfort.

“How? Is he going to rate our stench?” Al laughed at the thought of you being a judge in a stench contest.

“Why not? I just had a dream where we had a contest, but I woke up before a winner was decided.”

“Sounds like a weird dream. How does the contest work?” Al asked as he continued to study you. You hated being looked at like a toy of some kind; but what else were you at this size? Hardly a person…

“Well, we each get ten minutes with him. During those ten minutes, you get do whatever you want to him so he can experience the odors of your body. In my dream, we just used our feet and armpits…but why stop there? You can make him smell your butt and even your breath if you want. Whatever it takes to win.”

“Wow, that sounds like fun! You have some pretty weird dreams, big brother, but I don’t mind if you make up stuff like this! Hurry up and give him here so we can start!”

“Whoa there, Alphonse! I don’t remember saying you could go first. I think the eldest should go first.”

“That’s not fair! You got to spend over an hour with him! Let me have him first!”

Now they were fighting over you like siblings who fight over a toy. These two were going to make your life hell…you just knew it.
15211112112122121211111.title: Stinky Contest: Round 2

choices: A knock at the door interrupts the brothers' fun.
152111121121221212111112.content:
“Sorry, Al, but since I’m the one who found him AND came up with the game, I’m going first.” Ed told his younger brother. Al looked disappointed, but didn’t put up much of a fuss. He’d get his turn eventually. Alphonse just waked over to the couch and plopped himself down on it. At least he’d get a show to watch. “And keep and eye on the clock, Al.” With that said, Ed placed his full attention on you.

“Well, little guy, to get started…why don’t you get reacquainted with my pit?” Ed asked as he held you in his automail arm and raised his flesh arm over his head. You shook your head and mentally screamed “No”. Ed ignored the look of desperation on your face and stuck you under is arm. He began furiously rubbing you into the lightly aired armpit. It was different from being trapped in his pit; this time you were being forced into the sweaty area by a force unimaginably stronger than you. After a few minutes of smelling nothing but Edward’s reeking pit, the teenage menace took you out and brought you to his grinning mouth.

“Like that? Well, you’ll love this.” Ed wasted no time and gripped his gut with his hand. You watched as Ed’s face started to twist oddly and his cheeks began to fill with air. Before you realized what was about to happen, the elder Elric unleashed a monstrous burp in your face. It was like a gale force wind which would have blown you across the room if you weren’t being held tightly in Ed’s fist. With you arms trapped in Edward’s fist, you were unable to plug your ears, nor cover your nose. The sound of a mighty foghorn assaulted your poor ears as the smell of who-knows-what from the depths of Ed’s gut blew into your nostrils. When he was finally finished, you were left temporarily deaf and your nose was on fire. “Wow, that must have lasted a good minute! Must have been the hot peppers I had for lunch.”

Edward didn’t take the time to study your condition as he dropped you onto his fleshly foot. The impact didn’t hurt as much as it would have if you hit the floor, but it still caused some pain strike your back. Ed lifted his foot and rolled you off it so you were flat on the ground. Your hearing started to come back and your nose didn’t feel like it was full of hot coal, but none of that mattered since Edward wasn’t finished yet. You watched as Ed raised his foot and let it fall upon you. You felt your body compress under the ball of his foot and tried to scream, but only got a mouthful of the boy’s sweat. The liquid made you cough and splutter. Ed heard your negative reaction to his foot and responded by rubbing your face into his sole. Before long you were giving Ed’s foot a good rub with your face. A few minutes later, you face was finally free, but the remainder of your body remained under Ed’s foot. You looked up and saw the alchemist’s face grinning down at you. You were about to scream up at him until his toes gripped your head and forced your head between is toes.

“Get a load of my toe jam, slave. Don’t you just want to eat it up?” Ed bellowed with laughter as he continued to rub your face into the filth of his toes. A couple minutes went by and Ed released you from the tortures of his foot. You breathed in some fresh air and tried to wipe the grime from your face. All you wanted to do was get away from the evil teen, so you began to crawl your way away from his towering form.

“Where are you going, slave? There’s still my butt left!” Ed said as he started to reach for you, a sadistic grin plastered across his face.

“Sorry, Ed, but time’s up.” Al interrupted.

“What? Already? Darn it!” Ed cursed as he pulled his hand away and stood up to his full height. He looked back down at you. “Oh well, there’s always later. He’s all your, little bro.”

Edward strolled over to the couch as Al got up and began stomping over to you.
152111121121221212111112.title: Ed's Up First

choices: Al's ten minutes are up and you have to choose a winner.
Al sits on you and farts, securing his victory.
1521111211212212121111121.content:
You looked up, terrified, as Edward’s younger brother slowly stomped toward you. He had taken his shoes off during Ed’s turn, so his sweaty feet slapped against the rug. You could tell by the grin on his face that he was trying to intimidate you. It was defiantly working…you never expected human Alphonse to be so scary. Then again, even the most innocent child would become frightening if they were a giant. You tried crawling away from the approaching feet, but you were too late. Al was soon upon you and lightly stepped on your small body, pinning it to the floor. You squirmed desperately, but it was pointless before the blond giant’s power.

“Don’t worry, little guy. A little stink never hurt anyone.” Al said as he flipped you onto your back and hovered his bare foot inches from your nose.

“Speak for yourself…” you muttered under your breath.

“I want to win this contest, so start sniffing my foot!” Al ordered as he gave you an intimidating stare. You had no choice, you had to obey. If you didn’t willingly smell his foot, he was going to press it down on you and force you to do it. So, with your body laid out under Al’s looming foot, you closed your eyes and began taking deep whiffs. The terrible odor made you gasp in horror, which caused some of the stale stench to flow down your throat and burn it. You coughed and spluttered, making Al move his foot to check on you. “You okay, little guy? Don’t breathe in too much at one time, okay?” Al smiled kindly, as if he was giving you life saving advice. Maybe he was…

After you had recovered from your coughing fit, Al replaces his foot with his other one and tell you to smell this one. You so some, but take smaller sniffs this time. The smell is still terrible and disgusting, but at least your not choking on it…

“This is so much fun.” Al comments as he folds his arms over his chest and just watches you smell his feet. Perhaps a normal boy would find reading or sports fun, but for Al, it was making a tiny person smell his feet.

“You have five minutes left, Al.” Ed warned as he relaxed on the couch.

“Crap, five minutes have already passed! I was having so much fun I lost track of time.” Al quickly took his foot away and you were allowed a few seconds to rest. During those few seconds, you watched Al grab the collar of his shirt and pull it over his head. He tossed the damp shirt away and stretched his arms into the air. “Ahh…that feels good. I can feel the breeze coming through the window..”

As you gaze up at the giant with awe, you can’t help but think that he looks pretty good for his age. His muscles are well developed for a fourteen-year-old, sporting some nice arms and a developing six-pack. Before you note anything else about his godly appearance, you suddenly find his sweaty hand wrapped around you. Al brings you up to his cute face and smiles at you.

“Like Ed said; I haven’t bathed at all since getting my body back. This is really going to stink…” Al lifts his arm up and you brace yourself for what’s to come. Al swiftly pushes you into his lightly haired pit, immediately soaking you with pit sweat. He begins dragging you up and down the hot skin, transferring as much of his sweat onto your body. “I didn’t put deodorant on today either; we’re all out. I should have bought some when I went shopping…” Al muttered to himself as he uses you like he would any stick of deodorant. After rubbing you into the pit for awhile, he switched hands and wiped you into the other one. Unlike Ed, Al had two stinky pits to torture you with. Both smelled the same; like pure, teenage male.

When Al removed you from his pit, he dangled you before his eyes and looked you over. You were soaked with both of the brothers’ perspiration. Their body fluids had really taken their toll on you, leaving you weak and smelling like musk. Al still wanted to win, though, and had one last thing he wanted to do with you. The question was, did he have enough time?
1521111211212212121111121.title: It's Al's Turn Now

choices: POV Choice: Stay with Alphonse In The Apartment
POV Choice: Go with Ed as he Sees what this mission is about
1521111211212212121111122.content:
Just as Al reached down to untie his shoes, there came a knock on the boys' bedroom door. Ed and Al looked at each other, then back down to your quivering form. "Hide him quick!" Ed whispered as he went to open the door. Al looked around for a hiding spot, then an idea struck him. He lifted one foot out of his shoe and took off his sock. You could practically see the odor steaming off his raunchy foot. Al quickly dropped you into the crusty bottom of the sock before pulling it over his odorous foot again and popping his foot back inside the shoe.

Ed opened the door to see none other than Roy Mustang. "Um....Can't you see this is our day off, Mustang?" Ed grumbled to his superior officer. Mustang sighed, "I've got an assignment for you Fullmetal. Get your clothes on and come down to central." Mustang said.

Ed noticed he was wearing nothing but a pair of boxers and his tank top. Not only that but he had a hard on which could be seen sticking out from behind the blue boxers, stiff as a board.

Ed blushed and put a hand over his erection, "Yeah....I'll come down when I'm ready!" Ed said angry about being interrupted by his most hated superior.

"Just finish whacking off before you do put on some clothes, Can't have you roaming the halls of central with juice all over your jacket. Heh!" And with that Mustang got the door slammed in his face.

"The nerve of that guy! Coming into our apartment and insulting me!" Ed said as he stomped over to the bed and lay down.

"Where's shortstuff?" Ed mumbled.

"In my sock under my toes!" Al said with a giggle.

Ed smiled at his little brother. "Since I have to go, you can play with him for awhile until I get back. We'll continue the contest later."

"Aren't you going to get a shower before you leave?" Al said, secretly hoping he could trick his brother into cleaning up so he could win the contest.

"Hell no!" Ed said as he pulled his black jacket on and a pair of matching black pants. He pulled on his boots, Al noticed, Without slipping on socks. Ed was never one to wear socks much, which led to his feet stinking due to the overworn boots.

Inside Al's sock in his shoe, you were experiencing hell. His foot wasn't as bad as Ed's due to him being somewhat more cleaner than his big brother. But it still stunk like hell, the linty crud between his toes engulfed your face as he squeezed your head between his big and second toe.

Al's eyes were fixated on his shoe. Where his toes were wiggling happily, almost like they were excited to have a tiny, helpless little man to absorb Al's sweat and stink. Ed said goodbye and left. Now it was just you and Al.
1521111211212212121111122.title: Interruption Of The Contest

choices: Ed Gives Roy a Ride in his Boot as he Walks Back Home
15211112112122121211111222.content:
Ed walked with his hands in his pockets, one hand fingering his pocketwatch. He took it out and flipped it open, the engraving on one side and the little clock in the other. After looking at the time he closed it and stuck it back in the pocket of his black jacket.
"Hmm...Wonder what Mustang is thinking calling me to work on my day off." Ed said to himself. Ed really couldn't hate Mustang more than he did that moment, the short jokes and sarcasm were one thing. But to interrupt his quality time with his brother, especially when there was a tiny slave and a contest involved! Ed sighed and put his arms behind his head as he walked, Not really noticing the stench that seemed to seep up to his nostrils, even through the jacket his stench could be smelled, mixed with an aged version of his B.O. that had become ingrained into his jacket. Ed was never one for bathing regularly. But it wasn't so bad that he would get any people to wrinkle their noses at him yet. He always made sure to bathe before it started to interfere with his work and become embarrassing.

But today Ed had two things on his mind concerning hygiene. He had a tiny man to torture and a contest to win. That and he hoped to gross out the colonel and cause him to lose that famous composure. Who knew B.O could be so empowering?

As Ed mused over the thought of the colonel being smoked out of his office by his stink, Ed got an idea. That dream of his, in which Mustang shrunk and was at the mercy of his toes. It might, just might be possible to make his dream come true! Ed dashed off at full speed towards central, before he found out what Roy wanted, he would have to pay a visit to central's library.

****

After he had found what he wanted in the library, he looked at his watch and nearly fell out of his reading chair. He had been here for nearly an hour! Ed closed the book and left without putting it back on the shelf.

Ed took a deep breath and hoped that his plan would work, if not, he might get in serious trouble and even lose his place in the military. Ed gripped the doorknob, opened the door, and stepped inside Roy's office.

"Ah, Fullmetal. You're fashionably late." Mustang said sarcastically.

Ed smirked, "Oh you're gonna be so sorry you ever crossed this alchemist." Ed thought.

"Take a seat..." Mustang said, Ed took a seat on the sofa at the side of the room.

Ed simply smiled widely as Roy went on a roll of short jokes. Ed simply grinned back and kept telling himself, "You'll get yours, You'll get yours..."

Before Mustang could start on the next short joke, Ed reached into his pocket and pulled out a bottle of soda, still cold and still with the bottlecap on it. In truth this was a mixture Ed had made himself, following all the guidelines in the book. Long story short, he came up with what he believed was a shrinking formula. He simply had to clap his hands when all the ingredients were in place, and he had the solution to his Mustang problems!

"Thirsty?" Ed said waving the bottle in Mustang's face.

Mustang licked his lips, he was suspicious of this sudden and weird turn of events. Usually Ed would scream his head off when Mustang made fun of his height. But he was quite thirsty....And his thrist overpowered his suspicions.

Ed gave him the bottle and Mustang realized he didn't have a bottle opener. "Oh! How could I forget!" Ed said pulling a bottle opener from his pocket. "Whats this about Fullmetal?" Mustang said taking the opener.

Ed pulled his own bottle of soda out of his pocket, this one was untainted of course, he knew because Mustang's bottle was clear, and Ed's was green. Mustang looked confused, "Unless of course you don't think you can drink it faster than me!" Ed said, knowing Mustang was too proud to not accept a challenge, especially a challenge from a kid who didn't know what he was talking about!

Mustang glared and uncapped his bottle, As did Ed when he was passed the opener. Mustang had already sucked down the entire bottle by the time Ed lifted his to his mouth.

Mustang set down the bottle and stood up. "There, now can we get back to the matter at-" Suddenly Mustang realized his face was level with Ed's chest. Ed crossed his arms and smirked. "Alright you little bastard, what did you do!?" Mustang shouted before having Ed's hand come over his mouth. "Shut up and shrink!" Ed grinned as he said this.

Mustang was getting smaller by the second. Soon he was the exact height of the boy back at the apartment. Mustang looked up fearfully at the teenager who now towered over him...
15211112112122121211111222.title: Ed's Plan Succeeds!

choices: Ed makes it to his apartment to find Al playing with the other slave.
Ed makes a stop somewhere first.
152111121121221212111112221.content:
“Like your new size, colonel? It suits you.” Edward said as he stared down at Roy with an intimidating glare. The colonel just glared right back up at him.

“I don’t know what you did, Fullmetal, but reverse it! Now!” Roy yelled up at the towering teen. He was a bit scared, but refused to look weak in front of this brat.

“Sorry, colonel, but I didn’t look up how to reverse it. Not that I’d want to…” Ed smirked wider as he bent down to untie hi black boot. Roy continued to shout curses at him, but the giant just ignored every word and slipped his bare foot out of its confines. Ed silenced the smaller man with a quick stomp, pinning his superior against the rug.

“Get off me! I order you to take this god-awful thing away!”

“Don’t be like that, Mustang. You don’t like my feet?” Ed asked in an innocent tone as he wiggled his toes in the man’s face, smearing it with moldy toe jam. “Get used to it, because you’re going to be servicing it for a long time! Just like in my dream.” Ed gripped Roy’s head with his toes and lifted the man off the floor. Roy’s screams were muffled by the teen’s big toes, only becoming clear again when he released him over the opening of his boot. Roy landed in the hard leather and immediately noticed how awful it smelled.

“Don’t you ever wash these?!”

“Nope, because you’re always on my back about this and that! Think of it as your fault, Colonel Bug.” Ed began to lower his bare foot into his boot. Roy looked up in horror and made a mad dash for the end of the footwear.

“You’re not going to get away with this, Fullmetal! This isn’t one of your sick dreams! The military will notice I’m gone and they’ll look to you first, Edward! You’re going to pa--!!” Roy’s threats were silenced when Ed’s toes pushed him against the boot and gripped him tightly around the waist. Ed retied his boot and kicked it around a bit, making sure Roy was nice and snug before exiting the office. Roy felt every lift and drop as Ed walked through the halls of the HQ. The force of one step knocked his face between Ed’s toes, greasing his face up. When Ed got out of the building, he was practically humming with joy. Is dream was a reality; Mustang was his. The man who had always insulted him and bossed him around was about to feel what it was like to have someone bigger control you. He wasn’t worried about the military, nor the possibility that the shrinking was only temporary. His good mood wouldn’t be ruined that easily.
152111121121221212111112221.title: Dreams Do Come True

choices: Ed's boot suddenly catches on fire.
1521111211212212121111122211.content:
As Ed ascended the stairs of his apartment, he could hear Al giggling clearly. Ed smiled at the thought of Al enjoying himself, his brother enjoyed a good break from everything he’s been through. When Ed reached the door, he opened it to be met with the foul smell coming from the room. Instead of hopping back like any normal person would, Ed just sniffed the air with satisfaction. His eyes drifted to Al, who was barefoot and laying down on the couch with his eyes closed. Near his feet, you were giving the younger Elric a nice foot rub as the blond boy giggled to himself.

“Looks like you’re having a good time.” Ed spoke suddenly, surprising Al who sat up instantly and accidentally kicked you onto the floor.

“Brother! What are you doing home so early?! I was just starting to have fun!” Al wined, having hoped to spend a bit longer alone with their new slave.

“Well…you see…” Ed glanced down at his boot where Roy was still confined. Of course he would show him to Al; there was no reason to hide him. The colonel had poked fun at Al on several occasions, and he bet anything his little brother would enjoy some payback just as much as he would. Still, it was best to wait until later. There was still a contest to win, and they didn’t need any more distractions. “Something came up. I’ll tell you about it…after we finish this contest.”

Al smiled toothily and replied, “Sounds good!” before looking down at you and pinning you against the floor before you could try and escape again. Ed walked over to his brother and sat down next to him, looking down at you and eager to watch what his bro had in store.

“Can’t we talk about this?” you asked, trembling underneath Alphonse’s toes. “The contest is already ruined! I’ve already smelled Al’s feet for over an hour!”

“Oh? You saying you want to start over to be fair? I don’t mind that.” Ed said with an evil smirk. Your eyes widened and you shook your head. “Well then shut up and take it like a man. He’s just my little brother; how bad could he be?” Ed patted Al on the back, who smirked down at you with an equally evil grin.

“If you thought that hour was bad, you haven’t seen anything yet! I haven’t even tried yet!”
1521111211212212121111122211.title: Keeping a Secret for Now

choices: Go With Ed As He Punishes Roy
15211112112122121211111222112.content:
Ed looked down at his boot, and gasped in surprise and a sudden pain coming from his foot. Smoke could be seen rising through a smoldering hole coming from the toe section of his boot. Al said as he let his hair down from the ponytail he had been wearing. Al's hair wasn't as long as his big brothers of course, it only reached down to his shoudlers.

Al put the braid down on the tile floor and grabbed a bar of soap and a washcloth. And began to rub the two together, making a lather. Al proceeded to wash his upper body, making sure to wash his reeking pits thoroughly. Then Al proceeded to wash the rest of his body, making sure not to knock you into the water again in the process. When Al was finally done he pinched off a small fraction of the soap and handed it to you to use. Al however, grabbed a bottle of shampoo and began to scrub his head.

You scrubbed yourself thoroughly, hoping to get the brothers' stink off of you. When you had gotten yourself soaped up, you held your breath and went down under the water to rinse. You came back up and found yourself face to face with Al's monster. Al noticed this and smiled. "Don't be so shy. The way I see it, we both have the same stuff, so it's no big deal." Al chuckled as you broke your gaze. Al picked you up and set you on the ledge of the tub. He then laid down in the tub, rinsing his hair underwater.

When Al was done rinsing, you saw him rising out of the tub before you, dripping wet, like some mighty Poseidon. You were so tiny compared to him! You now realized how puny you were and began to cry.

Al looked down, thinking your tears were just water, then he heard you sobbing and picked you up.
1521111211212212121111122211222211212211.title: Bathing With Your Big Buddy

1521111211212212121111122211222211212211.content:
“Hey, what’s the matter, little guy? Why are you crying?” Al asked as he held you in the palm of his hand. You were sobbing profoundly and shaking like you were cold.

“It’s just…you’re so big.” you answered, rubbing the tears from your eyes.

“Of course I’m big. That’s because you’re so small.”

“I know and that’s what’s scary. I know you mean well, but the truth is that I’m so much less of a human being than you. You can’t pay full attention to me all the time and I could easily end up dead. What if you put me in your shoe and press down too hard? What if you forget I’m here and mistake me for a bug? It just takes a quick second to stomp out an insignificant bug!”

Al was at a loss for words. He could understand his buddy’s fears; they were all true. The giant boy brought you up to his soaked chest and pressed you gently against it. You hugged your giant’s skin as you continued to sob into it, your tears mixing with the bath water.

“I don’t know what to say, Matt. I’ll be EXTRA careful around you always. You’ll just have to trust me.” Al said, trying to comfort you the best he could.

“What about Ed? He doesn’t care about me at all.”

“That’s not true. Ed’s not a complete meanie. Besides, he likes to play with Roy more, which is why he gave you to me. During the few times where you are with him, I’m sure he’d never do anything to really hurt you.”

You nodded into Al’s chest as you started to calm down a bit. You felt a little better, but the fears were still fresh in your head.

“Also, looking up at me as a giant doesn’t have to be scary. How many people do you know can say they’re friends with a giant?”

“In my world, people would be thrilled to just have the chance at meeting you.”

“That’s right, you said I’m a popular character in your world. Kind of like a celebrity, right?”

“Sort of.” you replied, kind of finding it weird to think of Al as a fictional character when you were right here bathing with him.

“Do you feel better now? Wanna get out?”

You nodded to both questions and Al stood up in the tub. He took a towel and started to dry the both of them off. After that, he stepped out of the tub and drained it before placing you on the sink. The blond alchemist examined your clothes and stuck his nose up at them.

“These need to be washed. Why don’t I make you something to wear until then?” Al offered as he clapped his hands together and placed them on a folded towel. A simple transmutation later and Al handed you a blue bathrobe made out of the towel. You happily slipped it on and tied the rope around your waist so it wouldn’t fall off. Al wrapped a different towel around himself and exited the bathroom with you in hand.

Back in Al’s room, the younger Elric placed you on his bed as he got dressed. After tying his hair into a ponytail, he sat down on the bed and looked down at you. With a smile, he asked…
1521111211212212121111122211222211212211.title: Fears of a Tiny

choices: "He never gave me a break." (Makes Roy eat the filth in his boot.)
1521111211212212121111122211222211212211.content:
“You hungry?” Al asked, not remembering a time where you had eaten at all. As Alphonse asked this, you heard your stomach make a loud grumbling noise. You placed your hand over it and nodded up to Al. The blond heard your stomach and giggled. “Okay, I’ll make us something. Rest a bit here until I get back, okay?” You nodded and watched the giant stand up and leave. You laid down on the bed and tried to get some rest.

Al headed toward the kitchen and immediately started taking out everything he needed. He took out a large pot which he put on the stove, along with several vegetables and beef. He started cutting up the vegetables and meat, which he did very quickly and accurately. A few minutes later, he was standing over the stove while stirring the cooking contents of the pot. As he did this, he heard the door open and his older brother enter the kitchen.

“Something smells good! What are you making?” Ed asked, walking through the kitchen doorway. The teen was covered in sweat, having come back from a hard training routine.

“Beef stew.” Al answered simply, but earning a bright smile from Ed.

“Stew? Awesome!” Ed said with joy as he strolled over to the fridge and grabbed himself a soda. Ed instantly downed half the bottle and looked back at his brother. “Where’s the little guy?”

“In my room. I’m letting him rest until it’s time to eat. The poor thing’s starving and I’m a bit hungry myself.” Al tested the stew with a taste and added a bit more salt to it. “Where’s your little guy?”

“Oh, you mean this?” Ed reached into the collar of his shirt and pulled Roy out. The colonel was tied to a piece of string that hung from around Ed’s neck. “He was being disobedient so I used him as a necklace while I trained. How was it, bug man? Nice and hot in there?”

Roy ignored Ed and focused in catching his breath. It had been hellish inside Ed’s shirt and he was glad to be out in cool air again. He happened to sniff the air and catch the smell of something cooking.

“Is that stew? Do I get any?” Roy asked to no one in particular.

“You? Hell no! If you’re hungry, I’ve got your meal right here.” Ed grinned as he kicked his boot against the floor. Roy cringed, knowing that Ed’s boots were still unwashed and probably full of toe jam and other filth.

“Ed, don’t be mean.” Al said, turning away from the stove to face his brother. “You’ve given the colonel a hard day. The least you could do is give him a proper meal. Give him a break, would you?”

Roy was glad Al was so thoughtful, but ultimately the decision was Edward’s. The sweaty teen looked down at Roy and replied…
1521111211212212121111122211222211212211.title: If Only Roy Was So Cared About...

choices: POV: Roy In the bottom of Ed’s boot
POV: Matt enjoying  dinner with the boys

“ now way Al!, this slave needs to learn how to be obedient and listen the first time before he gets good treatment like Matt”.

“Yeah I guess that makes sense Ed, sorry Roy you heard him yo gotta learn how to listen first before you get special treatments”

Roy didn’t like the fact he had to treat the boys like gods to be treated with him decency but it was either that or eat toe-jam and drink Edwards foot sweat for the rest of your life

“Hey Ed do me a favor and get Matt from my room, the foods Almost ready and I still have to set the table”. Al heard Ed’s running footsteps towards his room while he filled three bowls with the stew and set them on the table with the spoons and napkins.

Ed found Matt lying on Al’s pillow soundly sleeping after a long day. “Hey little guy wake up Al made dinner for us. Matt opened his eyes and seeing Ed giving him a cheeky grin

“Oh hello master Ed, will Roy being eating with us”. Matt felt somewhat sorry for the colonel for being stuck with the more cruel giant and not with Alphonse.

“Hey! Matt how was your nap” Al asked with Enthusiasm

You didn’t know what Ed meant my that, all you could see was him messing with something under the table and then noticing a foul yet familiar odor pollute the air.

“My little slave here is going to eat the dirt and toe jam from the sole of my boot, since he was being so naughty and my boot hasn’t been washed it’s the perfect food for him, dirt form his gods stinky boot haha”.

The cruel giant put the boot on the table before untying the string from around the colonels tiny frame.

“Hehe hope you enjoy slave I will pull you out when you’ve had enough.”

The boys all started to eat the stew that Al prepared all while praising his master full cooking skills.
1521111211212212121111122211222211212211.title: "He never gave me a break." (Makes Roy ...

1521111211212212121111122211222211212211.content:
Ed sighed, "Fine. You better be grateful to us Roy! After all I don't remember ever getting a break from you." Ed said untying the colonel and setting him on the kitchen table. Ed turned to his brother, who was busy stirring the stew with a wooden spoon. Roy knew that any other time he would have hopped from the table to a chair and climbed down to hide. But the brothers were being thoughtful enough to give him some food that wasn't made up of toe gunk or sweat. And he was quite hungry anyway, so he stayed put on the table and watched Al taste the stew.

"Ed could you go to my room and get Matt?" Al asked not turning away from his cooking.

"Sure." Ed said walking down the hall into Al's room.

Ed opened the door and saw lots of kitten posters on the walls, Al even had the classic framed picture of a kitten doing chin ups that had the caption "Hang in there". Ed had to chuckle at this, his brother still hadn't changed after all this time. He saw you laying there fast asleep on Al's pillows. Ed smiled down at you as he crept over to the side of the bed. Ed had to admit, it was kind of cute seeing such a tiny person sleep. Kind of like how a cat curls up on it's owner's bed.

Ed reached down with his human hand and gently shook you awake. You sat up and rubbed the sleep out of your eyes. You yawned and looked up to see Ed smiling down at you. "H-Hello sir." You said hoping that Ed wouldn't be as mean as before.

"Hey squirt, you ready to eat?" Ed said as he picked you up.

You nodded.

"Well it's almost ready, lets go into the kitchen." Ed said as he prepared to leave the room, only to hear what sounded like a kitten purring. Something furry was tickling his foot too! He looked down to see a small grey and white cat rubbing up against his human foot lovingly.
1521111211212212121111122211222211212211.title: Ed's Kindness and Kitties

1521111211212212121111122211222211212211.content:
Ed knew who was behind this....

"Oh, Alphonse....." Ed called his brother into the room. Where Al saw Ed being cuddled by a small grey and white cat. The same one he'd been hiding ever since he got home with groceries. "Oh....Hi brother....Um...Have you met Mittens?" Al said sheepishly. Ed glared at his brother for a few seconds, then sighed and handed you to Al. He picked up the kitten and sat down on the bed with the kitten on his lap.

The cat continued to purr and rub it's head up against Ed's chest. "Aww...He likes you! Can't I keep him?" Al begged. Ed looked up at Al and sighed. "Well.......As long as he stays here and doesn't cause any trouble." Ed said seeing how pleadingly his brother was looking at him.

Al's eyes lit up with joy, "Oh thank you Ed! I promise he won't be any trouble!" Al said as happy as could be.

Ed followed his brother back into the kitchen, bringing the cat with him. "Please tell me you bought the necessary cat stuff?" Ed groaned as he imaged little cat poopies all over the apartment.

"Of course!" Al said producing a litter box, a bag of cat litter, a few cans of cat food suitable for a kitten, and some cat toys from the cupboard under the sink. Ed sweatdropped, "You certainly are prepared aren't you.."

"Hey Ed, can you fill up the cat box and set out some food and water for Mittens?" Al said while tasting the stew and finding that it was ready.

Ed filled up the cat box and set out some kitten food and water, while Al filled up two big bowls and two smaller bowls with tasty stew.
You and Roy, before even getting a spoon, started cooling off your helpings, before dunking your heads in the bowls and slurping up the broth before going to work on the beef and veggies.

You both had cleaned out your bowls as Ed and Al watched, feeling a bit bad for not feeding you both all day.
1521111211212212121111122211222211212211.title: Al's Dream Come True And FOODZ GLORIOUS FOODZ!!

choices: Al stops somewhere along the way.
There's a hole in Al's pocket.
1521111211212212121111122211222211212211.content:
Ed and Al finished their helpings around the same time and both sighed in satisfaction. Ed leaned back in his chair and said while slapping his stomach, “That was delicious, Al! Your stew is just what I need after some difficult training.”

“Thanks, brother.” Al replied before glancing down at their two shrunken slaves. “How about you? Did you like it?”

“It was great! Even better than my mom’s!” you answered, rubbing your stomach like Ed.

“It was fine.” Roy said, looking the other way due to embarrassment. Al smiled, happy with their replies, and looked back at his brother.

“What are you going to do now, big brother? Play with Roy some more?”

“I’d like to,” Ed said, grinning at the tiny colonel. “but I have to hit the books. I still need to find a way to get my limbs back.”

Al nodded and hid a frown as he started to clean up. Ed had successfully brought back his body, but was still looking for a way to get his own body back. He wasn’t having much luck recently, which was part of the reason he had a lot of built up irritation to take out on a couple tiny slaves.

“I’m going to go out for a bit. Now that I know we can keep Mittens, I have to buy a collar for him. Do you mind if I take Matt and Roy with me?” Al asked, finishing up the dishes.

“Sure, but don’t stay out too late. When I came in from training, the sun was starting to go down.” explained Ed as he left the kitchen and sat down in the living room. He gathered up a few books and notes from a nearby table and started going through them.

“I won’t.” Al said as he put the two of you into his pocket and hurried out the door. Mittens strolled over to Ed’s legs and nuzzled against them.

Outside, Al left the apartment building and walked down the street. Looking up at the sky, he noticed Ed was right and the sun was starting to go down. The Moon was becoming visible and it would be nighttime in an hour or two. As Al hurried down the sidewalk, Roy and you were having a hard time staying still. Al’s running was causing the two of you to rattle around in his pocket, occasionally smacking right into each other. Save for the part where you bumped into Roy, it was sort of fun. Still, it was making you dizzy so you eventually managed to cling onto the inside of the pocket to keep yourself in place.

Al reached the pet store and entered it, looking around for cat collars. He found several hanging together and looked through them, searching for a particular one. Once he found it, he brought it to the counter and paid the clerk. With the collar in his other pocket, Al left the store and made his way back to the apartment.

“I hope he likes this.” Al said to himself, caressing the collar in his pocket.
1521111211212212121111122211222211212211.title: Heading Out With Al

choices: Al makes it back to the apartment.
1521111211212212121111122211222211212211.content:
Al was hurrying back to the apartment when he passed something that caught his eye. Backing up a few steps, his eyes looked into the window of the store and a smile spread across his face. Roy and you felt Al change direction as he entered a second store. What was he doing now? You listened as Al looked through a bunch of stuff until he found something he liked and brought it to the store owner.

“Well, Alphonse, I didn’t know you had an interest for this kind of thing.” the old man said as Al paid him the money.

“Yeah, I didn’t know either.” Al replied, chuckling nervously. He waved to the man and left the store with his bought item. Outside the store, you suddenly felt Al reach into his pocket and pull you out. He let you stand on his palm as he spoke. “Look what I got ya, little guy.” Al showed you his other hand, which carried a miniature shirt, pants, socks, and shoes.

“Where did you get this?” you asked, taking the clothes and looking them over.

“This store sells all kinds of miniature models, including human ones! I hope those clothes fit you; they didn’t come in sizes. Try them on.”

You complied and started to change into the model clothes. They were a perfect fit, as if they were made for you. You finished putting on the shoes and smiled up at Al.

“These are great, Al! Thank you so much!” you said, hugging the boy’s thumb. Al was glad you were happy and pet you on the head.

“Glad you like them. Unfortunately, they don’t sell any miniature underwear or boxers, so you’ll have to go without those for now. Al was about to put you back in his pocket when he heard Roy speaking to him. The alchemist had climbed up the pocket and was hanging over the edge.

“Um…what about me? This uniform is kind of sweaty so…”

“Sorry, Mustang, but I only had enough money left to get Matt something. Plus, he needed them more than you because he was only wearing a bathrobe! Maybe next time, okay?”

Roy was disappointed that he had to stay in these clothes, which reeked of the Elrics’ sweat. He just nodded in understanding and dropped back into the pocket. He was soon joined by you and the three of you were on your way back to the apartment. Along the way, you admired your new clothes, much to Roy’s annoyance. You caught Roy glaring at you and talked to him.

“Are you jealous or something?” you asked the older man.

“Jealous? Don’t make me laugh. I still want to get back to normal, not live my life depending on these giant kids.” Roy said, looking away form you and just staring at the fabric of Al’s pants. There was nothing better to look at. Part of you was glad Roy was still himself, while another part wished Roy would just give up and accept his new life. If he didn’t and tried to escape again, who knows what could happen. Edward had shown that he had a kind side, but you knew he probably also had an evil side that wouldn’t think twice about getting rid of a hopeless slave. Boy, were you glad you were a slave with benefits…
1521111211212212121111122211222211212211.title: Clothes and Concerns

Ed heard the front door open and looked up. Al came into the living room and took Mittens' collar out of his pocket. "Hi Ed, Look what I got for Mittens!" Al said grinning.

"Nice....Where are the pipsqueaks?" Ed said as Mittens came over to Al and meowed up at him.

"In my pocket, you can have them for awhile if you want, I'm going to play with Mittens." Al said fixing the cute little red collar with a bell gently around his kitten's neck.

Mittens meowed happily up at Al and circled around his feet, purring. "Aww...I'm glad you like it." Al said as he gently picked Mittens up and held him.

Mittens purred and pawed at Al's face.

"Heh heh...That tickles!" Al giggled like a child.

Ed smiled and set down his book, he was frustrated by not finding anything on a Philosopher's Stone and held his hand out for....
