choices: You've run out of time and are just above Ed's bellybutton.
You surprise Ed and reach his face. He puts you in his mouth!
1521111211212212121111122211222211212211.content:
“Hey, Al, hand over Matt.” Ed asked his brother, holding his hand out.

“What? I thought you liked playing with Roy?”

“I do, but I’m annoyed by all these dead ends I keep running into.” replied the older alchemist, tossing one of his books aside. “Seeing that stupid Colonel’s face will just made me more pissed.”

“Well…okay, but try and be gentle with him.” Al reached a hand into his pocket and fished you out, handing you over to Ed. You weren’t very enthusiastic about being away from the kinder Al, but didn’t express it.

“I will, don’t worry.” Ed took you from Al and held you in the palm of his hand. Al left the room with Mittens and headed toward his bedroom, eager to play with the kitten. You and Ed stared at each other for a bit until you spoke up.

“So…how’s your research coming?” you asked, trying to start a conversation with the blond haired giant.

“Terrible!” Ed exclaimed, blowing hot air at you. “I can’t find anything new on the stone or any other way to get my limbs back. I’m really frustrated…good thing I have a tiny slave you take out that frustration on.” Ed gave you a sly grin as he stood up from his sitting position. “Although, Al said I had to be gentle with you. What could I do to you?” Ed ran his hand through his golden locks as he though. Suddenly he snapped his fingers. “I got it! How about we test out how much strength you got in those tiny muscles of yours with a game.” Ed poked you in the chest, easily forcing you to sit down on his palm.

“What kind of game?” you asked, a bit fearfully.

“A climbing game. I’ll start you out on my knee and we’ll see how far you can climb up me in…say…ten minutes.”

“But that’s dangerous! What if I fall?”

“I’ll catch you, squirt. However, you’ll have to start over again from my feet. Plus, just to make the game more interesting, you’re going to spend some time in whatever you’re closest to when time runs out. For example, say you fall at the last moment and end up on my feet. I’ll place you between my toes.”

“Being between your toes doesn’t seem very gentle to me…” you mutter.

“Oh, don’t be such a baby! If I really wanted to torture you, I wouldn’t be playing this game and just force you to lick my feet. I can still do that, if you want.”

“No, that’s okay. I’ll play the game.”

“Good…then, let’s get started!” Ed brought you down to his knee and waited until you had latched onto his pants before standing upright again. He told you to start climbing and you did. You scaled the expanse of Ed’s black, leather pants as fast as you could. You had done some climbing in your old life, but this was much different. This mountain was alive! Ed tried to stand as still as possible, but still fidgeted a bit and caused you to slip a few times. You managed to prevent yourself from falling completely, though, and grabbed onto Ed’s pants each time. You finally managed to leave his pants and start climbing his upper body, but you had no idea how much time had passed. Had it taken you the full ten minutes to scale just his pants, or did you still have time left?
1521111211212212121111122211222211212211.title: Climbing Mount Edward

1521111211212212121111122211222211212211.content:
"I think I'll need just my tiny for now...You can go ahead and have the other one for awhile."

Roy heard what Ed said and was frustrated at being called Ed's. However he didn't have much time to agonize over it however as Al's gigantic hand reached in and plucked him out, handing him to his big brother.

Ed took Roy happily and sat down on the couch.

While this was going on Al went into the kitchen, having taken you out of his pocket on the way. Mittens followed of course. Al looked at the dishes in the sink which had piled up over the last few days. He sighed and rolled his sleeves up after setting you down on the kitchen table. He ran some warm water with some soap in it, and took out a sponge and began to wash the dishes. He wasn't even finished with the first dish when he heard you calling his name. He turned around to you.

There you were, sitting on the table and minding your own business when Mittens hopped up on the table and gave you quite a scare. Mittens meowed at you, which you took as him saying he liked you. You reached out to pet his paw when he lay down on his stomach, reached out his two front paws and trapped you between them. By the time Al turned around Mittens was already giving you a bath with his tongue. Al laughed, "Relax, he won't hurt you." He smiled as he went back to washing the dishes.

You just sat there and actually started to enjoy being shown such affection by an animal who was so much bigger than you. When Al finished washing the dishes he piled them up in the little rack beside the sink to let them dry. He turned around to find you and mittens asleep on the table, you still snuggled between his paws. He laughed quietly and went into the living room to join Ed.
1521111211212212121111122211222211212211.title: Washing the dishes

choices: Ed decides to go to bed, but where's Roy going to sleep?
Ed comes up with a torture worse than Al's.
1521111211212212121111122211222211212211.content:
“Come on, Roy, tell me who your big, strong master is. Say it!” Ed held Roy in his automail hand and shook him as he ordered the slave around.

“Forget it, Fullmetal.” Roy spat, still refusing to comply with the giant’s commands. Ed didn’t glare at the shrunken man and just grinned before flicking him in the head.

“I suppose it’s wishful thinking to believe you’ll break after just one day. But you know, Colonel, you‘re just going to get punished if you act like this.” Ed said as he put a little squeeze on the tiny man. He saw his little brother enter the room and stopped the pressure. “Hey, Al, you’re just in time! Wanna help me punish this disobedient slave? He still hadn’t learned his place.”

“Haha, you really enjoy torturing him, don’t you?” Al asked, chuckling a bit at his brother’s behavior.

“Why not? This little shit’s done nothing but nag at me since I started working for him.” Ed flicked his ex- superior again, this time in the stomach. To the smaller alchemist it felt like being punched right in the gut. “He deserves this. Now come on; you know you enjoy it.” Ed gave his brother a sly smile.

“Okay, fine, but only for a bit. It’s getting late and you have work tomorrow, don’t you? Just because you shrunk one of your bosses doesn’t mean you don’t have others.”

“I know, I know.” Ed mumbled as his brother sat next to him. They both looked down at Mustang and the shrunken man cringed under their stares. “What should we do with him? Make him lick our feet?”

“That sounds like fun, but I have an even better idea. Give him to me.” Al took Roy out of Ed’s hand and brought him up to his face. Grinning at the little man, the younger Elric started to carefully remove Roy’s boots and socks. Both Ed and Roy were curious about what he had planned. They watched as Al finished removing Roy’s tiny footwear before bringing one of the Colonel’s feet up to his mouth and giving it a quick lick. Roy lurched in Al’s grip.

“Hey, Al, what are you doing?!” Ed asked his brother in total shock as he watched him lick Roy’s foot. “You’re licking our slave’s foot!”

“I know, but does it look like he’s enjoying it?” Al asked as he continued caress the shrunken man’s bare foot with his large tongue.

“Alphonse…please stop.” Roy begged, quickly losing his breath. Al’s only response was popping the Colonel’s entire foot into his mouth and sucking it. Roy gasped and felt tears build up in his eyes. Al’s mouth was so hot and wet, plus it was starting to tickle him. Roy was actually very ticklish.

“Is it really that bad, Roy?” Ed asked, greatly amused by his brother’s choice of torture. “It’s not like he’s going to eat you or anything.” Ed chuckled and his brother chuckled as well, vibrating Roy’s foot in his mouth. He slipped the tiny limb out of his wet cavern before giving the same treatment to the other foot. Roy’s foot was passed between Al’s lips as he sucked it like a lollipop. At this point, Roy was red in the face and almost at the point of screaming. He was lucky Al stopped when he did and gave him back to Edward.

“That’s it? You’re not going to torture him more?” Ed asked as his brother stood up.

“No, I’m getting kind of tired so I’m turning in for the night. You better soon as well. I don’t want to drag you out of bed.” Al gave his older brother a stern look before heading into the kitchen. He carefully picked up you and Mittens and brought the both of you to his room. Ed was left alone in the living room with his little toy.

“That Al. He’s supposed to be the little brother, yet sometimes he sounds like a mom.” Ed told himself. He looked at Roy, who was panting and recovering from Al’s foot licking. “I can’t believe you’re worn out from THAT. I’ll give you something to get worn out by…”
1521111211212212121111122211222211212211.title: A Different Kind of Foot Licking

choices: Burglars Break In While Everyone Is Sleeping
1521111211212212121111122211222211212211.content:
Al went into the living room to see Ed tossing Roy up into the air and catching him with his flesh and blood palm. Al sighed hoping that Ed wouldn't seriously hurt Roy. Sure the colonel could be a douche, but he didn't deserve to be badly hurt. Ed caught Roy once more and looked over to Al drying his hands off with a dish towel. "Hey Al, wanna join in?" Ed asked waving Roy towards Al.

Al simply shook his head and yawned. "No thanks, I'm gonna go get Matt and head to bed."

Seeing his little brother yawn caused Ed to yawn and realize how tired he was. "Yeah, I should head to bed too....I've got work tomorrow, everyone's probably gonna be in an uproar about their precious colonel being lost."

Ed grinned evilly down at Roy and continued as Al went into the kitchen to fetch Matt. "All the while I'll be holding your puny head between my humongous toes in my boot! I can't wait for tomorrow!" Ed said laughing loudly as he got up off the couch and headed down the hallway to his room.

***

Al hated to wake up you two when you looked so cozy and cute together. He quietly made up a little bed with some cushioning and a nice soft blanket so Mittens wouldn't get cold. When he had finished, he gently lifted up Mittens' paw off you and picked you up. You rubbed the sleep out of your eyes and yawned, you blinked sleepily and looked up at Al's kind smile. He motioned for you to be quiet and slowly tucked you into his pants pocket.

Mittens was still asleep until Al picked him up and carried him over to his little basket in the corner. He uttered a whiny meow as his eyes opened and he was set in the basket. Al lifted up the small folded blanket that he had prepared for his kitten and covered Mittens up. "Goodnight Mittens." Al whispered as he turned off the light...Only to hear Mittens whining. Al turned the light back on and Mittens stopped. Al realized that his cat was afraid of the dark and chuckled, "Okay...I'll leave this light on for you." Al whispered as he went down the hall to his room.
1521111211212212121111122211222211212211.title: Goodnight All!

choices: Ed arrives at headquarters and everyone is wondering what happened to Roy.
At the apartment, Al is bored and decides to play with you.
1521111211212212121111122211222211212211.content:
The next morning, you awoke on top of a neatly made bed. You recall falling asleep inside Al’s pocket while he slept, which means the giant must have woken up first, changed into some clean clothes, and placed you on the bed to continue sleeping. Before you could start to wonder whether you could just wait here or not, the door to the bedroom opened and Al walked in.

“Oh, you’re already awake. I was just about to wake you up.” Al told you as he approached the bed and let you climb onto his palm. He brought you up to his face and said, “Good morning, Matt. Ready for breakfast?”

You nod as Al leaves the room with you in hand and walks down the short hall to Ed’s room. The younger Elric starts banging on the door.

“Ed, wake up! You have work!” Al shouts to his older brother beyond the door. He hears some groaning followed by a loud crash and then some cursing. It must have just been Ed falling out of the bed. Al rolled his eyes and headed to the kitchen.

***

“Geez.” Ed muttered as he rubbed his head and picked himself off the floor. “I hate mornings…” The older Elric scratched his stomach as he yawned. He put on a clean pair of pants and a new tank top before heading for his desk and grabbing an oddly placed sock off it. The State Alchemist rattled the sock before turning it over and causing a tiny and sleepy Mustang to tumble out. “Hey there, Colonel Insect. Did you have a good nap?”

“You made me sleep in your smelly sock, how do you think it was?!” Roy shouted up at him.

“I think I don’t really care.” Ed replied as he violently snatched Roy off the desk and left his room. In the kitchen, he found Al just about to sit down to enjoy a freshly cooked omelet. You were right next to the plate, hungry nibbling on a small piece of the omelet. Mittens was lapping up some milk in the corner. The two brothers exchanged good mornings before sitting down to eat breakfast.

“Aren’t you going to give Roy any?” Al said after swallowing his fourth bite of omelet.

“Why? He’s going in my boot after this, so he can eat all the toe jam he wants for breakfast!” Ed replies before stuffing ¼ of the omelet into his mouth.

“Well if you won’t, I will.” Al cut off a small piece of his omelet and gave it to the tiny colonel. Mustang was happy to take it and started eating, much to Ed’s annoyance. If it wasn’t for the fact these brothers were enslaving him, he might of complemented Al on his cooking.

“Enjoy it now, bug. The rest of the day won’t be so nice.” Ed told his tiny boss as he smiled evilly. After breakfast was over, Roy knew that “the rest of the day” was about to start. Ed snatched up Roy and dropped him into the back of one of his boots (Ed had repaired the boot Roy ruined using alchemy). Roy wasn’t surprised at all when Ed lowered his bare foot into the boot and pinned Roy under it. Roy’s head was perfectly set between the teen’s big and index toes. Ed snickered as he kicked his boot around, making sure the Colonel couldn’t move. The Fullmetal Alchemist slipped on his signature red jacket and said goodbye to his brother. After that, he was out the door and heading toward the military headquarters. Every now and then Ed would grip Roy’s head tightly between his toes, sometimes hard enough that the man thought he would pop. The air inside Ed’s boot quickly heated up as Roy was forced to endure not only the pressure of the teenager’s foot but the stench as well. Even after a day of torture, Roy was still not used to the rank smell.
1521111211212212121111122211222211212211.title: The Next Day

choices: ...help test out the headquarters' new training field.
1521111211212212121111122211222211212211.content:
It was a long walk from Edward’s apartment to headquarters; the downside of not having a driving license. Ed didn’t mind, though, since he enjoyed the exercise. Plus, it meant he could torture and humiliate Roy with each step he took. After around forty-five minutes of walking, Edward finally arrived at the doors to the Central Headquarters. No more than four steps in and he could already hear the intense chatter through the place. Everyone was asking everyone else if they had seen Roy. Some were worried, others were happy since the Colonel wasn’t the most popular superior in the building. As Ed made his way down the hall, he wondered where he should report to since his usual boss was…unavailable.

“Edward Elric, the Fullmetal Alchemist?” came a voice behind Ed. Ed spun around to face a young man wearing a blue military uniform and a pair of glasses. His hair was dirty blond and his face was stern.

“Yeah, that’s me. Who’s asking?”

“I am Major William Sullivan and I’m investigating the disappearance of Colonel Roy Mustang.” the man said, his eyes carefully examining Ed’s short form.

“Disappearance? Aren’t you jumping the gun? Maybe he’s just playing hooky.”

“We’ve checked his home and can confirm that he has not stepped into it since coming to work yesterday evening.”

“And why are talking to me, exactly?” Ed folded his arms over his chest, already becoming annoyed with this person.

“I’m questioning as many people as possible, but I have interviewed several witnesses that claim they saw you enter the Colonel’s office and then leave soon after. Afterwards, Major Alex Louis Armstrong entered and Mustang was not present.”

“Yeah, I went to his office, but the bastard wasn’t there.” the alchemist lied. “I waited for a few minutes but decided to head home.”

“I see…and do have any information that may relate to his disappearance?” William asked, tipping his glasses and eying Edward.

“Nope, sorry.” Ed replied as he swiveled his flesh and blood foot, grinding Roy tiny body into his foot.

“Well than, if you come across anything please report it to me or my colleagues. I must ask that you do not leave Central until the investigation is concluded.” the Major saluted Edward and walked away. Ed stopped himself from snickering and continued down the hall. Since he had no one to report to, he decided to stop by the library and do some light reading. While there, he couldn’t help but feel he was being watched. The same people seemed to pass him occasionally and give him odd glances. Eventually, after over an hour and a half of reading, a letter was handed to the older Elric. It was orders from the higher ups, and the orders were…
1521111211212212121111122211222211212211.title: Right Under Their Noses

choices: Ask around to see if anyone had seen Albert
Go look for him on his own
1521111211212212121111122211222211212211.content:
Despite what Sullivan had told him about leaving Central, Ed had bigger fish to fry with his orders to find the escaped prisoner. Ed sighed and put his red coat back on and headed towards the exit. He encountered two men guarding the main doors to the outside, and when he tried to get past them they blocked his path. "We have our orders from the major...We can't let you off the premises until further investigation."

Ed reached into his coat pocket and pulled out his pocket watch, "Know what this is?" Ed asked intimidatingly.

The men nodded.

"This pocket watch means I outrank the both of you lunkheads....Not to mention Sullivan...So I suggest you let me through so I can do my job." Ed said darkly.

The men looked at each other, stuttered numerous apologies, and got out of his way.

Ed smirked a bit as he walked down the steps, putting extra pressure on his human foot all the way down from central.

****

Since Al now had his body back and could die just like anyone else could, Ed was more reluctant to take him on missions. Despite how much Al begged him to take him. As Ed sat down on a bench in the park, he began to look over the escapee's profile.

He had jet black hair that looked greasy and was sleeked back with gel. He had innocent looking blue eyes. In fact he looked as if he was about to cry in his mugshot. He had pale skin, as if he rarely ever went out in the sunlight. His age was listed as nineteen.

Ed looked down past all this to see what he was charged with.

Assault with a deadly weapon (Underneath this it was written that he had beat his girlfriend with a club til her face was unrecognizable)
Armed robbery

Ed muttered the rest of the crimes, which were mostly repeat offenses, under his breath until he found the big one....Murder.

Underneath the word there was a paragraph describing how it all went down.

"Albert Francesco Idine after a long night of drinking at a bar went home in a drunken stupor and collapsed on the sofa of his girlfriend's house. The next morning he claims he had a hangover which was made worse when his girlfriend yelled at him that she was leaving him. He grew angry, grabbed a knife from the kitchen, and stabbed her to death. He has confessed to the murder, but refuses to give us the location of the body."

Edward then turned the page and saw the crime scene photos and pictures of Albert covered in blood and in cuffs. Ed sighed and put the depressing file in his jacket pocket. Ed decided to...
1521111211212212121111122211222211212211.title: Albert's Tale

choices: Ed Kicks His Boots Off With A Sigh...
1521111211212212121111122211222211212211.content:
Ed entered a local hotel and showed the manager the picture in the file. The manager's eyes grew wide and he nodded. "Y-Yes...he's up in room 103..."

Ed nodded taking off his red jacket, leaving it at the desk. He raced up the stairs, counting the rooms til he got to 103. He slowly approached the door and knocked gently, "Room service!" Ed said. He heard a man cursing, apparently having been woken up by Ed's knock. "Didn't order no damn room service..." Ed couldn't help but snicker as he heard this from inside the room. He stopped when he heard the distinct click of a gun being loaded.

Albert opened the door halfway, Ed noticed the gun in his right hand, and knew that it was now or never. Ed kicked the door open, sending Albert flying onto the bed. He still had the gun in hand however, and he proceeded to shoot at Ed!

Ed clapped his hands and placed them on the floor, causing a wall to rise up and protect him from the bullets for awhile. But a little while was all he needed, While Idine shot at the wall Ed raced around it and landed on top of him. He wrenched the gun from Albert's hand and knocked him out.

***

After Albert had been taken into custody, Ed reconstructed the room and asked if he could stay inside it for awhile in private to look for evidence. The manager said that was fine. Ed however was actually going to torment Roy some more.
1521111211212212121111122211222211212211.title: Albert's End

choices: Ed finds a workout room. May as well use it!
1521111211212212121111122211222211212211.content:
After making sure the door to the hotel room was locked, Ed sighed deeply as he unstrapped both his boots and kicked them off. Roy, who had been pinned under Ed’s foot this entire time, felt Ed’s foot disappear and his prison fly through the air. Somewhere along the way, the tiny Colonel fell out of the boot and landed on the dusty rug. He coughed and looked around; his eyes soon drifting in front of him where a titanic Edward was staring at him, his arms folded over his chest and a smug grin on his face.

“Hey there, Colonel Bug. Ready for your work?”

“Where are we?” Roy asked, not familiar with his surroundings.

“Some dirt bag’s hotel room. They just hauled him off and I thought now would be the perfect time for some privacy.”

“I see…I thought it was you new apartment.”

“Funny. Now get over here and give your master a foot rub.” Ed lifted up his bare foot and urged Roy to walk over to it. The tiny Flame Alchemist, however, refused and turned his back to Ed. “So you’re going to make me come over there? What a troublesome insect…” Ed sighed, but said it with a grin since knew the Colonel would respond like that. Roy watched as the giant teen stomped over to him and without giving the tiny man a chance to run, stomped down on him and forced him onto his back. He slowly began to apply pressure to his foot as he felt Mustang squirm under his foot.

“Don’t make me go home and tell Al I accidentally crushed you. Get rubbing!”

Roy groaned in pain as Ed lifted his sole off Roy just enough for the older male to rub his foot from his laying position. The alchemist reluctantly began rubbing the boy’s foot, ignoring his sinister smirk high above. Ed had build up a lot of sweat in his boot, so by the time Roy was finished his hands were soaked in sweat.

“Do you really have time for this? Don’t you have to report back?” Roy asked while he rubbed his teen master’s foot.

“And remain under the watch of that Sullivan guy? I think I’d rather take my time here. If he wants me back, he can tell me himself.” Ed told his slave as he took his foot off him and roughly snatched him up before he had a chance to run. “How about we see if this dump as anything we can use. I don’t think he’ll mind…”
1521111211212212121111122211222211212211.title: A Break From Work

1521111211212212121111122211222211212211.content:
Ed stuffed Roy back into his boot and re-inserted his dripping wet foot. He was about to leave the room when something on the desk by the window caught his eye. He went over to the desk and saw four or five papers scattered over it. There was also a bulky round thing wrapped in newspaper and tied at the top with some string. Ed shrugged, probably the dirtbag's lunch. However something compelled him to open it.

When he undid the poorly tied knot, he got the shock of his life. A grin slowly spread across his face as he re-wrapped the package and stuffed it along with the rest of the papers in his pants pocket.

Ed ran to the police station, where Albert was being held. He ran inside, flashed his watch for everyone and anyone who wanted to see it, and eventually gained access to see Albert.

He had asked to be alone in the cell with him.

When Albert saw Ed he sighed and looked down at the floor. "What do you want from me kid?"

Ed had made sure that the guards were positioned far away so he could do what he was about to do. He approached the wall behind Albert, clapped his hands, and placed them on the wall which quickly dissolved. Albert looked from Ed, to the open space and turned to run out. However the first step he took onto the soil outside, a transmutation circle appeared under his feet, and suddenly the world seemed to be getting bigger.

Once Albert had reached the desired height, Ed stepped outside, snatched the dazed and bewildered man up, and stuffed him in his pants pocket. The guards of course came running. Ed explained to them how Albert had had an accomplice who could use alchemy come bail him out. It was a far fetched story, but the dim witted guards believed it.

Ed grinned as he began to head home...
1521111211212212121111122211222211212211.title: A New Method of Shrinking

choices: A happy Ed with his limbs back!
A pissed off Ed. The stone turned out to be fake.
1521111211212212121111122211222211212211.content:
Ed could feel Albert struggling wildly in his pocket and decided he couldn’t wait to get home to question the man. About half-way to his apartment, Ed quietly slipped into a nearby ally and fished the tiny criminal out of his pocket. Albert struggled in his grip, but the older teenager was too weak compared to the giant Edward.

“You ass wipe! You…you shrunk me!! You took the notes from my room!” the tiny man screamed at his large captor, who was previously a couple feet shorter than him and now towered over him like a god.

“Yeah, I did, but I already knew about the alchemic circle described in the notes. They just happened to remind me of it. What was REALLY interesting was this…” Ed reached into his pocket and took out the object he had found in the hotel. Unwrapping it, he showed it to Albert. It was a blood red stone, a Philosopher’s Stone. “Care to explain where you got this, punk?”

“I…I stole it from a military warehouse. I thought it was just a rare gem, but once the military found out I had It they arrested me and demanded I tell them where it was. I managed to escape and was about to leave town when you knocked down my door!”

“Wait, I thought you killed your girlfriend. That’s why you were arrested.”

“That was a lie! My girlfriend broke up with me months ago and moved down South.”

“I see…I guess I shouldn’t be surprised. What about the research notes on shrinking? You don’t look like an alchemist to me.”

“Those belong to a friend of mine. He was using it to shrink his merchandise to make them easier to transport. I was holding onto them for him.” the nineteen tear old explained.

“Ha, merchandise? Why shrink merchandise when you can shrink people? It’s a lot more useful!”

“I don’t you everything I know, can you turn me back to normal now? Please?”

“Hmmm…nah.” the elder Elric replied. “Am I correct to assume all those other crimes on your record are true? If they are, you’re just douche bag that doesn’t belong on the streets. You better off with me where you can’t hurt anyone.”

“That…that’s not fair!!” Albert shouted as he struggled against Ed’s fist once more. “I already paid for all that stuff! You can’t do this to me!”

“Watch me. Today is the beginning of your new life, slave.” Ed said evilly as he stuffed Albert and the stone back into his pants pocket and made his way home.

Once he arrived at his apartment number, he rushed through the door and ran right by Alphonse. The younger alchemist was sitting on the couch reading while you were willingly giving him a foot rub.

“Hey, Ed, what are you doing home so--”

“Not now Al, wait just a moment!” Al shouted to his brother as he rushed to his room and slammed the door shut. Inside, he tossed Albert onto his bed and took his boots off before throwing Roy onto the bed with him. The two shrunken men exchanged glances before Roy looked up angrily at the blond teen.

“Fullmetal, what’s going on?” Roy asked, getting to his feet and walking to the edge of the bed. “Why is--?”

“Just shut up bug and watch!” Ed snapped back as he took off jacket and shirt, revealing his entire automail arm. Ed took the Philosopher’s Stone out of his pocket and examined it closely. He would have to use it to find out if it was real or not. Ed was eager to do just that, so he took a few minutes to mentally prepare before holding the stone between his fingers, clapping his hands together, and placing them against his chest. The entire room filled with blue light as alchemic energy crackled everywhere. Roy and Albert were forced to shut their eyes or go blind from looking at the light. Al saw the light from down the hall and rushed for the door. When he found it locked, he banged on the door repeatedly.

“Brother! What’s going on in there?! Are you okay?!” Al continued to yell until the light faded. A few seconds later, the door was unlocked and opened to reveal…
1521111211212212121111122211222211212211.title: A New Slave And...

choices: First order of business...Al wants Albert to sniff his socks
1521111211212212121111122211222211212211.content:
Ed had a furious look on his face when he finally opened the door. "Ed? Whats wrong?" Al asked in a concerned voice.

"I found another stone....And it was just another fake." Ed said through gritted teeth.

Al blinked, "You found one? Where?"

"In some criminal's hotel room that I was assigned to bring down. I also found notes from that book on how to shrink people with transmutation circles. I forgot about that method."

Al noticed there were two tinies on Ed's bed. He looked at Ed sternly, "Ed...did you shrink someone else?!"

"Yeah, so? He was a dirtbag anyway and I thought you could use a new slave to break since your old one is kinda getting a bit...comfortable with you." Ed said noticing you sitting on Al's shoulder humming a tune. Al looked at you on his shoulder and shielded you with his hand. "So? I like him! He had a life as a normal sized person before he got shrunk and zapped here ya know. Why shouldn't I make him comfortable? It's not his fault he's here!" Al said defensively.

Ed hated to admit it, but you were growing on him too. And you were Al's slave.

"You didn't let me finish. I want him for awhile but you can have him for awhile too and we'll see how it turns out."

"Hmm...I guess so....What'd he do anyway?"

"Well he says he was captured by the military for finding a supposed Philosopher's Stone, but the rest of the crimes on his record, like rape and assault..are true."

Al's eyes widened then he glared in Albert's direction.

"Hey Ed...Since you've had Roy all day can I have the new one?"

"Aww....But I wanted him first!"

"You'll get him eventually...Promise. I just think it'd be fair since you've had Roy."

"I guess so...His names Albert by the way."

Al snorted, "Who cares what his name is? He'll be called slave from now on!" Al laughed and so did Ed.

Ed snatched Albert up and brought him over to Al who held out his hand. Albert was dropped into Al's sweaty palm which closed around him like a cage.

"Thanks Ed....I'll give him to you later tonight!" Al said walking to his room.

"Later tonight!? Al!" Ed yelled after his little brother but Al had already shut the door of his room.
1521111211212212121111122211222211212211.title: A pissed off Ed. The stone turned out to be fake.

choices: Ties Albert up and lets you torture him.
Finds another way to humiliate Albert.
1521111211212212121111122211222211212211.content:
Alphonse stepped away from his door and stared at Albert in his hand. The tiny nineteen year-old started to sweat under Al’s frightening gaze. Al’s stare turned into a grin as he squeezed the little criminal a bit, making him yelp.

“I really don’t like bad guys like you. My brother was right to shrink you and keep you away from other people. You need to be punished for all the crap you’ve done.” Al scolded, finishing his last sentence with a tight squeeze that showed just how mad he was.

“I…already told your…brother,” Albert said between Al’s bone breaking squeezes. “I already paid for all that stuff.”

“I’ve seen it before. The poor criminal wants to turn his life around one minute, and the next he’s murdering people in broad daylight! I’m going to make sure you never hurt anyone again, slave.” Al gave Albert one last squeeze before turning his head to you on his shoulder.

“What about you, Matt? Do you think this guy should be allowed to return in his normal size?” he asked. You paused for a moment before shaking your head, agreeing with Al’s decision. “I knew you’d agree with me. How should we start breaking him in?”

You scanned over Al’s room for a moment before spotting a dirty pair of socks on the ground. Pointing at them, you say, “Hey, aren’t those the socks you wore yesterday?”

“Hey, you’re right,” the younger Elric replied as he walked over to the socks and picked them up. The blond giant took a big sniff of his foot wear and shook his head in repugnance. “And they haven’t bee washed yet either! Bad news for you, slave.”

Al seated himself down on the wooden floor and placed the two of you down as well, Albert being closer to him. The youngest of the three males then began slipping his dirty socks over his feet. Albert didn’t like where this was going, but knew he didn’t have any hope of escape. Without warning, Al slammed his socked foot on top of his new slave and forced him onto his back with a thud. Only the teen’s head was visible, the rest of his body was smothered by the giant foot. Al smirked as he gripped the man’s head with his toes, forcing his face into his fuzzy sock. Albert tried to wiggle free to escape from the foul odor, but only succeeded in amusing Al further. Al eventually let his head go and just kept his foot on top of the tiny criminal.

Albert looked dazed as he recovered from having his face stuffed into the dirty sock of a younger boy. He looked backwards and spotted you, just standing there watching your master have his fun.

“Hey, kid, you and him are buddies right? Can’t you make him stop?” Albert pleaded, looking like he would break into tears at any moment. You just folded your arms and gave him a stern glare.

“I’ve seen people like you all the time in the news. You deserve every bit of this.” you told him just before Al covered his head again with his foot. Albert screamed fruitlessly into the sock and struggled harder, making Al respond by smothering him more into the floorboards. After awhile, Al removes his foot and…
1521111211212212121111122211222211212211.title: A Slave Without Friends

1521111211212212121111122211222211212211.content:
As Al lifted his foot off of Albert he gasped for air. Alphonse and you smirked at Albert's suffering. But it was about to get a hell of a lot worse for the tiny criminal. Al put his foot up on his other leg and stripped the dirty sock off. He then reached down and picked both you and Albert up. He set you down on the bed and without a word, dropped Albert into the dirty sock.

Albert fell down and hit the crusty bottom of Al's rancid sock. He gagged at the smell of unwashed teen socks. Al looked up as he heard a knock on his bedroom door. He opened it and saw Ed holding his hand out. "Give him to me. That was a dirty trick!" Ed growled. Al grinned and held up the sock to his older brother's nose. "You want him? Take the whole thing!" He said as he dropped the crusty feeling sock into Ed's hand. Ed fished out the tiny Albert and threw the sock on Al's floor. "I'm gonna head back to work. I'll have him trade places with Roy. That one can go in my armpit for the rest of the day!" Ed chuckled and went into his room to get dressed.

When Ed had gotten dressed but was still without his boots and was still in his tank top, he grabbed Roy and brought him up to his face. "Time to taste pit colonel runt!" was all Ed said before he lifted his human arm and shoved Roy into his hot, sweaty pit.

Albert was horrified as Ed lowered his arm and reached down for him!

Albert turned to run but Ed was just too big and much too fast for him. Ed placed him in the boot his human foot usually occupied and stuffed his cheesy foot inside. "Mmmm...That feels good when you struggle like that slave!" Ed taunted as he put his other boot on and finished getting dressed.
1521111211212212121111122211222211212211.title: Feeted and Pitted

choices: He was right. Sullivan approches Edward and questions him.
He was wrong. Sullivan has already left for the Elrics' apartment.
1521111211212212121111122211222211212211.content:
As Ed began the long trek to Central HQ for the second time that day, Roy was starting to have paranoid thoughts (Perhaps brought on by the fumes of Ed’s B.O.?). He was confident that the military experts would find out Ed was behind his disappearance eventually. It wasn’t that difficult; two people vanishing who are somehow involved with Edward? Despite his confidence, Roy feared Ed’s new power. The teenager now had the knowledge to shrink anyone he wanted using alchemy. Combine that with his ability to transmute without circles, and Ed would just have to touch someone and they would quickly find themselves looking up at a much bigger Edward Elric. He could shrink and enslave the entire military!

“I have to calm down…Edward isn‘t that crazy.” Roy said to himself as he tried to get comfortable in Ed’s damp, hot armpit. His jacket was trapping all the heat and causing his pit to produce sweat much faster. That, and the fact that Ed’s blond armpit hairs were tangling around Roy and greasing him with sweat, made getting comfortable near impossible. Roy could only imagine what that Albert kid was going through; probably trapped in Ed’s sweaty boot. If things continued like this, it would only be a matter of time before someone else was shrunken and put somewhere on Ed’s body.

“If only I could get a look at those research notes on shrinking.” Roy muttered to himself, remembering that Ed had mentioned taking them from Albert’s apartment. He might still have them on him…but it’s not like Roy could just ask for them. Roy sighed and started to think about something else. Maybe he should just give up on trying to get back to normal and accept Ed as his master. That Matt seemed to be okay with the whole thing, but then again he had Al as a master and he was a lot nicer. Ed might be nice too if…

“What am I thinking?!” Roy screamed, accidentally getting himself a mouthful of pit sweat. With his face pressed up to Ed’s skin, the colonel was forced to swallow the liquid and groan in discomfort. Not wanting that to happen again, Roy kept his mouth shut and waited silently in the giant’s armpit. Ed occasionally rubbed his arm against his ribs, crushing Roy deeper into his pit and filling his nostrils with the rank body odor. Ed was oblivious to Roy’s worries and thoughts, the giant only cared about humiliating the flame alchemist.

Once Ed arrived at headquarters, he stepped through the doors and expected Sullivan to spot him immediately. The Major would probably question him about disobeying orders and Albert’s disappearance.
1521111211212212121111122211222211212211.title: Roy's POV

1521111211212212121111122211222211212211.content:
Ed spotted Sullivan coming towards him and muttered, "Crap..." Sullivan looked even more stern than usual when he finally came up to Edward.

"Edward Elric, didn't I tell you not to leave headquarters?" Sullivan growled.

Ed glared at the man, "Yeah, But I had a mission to attend to."

Sullivan glared back, "Would you join me in private for a moment?"

Ed shrugged and followed Sullivan.

Ed was a bit surprised when they found themselves in Roy's office sitting across from each other.

Sullivan sighed, "Are you aware that two people have disappeared in your presence in less than a week?"

"Albert hasn't disappeared he's escaped...Probably got a ride with his friend out of the military's jurisdiction"

"Friend? ....Oh yes his friend that was able to use alchemy! The one that busted him out!" Ed could tell from Sullivan's voice that he doubted Ed's story.

"Yes....I saw it."

"Then care to tell me why you, the famed Fullmetal Alchemist, didn't even try to stop them?"

Edward gritted his teeth.

"Because they weren't my problem by then." Ed said through his teeth.

Sullivan raised an eyebrow.

"Not your problem? Heh....Be thou for the people indeed...." Sullivan chuckled.

Ed narrowed his eyes.

Sullivan leaned forward, staring into Edward's eyes as he continued. "Listen kid. You may be treated like one of the higher ups because of that shiny watch of yours. But to me you're just a kid who has lucked out numerous times. 1521111211212212121111122211222211212211.content:
Alphonse’s little shopping trip had brought him pretty far from the apartment. Instead of heading back the way he came, the young alchemist decided to take a shortcut through the park.

“Do you think Mittens will like what I got him?” Al asked you, looking down at his pocket.

“I bet he’ll like anything you gave him, Al.” you reply, the both of you chuckling at the possible truth of the statement. Several minutes later, the two of you arrive at the center of the park. It’s really busy around this part; there are parents taking their kids out to play, artists sitting down and sketching, couples sitting down and talking, and even some tourists taking pictures of the landmarks. One person stands out, however. Sitting alone on a nearby bench is a young boy, no older than thirteen. He’s wearing a red cap that covers his chestnut hair and a white, dirty, sleeveless shirt along with a pair of baggy pants with several rips in them. His feet are dirty and bare and the boy seems to stare at them with lonely eyes. Occasionally he looks up to watch someone pass by, staring at the ice cream or sandwich they’re holding. Al, being the kind pedestrian he is, walks over to the boy and sits down next to him. The child glances at Al, but is soon staring at his feet again. They both sit in silence for a few moments before Al speaks up.

“Do you sit here often?” Al asked, smiling at the younger boy. The boy doesn’t even look at him and continues to stare at the ground. Al frowns at the lack of response, but continues to try and talk to the boy. “My name’s Alphonse, what’s yours?” This time the kid looks up at Alphonse for a moment before once again looking at the ground. It seems like he’s going to ignore the question again until…

“Robert.” he replied, almost in a whisper.

“Nice to meet you Robert. Are you here alone?”

“Yes. I don’t have anyone else…”

“No parents?”

“Nope.”

“Oh…well, when was the last time you ate?”

“I don’t know…a few days ago.” The boy clutches his stomach as it growls. When Al sees this, he reaches into the grocery bag and pulls out a loaf of bread. He hands the bread to Robert, who just looks at it and Al for a few seconds. With a nod from Al, Robert takes the bread and begins consuming it.

“Thanks!” he manages to say between swallows.

Al smiles at the homeless boy before asking, “So you don’t have anyone who can look after you?”

“I used to have a dog. His name was Chester. He would always be at my side, but a year ago he got ran over by a car.” Robert wipes his eyes with the back of his hand before taking another large bite of the bread.

“I see…do you like cats?”

Robert nods and replies, “My grandma used to own a car, but she was really old and never wanted to play.”

“I have a kitten at home, his name is Mittens. If you want, I can let you play with him.”

“Umm…I don’t know…” Albert looks at Al suspiciously, but the older male just laughs at the look.

“Don’t worry, I’m not some creep. I’m just a couple years older than you, believe it or not. So, what do you say?”

“I…I guess so. Is there more bread?”

“Haha, yeah. I can make you a nice lunch of you want.”

Robert smiles widely just before he finishes the brad in his hands. He leaps off the bench with Al and before long the two were walking off.

“Let me carry one of those for you.” Robert offered, taking one of the bags from Al. The younger Elric thanked him and patted his head with his free hand.

As the two boys made their way to the apartment, you were listening from within Al’s pocket. You knew there was a big difference between bringing home a cat and bringing home a kid…Ed wasn’t going to like this.

Not long after Al and Robert left the park, someone else arrived and sat down in the same bench they were sitting at. It was Edward, and the troubled teen wasn’t looking so good. He took out three photos from his pocket and looked them over again. They were his three “targets” from Sullivan, who wanted Edward to make then disappear with his shrinking alchemy. He didn’t care what happened to them after they were shrunk, just that they never bother him again.

The first photo was of a young man William had identified as his brother, Johan Sullivan. The two of them were polar opposites. While William was a high ranking military officer, Johan was a simple owner of a simple fish market. So why did Sullivan want his own brother gone? The only reason he had given was that he hated his guts. It made Ed sick that he wanted his own brother to vanish…

The second photo was of a twenty-year-old military officer, Colonel Carl Heinrich. Carl was a prodigy in the military, having made the rank of Colonel at just eighteen. Sullivan wanted him gone because, apparently, Carl was blackmailing him with some “dirt” he had picked up on the major. The colonel was using this information to prevent William from moving up in the ranks.

The third photo, and the worse of them all, was of a thirteen-year-old street urchin by the name of Robert Schneider. When Ed first saw the photo, he couldn’t believe Sullivan wanted a child to disappear. The reason was even more ludicrous. According to Sullivan, the boy’s dog had been run over by his car a year ago. Ever since, the boy had been harassing him every chance he gets. His tires were slashed on several occasions, his house sprayed with graffiti, dead pigeons left to rot on his doorstep, and much more. The major had never been able to pin any of these things on the boy, but knew he was behind it all. A year of this torment had finally pushed Sullivan to take such drastic action…and he was using Ed to do it.

The State Alchemist sighed as he put the photos back in his pocket. He couldn’t think of anyway out of his situation other than to do as William says. The teen got up and made his way back into the city. Ed didn’t want to see Mustang’s face since last night, so he had stuffed the man in his armpit without even giving a reason. He felt the man struggle, but wasn’t really in the mood to enjoy it…
1521111211212212121111122211222211212211.title: Sweet Irony

Al just smiled wider and nodded. Robert took a hesitant step into the house, his barefeet leaving dirty footprints on the floor. Robert soon poked his head out of the door, "Al? Can I don't have any other clothes." He frowned.

Al went over to the closet across from the bathroom and pulled out a towel, soon Robert had a bathrobe.

"Thanks Al!" He says tying the belt.

"No problem, come out and get your sandwich!" Al says and a immediately Robert races out into the kitchen and snatches up a sandwich. He raises it to his mouth and is about to take a bite when he sees you next to Al's, nibbling on the edge. At first glance you looked like some sort of pest that needed squishing, but then Robert sees that you are wearing clothes and sitting upright. He falls from his chair in surprise! "Robert!" Al says and rushes to his friend's aid.

"W-what the heck is that!?" He says pointing to you peering over the table at him.

Al just laughs as he helps Robert up, "This is Matt. He's a person just like us, only he's tiny."

Robert approaches you cautiously and peeks at you with his big blue eyes, you are starting to feel uncomfortable with his staring.

Robert then smiles wide and says in an obnoxiously loud voice. "Hi Matty!" he says offering you his finger to shake.

After your ears are done ringing you take his finger and shake it as best you can. He giggles at your tiny form.

After you've all eaten your fill, Al calls in Mittens, who hops up on his lap. "This is Mittens." He says as he scratches behind his ears. "Can I hold him?" Robert asks. Al nods and hands Mittens to Robert, who gently sets him on his lap and begins to do what Al had been doing.

Mittens purrs and rubs up against Robert's stomach.

"I love cats." Robert says as Mittens closes his eyes and seems to go to sleep.

Al just flashes a grin, "So do I."

choices: Ed makes Johan put those strong arms to use and rub his foot.
Ed sticks Johan in his sweaty, warm boot.
1521111211212212121111122211222211212211.content:
Edward checked the address he had been given and compared it with his current location. This was defiantly Crimson Creek, the store Sullivan’s brother managed. Edward sighed as he braced himself for what he was about to do. After preparing, Ed pushed on the glass door and heard a chime as the door opened. The store was quite small and only had three customers at the time. One man was looking at fish behind a glass window, another man walked past Ed and made his way outside with a bag of produce. The third person, a woman, was talking to his target, Johan Sullivan. Johan was busy placing the woman’s purchases in a plastic bag to notice Ed’s arrival. The young dog of the military took this time to examine Johan more closely. He looked a bit like his brother; same dirty blond hair and a similar facial structure. He lacked the glasses the major wore and Ed noticed he was considerably more muscular than his scrawny brother who spent most of his time behind a desk (when he wasn’t breaking into people’s homes).

After the woman left, Ed approached his target and Johan welcomed him with a smile.

“Welcome to Crimson Creek, kid. How can I help you?” he asked while drying his hands on a rag.

“I’m not a customer.” Ed replied before flashing his State Alchemist watch. Johan’s expression completely changed and was now looking at Ed with distaste.

“The military, eh? What do you want?” His tone of voice had also changed. He apparently wasn’t much of a fan of the government.

“I’m here on behalf of your brother, Major William Sullivan.” Ed replied, his tongue receiving a bad taste as he said the man’s name. “Can we speak someplace private?”

“William? Oh, this should be good. Follow me.” William’s brother finished washing his hands and lead the elder Elric into the back room. The room was much colder than the main part of the store and several frozen fish hanged from the ceiling. Edward was glad he was wearing his jacket.

“So, what does my brother want this time?” Johan asked as soon as the two of them entered the back room, his back still turned to Ed. Instead of hearing a verbal response, he heard the sound of clapping followed by a faint “Sorry.” and then two hands upon his back. The next thing he saw was a surge of blue light that engulfed him. The man covered his eyes with his arm as his body quickly shrank before Edward’s eyes. In a few seconds the light faded and Johan stood the same size as Ed’s past victims. At first the man was confused, but after spinning around he noticed Edward’s giant boots in front of him. Johan strained his neck to look up at the gigantic teen that now towered over him.

“W-what’s going on?! What did you do to me?!”

Ed didn’t answer immediately and just looked at the poor man with sorrowful eyes. This wasn’t the same as shrinking a lowly scumbag; this was just a normal man that had to have a jackass as a brother. Edward closed his eyes and inhaled deeply. When his eyes opened, he was smirking down at the fish market owner with the same eyes he looked at all his victims with. If he was going to be forced to shrink people, the least he could do was try and enjoy it. Once someone shrunk, it didn’t matter what their old life was like, they were his slave. That’s what Ed told himself.

“Sucks for you, little guy! William’s gotten tired of you being around and wants you gone. So, I’m here to fulfill the order!”

“My brother?! He told you to do this! Kid, he’s insane!!”

Trust me, I know. Edward through before reaching down and grabbing the tiny Sullivan. The muscular man tried to struggle, but Ed was far too strong for him now. The blond sat down in a nearby chair and used his free hand to take off his boot, revealing his bare foot. Ed shuddered a bit as he felt the cold air of the room hit his foot.

“Well, bug, you’re now my slave! Instead of explaining it to you, let me show you what I do to my tiny slaves.”
1521111211212212121111122211222211212211.title: Johan

1521111211212212121111122211222211212211.content:
Johan stared up at Edward in question, he was still trying to take in what was going on. "Slave!? I'm not your slave kid! Please, listen, My brother has always been nuts! He hates me for god knows why! I don't know what lies he's told you but don't listen to him!" This long ramble all took place in front of Ed, who tried to tune it out regardless of how hard it was.

He sighed and, as gently as he could, placed Johan at the bottom of his damp boot. He could hear Johan gagging, he pitied the man, this wasn't like the other slaves, who more or less deserved to be tortured. This was an innocent guy who just had some bad luck. Johan looked up with teary eyes, though Ed couldn't tell whether it was from the smell or from his situation.

Ed almost lost it at the sight of the muscly man crying, but he just looked away and lowered his sweaty foot into the boot, on top of the tiny man.

Ed wiggled his toes, getting a good feel of Johan's body underneath him. Soon he was heading back to central to report to Sullivan.

Once Ed was in Sulivan's office he raised his foot out of his boot and pulled Johan out. Sullivan laughed at the state of his brother, making Ed have images of himself stomping Sullivan underfoot flash through his mind.

"Oh man, can I see him for a bit?" Sullivan said wiping a tear from his eye.

"No....That wasn't part of the deal."

Sullivan scowled at the alchemist but said no more. He waved Ed away, not noticing that Ed tucked Johan in his pocket this time.

1521111211212212121111122211222211212211.content:
One down, two to go… Ed thought as he exited Sullivan’s office and began to think about his next target. He did not like the idea of shrinking a kid, not matter how much of a brat they were, so he decided to save Robert for last. He would instead track down Colonel Heinrich, the twenty-year-old army prodigy. He could just ask around headquarters, but that might make him seem suspicious when the colonel suddenly vanished. As the red-coated alchemist walked down the hall, he overheard two women speaking.

“Hey, aren’t you supposed to be at the training field today?” the blonde one asked. “I thought it was your turn to train the new recruits?”

“Colonel Heinrich offered tot take my place. You know how that showoff is; he’ll jump at the opportunity to display his marksmanship skills to the newbies.” replied the brunette. Ed smirked at his luck and changed his direction, heading for the outside training field.

Once outside, Edward spotted several young recruits lined up before a single man in a blue military coat. The man was the same as the one in the photo; Carl Heinrich. He had messy auburn hair and a face that the woman would swoon over. Unfortunately, his smug attitude didn’t make him very popular among his peers. It’s only thanks to his superior skills that he was promoted.

“Alright guys, watch closely. This is how you shoot a gun.” Carl said to the group of newbies as he turned to face the marksman target. He just stared at it for a few moments before whipping out his gun and immediately firing three shots. All three bullets hit the bullseye almost perfectly. Heinrich blew the barrel of the gun and twirled it on his finger before putting it back in its strap. The group of recruits rolled their eyes at the man’s cocky attitude and clapped softly. “Okay, now I want all of you to try. You won’t be leaving this field until you each hit the bullseye at least once!”

Carl waved to the group before getting out of their way. As they took aim and began firing, Carl noticed Edward watching from afar.

“Hey, you’re the one they call Fullmetal, aren’t you? Wow, you are short!” Carl laughed, unaware of the danger he had just put himself in. Ed felt a blood vessel pop in his head as he grinded his teeth.

We just started talking and I already hate him. Ed thought as he put his anger under control.

“Anyway, what brings you out here?”

“Well, you see-” Ed began, but Carl finished for him.

“Let me guess; you want some marksman practice, right? You alchemists do pretty good with your abilities, but it doesn’t hurt to always have a gun by your side.” the colonel stated as he patted the gun strapped to his waist.

“No, I-”

“Don’t worry about your height, either. Even a child can shoot a gun.” Carl interrupted again, laughing as Ed’s temper rose.

That’s it! I don’t care if I’m being forced to shrink him, he’s no better than Mustang!

“Actually, sir, I have something important to discuss with you. Can we talk somewhere private…and less noisy.”

“I see, urgent is it? Very well…” Carl turned back to the group he was training. “You guys keep on practicing! I’ll be back in a minute!”

The new recruits seemed to breath a sigh of relief as the colonel left. They had no idea he’d be out of their hair for more than just a minute…

Since it was nearby, Edward and Carl entered one of the headquarters’ indoor gyms. No one was using it, thankfully, allowing Ed to do the deed without any witnesses.

“So, Fullmetal, what did you want to talk about?” Heinrich asked as he turned around to face the younger man. When he did, however, he saw Ed grinning at him and clapping his hands together. Before the colonel could react, Ed had his hands on his chest and light engulfed him.

“We alchemists have no need for guns when we can do things like this!” Heinrich heard Ed say as he watched the short man seem to get bigger and bigger. Soon Ed was the one that was looking down at him! Not only that, but the gym itself was getting bigger too!

“What the hell?! A-Am I shrinking?!”

“Yup! Who’s short now, colonel?” Ed boomed down to him as the expert marksman shrank down to his stomach, then his knees, then is heels. When the light faded, Carl was just like Roy: Colonel Insect.

“Looks like you just got demoted, shrimp!” Ed laughed down at the tiny man.

“You punk! I order you to turn my back immediately! I’m your superior officer!”

“Didn’t I just say you were demoted? You now hold the rank of slave! Congratulations!” Ed continued to grin down at the shrunken man. Shrinking an innocent citizen was one thing, but bringing down someone who always acted high and mighty put a smile on his face. Carl didn’t find it so humorous, though, as he pulled out his gun and started firing at Ed. Trigger happy little fellow, wasn’t he?

Too bad for Heinrich, he was shooting Ed’s automail leg. The bullets just deflected off him like they were made of plastic. Even if Carl had hit flesh, it would probably feel just like a bug bite to the giant. Edward lifted his black boot high into the air and stomped the ground hard, knocking the colonel off balance and making his gun slip out of his fingers. Ed quickly stepped on the small pistol and grinded it into dust. Heinrich watched in horror as his only weapon disappeared under the teen’s foot.

“Now that I’ve taken care of that, lets get down to business. I’m not too thrilled about going after my next target, so let’s have some fun!” Ed said down to the helpless little bug while towering over him. Without his gun, Heinrich was reduced to a frightened little man.

Edward watched the frightened former colonel quiver in fear at his gigantic form, and he chuckled a bit. He knelt down and took his sweaty boot off. He sighed in relief as he wiggled his toes, bringing them closer toward Carl. Heinrich held his nose, standing there for a moment, then darted off toward the door! "Oh no you don't!" As if the boy hadn't washed his feet in weeks, but actually he just hadn't washed all the sweat and filth off of himself from yesterday.

You, Al, and Robert were sitting at the kitchen table together. Al had his nose in a recipe book, looking for something new to cook. Robert, after Mittens had fallen asleep at his feet, was busy playing with you. He had his finger wagging over the table while you swung from it. The kid really liked playing with you and you didn’t seem to mind at all.

“Hehe, it must be fun being that size.” Robert said as he stopped wagging his finger and just let you hang from it.

“It is, most of the time. It’s also kind of dangerous, but as long as I’m with Al, I’m not worried.” you reply, smiling kindly at him.

“It must be dangerous! You could be stepped on, sat on, or even eaten!” Robert stated as you just nodded and turned your head, not really wanting to know all the ways you could die at your size. You thought you heard Al suppress a snicker at the word “eaten”.

Robert put you down on the table and looked over at Al before asking, “So, how did get so small?”

“We don’t really know.” Al answered, looking up from his cook book. “According to my brother, he just appeared in our apartment at that size. My brother discovered a way to shrink people, but we don’t think it’s the same method that shrunk Matt.”

“Ohhh…” Robert didn’t quite understand, but acted like he did. “So, is your brother as nice as you?”

“Yep! He can be kind of mean at times, but deep down he’s a nice person. It may take some convincing, but I’m sure he’ll let you live with us.”

“I’d…I’d like that.” Robert said, looking like he was about to cry. “I forgot what it’s like to have a real home. I wasn’t sure how long I could last on the streets. I was planning on taking a train to a smaller town, but I’ve lived my entire life in Central City.”

“I understand, Robert. Now you don’t have to go anywhere.” Al said as he leaned over the table to give Robert a pat on the shoulder. Robert wiped the tears from his eyes and decided to change the subject.

“So, what does your brother do?”

“He works in the military as a State Alchemist.”

“A-A State Alchemist?” Robert repeated, suddenly appearing quite distant.

“Y-Yeah…is that a problem?”

“N-No…it’s just that there’s someone in the military I really don’t like.”

“Who is it?” Al asked, resting his head against his palm and looking straight at Robert.”

“His last name is Sullivan. He’s a really mean man.” Robert replies as he gets and angry look on his face. Al’s eyes widen at the mention of the name.

“Sullivan?!”

“Yeah, you know him?”

“Isn’t he the guy who’s causing Ed so much trouble?” you jump in, looking up at the giant Al. Al nods to you.

“So your brother doesn’t like him either? He already sounds like someone I’d like!” Robert smiles toothily.

“I’m sure you’ll like him…”
