1521111211212212121111122211222211212211.content:
Just then Edward came in the door, looking tired and sweaty from being out in the baking sun all day. He looked up at the three of you at the table, "Hey Al, Hey Matt....Who's the kid?"

Al looked nervous, "Oh! Um...brother this is Robert. Is it okay if he stays here?"

But Ed didn't reply, he just dug his hand into his pocket and pulled out the photo of the boy. The only difference in the photo and the boy sitting at their table was that the boy sitting there was clean and not dirty like the one in the photograph.

Edward looked from Robert to the photo a few times before he put it back in his pocket and nervously spoke. "Al um....can I talk to you in private for a sec?"

"Sure." Al said getting up and putting his book down.

Edward led Alphonse into his room and shut the door.

He took a deep breath and spoke. "Al.....He can't stay here."

Al looked crestfallen. "Why? He's got no one to take care of him! You can't just throw him back out on the streets like that!"

But Ed just frowned, "You don't understand. He can't stay here because he's one of my targets and I have to make sure Sullivan thinks he's gone." Ed said pulling out the three photographs.

"You can't do this brother. I don't want people suffering just for our sake!"

Edward sighed, "I have to do this...there's no other way." He said reaching for the doorknob.

But Al stopped him by putting a hand on his shoulder. "Yes there is. We just need a plan to bring down Sullivan. Now grow back all of them right now! They may know him better than we do."

Ed stared into his brother's eyes for a few moments, then nodded before opening the door.
1521111211212212121111122211222211212211.title: The Discussion

1521111211212212121111122211222211212211.content:
Al followed Ed back into the kitchen, a worried expression on the young teen’s face. Edward was about to start taking out his shrunken victims an placing them on the floor until he noticed a certain, unlucky thirteen-year-old was not present.

“Did he need to use the bathroom?” Ed wondered a she glanced down the hall.

“Matt, where’s Robert?” Al asks as he approaches the table and picks you off it.

“I’m sorry..” you reply, looking like you had failed at something. “He followed you guys when you left the kitchen and a few seconds later he bolted right for the door.”

“Shit! He must have been eavesdropping on our conversation!” Ed shouted as he slammed his fist against the table, making Al and you flinch.

“I’m really sorry…” you say again.

“Why are you apologizing?” Ed asked, looking at you. “There’s nothing you could of done at your size.”

“Anyway, we have to find him!” Al says, pocketing you sand running for the door with Ed right behind him. Once the two Elrics were outside, they both glanced around for the young street urchin, but he was no where to be seen.

“Okay, he couldn’t have gone far. If we split up, we should be able to find him.” Ed tells his brother. Al nods in agreement and is about to head out, but Ed stops him. “And Alphonse…if I find him first, he might not trust me. If he tries to run away again, I might have to shrink him.”

Al bit his lip before replying, “If it comes to that…you’ll change him back once we get home, right?”

“If we can think of a way to take down Sullivan, then yes. If not…he can still live with us, Al, just…smaller.”

Al nodded, knowing that Ed wanted the best for both him and Robert. Ed watched his brother take off before taking off himself in the opposite direction. Meanwhile, almost completely forgotten on Ed’s person, the giant’s three other victims were in a constant state of torture. Carl was still inside Ed’s boot, enduring the ungodly amount of pressure and stink that bore down on him. Johan was inside Ed’s pocket, tumbling around in there as the teen ran. Roy had been stuck in Ed’s armpit for the entire day and was slipping into and out of unconsciousness.

The Elric brothers searched everywhere around their apartment before spanning outward, asking everyone they met if they had seen a young boy in a bathrobe pass by. The search lasted a full hour before…
1521111211212212121111122211222211212211.title: Robert on the Loose

choices: The Two Tinies Grow Back...And Are Willing to help
The Two Grow Back But Refuse to help
1521111211212212121111122211222211212211.content:
Alphonse was searching down a dark alley, about to go search somewhere else when he heard the faint sound of someone crying. Alphonse went deeper into the dirty alleyway until he found the source. Robert was huddled there, among the trash that he had become accustom to over the years, and he was crying with his head in his hands.

"Robert?" Al said slowly approaching the small child wearing a bathrobe.

Robert looked up with teary eyes, he crawled way from Al until he met the wall, he looked frightened. Alphonse looked hurt by this, "Robert, please. We aren't going to hurt you." Al said as Ed came onto the scene.

Robert looked even more scared as Edward appeared. But Alphonse knelt down to Robert and put a hand on his shoulder. "Don't you still want to live with us? Nothing has changed about that. You didn't hear everything Robert. Ed isn't going to do anything to you, in fact he's got a plan to take down Sullivan. But we'll need your help."

Robert looked from Al to Ed, then buried his face in Al's chest, sobbing. Al held Rob's head in his arms, trying to soothe him.

"It's okay....Lets go home."

Soon the three boys were back at the apartment, and Ed was drawing the growth transmutation circle for the two tinies.
1521111211212212121111122211222211212211.title: Robert Found

choices: The plan is put into action.
Heinrich betrays them and calls Sullivan to warn him.
1521111211212212121111122211222211212211.content:
Ed stripped his red and black jackets off, followed by his boots. He placed Carl and Johan on the growth circle while placing an unconscious Roy on the table. After that, Ed preformed the transmutation and watched as the two men started to grow. When the alchemic reaction ended, both men were standing in the Elric’s apartment and back to there normal sizes. Heinrich wasted no time in flashing Ed an angry glare before lunging at him. Ed responded by punching the colonel in the stomach and then kicking him to the ground.

“Just sit there and listen!” Ed ordered, not losing his commanding voice just because his slaves had returned to normal. Carl, despite being taller than Ed now, was still a bit scared of him and sat on the floor with his head down. “Now listen…I didn’t want to shrink you two; Sullivan forced me to with blackmail. I need your help to think of a way to take him down.”

“Why should we help you?” Carl asked, looking up at Edward. The teen pointed at Robert, who was beside Al with the younger Elric holding him close.

“That crazy investigator plans on making me shrink this kid. I won’t have a choice unless you help me!”

Carl and Johan glanced at each other and then at Robert. The boy had tears in his eyes and they couldn’t understand how someone would want him to disappear. After a few seconds, both men nodded and agreed to help Ed.

“Good, now let’s get down to business. Colonel Heinrich, Sullivan said you had some dirt on him and was blackmailing him. What is it, exactly?”

“A few years ago, back when he was Lieutenant Sullivan, he executed three officers without permission and then reported they were shot by the enemy. He thought there was no witnesses, but I had discovered the entire event was recorded.”

“That’s it, brother! With that tape, we can send Sullivan to jail!” Al said, smiling. Johan, however, shook his head.

“Even if you did put him behind bars, he would still have the dirt on you. Nothing is stopping him from telling someone and alerting the higher ups of the military.” Sullivan’s brother explained, making Al’s smile vanish. Was there anything they could do?

“You’re right. He wanted me to make three people disappear, and now it seems the only way to bring him down is to make HIM disappear.” Ed said, not exactly bothered by this…

“Good luck doing that.” Carl muttered with a laugh. “You’ll have another disappearance connected with you and they’ll be storming your home in no time.”

“…what if, my brother disappeared, but it wasn’t Edward Elric that did it.”

“What are talking about?” Ed looked at Johan, puzzled.

“What if you disguised yourself and shrunk William with a few witnesses present. They would immediately report that he was kidnapped, but the description they would give would not be yours. They would be looking for someone completely different!”

A smile spread across Ed’s lips as he said, “Yeah…not only that, but they may look at this mystery shrinker as the one who caused the disappearance of Colonel Mustang! All eyes would be off us!”

“This plan might work…” Carl jumped in, finally getting up from the floor. “If I’m not mistaken, Major Sullivan is supposed to have a meeting with two Generals from the military to discuss the progress in Mustang’s investigation. It would be the perfect time to strike.”

Ed slammed his fist into his automail hand while making a wide, almost scary, grin.

“Yes, this plan is perfect! I’ll disguise myself, sneak into headquarters, shrink Sullivan, escape, change out of my disguise, and them come back here. Bam! Both Sullivan and his mysterious shrinker disappear into the night!”

“Are you sure this is okay, Johan?” Al asked, looking at the muscular man with a frown. “He’s your brother…”

“I’m fine with this. We’ve always hated each other, and I’ve known for a long time that William is an evil man. Someone like that should not have so much authority; he should be shown his place.”

“Okay.” Ed nodded to Johan and turned toward the hallway. “Al, I’ll need your help with the disguise. We need to be really creative so no one will know it’s me!”

“Sure thing!” Al looked down at Robert and smiled. “Can you wait here with Matt and Roy? I think Mittens is hungry too.” the young boy smiled and nodded, running off to get Mitten’s food.

“So…are we allowed to leave now?” Heinrich asked.

“Yeah, but you have to promise not to tell anyone about this!” Ed said, pointing his finger at the two men.

“You’ll be putting my brother in his place, I won’t hold any grudges against you.” Johan stated before heading for the door.

“I don’t feel like being near that foot of yours again. My lips with stay sealed.” Carl assured before leaving as well. When both men were gone, the Elric brothers strolled off to Ed’s room to begin preparations.
1521111211212212121111122211222211212211.title: A Plan is Hatched

choices: The Plan Is Put Into Motion (Success!)
The Plan Is Put Into Motion (Failure)
1521111211212212121111122211222211212211.content:
"Are you sure this is gonna work brother?" Alphonse said as he helped Edward fit into the ratty coat.

"It has to work, Al!" Edward said as he tied the shoelaces on a pair of equally ratty sneakers to match the rest of his hobo outfit.

Alphonse sighed, "Even if it does work, its risky! But okay Ed...You're all set as far as I can see." Al said backing away from his brother.

Edward stood up and looked at himself in the mirror, he looked like your everyday homeless kid. Ed smirked.


"Okay Ed, tell me what you're gonna do."

"You'll take care of the guards once you're in your outfit, then I'll take care of Sullivan. Once he's done in, we're home free!" Ed said grinning.

Al sighed, "If only it were that simple Ed. Now help me get into these clothes."

***
You were amusing Robert by letting him play with you, when the Elrics came out of Ed's room dressed as hobos. Robert jumped up with you in hand. "Awesome! You guys aren't even recognizable! Can I come? I wanna pay that bastard back for killing my dog!" Robert said with an evil glint in his eyes.

But Edward held up a hand, "Don't worry, you'll get your chance once we get back with him. But for now, stay here and take care of Matt." And with that, Edward and Al were out the door.
1521111211212212121111122211222211212211.title: Disguises

1521111211212212121111122211222211212211.content:
It was nightfall by the time Edward and Alphonse arrived at the entrance to headquarters. Like always, two tough looking guards were stationed at the entrance. Ed glanced over at Al as if to say “You ready?” and Al nodded to his silent question. Al emerged from the brother’s hiding spot and started to approach the two guards. The men exchanged annoyed glances as they saw Al approach.

“Hey, kid, where do you think you’re going?” one of the guards asked, blocking Al’s path when he tried to get past him.

“Well…I heard there was all kinds of yummy foods inside Central’s headquarters. Can I please have some, I’m really hungry.” Al put on his best sad face and rubbed his stomach.

“Ha! If you’re hungry, kid, go dig in a dumpster like a good street urchin. Now get lost!” yelled the other man, giving Al a light push.

“But--”

“I said get lost, trash!” the man yelled again and gave Al a stronger push, knocking him to the ground. Al gave the two guards an angry look. Both guards didn’t like the look…

“I don’t think I like the look he’s giving us…”

“Yeah, let’s teach this brat a lesson in respect.” The guards started laughing as they approached Al, cracking their knuckles in an intimidating fashion. The last thing they saw was the poor homeless kid before them smirk before he disappeared. Al quickly maneuvered around the guards and struck them in the back of the neck. In a matter of seconds, both large men were face-first against the cement. Al turned to his brother and gave him a thumbs up.

“Nice going, Al!” Ed said as he ran up to his younger bro and gave him a high five. “I’ll only be a few minutes. You should get out of here in case someone else comes.”

Al nodded and watched Ed run into HQ. Giving one last glance at the unconscious guards, Al ran off in the opposite direction.

++++

“So, you say there has been no progress in the search for Roy Mustang?” an older man with grey hair and a large mustache asked.

“Indeed.” Sullivan replied, sipping from his tea. “I suggest we start thinking about writing up a false report to hand in. Say he betrayed the military and joined Drachma.”

“I agree. We can’t simply say one of our top personnel vanished into thin air.” said a middle-aged man with black hair. “I will make sure it is done tomorrow. In the mean time…”

Suddenly, the two generals and Sullivan started to hear crashes and screams coming from outside. Before the could make a move to see what it was, the double doors of Sullivan’s office were kicked in and certain disguised alchemist invited himself in. Ed put his hands on his hips and gave the three men a wide, smug grin. Sullivan knew that grin from anywhere…

“It can’t be…you’re-!!” the major began, but could not finish as Ed dove straight at him. The teen clapped his hands together in midair and placed them on Sullivan, tackling him to the ground in the process. The two generals watched as the two of them hit the floor and a bright light filled the room.

“Alchemy? He’s an alchemist!” one of the generals yelled. They couldn’t see a thing until the alchemic reaction ended and they were allowed to stop shielding their eyes. They watched the mysterious, young hobo pick himself off the floor. The major was no where in sight…

“What? What did you do to the major?” the black-haired general inquired.

“The major?” Ed repeated, disguising his voice by making it deeper than usual. “Oh, you mean him?” Ed held out his hand to the two generals. Poor William had been shrunken and was now being held by the back of his coat.

“What do you think you’re doing?! I’ll make you pay for this, Full-” the tiny man screamed, but was silenced as Ed clutched him in his fist and muffled his voice.

“W-what? H-How did you-?”

Ed didn’t let the man finish as he gave them a farewell smirk and darted toward the window. The generals watched as Ed jumped right through the glass, shielding his face with his arms. They ran up to the broken window just in time to see the perpetrator disappear into the night.

“What the hell just happed?” the older man asked, unable to accept everything that had just happened.

“What do you mean “what happened”? William Sullivan was just kidnapped! Call the guards and tell them what we just saw!” the black-haired man yelled, turning back to the window as his fellow general picked up the phone and started dialing.

++++

Ed arrived at the spot he and Al had agreed to meet at. Al was already there, and met his brother with a look of both worry and eagerness.

“Well? Did you do it?” he asked, hoping nothing had gone wrong.

“What do you think?” Ed chuckled as he held out his fist and showed Al the much smaller Sullivan.

“We did it! I can’t believe it actually worked! This is fantastic, brother!”

“Enjoy yourselves while you can.” Sullivan snarled as he struggled in Ed’s powerful grip. “They’ll find you and lock you both behind bars for this!”

“They will? I don’t see how, since they won’t be looking for the Fullmetal Alchemist.” Ed smirked down at Sullivan as he witnessed the man begin to understand the brothers’ plan. Ed shoved Sullivan into his pants pocket and lead his brother to a nearby warehouse. There, Al removed their clothes from a bag he was carrying and the two brothers changed out of their hobo outfits. While he did this, Ed dropped the shrunken major into his boot before slipping his sweaty foot inside, ignoring the man’s screams. After the disguises were disposed of, the Elric brothers casually left the warehouse and began heading home. Both had victorious grins on their faces the entire time…
1521111211212212121111122211222211212211.title: The Tables Have Turned

1521111211212212121111122211222211212211.content:
Robert sighed as he lay down on the couch with you. "When will they be back? I wanna torture the crap outta that freak!" Robert said looking angry as he thought of his poor doggie.

He unintentionally squeezed you as he said this, as if he was mad at you. "Robert, please, you're hurting me." You said as you struggled in Robert's surprisingly tight grip. Robert looked down at you and his face softened, "Oops. Sorry Matty!" He said as he let go of you and allowed you to drop onto his leg.

You dusted yourself off and sat up, looking up at Robert's concerned face. You told him you were okay and he looked immensely relieved. He picked you up gently, as if you were made of glass this time. He sat up on the couch and stared down at you, you were starting to get uncomfortable when Edward and Alphonse came in the door.

Robert jumped up in excitement, nearly dropping you in the process. He ran over to the table with you enclosed in his fist as Edward and Al sat down.

"So how did it go!? Where is he!? Can I play with him now!?" Robert said jumping up and down, nearly making you sick.

Ed and Al smiled at each other before Ed finally spoke up. "Sure....You can have him for awhile." As Ed said this, he dramatically lifted his booted foot up in the air and took it off, revealing a steamy, sweaty bare foot with wiggling cheesy toes.

Robert sniffed the air and plugged his nose, "Yuck! Is he in there? Heheh!"

Ed nodded and retrieved Sullivan from his boot. The former major was already looking like a well used slave!

Robert grinned evilly as Sullivan was handed to him.
1521111211212212121111122211222211212211.title: Robert's Revenge

choices: Roberts plays a stomping game with Sullivan.
Ed comes back and asks if he can join in on the revenge.
1521111211212212121111122211222211212211.content:
Robert clutched Sullivan with both hands, gazing at him with his big, blue eyes. Sullivan wiped the footwear from his eyes and look right at Robert’s giant, youthful face. His own face went white with fear.

“Y-You?!” Sullivan cried, thrashing in Robert’s hands. At his size, even this thirteen-year-old was leagues stronger than him.

“Yeah, me!” Robert replied, grinning and squeezing the major tightly. Robert turned to the two blond brothers and asked, “Can I go somewhere private with him?”

“Sure, you can use my room.” Ed offered, leading the younger teen to his bedroom. Once there, Ed shut the door and Sullivan was all alone with the former street urchin…

“I’ve been waiting so long for this.” Robert stated as he brought the shrunken major up to his face. “I’m finally going to get justice for Chester!”

“Chester?! You mean that dog of yours? Listen, kid, I didn’t mean to run him over! It was-”

“Don’t lie, scum!” Robert interrupted, raising his voice a tiny bit and putting the squeeze on the creep of a man, making him yelp. “I saw what happened! Chester ran into the road and you saw him, but you didn’t even try to slow down! You killed him and you didn’t even stop! You probably thought he was just too petty and insignificant to slow down for!”

Sullivan trembled in the young boy’s strong grip. He was completely correct; that dog wasn’t worth anything to him. How would he know running over that dog would result in this situation? It was just some dirty brat’s dog!

“Well, guess what?” Robert spoke as he got his emotions under control and wiped away some tears with the sleeve of his bathrobe. “Who’s petty and insignificant now?

Robert smirked evilly as he bent down to place Robert on the floor. Instead of gently placing him down, he dropped him when he was still a few feet from the floor. Sullivan landed hard and cried out in pain. Nothing was broken, but if this kid continued to have his way with him, EVERYTHING might get broken soon…

A huge earthquake shook the ground under Sullivan as Robert sat his butt down with a thoom. The former major craned his neck up as he looked the young giant in the face. Just yesterday, this kid was filthy and homeless, while he was powerful and held authority. Now, the kid was the one who was powerful while he was still dripping with Edward’s foot sweat. How was that fair?

“I want a foot massage!” Robert said out of no where, confusing Sullivan. When the major saw the boy’s bare feet appear on either side of him, he wasted no time in running away from the towering teen.

“No! No! NO!” Sullivan chanted as he ran. A shadow suddenly engulfed him as Robert stomped down on him, pinning him under his warm foot. The boy snickered as he rolled Sullivan onto his back and took his foot off him.

“You don’t get any say, slave! Do what I say if you don’t want me to get angry.”

Sullivan wanted to cry, but his tears wouldn’t have any effect on his boy. The major watched as Robert planted both his feet in front of Sullivan, soles facing him. Sullivan gulped under the boy’s intimidating glare and wobbled over to the feet. He placed both his gloved hands on the boy’s soft sole and started rubbing. Robert sighed deeply at the first touch, amazed at how good it felt.

“Wow…do it more!” Robert ordered. Sullivan complied and rubbed the sole with all his strength. Robert wiggled his toes in excitement, loving the power trip this was giving him. Was this how Edward and Al felt when they played with one of their little slaves?

Occasionally, Sullivan would switch feet and rub the other one. He thought that if he obeyed, he might get the chance to escape. Deep down, however, he knew the chance of escape was probably zero percent. At best, he would probably be crushed for his crimes against these three giants…but not before they had their fun.

After several long minutes of massaging Robert’s sweaty, warm feet, Sullivan was still going at it. Robert still looked relaxed and showed no signs of letting the major rest. Little did he know, the child was already plotting up more ways to take out his revenge on the little man…
1521111211212212121111122211222211212211.title: Long Awaited Torment

choices: Ed Puts Sullivan In His Armpit While He Trains With Al
1521111211212212121111122211222211212211.content:
Robert jumped in surprise when there was a firm knock at the bedroom door. He got off the floor and picked up Sullivan. He opened the door and was greeted by Ed's smiling face. "Hey kid, Care for a little company?"

"Um...sure...Come on in..It's your room!" Robert said as Ed came inside, never taking his eyes off of Sullivan. Ed sat down on the bed with a sigh, he lifted his human foot and rubbed it with his fingers, groaning. "The plan went off without a hitch, but it needed alot of footwork. I need a massage and a nice foot licking too! Know anybody who would be willing to do that, kiddo?" Ed said grinning widely.

Robert grinned too and held out Sullivan, Ed smirked and held out his automail hand. Robert placed the quivering former major into the cold metal palm. Which in turn enveloped itself around the pitiful man. Ed brought Sullivan up to his smirking face, "Not so tough now, are ya bug?" He whispered to Sullivan as the man struggled in his grip.

"Yeah....I don't think you'll be investigating anymore disappearances or ordering me around anytime soon. Ha!" He laughed as he roughly shoved Sullivan's head between his big and second toe. Robert and Edward could hear Sullivan's pitiful screams, it was like music to them.

Ed really forced Sullivan's face into the sweaty pocket of flesh between his toes. All the while he and Robert laughed at his humiliation.

After doing the same with the rest of his toes, Ed brought Sullivan up to his face and saw that the man had been knocked unconscious by the smell!

Ed turned to Robert and got a nasty idea....
1521111211212212121111122211222211212211.title: Ed Joins In!

choices: Ed manages to overwhelm his little brother.
1521111211212212121111122211222211212211.content:
“By the look on your face, I take it you’ve thought of something nasty?” Robert asks the elder Elric.

“Oooh yeah.” Ed replies, bringing the unconscious Sullivan up to his golden eyes and smirking evilly. Robert watched as Ed lifted up his human arm and, in one quick movement, slapped the shrunken major into his armpit. Robert cringed at the wet sound Ed’s flesh made when the tiny human was pressed against it.

“He’s going feel like shit when he wakes up!” Robert exclaimed, slapping his knee as he laughed.

Ed chuckled as well while he slowly putt his arm down, savoring the feeling of the tiny man compress under his triceps. He turned to the younger teen and said, “There’s more; follow me.”

Ed lead Robert out of his room and into the kitchen, where Al was. Ed entered the kitchen and saw Al washing his hands and smelled something delicious in the air.

“Hey, Al. Something smells good!” Robert exclaimed, smelling the air and following it to the oven.

“It’s steak, I just put it in the oven. It should be ready in an hour or so.” Al said as he dried his hands off and approached Ed. “Did you come in here for Roy? He woke up a bit ago and I put him in my room to rest.”

“Nah, I’m not interested in Colonel Insect right now. I’m preoccupied with Major Shrimp.” Ed jested as he raised his arm and showed his brother the unconscious Sullivan. Al snickered at Sullivan’s position, not showing any pity for the evil man.

“So, what did you come in here for then? Did you smell dinner?”

“That’s not it. I was wondering you wanted to get some training in.”

“I don’t know, Ed. It’s getting pretty late.”

“So? Don’t tell me you can only fight during the daytime, because you knocked out those guards with expert timing.”

“Wow, I wanna see you two train!” Robert shouted, looking at Al with a cute, innocent face. “Please?!”

“Oh, alright. I’ll be out in a minute.”

Robert jumped for joy and gave Al a hug. After that, the older alchemist and the hyperactive kid both ran outside to the back. Robert sat down on a nearby lawn chair and watched Ed do a few stretches. When Ed lifted his arm up to stretch it, he looked down at Sullivan to check on him. The little man was tightly secured in his pit via his blond hairs; he wasn’t going anywhere. After a couple minutes, Al appeared from the door and approached Robert. He handed you over to the boy, who placed you on his leg to watch the two brothers train.

“Remember, brother! Whoever loses has to do something for the winner.” Al reminded his brother as he took his place in front of him.

“I know, I know. That’s exactly why I’m going to win this time! I’m not going to act like your servant a third time!” Ed shouted at his brother, clenching his fist in determination.

“We’ll see about that.” Al replied, grinning as they both took up their fighting stance. The two blonds stared at each other for what seemed like a full minute before beginning the sparing match. Robert was almost blown out of his chair when the first punches were thrown. He knew these teenagers were martial artists, but seeing them move the way they did was mind-blowing! They moved so fast that Robert found himself unable to keep up a few times. By the intensity of their fighting, one wouldn’t believe they were just training and not really trying to hurt each other.

“Wow! I hope they teach me to fight like that someday.” Robert muttered under his breath as he became transfixed on the fight. You were also in awe as you watched the Elrics train. You had watched them before on TV, but actually being this close to them was a whole new experience. You were glad you had front row seats this time and weren’t trapped in Edward’s armpit like before. This time, it was Sullivan who was in that situation.

Speaking of Sullivan, the man was lucky to be unconscious during the whole ordeal. Ed’s quick moves repeatedly pressed him deep into the sweaty pit. His luck ran out when one squeeze was so tight it woke him up. He was conscious for about three seconds before Ed swung his arm down and slapped him into his underarm. The force of the blow combined with a monstrous stench even worse than the teen’s feet knocked the investigator back into dream land.
1521111211212212121111122211222211212211.title: Nighttime Training

1521111211212212121111122211222211212211.content:
In the end, try as he might, Ed was just too determined to win this time. And Alphonse was overwhelmed and soon found himself being pinned by his older brother. "Okay okay," Al laughed, "You win Ed!"

Ed got off of Alphonse and punched the air with his automail arm. "Yes!" He shouted in victory as Alphonse dusted himself off. "Okay, now your reward will have to wait Ed. The steak is probably burning already!" Alphonse said as he rushed into the kitchen. Ed chuckled triumphantly and started thinking up his reward. Robert rushed over to him, "Wow! That was amazing! Can you guys teach me to fight like that!? Huh huh huh!?"

Ed just patted him on the head as Robert jumped up and down, "Easy there kiddo. Maybe someday. Right now we've gotta get you to where your ribs aren't showing through your skin! Now go into my room and see if I have any clothes that could fit you."

Robert nodded, "I'm sure your clothes could fit me! You're not that much bigger than me!" Robert said as he ran happily off to get dresed for dinner, leaving a fuming Edward behind.

Dinner wouldn't be ready for a few hours, so once Robert got dressed into one of Ed's outfits that he wore when he was younger, the three boys gathered round in the living room to decide what to do next as Ed lifted his arm and peeled Sullivan out of the sweaty pit.

Ed set him with a slap on the coffee table and the three boys leaned in closer to see if he stirred.

Sullivan at that moment started to wake up, he lifted himself up using his hands and looked around him. He looked up and saw the three teens grinning evilly down at him and screamed at the top of his lungs...
1521111211212212121111122211222211212211.title: Ed Wins!

choices: One of the brothers find him!
1521111211212212121111122211222211212211.content:
The three teens found Sullivan’s sudden outburst of fright so hilarious that they all leaned back on the couch and started laughing their heads off. Even though Sullivan hated being laughed at, this was his chance to try and escape. While the trio were occupied with their laughing fit, Sullivan dashed across the coffee table. His captors saw him running, but didn’t look worried at all. They watched Sullivan run away from their gigantic forms before he came to a sudden halt upon reaching the edge of the table.

“End of the line, Sullivan. Unless you want to try jumping from that high up.” Al said as he leaned toward the scared little man. “Now come here; I want a turn to play with you!” Sullivan watched as Al’s enormous hand reached out to grasp him. Refusing to be passed around like some kind of toy, Sullivan decided he would rather die then live another moment as these three’s play toy! With his mind made up, Sullivan jumped off the coffee table.

“Shit, he actually jumped!” Ed exclaimed, his attention grabbed. Sullivan braced himself for the ground, but found the landing to be a lot less painful they he thought. This was because a small rug had been placed under the table, which Sullivan landed on with nothing but a couple bruises.

“Quick, grab him!” William heard Robert shout as the sound of the three giant’s feet stomping toward him filled his ears. Sullivan pushed himself off the ground and rushed for the first thing he saw: a pile of alchemy books left on the ground by Edward. Sullivan ran into his fortress of paper, disappearing from the teens’ sights.

“I saw him run in here! Help me look through them.” Al said to the other two as the three boys got onto their knees and started fishing through the pile of research material. By the time they started, Sullivan had craftily sneaked out of the book pile and dove underneath the rug he had landed on. The tiny bump that now appeared on the rug went unnoticed by the three teens. Eventually, Sullivan crawled himself out of the run and resumed running toward the only means of escape he knew: the door. He had barely gotten anywhere near it when…

“Damn, he’s not there!” Ed cried out, tossing the book he was holding back into the pile.

“He has to be around here somewhere! Those tiny legs couldn’t have brought him far.”

The three boys nodded to each other and got to their feet to search the living room thoroughly. Sullivan cursed under his breath and scrambled behind a nearby lamp. He leaned against the lamp and caught his breath. He wasn’t fit for this kind of stuff…

“Hey, I have an idea!” Ed suddenly said, smirking. “Whoever finds the shrimp gets to be the one to smush him!”

“What?!” Robert cried, looking up from the rug he was inspecting. “But I hardly got to torture him at all! I still a bunch of ideas left.”

“Think about it, kid. You got to look down at him for once. Imagine how he must have felt looking up at your giant body! Realizing how pathetic and puny he was must have been punishment enough, right?” Ed explained.

“I guess you're right.” Robert replied. Even if his revenge against Sullivan was cut short, it was almost certain that as long as he hanged out with these alchemist brothers, another shrunken victim would come along for him to toy with. “I still want to be the one to squish him, though!”

“Well, you better get looking then.” Ed flashed the boy a grin before they both resumed their search. Sullivan hugged himself and tried to stop himself from shaking. This was it…he was doomed. Trying to run to the door while the trio was searching the room like hawks was suicide! Even if he didn’t move, it was just a matter of time before he was found and crushed like…like…like a bug!

“This can’t be the end!” Sullivan told himself, furiously running his hands through his hair. “I didn’t climb through the ranks to be stepped on like an insect! I’m not an insect! I’m Major William Sullivan!”
1521111211212212121111122211222211212211.title: An Escape Destined to Fail

choices: Ed Takes Him Up On His Offer As A Slave
1521111211212212121111122211222211212211.content:
However just as Sullivan had told himself this the lamp was lifted by none other than the cruelest of the boys: Edward! Sullivan shook with fear as he looked up at Edward's grinning face. "Well well well....Look what I found. A bug that needs smushing!" Ed said wiggling his automail and flesh toes.

Alphonse and Robert came over then, both looking disappointed. "Aww man! I wanted to be the one to do it!"

Alphonse however just sighed and rubbed his temples, "Ed...are you sure that Robert should see this?"

Ed, never taking his golden eyes off his prey, spoke. "Why shouldn't he? This bastard would've had me squash him if I hadn't turned the tables on his ass!"

"I know, but Ed...he's just a boy....it could scar him..." Alphonse said looking at how anxious Robert was looking down at Sullivan.

Ed sighed, "Fine, whatever....Take him in the other room."

Al put his arm around a struggling Robert, and led him into the kitchen. "But I wanna see!" Robert whined.

"Come on Robby....Lets go play with Mittens."

Soon it was just Sullivan and Ed in the living room. Ed hadn't taken his eyes off the evil man and Sullivan hadn't stopped staring up into those determined golden orbs either.

"Please.....Edward....Don't kill me." Sullivan begged quietly.

But Edward just frowned, "Didn't quite catch that. Maybe if you get on your knees and beg loudly."

So Sullivan fell to his knees onto the floor and began weeping and begging for his life like the coward he was. "Please E-"

"Call me master!" Edward thundered.

Sullivan gulped, "M-Master....Please spare me!! I'll do anything! I'll be your slave for all time!! Just don't kill me!!" This type of begging and pleading went on for some time, Ed listened to it for quite awhile too, tapping his big toe on the floor impatiently.

Ed finally held up a hand for Sullivan to stop and began to think of what to do...
1521111211212212121111122211222211212211.title: Found!

choices: Ed "checks up" on Roy in Al's room.
Ed wants his reward from Al now.
1521111211212212121111122211222211212211.content:
“Very well, I’ll spare your miserable life and sentence you to a lifetime of serving me.” Ed decreed, ceasing the wiggling off his toes and smirking down at Sullivan.

“Oh, thank you, master! I promise to-”

“Let me finish!” Ed raised his voice, but said it quiet enough so the other two boys didn’t hear him. “I can’t let Al or Robert know you’re still alive; they want you dead. Therefore, I’m going to shrink you even smaller and keep you as a secret slave.”

“S-smaller? B-but-!” Sullivan mumbled, but the thunderous sound of Ed clapping his hands together brought an end to his whimpering.

“By the way…” Ed grinned as he slowly brought his palms over William. “Slaves that get this small don’t usually have a long “lifetime”. Good luck!” And with that, the former military officer was covered with the alchemist’s’ palms and blinded by blue light. Ed kept the alchemic reaction between his hands, making sure the two other males didn’t see or hear anything. When Edward removed his hands, the light faded and Sullivan was a mere half-inch…a speck to the cruel teenager. “Hehehe, yeah…that size fits you.”

Sullivan trembled under the shadow of the titan before him. The alchemist could crush him with nothing but his toe now. It didn’t matter if he lived or died now…he was dead to the world. He watched hopelessly as Ed bent down and pinched his frail body between his fingers. Ed brought the puny man up to his face, gave him a satisfied grin, and shoved him into his armpit. Sullivan was so small that he didn’t even need to touch the young man’s flesh; he was slumped over a few of the tree-like hairs and glued to them by the sweat coating. Ed put his arm down, trapping the major in darkness. When Edward walked into the kitchen, he saw Robert and Al on the floor, playing with mittens using a toy ball Al had gotten him during his shopping trip.

“Did you do it?” Robert asked, his attention fully on Ed now.

“Yup! He’s nothing but a smear on the floor now. He won’t be bossing anyone around anymore.”

“Well, clean that “smear” up.” Al told his older brother, pointing to the toll of paper towels. Ed did as he was told and left the kitchen with a paper towel in hand. A few seconds later, he reentered the kitchen and chucked the paper towel into the rubbish as if he had actually cleaned something up with it.

“So, is dinner almost ready?” Ed asked, loving the smell of that steak.

“Not quite yet.” Al replied, checking the timer.

“Well…looks like I’ll have to find something else to do until then…”
1521111211212212121111122211222211212211.title: Sullivan at Half an Inch

1521111211212212121111122211222211212211.content:
“Hey, Al, how about giving me my reward now? I’ve already thought up what you’re going to do.” Ed grinned and rubbed his palms together.

Sighing, Al replied, “Do I have to, brother?”

“Hell yeah! I finally beat you and I want my prize! Don’t chicken out on me, Al.”

“Fine…” Al gave in and picked himself off the floor. Robert moved to follow him, but the younger Elric held him back down. “You stay here and play with Mittens, Robert.”

“Aww, but I wanna watch!” Robert pouted, looking up at Alphonse. The younger blond gave him a nasty glare, as if to say “And I DON’T want you to watch.”. Robert got the message and sat back down as the two brothers left the kitchen.

“So, what do I have to do?” Al asked his brother as he followed him into his room. Ed didn’t respond and instead tugged his tank top over his head, tossing it on the floor somewhere. “Um…Ed?” Al asked again, but his brother still didn’t answer him and instead walked over to his bed and laid himself down on it, back facing the ceiling. The elder brother rested his chin on his arms and flexed his back muscles, hearing them crack uncomfortably. Finally, he spoke…

“Doing Sullivan’s dirty work, beating up a bunch of guards, and winning a sparing match…I’ve had a long day. My back is all tense, mind loosening it up for me?”

“So, you want me to massage your back?”

“Do I have to spell it out?”

Al shrugged and approached his brother’s bed, pulling up his sleeves as he did. A backrub didn’t sound too hard. It sure beat rubbing his feet. Once Al was standing over his brother’s body, he cracked his fingers and got to work. Ed felt his brother dig his fingers into his skin and grunted in response. The younger brother began massaging his brother’s broad back, loosing up his tense muscles.

“A little to the left, Al.” Ed said as he closed his eyes, focused on the amazing feeling his brother was giving him. As Al continued to massage his brothers back, he happened to get a strong whiff of the air and almost gagged.

“Ed, your B.O. is horrible!” Al said, coughing a bit from the smell. He now understood one of the reasons Ed wanted him to rub his back. With no shirt on, the sweat he had accumulated all day was free to unleash its unholy stink on Al. Al moved one hand off Ed and noticed it was covered in greasy sweat. “You really need to take a shower!”

“I will, soon. Maybe tomorrow…or the next day.” Ed mumbled, not really listening to his bro. “Keep rubbing. Lower this time.” Al sighed and did as he was told. Upon moving down to the area just above Ed’s buttocks, his brother suddenly moaned in delight. “Oh yeah! Right there. Scratch right there.”

Al obeyed and scratched Ed’s back, feeling the muscles under his fingertips flex to life. This continued for about fifteen minutes until…

“Okay, that’s enough.” Ed said, earning a pleased response from Al. Ed got off his stomach and sat up on his bed. “You did good, Al.”

“Glad you’re happy.” Al replied, sarcastically. “I’m done now, right?”

Ed smirked at his brother and said...
1521111211212212121111122211222211212211.title: Al the Back Rubber

choices: Ed puts Roy on the floor and smothers him with his foot.
Ed puts Roy in his mouth and swishes him around.
1521111211212212121111122211222211212211.content:
"Yeah, until next time. And there WILL be a next time." Ed said as he gave his younger bro a thumbs up.

"You just got lucky this time. Next time will be different! You'll be the one rubbing my back!" Al replied, giving him a smirk. Both Elrics glared at each other for a few long seconds before Al turned to the door. “I have to go check on the steak. It’s probably still going to be a while before it’s ready.”

“Okay. I got plenty of ways to amuse myself in the meantime.” Ed pulled his tank top back over his body just as Al left his room, leaving the older alchemist alone…save for a tiny investigator suffering in the teen’s armpit hairs. Ed felt like playing with Sullivan some more and lifted his human arm to check up on him. Unfortunately of him, the smell of his B.O. was far too strong for the speck-sized Major and William was out cold. “That’s no fun…” Ed whined as he out his arm down again and stood up. If Sullivan wasn’t going to offer him any amusement, there was someone else who could. With a grin on his face, the blond alchemist left his room and strolled down the hall toward Al’s room.

Once he was there, he entered the similar room to find just what he was expecting. There on Al’s perfectly made bed was Roy’s sleeping form. Mustang looked so peaceful sleeping, Ed almost didn’t want to wake the bug up. Almost.

“I think you’ve had enough time to rest, Colonel Insect. Time to get back to your slave duties!” Ed called as he approached the sleeping Colonel. Ed roughly snatched Roy into his steel fist and brought him up to his evil looking face. Roy, however, was still sleeping. He had spent the entire day in Ed’s armpit, so the man was completely tuckered out. It wasn’t going to be easy to wake him.

“I said it’s time to get back to your slave duties, colonel!” Ed said again as he squeezed and shook the shrunken alchemist. The man twitched a bit in his fist, but would not wake up. Ed was starting to get annoyed.

“Okay, have it your way, sleeping beauty. Maybe you’ll wake up if I do THIS.”
1521111211212212121111122211222211212211.title: Until Next Time

choices: Ed puts Roy near his toes, which are infested with toe gunk.
1521111211212212121111122211222211212211.content:
Ed smirked as a sinister thought crossed his mind. The Colonel was about to get a rude awakening. Dangling the man from his ankle, Edward lifted him into the air and positioned him above his young, handsome face. He gave the Flame Alchemist one last smile before opening his mouth wide and blowing hot air over the shrunken man’s form. Without a second thought, Ed released his superior’s leg and dropped the tiny man into his gaping mouth. If Al had walked into the room at that moment, he would have thought Ed had just devoured the Colonel. Once he was inside, Ed closed his mouth and began swishing his slave around like a piece of hard candy. He found the human being to be surprisingly tasty…

It was about twenty seconds before Ed started to feel Roy stir in his mouth. Before long the colonel was screaming and thrashing about. Ed chuckled cruelly, but kept his bug in his maw a bit longer. Eventually he spat Roy into his steel hand and curled his cold, metal fingers around his slave. Roy was covered in the teen’s spit and wide awake thanks to the giant.

“What the hell was that, Fullmetal?!” Roy yelled, earning himself a quick squeeze from his master.

“That was me waking you up, insect. I never told you anything about resting! You have slave duties to fulfill”

“Ugh…gross.” Mustang muttered as he used his hands to attempt wiping off his master’s saliva…and failing miserably. Ed rolled his eyes and moved Roy down to his shirt, which he used to wipe the alchemist clean. Roy hated being manhandled like this and struggled in Ed’s superhuman-like grip.

“Stop struggling, I’m cleaning you off. Do you want to stay soaked in my spit, shrimp?” Ed brought Roy before his eyes once he was finished and gave the little man another smirk. “Now, it’s time for a certain little slave to amuse their master…”

“For how long? I’m starving…” Roy complained as he glanced down at his stomach.

“Dinner won’t be ready for awhile. However, if you’re so hungry, how about an appetizer?”

“Appetizer?”

Ed’s grin widened with anticipation and Mustang knew whatever the boy was thinking…it wasn’t going to be good.
1521111211212212121111122211222211212211.title: A Wet Wakeup

choices: Roy plays it safe and climbs down.
1521111211212212121111122211222211212211.content:
Roy’s suspicions were confirmed when Ed bent down and dropped him in front of his gargantuan foot. Still bending down, Ed used his fingers to peel apart two of his toes, revealing their messy contents. Roy plugged his nose as the fumes coming from the teen’s foot washed over him. Mustang couldn’t believe how much gunk had accumulated between Edward’s toes since he had taken a shower. Ed was a god alright; a god of uncleanness.

“Mmmm…look at all that toe funk.” Ed whispered as he wiggled his toes, enjoying the feeling of his toes rub his crusty toe jam together.

“Why don’t you take a damn shower?!” Roy yelled, still plugging his nose.

“Why so soon? I’ve went without bathing for a lot longer than this! Once, when I was a kid, I didn’t take a bath for two whole months! All the kids in town called me Stinky Ed, but I didn’t give a damn. I just beat them all up.”

Like you do when someone calls you short? Roy thought.

“Anyway, all this is for you, Colonel. Dig in!”

“What? Why should I eat that filth when Al is making a delicious supper?”

“Why? Because I told you to, bug!” Ed replied before using his other hand to pinch Roy around the waist. In one quick movement, he pushed the shrunken military man between his smelly toes. When he removed his fingers, the toes clamped themselves around the man’s small form. Roy tried to struggle free, but Ed’s digits had a tight grip on him. It was like Major Armstrong had caught him in a bear hug…

“Stop struggling, shrimpy. We’ve been over this: I’m your new master and you’re my slave. You have to do everything I say if you want to live!” Ed followed his threat by squeezing Roy with just his toes. Roy whimpered as he felt like he was going to pop like a grape. “Get licking, bug. Now!”

Mustang quickly gave in and plunged his head into the crevice between Ed’s toes. The Colonel lapped up the combination of dead skin, sweat, and who knows what else. After a few licks, his mouth was full of the disgusting junk and he swallowed it with a pained expression. Ed smiled evilly and folded his arms over his chest while he watched. He could tell that the alchemist wanted to finish his little appetizer quickly, as it only took about two minutes before the pocket between his toes was licked clean.

“Done already? Good boy, you must have really enjoyed that.” Ed plucked the Colonel out from between his toes and brought him to face level. “So, how was it?”

“It was delicious. Just freaking delicious.” Mustang replied sarcastically as he spat some stands of lint out of his mouth and tried desperately to wipe the bad taste off his tongue.

“Glad you liked it. That’s all for now, though. You still need to have room for supper, or else Al will know I fed you already.”

“Whatever. Can I go back to sleep until then? I’m stick tired from being in your armpit all day!”

“Hell no! There’s still time to kill!”

With that, Ed released his hold on the shrunken male and watched him plummet to the wooden floor. Roy screamed as the ground quickly got closer and closer. Before gravity carried him too far, Ed swung his foot off the ground and curved it so Roy landed on his pants leg. The impact was a lot less worse than if he had hit the ground, but it still hurt. The elder Elric didn’t give him enough time to rest, though, as Ed planted his foot back on the ground and forced Roy to cling to his pants to prevent plummeting again.

“Haha, look at you! Clinging to your mighty master like a pathetic slave. How cute.” Ed taunted, making Roy glare up at him. Ed put his hands on his hips and started down at the tiny creature that was holding onto his leg for dear life. “I’ll tell you what, shrimp, you can choose what happens next. You can take the easy way out and climb down to the floor. Someone like you should at least be able to manage that. If you do that, however, you’re going to have to worship my foot until dinner’s ready. That could be an hour or more! If you don’t want to worship my foot, then you’re going to have to climb up the rest of my body. If you manage to get to my shoulder, I’ll go easy on you for the rest of the night. What’s it going to be, Colonel?”

Roy didn’t know what to do. He didn’t want to spent an entire hour or more worshiping this brat’s foot, but could he climb up this living mountain? One wrong move and he would plummet to his doom. Even if he survived, Ed would probably make him worship his feet as the price for failure.

“Hurry up and decide, shrimp! If you’re not quick enough, I’ll just shake you off!”
1521111211212212121111122211222211212211.title: A Linty Appetizer

1521111211212212121111122211222211212211.content:
Roy sighed and at Ed's threat, began to climb down the black material.

Back in the kitchen with you, Alphonse, and Robert. You were being treated quite the opposite as Roy was being treated by your giants. "Lets play!" Robert said as he walked over wearing some of Al's baggy clothes. Al turned around and looked at the clock, the steak wasn't quite done yet, so he had time to play with Robby (As Al had nicknamed him) and you.

Al smiled and nodded, "Okay! What do you want to play?"

Robert grinned and looked down at you before gently scooping you up to your surprise. "Hey! What the-"

Robby looked around and saw Mittens coming in the kitchen.....perfect.

Robby went over to Mittens, who mewed up at him, Robby leaned down with you in his hand and put you on the enormous cat's back. You held onto Mittens' collar for support. Robert stood back so Al could see. Al chuckled and so did you as Mittens began to walk around.

choices: Roy does it and sucks up some sweat as well
1521111211212212121111122211222211212211.content:
Roy had managed to climb down Ed's pants, he collapsed on the hardwood floor and panted, but he wasn't able to rest for long before Edward sat down before him and propped his foot up on the heel in front of Roy. "Good job with the climbing! Now get to worshiping my mighty foot!" Ed laughed as he waved his giant bare foot from side to side in Roy's face.

Roy groaned and stood back up on his aching legs. He trudged up to Ed's sole, put his hands onto the soft squishy sole and looked up past Ed's toes to his face. Ed was grinning evilly down at him, "Kiss it and suck up any sweat you find." Ed commanded.

Roy sighed, took a deep breath (which caused his eyes to water a bit due to the overwhelming stink) and lowered his face to the dripping wet dirty sole.

Roy puckered his lips and gave Ed's sole a slight peck. However just as Roy was going to lift his befouled lips off the dirt covered sole he felt Ed's finger on the back of his head press his face deep into his flesh. "Pucker up and give it a big smooch! Ha ha ha!" Ed laughed loudly.
1521111211212212121111122211222211212211.title: Meanwhile With Ed and Roy

choices: Roy gives in and does it.
1521111211212212121111122211222211212211.content:
Roy knew nothing good ever came from refusing the blond titan, so with much hesitancy, he puckered up and gave Ed’s sole a big smooch. Ed kept his finger pressed against his slave’s head so he wouldn’t chicken out half-way through the act. As Roy continued to make out with his former underling’s sole, he felt the need for some air and accidentally sucked in a large portion of foot sweat. He gagged and choked and the giant Ed felt his slave fight against his finger. Understanding what the Colonel had done, Ed laughed and let the alchemist have some air. Roy pushed himself off the sweaty sole and coughed hysterically. When he was done, he grabbed both his knees for support and took a breather. Ed watched the entire thing from his seated position.

“What’s the matter, Colonel Insect? I thought someone with your looks would be a better kisser.” Ed said, failing to flatter the smaller male. “Take a breath and then get back to work! I want you to kiss as much of my sole as you can reach at your measly height.”

Roy nodded and when he had caught his breath, walked back over to his master’s sole to continue. When he had pressed himself back against it and began giving every inch he could reach a quick peck, he realized how quickly he had agreed to Ed’s demand. The old him would have at least expressed his distaste somehow. Was he starting to become adapted to this life as a slave? No way! That was impossible!

As Roy thought about his situation, Ed watched the tiny bug plant kiss after kiss onto his filthy sole. Even though he wasn’t smooching it anymore, Ed could tell Mustang wasn’t enjoying a moment of this. Still, he put up less of a fight then usual, so perhaps he was finally starting to break. It was only a matter of time before the torture and humiliation became too great and the Flame Alchemist broke completely. He would soon BEG for the chance to smell his feet.

After several minutes of watching the small alchemist kiss away, Ed moved his foot so Roy was no longer leaning against it. He positioned his big toe right in front of Roy’s face and wiggled it.

“One last smooch for my toe, Roy. Give it a nice wet one!”

Roy resisted showing his anger at Ed and just looked at the floor. He couldn’t find the courage to stand up to someone who could destroy him with just the toe he was being asked to kiss. He wanted to glare at Ed, but he feared worse torture. Without giving himself any more time to hesitate, Roy pressed himself against the big toe and pressed his lips to it. Ed shuddered in pleasure as he felt the bug use his tongue to brush against his sensitive skin. When Roy was finished, he pulled back and a trail of spit/sweat connected him to the toe. Ed laughed out loud and wiped the saliva off his toe.

“Good job, slave. You’re starting to get the hang of this.” Ed said before glancing over at the clock. “If I’m right, Al should be calling me for dinner any minute now. Before he does, how about you and me make another deal?”

“What is it this time?” Roy asked as he wiped his mouth off in his sleeve.

“It’s simple. I want you to get on your knees and verbally tell me how small and pathetic you are and how big and awesome your master is!”

“Wha-? What?!” Roy yelled, shocked. Ed had humiliated him to no end, and now he wanted him to humiliate himself?

“If you do, I’ll let you sleep somewhere nice tonight. If you don’t, then I’m going to tie you to my foot for the night! It’s your choice.” Roy watched as the giant picked himself off the floor and planted both his humongous feet on either side of him. Ed put his hands on his hips and stared down at the shrunken colonel. “Make your decision, bug. Your god is waiting…”
1521111211212212121111122211222211212211.title: Breaking Roy
