Al has to get started on dinner.
1521111211212212121111122211222211212211.content:
"Maybe we can be more than just friends?"

“Yeah, I’d like--wait, what?”

Before you could fully understand what Al had just asked, you noticed his face start to get closer and closer. It was now mere inches from you and you felt the alchemist’s lips gently brush against your forehead. He carefully pressed his perfect lips against you…he was kissing you. It only lasted a second before Al brought his face away and noticed the puzzled expression on you. The giant blushed and turned his head away from you, avoiding eye contact.

“I-I’m sorry. I shouldn’t have done that.” Al said, looking at the floor.

“N-no, it’s alright. I…I kinda liked it.” you reply, blushing a bit as you touched your forehead. It had become slightly damp from the giant’s lips.

“R-really?” Al asked, surprised and turning his sights back on you.

“Yeah…um…do you think…I could kiss you too?” you stutter, softly enough that Al almost didn’t hear you.

“Um…sure. That’d be fine.” Al once again lowered his face down to you until his lips were leveled with you. You walked across the younger Elric’s palm until you could hug his bottom lip and give it a quick kiss of your own. The two of you separated again and Al touched his lips with his fingers.

“Wow…that was my first kiss.”

“Yeah, mine too.” you say, also touching your lips. “So…does this make us a couple?”

“What? No! I mean…maybe. Would you mind if I was your giant boyfriend?” Al questioned, laughing nervously.

“Not at all. Would you mind if I was your tiny boyfriend?”

Al looked like he was about to cry and just shook his head. The next thing you knew, the hand you were standing on rushed toward Al’s body as your new boyfriend hugged your small form. You giggled and snuggled into the boy’s chest, listening to his heart beat underneath his shirt.

“I love you, Al.”

“I love you too, Matt.”

Al gave you another smooch to the top of the head as the two of you just stayed in that position for a while.
1521111211212212121111122211222211212211.title: Big on Love

choices: Ed takes Al out for dinner, leaving the slaves alone at home.
Ed looks at Albert hungrily. He may need to be washed, but...
1521111211212212121111122211222211212211.content:
Ed was furious the entire way home. This was bad news for Albert, who felt each one of the giant alchemist’s stomps as he matched across the sidewalk. By the time Ed reached the apartment, Albert felt like his body would collapse under Ed’s foot after just a few more minutes. As Edward walked through the door, he noticed his brother wasn’t waiting for him like usual. The light was on in his bedroom, so he was probably in there. Too pissed off to even greet his brother, Ed stormed into his room, shut his door, and started stripping off his jacket and boots, removing the two shrunken males in the process. Roy and Albert were roughly discarded onto Ed’s messy bed like a couple of toys. Roy struggled a bit to get back to his feet, still covered with Ed’s pit sweat. There was nothing he could do to wipe himself off, and Ed would surely get angry if he tried cleaning himself with the bed sheets. Albert, on the other hand, did not have the physical strength of a military officer and couldn’t even manage to sit up. The tiny teen was far too exhausted to do anything but take in the fresh air.

Ed, in his tank top, put his hand son his hips and glared down at his two slaves. With a sinister smile, he said, “Well, bugs, in case the ride home wasn’t enough to show you, I’m really pissed off right now. I need a couple slaves to help relieve me of some stress.”

“Do your worse!” Roy shouted up, surprising Ed a little bit. “I heard your entire conversation with Sullivan. He’s on to you and it’s only a matter of time before you’re caught!”

Ed just grinned at Roy, not showing any worry, and replied, “On any other day, I probably would punish you for using that tone of voice with me immediately. Lucky for you, I still have to teach my new slave a few things.”

Albert’s eyes shot open a she heard this, knowing the giant was referring to him. No matter how much he told his limbs to move, they would not budge. He just watched with teary eyes as Ed grinned down at him and picked him up with his automail hand. As he brought the small criminal to his face, he raised his human arm over his head and burrowed his face into his armpit. A few seconds later, he recoiled in disgust with some grease smeared on his nose.

“Pee-yew! It reeks in there, even after Roy spent a couple hours soaking up the sweat. I guess I need some deodorant.” Ed finished his sentence by giving Albert a nasty smile. The tiny, frightened man practically gapped.

“N-no! Please don’t! I don’t want to!” Albert pleaded, struggling weakly in Ed’s iron-like grip. The blond teen ignored his protests and sin one quick movement, shoved the shrunken slave into his sweaty pit. The Fullmetal Alchemist started rubbing Albert into in armpit just like he would a stick of deodorant. He listened to his slave scream in desperation and responded to it by twisting the boy into his slightly hairy pit, shutting him up nicely. As he continued to apply his “deodorant” to his smelly underarm, the cruel giant walked over to his mirror and watched himself. He smugly smiled back at himself, as if saying “You’re one BIG guy, Edward. Everyone else are bugs to you!”

After several minutes of taking his frustration out on the scumbag, Ed felt like Albert had soaked up most of his sweat and tossed him onto the bed. The teen was barely conscious, his skin bright red from the heat of Ed’s pit and his clothes drenched in his sweat.

“You’re turn, Colonel Insect!” Ed said as he reached for Roy, but a loud rumbling sound stopped him. It took him a few moments to realize it was his own stomach. He touched his gut as a frowned spread across his face. “I was having so much fun with you bugs that I completely forgot I didn’t even eat lunch today!” Ed glanced over at the clock and noted it read 9:30 PM. “It’s dinner time too…I need something to eat…”
1521111211212212121111122211222211212211.title: Albert Just Can't Catch a Break

choices: Al Takes Them Home (Restrained) And Has Ed Shrink Them
1521111211212212121111122211222211212211.content:
Al was walking down the sidewalk, humming a tune and fingering Mittens' new red collar with the cute little golden bell that jingled as he walked. As Al imagined how cute Mittens would look in his new collar, He heard a clicking noise coming from the alley to his side.

He peeked into the dark alley and saw a gang of thugs surrounding an old man. He noticed the man was laying on his back, shaking. One thug held a switchblade, the one next to him held a bat, the last thug held a pistol that he was pointing at the man.

Al drew a transmutation circle on the ground and clapped his hands, gaining the three thugs' attention. He smirked as he placed his hands on the transmutation circle, from which two large stone hands formed and closed around the thugs, trapping their arms at their sides and holding them. Al walked around the thugs and helped the stunned old man up. "You okay sir?" Al asked with a friendly smile.

"Yes, thank you young man!" The old man said shaking Al's hand.

Al grinned and rubbed the back of his head sheepishly, "No problem!" The old man walked out of the alley and Al watched him til he was safely out of sight and earshot. Then he turned to the helpless thugs, "Now....What to do with you three?"

The leader with the gun shouted curses at Al, as did the rest of the muggers. Al simply grinned evilly and swiped their weapons.

"I have the perfect punishment for you three."
1521111211212212121111122211222211212211.title: The Thugs

choices: They give the thugs to Mittens to play with.
1521111211212212121111122211222211212211.content:
“I’m bringing you three home with me. You need to be punished, and I’m sure my big brother knows how to do it.” Al said, tossing the weapons aside and getting a closer look at the three thugs. They were all young, perhaps in their late teens or early twenties. They were just your average troublemakers who had lived rotten lives.

“What?! You can’t do that!” one of the young men shouted, but Al simply ignored him and transmuted the stone hands around them. He dissolved the sculptures down until they formed a new shape: three pairs of handcuffs that bound the thugs’ hands together. They were all attached to each other via some stone chains, so the men couldn’t scatter.

“You guys follow me and don’t try to escape. Not unless you want to be smushed by another stone hand.” AL flashed them another evil grin and turned back they way he came. The thugs reluctantly followed, not wanting to suffer the alchemist’s wrath again. Little did they know it was nothing compared to the wrath that was going to be inflicted on them soon…

“So what’s your names?” Al asked as they made their way to his apartment.

“David.” answered one thug.

“Leon.” answered another.

The third thug, the leader, kept his mouth shut.

“Not going to tell me yours? That’s okay, I guess. Mine is Al, by the way.”

“Al?” blurted the leader. “As in Alphonse Elric? Edward Elric’s brother?”

“Yep, that’s me. I’m taking you to see him right now.” Al told them, grinning toothily. The three thugs suddenly became really fearful. They had heard stories of the Fullmetal Alchemist, and now they were going to be punished by him? What rotten luck…

Eventually Al made it to the apartment building and walked up the stairs with his three followers. He opened the door leading to his apartment and spotted Ed still studying.

“I’m home, brother.” Al said, making Ed look his way. His eyes fell on his brother first…and then his three companions. In chains.

“Alphonse, explain. Now.” Ed ordered. “Bringing home a kitten is one thing, but you can’t just bring every street urchin you find home!”

“It’s not like that, Ed. These guys were robbing an old man! I stopped them and brought them here to be punished, if you know what I mean.”

Ed’s lips curved into a smirk as he replied, “Nice thinking, little bro. Mind helping me in the kitchen?”

“Sure thing.” Al watched his brother stand up and leave the room. The younger Elric called Mittens over and put the new collar around the feline pet. He pet the small animal a few times before following his brother into the kitchen. The group of thugs were left in the living room, alone save for the small kitten. Mittens gave the three men a glance and hissed at them.

A few minutes later, the Elrics returned holding a few glasses of water. Ed held two in his hands while Al carried one.

“You guys look like you could use a drink. How about some water?”

“Forget it! That stuff’s probably poisoned or something!”

“Poisoned? Yeah right. Have you ever heard the Fullmetal Alchemist using poison? Tell you what; just drink the water and you can leave.” The older Elric lied. The three thugs gave each other a glance and finally agreed to take the liquid. Even with their hands bound, they could still hold the glasses up to their mouths to take a drink. The water tasted funny, but the three thought nothing of it.

“You know, you’re a lot shorter than I thought.” one of thugs said as he handed his glass back to Ed.

“Ooh, you really shouldn’t have said that.” Ed said with a smirk, just as the three began to shrink. While they had once been looking down at Ed, they now found themselves looking up at him. The cuffs around their wrists slipped off and hit the floor with a loud clang. The three young thugs continued to dwindle down until they had shrunk to the same size as Roy. Before the thugs could even realize what had happened, they noticed Ed lift his human foot off the floor and hover it over the thug that had called him short. With a quick stomp, the foolish male was pinned under Ed’s sole.

“Now who’s short?” Ed asked, squeezing the smaller boy’s head with his toes and making him scream for mercy. The other two boys looked up in shock and confusion.

“What did you do to us?!” another one of the thugs shouted up at the giant teen. Ed responded by raising his automail foot over him and stomping down on him too, pinning him under it. It didn’t smell like his flesh foot, but the pressure was immense. It would only take a tiny bit of strength to pop the thug like a grape.

“We shrunk you, losers!” Ed told them, wiggling his metal toes. “And now you’re going to be punished for picking on a defenseless old man! You were probably going to kill him, weren’t you? You deserve to be stains on our feet or just some more meat in our stomachs!”

“Please, no!’ begged the leader, the only one left not being pressed into the floor by a giant foot. “We weren’t going to kill him! We were just roughing him up a bit!”

“I can tell you’re lying. We’ll see how good you are as slaves before we decided on your fate.” Al told the smaller, older man. “What to do first…”
1521111211212212121111122211222211212211.title: Thugs to Bugs

1521111211212212121111122211222211212211.content:
"Screw that!" The leader yelled and ran for the door, abandoning his buddies. Ed was about to go after him, when who else but Mittens ran in front of the fleeing man, probably thinking he was a mouse that his owners had neglected to pin under their feet. The leader stopped dead in his tracks as he saw the gigantic kitten loomed over him, staring down at him with those cat eyes, he looked ferocious at that size, worse, he looked hungry!

Ed looked down in surprise, he couldn't help but chuckle at the evil man's situation. "Little man, meet Mittens!" Ed laughed evilly. Al didn't know whether to help the man or let his cat eat him.

The thug leader turned and ran in the other direction, towards the boys' feet. The cat was right behind him, he could hear it's thundering footsteps. So he took a literal leap of faith and dove forward....landing his face between Ed's recently washed, but still foul toes. His legs were kicking and hitting David, who was still under the same foot, in the face.

The other two who were underneath Ed's feet, shuddered in fear at their leader's muffled screams of horror and despair. Ed however, clutched his gut in laughter. "WAHAHAHAHAHAHA!" Ed's thunderous and ear shattering laughter made the two cringe.

Mittens however looked disappointed at his lost meal, he meowed sadly up at Al who smiled, "Aww....Don't worry Mittens, I'll fill up your bowl and you can eat that okay?" Al chuckled, picking up the kitten and taking him into the kitchen.

Ed finally stopped laughing and realized that the man was smothering, he spread his toes and let the man fall back on top of David. The man's face was covered in greasy sweat from Ed's feet. Ed lifted one foot off of David, and lifted the other off of Leon. He picked them all up in his human fist, and took them over to the couch.
1521111211212212121111122211222211212211.title: Meeting Mittens

1521111211212212121111122211222211212211.content:
Al came back, to find Ed holding the three men in his iron like grip while he thought about what to do with them.

"What do you think we should do with them Al?" Ed asked as his brother sat down next to him on the couch. Al glared down at the men, "We should make them pay for what they did....We've already got one slave each, however if we both had two that would still leave one unaccounted for." Al said thinking it over.

"How about we dispose of the last one?" Ed said looking up at Al with a gleam in his eyes.

"Well...since they were going to do that to the old man....I guess it would be a good punishment...and it would show them that we won't tolerate them doing bad things." Al said showing his darker, more calculating side.

Ed nodded, "But the question is how?"

"We'll cross that bridge when we come to it Ed...Right now...lets decide who should get the shaft."

"I think it should be the leader, since he's the one who's obviously been teaching these boys how to harm people." Ed said looking back down to the shocked and horrified leader.

"Not to mention he tried to run away." Al added.

"So...it's decided....Their fearless leader is going to be the one who is done in." Ed said.

It was a right nasty business, and neither boy took any pleasure in even discussing it. But they knew it had to be done. The man was a manipulating creep, nobody would miss him.

Now the only question was...who and how?
1521111211212212121111122211222211212211.title: Al Comes Back

choices: The brothers play with their slaves together.
The brothers head for their separate rooms with their slaves.
1521111211212212121111122211222211212211.content:
"Ed, I don’t mind being the one to do it.” Al told his brother as he looked down at the frightened leader.

“No, Al, I think I should. The only thing you have to do is watch…unless you don’t want to.”

“No, I can’t look weak in front of our slaves. I’ll sit here and watch.”

“Alright, let’s get started then.” Ed used his automail hand to grab the leader by his head and tug him free of his tight grip. He then held the young creep in his metal fist and looked at him sternly. The elder Elric licked his lips and spoke, “I don’t usually eat dirty filth, but it’s the easiest way to do away with you without leaving much of a mess.”

“No, please! I just did the things I did to get by! You can’t end my life after everything I’ve had to go through!”

“Your own rotten life doesn’t give you the right to make others suffer. I doubt they had anything to do with your situation. I can see it in your eyes; you’ve killed people before, haven’t you?”

The leader stuttered a bit, but didn’t deny it.

“Well that settles it. Scum like you is better off this way. Down the hatch!” Ed exclaimed before opening his mouth wide and bringing the leader closer to it. The thug struggled and screamed curses, attempting to free himself from Ed’s metallic grip. His efforts ended in failure and he was casually tossed into the teenager’s mouth. Ed shut his jaws and sloshed the creep around his wet mouth. He continued to struggle to survive even when Ed tilted his head back and took a big gulp. The two other horrified thugs and Alphonse watched as Ed’s Adam’s Apple bobbed and a small bump made its way down the alchemist’s throat. Ed tracked its position with his finger until he couldn’t feel it anymore. He was in his stomach now.

“Not bad for scum.” Ed commented, rubbing his stomach through his shirt. “I can feel the little shit moving.”

Al leaned over and lifted his brother’s shirt up, pressing his ear against the six pack.

“I can hear him screaming. He sounds like he’s in pain.” Al said, taking his head away and frowning a bit.

“Good. Think about what you’ve done while you digest, bitch.” Ed gave his gut one last pat before he started to ignore the struggles. “Where’s the other two squirts, by the way?”

“Right here.” Al reached into his pocket and fished out their other two slaves. Both of you had heard everything that had happened and were equally as horrified as the thugs.

“I can’t believe you, Fullmetal.” Roy said, glaring from the blond’s stomach to his face. “Who do you think you are?!”

“I think we settled that awhile ago. I’m your master, and I was just disposing of a useless slave. I thought about doing that to you a few times, you know.” Ed replied, making Roy shut up. You, on the other hand, believed that what the Elrics had done was the right thing. They had done the city a favor, so how could anyone complain?

“Anyway, time to decide on which of the remaining thugs we get as our personal slaves. I did away with their boss, so I choose first.”

“That’s fine. I’m okay with either of them.” Al said, grinning down at the two thugs. They had just witnessed their leader get eaten and now they were going to be turned into slaves? Weren’t their lives already bad enough?

Ed examined both the thugs and found little difference between the two. They both appeared to be the same age, with David having longer hair than Leon. They both looked fit enough to be good slaves, too.

“I guess I’ll take you.” Ed said, choosing David and tossing Leon into Al’s hand. He brought the older boy up to his face and smirked at him. “I haven’t finished paying you back for calling me short.”
1521111211212212121111122211222211212211.title: Eating Filth

choices: Al begins to break Leon in.
1521111211212212121111122211222211212211.content:
“Better start breaking these boys in while they still have the image of their leader falling in their minds.” Ed told his little brother, taking Roy and standing up with a slave in either hand. “I’m heading to my room for some privacy. That alright with you, Al?”

“Yeah, I’ll head to my room too.” the taller Elric replied, getting to his feet with Leon and you in hand. The two boys nodded to each other and left for their rooms, which were on opposite ends of the apartment.

*Edward*

The Fullmetal Alchemist entered his bedroom, locked the door, and jumped onto his bed. Ed placed both the slaves by his giant, bare foot and smiled down at them. Roy knew what was coming.

“Okay, slaves, time for a foot rub. With both of you rubbing, it’s sure to feel great!”

“Forget it! I’m not rubb-”

“Don’t bother.” Roy cut in, already rubbing Ed’s greasy foot with his hands. “If you protest, you’ll just make it harder on yourself.”

“What? Aren’t you the Flame Alchemist? How can you give into this kid so easily?!” David asked, lowering his voice a bit.

“How? Just look at him, stupid. You want to end up in his gut like your boss?”

David gave no countermark and sighed heavily. He began to help Mustang with the foot rub, knowing that refusal meant the possibility of becoming Fullmetal crap. He looked past the foot at Ed, who was laying back and resting. The teen’s hand moved to his stomach and scratched under his shirt. A quick burp escaped his lips.

*Alphonse*

Al sat down on his bed and placed his slaves next to him. He started to untie his boots while Leon just backed away as much a she could from the titanic teen. You looked over at the older boy and said, “Don’t worry, Al’s a good master. You’re safer in his hands then you are in Ed’s.”

“Safe? Did you miss the part where his brother SWALLOWED Ulrich?! Aren‘t you worried about him doing that to you?”

“Ulrich? So that was your leader’s name?” Al asked as he tugged off one of his socks, sending sock fuzz everywhere. How much did he have in those things?

“Don’t worry, he won’t do that to me. I’m a slave with benefits.” you smiled, somewhat proud of your title.

“Slave with…what?” Leon asked, dumbfounded. Before you could answer, Al picked both of you up and placed you each on a knee. He was sitting cross-legged.

“So, Leon, tell me about yourself. How did you end up with a creep like Ulrich?” the innocent boy asked. Leon wasn’t fooled by that innocent look, though. He knew the young teen could change at any moment. Still, he decided to tell his story. No one had ever asked him to talk about it before.

“Well, Ulrich found me about a year ago. My family was killed in a fire and I had just lost my job. I was…going to kill me boss in anger, but Ulrich stopped me. He said it wasn’t worth it.”

“That was…nice of him.” Al said, believing that Ed’s snack hadn’t been totally evil. A shake of Leon’s head told him otherwise, though.

“No, a few days later I found out the place had been robbed and the guy was murdered. Ulrich never said anything, but I somehow knew he was the one who did it.”

“Oh…so…have you ever…killed someone?”

“No, never. Ulrich was the one who always did it.’ Leon explained, looking up at Al and noticing the boy’s face had changed from pity to anger.

“But you could have stopped him all those times! You just let him do the deeds. When he was pointing that gun at that old man, all you did was hold that switchblade!”

“I-I-I know. I’m really sorry.” Leon mumbled, bowing his head down. Al’s expression didn’t change, though.

“Yeah, whatever.” Al felt sorry for the boy, but couldn’t forgive him for what he’d done. It was like Ed said: he needed to break him in.
1521111211212212121111122211222211212211.title: Two Very Different Masters

choices: Ed wants you to spent more time with his feet.
1521112.content:
With you clutched in his hand, an idea suddenly pops into the young alchemist’s mind. He grins in excitement as he placed you on the floor near his shows. You watch in terror as he slowly starts to remove his shoes, revealing one socked foot and his “bare” metallic foot.

“Your first job is going to be worshiping my foot. You’ll look at it like it’s a god in itself, understand shrimp?” he asks from high above. You don’t say anything and he scowls at you. Raising his auto mail foot and stomping the ground, you snap out of your trance and nod up to him. Edward grins and starts to peel his sock off, even more slowly than his shoes as if to add dramatic effect. When the sock is completely off and tossed onto the bed somewhere, the now-bare foot lifts up so the sole is facing you like some kind of wall of flesh. From his seated position on the bed, Ed simply points at his foot while staring you down with his eyes. You don’t really know what to do, but you defiantly don’t want to make Ed angry. The first thought that comes to mind is to touch it, so you do so. Your hands touch Ed’s soft soles as they rub as much of it as your small size would allow. Ed seems pleased form the look of his face above you. You don’t really know what to think. The foot reeked like any teenage boy’s would, but the stench was somehow comforting. Rubbing the giant’s sole felt humiliating, but also kind of good. Before you new it, you had your face pressed into his sole just to get a good sniff of it. Ed saw this as was amused.

“Well, if you like to be that close to my foot…why don’t you lick it next?” Lick them? The thought seemed disgusting to you, but you were in no position to defy him. Therefore, you hesitantly stuck out your tongue and gave the foot its first worshiping lick. Ed felt this more than the rubbing and his foot twitched at the feeling. Again, you didn’t know what to make of this. The taste of pure, teenage boy sweat was all you could taste on the foot. Salty and warm…not your first choice for a drink. Neither the less, you continued to lick all the places you had rubbed. The foot worshiping went on for a full half-hour before something else happened.
1521112.title: Ed wants you to worship his feet.

choices: Ed keeps you in there awhile to prove his point
He lets you out and does something else with you
15211121.content:
Suddenly the foot was lifted away. You fell over onto your knees since you had been leaning pretty heavily into the foot. You looked up questioningly at Ed who smirks down at you.

"Don't worry squirt. I'm not done with you yet. We're just moving onto to the next event."

You get to your feet as Ed starts to pull off his shirt. You watch in amazement as the black material lifts away to reveal Ed's muscular torso. It was a breathtaking sight. Ed's may only be fifteen but his body was to die for. And if you weren't careful you very well might die for it. Ed doesn't waste time and quickly reaches down to scoop you up. You cringe and cover your head, feeling like that hand is going to come down and crush you into paste. Ed doesn't do this of course. His grip is gentle, for a metal hand anyway, but firm. It's a grip that clearly says you aren't going anywhere unless Ed approves. You feel your stomach drop as you ascend in a god like hand to Ed's face. He opens his fist and you gaze up once again into his golden orbs. He grins at you and says, "You liked being down by my feet didn't you?"

You almost shook your head and told him you didn't like it, but you both knew that would be an outright lie. You had willingly embraced and smelled his foot before licking it for half an hour. You did, in fact, like his feet. You nod and he laughs slightly. "Yeah, I knew you did. So when you're good you get to go to my feet. Sound good?"

Well...it was better than being dead...so you nod again.

"But," he raised a finger and waggled it threateningly. "if you're bad then you're going to end up somewhere else."

He lifted up his flesh and blood arm and revealed his pits. You barely notice that there's not even any hair there before the hand you're seated in slaps against the open pit. You feel moisture cover your body instantly, your mouth swimming in fluid. You can't even pull your head out to breathe so you take a big sniff of the area you're in. It reeks of sweat but it's not much worse than Ed's foot. You feel the pressure on your back alleviate as he pulls his hand away only to have it replaced by his arm as he closes you inside his pit.

"Whenever you do something that pisses me off, you'll go in there for punishment. Just don't ever piss me off too much or I might just skip over the jail time and get right to the execution if you catch my drift."

His voice was slightly muffled thanks to your position but, yeah, you caught his drift. You just hope you don't spend too much time encased in this sweaty, horribly hot prison. The air was so musky it was hard to breath.
15211121.title: If You're Bad...

choices: You are drenched in sweat and stench while Ed works out
Ed Feeling Merciful takes you out
152111211.content:
As you were trapped between Ed's side and his arm...effectively trapping you in his armpit, Ed laughed high above. "I'll just keep you there for awhile. Don't worry, you're not in trouble. Lets just say I'm breaking you in...heh." He said as he put his shirt and boots back on.

He walked out into the hallway, walking down until he came to a door which he proceeded to open. The room unknown to you was filled with weights and other fitness equipment. Ed's eyes twinkled as he walked over to the weights. He took off his shirt leaving him bare chested. Then he put as much weight on it as he wanted, and proceeded to lay on the bench.

Without warning, Ed starting to lift the heavy weighted down bar...
152111211.title: Ed keeps you in there awhile to prove his point

choices: Ed walks over to the punching bag.
Ed walks over to the pull-up bar.
1521112111.content:
Ed lifted the several pounds of weight with little effort. His metallic arm, as well as his trained muscles, allowed him to lift an amount that even a grown man would struggle with. While it didn’t appear that he was breaking a sweat, his pits were a different story. With each second that passed, the elder Elric finished another lift and each time his pit became hotter and more moist. With no hairs to entangle you, your small form was virtually glued to his flesh. When Ed’s arms stretched out to lift the weight, the pit opened up and allowed you a half second of light and air. The arms then came down again, smothering you in darkness and coming up once again with a soft squelch. You felt like a bug trapped the smelliest bug trap ever made. Edward pumped iron for a good ten minutes, meaning you were put through around 600 consecutive lifts of the weight before Ed finally placed it back on the hinges. By now his pit must have reeked like moldy cheese and you were red with your’s and Ed’s sweat. Mostly Ed’s.

Despite the sweat covering his pits, Ed didn’t seems exhausted at all. There were a few drops on his brow and some on his torso, but ultimately he was fine. The blond teen got up off the bench and grasped a bottle of water from a nearby crate. He took a few gulps of it and wiped his mouth with his arm. Before putting the bottle down, he lifted up his flesh and blood arm to get a look at you. The sight of you plastered to his pit amused him, but he didn’t want you dying on him or anything. Therefore, he poured some of the water over you and his pit. You happily lapped up as much of the liquid as you could as it seemed to wash away some of the sweat and smell.

“I hope you’re well enough to go on, cause I’m not nearly finished.” Ed told you as he put his arm back down again and looked around the room for his next workout.
1521112111.title: Pumping Iron

15211121112.content:
Ed put the bottle down and you were once again encased in darkness. The water that had been splashed over you had actually unglued you somewhat from the pit. You can feel yourself slowly slide downward but quickly stop before you get out of the pit. All in all you slid maybe a handful of centimeters before being firmly glued back in place. While this was going on Ed had made his way over to the pull up bar against the far wall. When he reached up to grab the bar you were awarded another look at the outside though it wasn't a very long look as Ed quickly lifted himself up his arm coming down to cover you once again.

For the next ten minutes it was pretty much the same repetitions as when Ed was bench pressing. Hot smelly moist darkness, brief clean light and air, back to hot smelly moist darkness. The only difference was that instead of just his arms moving his whole body was. You started to get dizzy as you were plunged in and out of darkness and up and down without stop. The experiences left one thought screaming in your mind. Never, ever, piss Ed off. If this was what it meant for disobeying an order there was no way you'd do it. Of course, this is exactly why Ed is keeping you where you are.

Finally Ed finished his workout on the pull up bar. He was still looking pretty fresh though and quickly moved on to the next workout.
15211121112.title: Up and Down

choices: "Oh yeah, I got something to show you Al!"
Ed goes and takes a shower with you
152111211121.content:
After a round with the punching bag, Ed could've still gone on....But after sniffing himself and seeing the pitiful state you were in....He took A BIT of pity on his servant and peeled you out of the stinking armpit. You were literally dripping with Ed's pit sweat and you reeked like any young man's armpit would after a long workout without deodorant. He took a sniff of you and laughed, "Jeez, you smell like my armpit! Heh heh! I think you've had enough demonstration of my wrath for now anyway." He smirked as you looked up at him with watery eyes, though whether it was sweat or tears neither of you could tell.

Just then a door could be heard opening. Ed looked down at you, "I think I'll hide you for now...." He said as he spread two of his toes apart and wedged you between them, effectively making you a piece of toejam. His human foot smelled horrible, you couldn't get any pleasure from it this time, it was drenched in sweat and still dripping. His foot made a squishy sound whenever he lifted it from the floor, and left a moist foot print behind.

Ed went into the hall to find his brother struggling with several groceries, "Al! You always get too much..." Ed said putting his hands on his hips. "H-Hey Ed! You been working out I see, While I had to do all the real work." Al said heading into the kitchen where he put the bags on the counter.

Ed shook his head, winking down at your pathetic form between his toes. "Ugh...Ed don't come in here! I can smell your odor from the kitchen! You'll spoil the food! Take a shower already!" Al said teasing his brother about his sweaty smell after a workout.

Ed rolled his eyes....
152111211121.title: Punching bag

1521112111211.content:
Al sighed, "What is it now brother? I've got groceries to put away!" He said as he watched his brother pluck something out from between his toes. "Is that what I think it is?" Al said with a look of disgust on his face. "Depends on what you think it is!" Ed said with a sly smirk.

Al came over and got a good look at you, "*Sniff, Sniff* EWW! It stinks Ed!" Al said plugging his nose.
"Duh! I just had him in my armpits and between my toes!" Ed said to Al's disgust.

1521112111211.title: "Oh yeah, I got something to show you Al!"

15211121112112.content:
Al looked at you more closely and his young face filled with shock. “Whoa, seriously?! I guess you’re not crazy after all, brother.”

Ed nodded, but then paused for a moment. “Wait…you thought I was crazy?!” As the two Elric brothers argued with each other, you watched from within Ed’s enclosed fist. Alphonse looked kind of like is brother, but a lot nicer. Surely that young, innocent boy wouldn’t think of treating you like a slave too, right? Maybe this was your chance at freedom!

The younger Elric brother stopped arguing with his brother and looked back down at you with his brown eyes. He was wearing his typical smile, which seemed to keep you at ease. Then, suddenly, without warning, his mouth curved into a wicked smile. It was the total opposite of his expression a few moments ago.

“So, I guess he’s our slave now, right?” he asks, reaching a hand out to touch you. Ed pulled you out of his reach, much to his little brother’s dismay.

“Hold it, when did I ever say he was yours? I said I’d share you with him, but that’s it.”

Al gave his brother an annoyed glare and mumbled his response. “Can I at least hold on to him while you’re taking a shower? You seriously need one.”

“I don’t know…I was going to take him in with me. He needs one too, being in my armpit the entire time.” Ed says with a grin, winking at you. You shuddered from the recent memory.

“Edward, you’re a mass of male odor that’s stinking up our kitchen. He’s only noticeable if you bring him up close.” explained the young boy.

“Okay…fine. But be careful and don’t do something stupid.” Ed instructed as he handed his brother his new slave. Al happily grabbed you and held you in front of his face with both hands. Ed smiled at is brother’s interest in you and left the kitchen, leaving you two alone. After scanning your tiny body, All placed you down on the kitchen counter and looked straight down at you.

“So, tell me your name.” he requested. “I could just call you ‘bug’ or ‘slave’, if that’s what you want.”

“Um…it’s…Matt.” you answered shyly.

“Okay, Matt. Nice to meet you. Just because you’re a slave now doesn’t mean we can’t be friends, right?” Al smiled before walking away, leaving you on the counter. He started taking groceries out of the bags and putting them away. You stood there on the counter, thinking about what to do next.

He spotted you! He grinned evilly as he plucked you up roughly, "Aha! There you are! You've been a bad slave, Matt! I'm going to have to punish you!" Al said as he....

No, not punishment. You prayed silently that he wouldn’t put you in his armpits like his brother said he would. Thankfully, Alphonse instead started to slowly step out of his two leather shoes, revealing his two socked feet. As you watched this from within his hands, you started to prepare yourself for more foot play. Al saw the fright in you and only smiled, imagining what his brother must have done to him while he was out. Al took a seat near the kitchen table and dropped you on the tiled floor, right in front of his socked feet. You were too frightened to move, so you just sat there and waited for Al’s next move. The young Elric slowly lifted his feet above your shaking form before covering you with them. You were forced onto your back as the two soles behind a thin, soft layer incased you in darkness. Al didn’t make any moves after that, just allowing his feet to rest on you.

Go ahead.” Al started to apply more pressure on you, smushing you deeper into the cotton of his socks. Understanding, you reluctantly breathed in the stench of Al’s feet. It was no rose bush, but it did in fact smell a lot better than Edward’s. Al must have really good personal hygiene. You weren’t surprised, since he had to go without a body for along while and wanted to take care of this one as much as he could. Al felt you breathing in his odor and grinned at the power he had over you. Ed must have had a ball.

Just then Ed walked into the room with a towel wrapped around his waist. He had obviously hurried his shower and was dripping wet. He spotted you and Al having some "quality time" and just chuckled. "Way to go Al! You breaking him in?" He asked as he came and sat down near the table with his bro.

Al smiled at his wet brother. "He tried to escape so I'm punishing him. And Ed?"

"Hm?"

"Go get dressed!" Al sighed shooing his half naked brother away. Ed rolled his eyes and walked out of the room, "Oh and by the way.....It's more effective if you use your bare feet." He smirked as he walked out. Al pondered this for a moment, he didn't want to be TOO cruel to you. But you did try to escape him.

You stared up at the younger Elric blankly. “R-really?”

“Sure. I’ll even recommend to me brother we give you a break. Sound like a deal?” You thought about it, and it’s not like you had a choice. If you refused, Al would only do something worse and then you’d have to suffer both brothers’ wrath later on. The answer being clear, you nodded your head and Al covered you with his feet like before. “Get smelling, slave!”

Keeping your arms to your side, you leaned up and took a long sniff of his bare soles. It took everything you could muster not to puke right then and there. Al probably wouldn’t like that very much. Instead you cringed and shook like a poison had just been introduced into your system. As you recovered, you hoped you’d develop an immunity to this poison called foot odor. You took another sniff of the foul air contained in your prison and similar effects occurred. How much did you have to smell before Al was satisfied? Only seconds after thinking that, Al pushed his feet deeper into you and your nose was pushed into the soles. There was no escape and you were forced to experience a never-ending torrent of foot odor that sank up your nostrils. Sweat dripped down from the feet and onto your already desecrated clothes. Only seconds passed, but they felt like minutes. If this continued any longer you’d die of suffocation. Thankfully, Al’s feet lifted off you and you gasped for fresh air. Your face was beat red and you looked as if you were drunk the way you stumbled to your knees. Al watched this display and started to think their slave was finally reaching his limits.

15211121112112211122.content:
You wake up to the sound of two voices arguing, although you can’t make out what they’re saying despite the volume of their voices. You do, however, notice two things upon waking up. First, you’re slightly wet and no longer smell like a decaying corpse. Second, you’re nude. You blush when you notice you’re laying down on someone’s palm. You crane your neck and look up to see that it’s Edward’s hand. He seems to be scolding his brother, who’s sitting down with his arms crossed.

“Look. Al. Just because he’s our slave doesn’t mean he isn’t alive. If you pressure him too much before he’s ready you’re gonna kill him!” Ed explained to his brother, who’s eyes drifted back and forth from the floor to his bro.

“I know.” responded Al. “I was just having a little fun. I wasn’t trying to hurt him or anything.” Ed sighed and used his metal hand to ruffle Al’s hair.

“I know you weren’t, little bro. Just be more careful next time.” Ed said with a smile. Al smiled back and nodded. Ed looked down at you and noticed you had awoken. “Oh, you’re awake. I gave you a quick bath while you were unconscious. I bet you’re really tired…”

You gave a weak nod and Ed started to make his way toward the brothers’ bedroom. Al, meanwhile, stayed in the kitchen and started to prepare dinner. When Ed arrived in the bedroom, he placed your naked form onto one of the blue-sheeted beds and started searching through his closet of clothes. You simply sat there with your hands covering your privates. Ed removed himself from the closet carrying a white shirt with black stripes, which he laid down next to you. “Stand on this.”

Obeying, you picked yourself up and walked onto the shirt. Not really know what the elder brother had planned, you stood in the middle of the garment and looked up at your blonde master. Ed clapped his hands together and touched the bottom of the shirt. The alchemic reaction flowed across the clothing and around you. Although it looked like electricity, it didn’t hurt at all. You watched shockingly as the clothing began to curl around your bare skin. A few seconds later the transmutation ended and you were left standing in a hole shaped like a shirt and pair of pants. You found yourself wearing a pair of simple black pants and a white shirt. You weren’t wearing any underwear and nothing was protecting your bare feet, but it was better than nothing.

“How do you like it? I tried to get the size right.” Ed said as he discarded the now ruined shirt.

“It’s fine, thanks.”

“Good.” Ed looked at his watch and then back down at you. “You know, it’s partially your fault. If you weren’t so weak you could have remained conscious despite Al’s ’fun’.” You didn’t say anything and just looked down with a saddened expression. Despite his kindness, Ed still thought of you as nothing but his slave. “Don’t worry. I’ll shape you into a tough slave worthy of being owned by the Elric Brothers. Hopefully, anyway.” You worried about what would happen if you couldn’t meet Ed’s satisfaction. “Anyway, I’ll leave you here awhile to rest and come back when dinner’s ready. Don’t even think about trying to escape; I have no problem with killing you if you aren’t going to be obedient.” You nodded, but Ed had already turned around to see your agreement. After he left, you laid down to try and get some rest.

Ed walked into the living room, which was empty save for some lamps and book shelves. He grabbed some papers on a nearby side table and started writing on them. They were reports to the state military. Al just finished putting their dinner, a pan of lasagna, in the stove. The apartment was quiet and kind of peaceful, despite the torture you had gone through the past few hours.

You held onto the giant teen’s toes as his feet pounded down the hall toward another door. Entering it, you took notice how the bathroom looked quite nice for an apartment one. “Well, we’re both kind of cheesy. Makes sense that you’ll join me in my shower. I mean, I don’t want my slave to be smelly all the time. So, hurry up and get those clothes off.” You gave him an odd look and he just cocked an eyebrow. “Don’t look at me like that. What do you do; take a shower with your clothes on? Hurry up and strip, or I’ll do it for you.” Ed grinned as he raised his hands toward you in a threatening matter. You got the idea and immediately started to remove your shirt. It was difficult since the sweat made it cling to your body. Ed was entertained with your struggling and started to unbuckle his pants. After getting the drenched shirt over your head, you watched Ed pull his leather pants down to his feet, revealing his boxers with a visible bulge in the front. Ed caught you staring and smiled. “Like what you see?” You became red and turned your head away while fiddling with your pants, getting them off with some effort. By this time Ed had already removed his boxers, so when you turned back around you--oh god, his dick is huge.

The young alchemist may not have been blessed with height, but when it came to muscles and package size he was like a god. You gaped at his naked and clearly superior form while he looked down at you in amusement. After removing the band in his hair and allowing his golden locks to come loose, the giant adolescent pointed down at you.

You sit there on the floor for several minutes simply observing the titanic form of the sleeping Edward. You try to figure out how to wake him up, but come to the conclusion that it's impossible. There was no way someone as tiny as you could get the attention of a sleeping giant. Maybe if he was awake…but asleep? A definite zero possibility. Your voice wouldn’t reach him nor would your fists resister with him if you banged on his boots. You weren’t even going to consider trying to climb the behemoth…

With one brother sleeping on the couch and another off grocery shopping, you decided your only option was to wait for an opportunity to get some help. At first you were just going to lie back where you sat, but quickly jumped to your feet when you realized it was dangerous to just sit out in the open like this. You might fall asleep and Ed or Al would step on you before you could even open your eyes. Therefore, there was only one thing to do; explore!

You turn away from the sleeping giant and make your way across the living room. As you walk you glance around at your surroundings and determine that this seems to be an apartment owned by the Elric brothers. Nether of the alchemists seemed to be good at decorating, since the room was fairly empty. There wasn’t even a rug under your feet; just a wooden floor. For an apartment, it had a fairly large kitchen. The two brothers must of enjoyed a lot of good meals in here…

However, the kitchen was just a kitchen. You’ve seen them before and wanted to explore more of the apartment. By the time you pass through the large doorway and out of the living room, a half hour has already passed since Edward fell asleep. Your tiny legs could only travel so far within a certain period of time.

You come to a stop and start breathing heavily. You never thought it would be this difficult to run across a room. As you catch your breath, you look around and see that you’re in a small hallway. There are at least four or five doors in the hall. Two of them were probably the brothers’ separate rooms, and another was defiantly a bathroom, but what about the others? How big was this apartment anyway? Edward’s State Alchemist status must come with good pay…

You decide you want to take a peek into one of the rooms and look to see if any of them are open. All of them were shut…save for one. One of the doors was open a crack and you were just barely able to squeeze yourself through. You enter the new room to find that it’s…

What immediately catches your eye about this room are the overflowing bookshelves that line the walls. The room is full of stacks of books threatening to fall over and crush you! They seem to be books ranging from pleasure to study.

You spot Frankenstein at one point, mixed in with several books on alchemy.

You were always a reader, and if you were normal size this place would qualify as your personal heaven. As you drift through the mountains of books you don't seem to hear the door finish opening behind you and a yawning Edward step in.

Edward rubbed his eyes as he stepped into their personal library, once he cleared the crust out of his eyes he realized he would have a hell of a time finding what he wanted in this mess. He groaned, "Sigh....Guess we'll have to organize this place....eventually."

Edward's voice snapped you out of your dreamlike state. And you whipped around to see a gigantic blond alchemist stooping down at the stack right nearby you!

This could be your chance to get help!

As Edward began rummaging through the books, he spotted a strange looking bug near the bottom of the stack.....

“Ugh, just my luck. There are bugs in the library again.” Ed mutters as he picks himself off the floor. Your look of hope turns into terror as you realize Ed had mistaken you for a mere insect! You watch as he stands to his full height; his golden eyes locked onto you like a hawk. Normally his size was nothing impressive, but to you he was like a god. “Better smash it before Al gets home.”

Edward raises one of his boots over you and you gaze up at the leather footwear as if it’s the last thing you’re ever going to see. You thankfully break out of your trance just soon enough to run for the nearest hiding place; the pile of books nearby. Ed’s foot comes down just as you dive for the books. The impact misses you, but it creates a powerful gust of wind that sends you deeper into the book pile.

“For crying out loud…” Ed mumbles a she notices you disappear into the books. “If that thing lays eggs on any of my books, I’m going to make its death long and painful!” the Fullmetal Alchemist gets back onto his knees and starts rummaging through the books again. Meanwhile, you quickly make your way through the maze of books and reach an exit before Ed can dig deep enough. You hop out of your hiding spot unnoticed and make start running for your life. Ed has reached the bottom of the book pile, but sees no signs of you. He’s about to start opening books when he spots his tiny target in the corner of his eye. An evil smirk slides across the teenager’s face.

“You think you can escape me, bug?” Ed asks as he stands back up and starts stomping in your direction. In just three steps he’s already on top of you and you think this is defiantly the end. Your love of Fullmetal Alchemist will be rewarded by becoming a red stain on the bottom of the main character’s boot. How lucky you are…

“Ed!! Stop, please!!” you shout without turning around. The blond titan doesn’t seem to hear you and just continues to grin down at the bug he’s about o squash.

“About a week ago I found a bug crawling through the pages of my favorite book. You know what I did to it?” Ed asks as he raises his foot over you once again. You may be fast for a bug your size, but you can’t escape the foot of the elder Elric. “Well you’re about to find out!”

With that, Ed brings his foot down and you brace yourself for your abrupt end. Luckily for you, Ed is still a big groggy from his nap and his aim is a bit off. The foot crashes down just inches from your minuscule form, sparing you once more. The powerful impact once again sends you flying…right into another pile of books. Ed grinds his boot against the wooden floor, thinking he’s crushed you. A lack of a crunch causes him to inspect his sole and realize you’re still alive. Ed angrily stomps his boot against the floor, sending a tremor through the room that causes a few books to fall of their shelves.

“You’re really pissing me off now…” Ed mutters under his breath as he scans the floor for you. All he wanted to do was find a book to read, but now some bug was giving him a hard time. Once he found you, he was going to show you exactly what happens to a bug that finds its way into his personal library.

Meanwhile, you’re laying at the bottom of the book pile and shaking with fear. The books on top of you are weighing you down, so it’s very difficult to move. You’re a sitting duck…if Ed finds you, he’ll surely put an end to the insect that’s causing him so much trouble. All you can do is wiggle and slow make your way out of the book pile; hoping Ed doesn’t search through the books and find you.
