Your hands are stuck so well to the fluffy inside that you can't get the lint out of your eyes and have to keep them closed as you continue to struggle.

Soon your journey is at it's end when your entire body is caught in fluffy, sticky, malodorous sock. You struggle to get unstuck but its fruitless, you're stuck in Al's sock and he might be putting it on soon!

Alphonse sighed as he swung his legs off his bed and placed his bare feet onto the floor, "Guess I'd better get started on dinner...." Al sighs as he wipes his forehead of sweat.

Al walked toward his socks and picked them both up in one hand, sitting back down on the bed, he slipped his still damp toes into the worn socks.

He didn't notice a tiny person struggling to free themselves at the bottom of one.

As you feel your prison become airborn, and you tumble to the very bottom of the damp sock, you are able to clean out your eyes as best you can and open them just in time to see a gigantic toe pad butt you in the face...

Al, having a good idea how his feet are smelling about now, puts his shoes back on to help hide the embarrassing odor from Ed...He doesn't feel anything under his toes as he opens the door and goes into the kitchen to begin cooking.
15213221211.title: Bad Situation Turned Worse

choices: You do something to make Al figure out something's in his sock.
You pass out and wake up some time later...
152132212111.content:
The trip into the kitchen is a short one for Alphonse, but for you it’s much longer. Each step the younger Elric takes presses you against the soft, smelly ground with a hard, equally smelly toe. You’re directly under Al’s big toe, the giant digit pressing down on you and the pad of the toe smushed right into your face. When the toe first smacked you, your mouth just happened to be open and you got a mouthful of cheesy taste…

“Hey, what are you doing, Ed?” you hear Al ask as he apparently enters the kitchen.

“Um…nothing…” Edward replies, his voice sounding nervous. You then hear Al sigh heavily.

“You were trying to sneak a snack, weren’t you?” Al rolls his eyes and pushes his older sibling out of the kitchen. “I’m making blueberry pancakes for supper. They’ll be done real quick, so just wait in the living room.”

“Heh, sounds good!” Ed smiles and licks his lips. “I’ll be sitting down and reading; call me when they’re ready!”

“Heh, you’ll probably smell them first…” Al replies under his breath as he starts taking out a bowl and other things he’ll need. Al unknowingly steps on you again and again as he walks from one part of the kitchen to the next. Even after he’s assembled all the ingredients and begins making the batter, he still steps from side-to-side to reach for distant objects. Hell, the giant boy is putting a lot of pressure on you just by standing still! You can only imagine how horrific it would have been of you were under his sole…

As Alphonse stirs the pancake batter and heats the stove, he wipes a bit of sweat off his brow. The kitchen gets much hotter as the stove turns on. Inside his shoe, things are even worse. Your entire body drips with sweat while Al’s toe smothers you underneath it, drenching you in even more sweat. It’s so hot…you can barely stand it! When Al starts pouring the batter onto a pan, you know you have to get out of here.

“Al! Help!” you shout, banging your fists against the hard texture of his toe. Your tiny fists don’t register with the blond at all, and Al just continues to make pancakes while whistling a tune. You listen to his carefree whistling and grit your teeth. You had to get out of this sock…fast! At this rate you might pass out from the heat…
152132212111.title: Things Heat Up

15213222.content:
When Edward recalled his dream, he thought better of stomping any bugs that coincidentally showed up. Sure he wasn't a guy who believed in prophecy and all that nonsense, but...it was odd for him, right after his dream about the tiny man, to find a bug that resembled a human...

Edward leaned down closer, hoping the bug wouldn't hop up his nose or anything. You backed away slowly as Ed's face came closer to you, he gave a sharp intake of breath when he realized that you were no bug.

"What the hell are you?" he whispered.

"I-I-I...." you stammered.

Edward set down the book he was holding, and quick as lighting picked you up. "Ah! Hey! Put me down!" you struggled in his grip. Edward stood back up to his full height and brought you up to his eyes to get a better look at you. "Whoa...You really are a tiny-"

"E-e-e-e-e-ed!!" Shouted Alphonse from the front door.

Your eyes flitted to the library door, would Ed show you to Al or was he going to keep you all to himself? That was the million dollar question at that moment.

Your fears turned out to be true when Edward stuffed you into his pocket and went out to help Alphonse with the groceries.
15213222.title: Not A Bug

choices: Edward puts you into his boot.
152132221.content:
As Ed made his way into the kitchen and started helping his brother put away the groceries, you didn’t dare make a move. There must have been a reason Ed was hiding you from Al and you didn’t want to risk angering him by trying to get Al’s attention. You just sat there inside Ed’s pants pocket as he took groceries out of the bags and put them where they belonged. When the two brothers were done, Ed noticed his brother wipe a few beads of sweat from his forehead. It must have been really hot out there.

“So, when’s dinner?” Ed asked immediately, knowing his brother always had something good planned.

“Um…I’m not sure, brother. To tell you the truth, I didn’t have anything planned. I’m kind of tired too and I think I’m just going to lay down and rest. Do you mind just making yourself a sandwich or something for supper?”

“Sure, I don’t mind.” Ed replied as he patted his brother on the shoulder. Al gave Ed a big smile before he headed off to his room for some rest. Ed waited until he heard his brother’s door close before he quickly took you out of his pocket and ran into the living room. The teenaged alchemist plopped himself onto his sofa and dangled you in front of his youthful face.

“Now, why don’t you tell me your story, squirt?” Ed asked, blowing hot air at you as he spoke.

“I…I can’t really explain everything. One moment I was in my own room, the next I was here at this size!” you explained. Ed continued to stare at you with his large, golden globes before he spoke again.

“That’s a pretty lousy excuse.” Edward said.

“L-lousy? But it’s the truth!”

“Haha, and I think you’re lying.” Ed suddenly drops you and you start falling toward his lap. Before you reach it, he catches you with his other hand and brings you back up to his face. “I think you’re some thief that thought they could sneak by me by shrinking themselves. I’m not sure how you did it, but looks like it didn’t work.” Ed laughs softly as you start to back away from his face. A quick curl of tree-like fingers stops you and you can only stare up at the handsome giant with fear.

Without warning, Ed curls you into his fist and brings you down to the floor. You’re dropped onto the hard wood as Ed starts untying his black boots. When both of them are undone, he kicks them off with two quick movements and you watch him plant his two socked feet directly in front of you.

“Man, look at you. I bet you don’t know how to reverse whatever you’ve done to yourself, so you’re at the mercy of my feet now!”

“Ed…stop it…this isn’t funny.” you mumble as you back away. Edward just smirks and lifts one of his socked feet over you. Before you can turn around and run, the socked foot comes down on you and slams you into the floor. The wind gets knocked out of you before Ed starts to smother you under the white, dingy fabric. You start screaming as his foul foot odor makes its way into your nostrils. Ed must have had a long day, and his feet are evidence of that. They reek like moldy cheese and you desperately try punching at the foot.

“Don’t like the smell, squirt? You better get used to it, because a slave like you is going to be smelling a lot of it!”

You’re watering eyes widen as you hear this. Did Edward just call you a slave? There was no way…no way you had gotten his attention just to become his slave! You wanted help, not this! You violently start writhing under Ed’s socked foot, but Ed just responds by curling his socked feet around you and giving you a few squeezes.

“That’s right, bug. You’re my slave now. It’s what you deserve for breaking in.” Ed explains as he rolls you under his foot, covering you from head to toe with sock fuzz. “Welcome to your new life, puny.”
152132221.title: Not What You Were Expecting

choices: Ed picks his foot up and finds you stuck to it.
Ed rolls you onto your back and orders you to lick his sole.
1521322211.content:
You felt like you were struggling under Ed’s sock for hours (when actually, it was just a few minutes). Finally, your world of white cotton disappeared as Ed moved his foot off you and allowed you to stand. The moment you got to your feet, you felt a rush of dizziness and collapsed onto your butt. You started coughing uncontrollably as you choked un the lingering smell of Ed’s foot odor.

“Do my feet really smell that bad?” Ed laughed as he glanced down at his dirty sock. “I can’t wait to see how you react when I take my socks off!” You gasp in horror before you watch Ed lean down to strip off his socks.

“No! *cough* Edward, please *cough* don’t!” you plead, but Ed hears none of it. You watch him grip the end of his sock with his newly humanized hand and pull the garment right off. A rain of fuzz and lint comes down on you as he does this and you desperately try to brush all the crud off you. When you look up again you see Edward tug his other sock of with the same hand before tossing both of them over his shoulder. He stretches out his feet and flexes his toes in content. You weren’t sure since he was covering it, but it looks like Edward also had his leg back as well.

“Do you even know how hard being a State Alchemist is? When I’m not killing my brain, I’m killing my poor feet! Today was especially hard since the Colonel was sending me all across the city. It feels good to have them out in the open air like this…”

After Ed finishes talking, he plants both his bare feet on the floor directly in front of you. With a grin, he starts wiggling his toes as he decides what to do with you next. You watch the ten large digits, each one the size of you or bigger, slap against the floor with enough force to cause you bodily harm if you were under them. You were so focused on the intimidating feet that you didn’t even notice how much they were contaminating the air until you happened to take a whiff. Your face goes pale and you jump back in surprise. It smells like you had just sniffed the ass of a cow…right when it farted! You cover your nose and groan as Ed’s foot odor starts to have an effect on you. You’re so disorganized that you don’t even ntoice Ed has his foot hanging over your head until it’s too late…

You feel something hard and powerful slam into your back and pin you against the wooden floor. It takes seconds for you to figure out its Ed’s bare foot and you try fighting once more. Unfortunately, it’s like trying to topple a building with your bare hands; it’s just not possible. Ed has his sweaty foot planted on you and there’s nothing you can do about it.

Edward chuckles as he applies some more pressure onto your bug-sized body. He waits until he hears you scream in pain before letting up on the pressure. He doesn’t want to squish you…not when you can amuse him.

“How’s it smell, bug? If you want me to move my foot, just say so.”

You immediately shout for Ed to remove his foot, but your voice is muffled since your face is pressed up against the hard wood. Ed doesn’t hear anything except a few squeaking noises.

“Sorry, didn’t quite catch that.” Ed says before he presses down on you again until you scream. Underneath the muscular male’s foot, you’ve finally given up on struggling since you’ve worn yourself out. You just lay there and endure the smell and pain. Ed’s foot is dripping with warm, salty sweat and you feel your shirt cling to your back as it’s drenched with the teen’s perspiration. You feel liquid on your face, but you don’t know if it’s tears or Ed’s foul foot sweat.

Ed continues to relax in his rush of power before deciding to do something else...
1521322211.title: Off Come the Socks

choices: Edward thinks of another way to torture you.
As soon as Ed takes his foot off you, you try to run away.
15213222112.content:
Without warning, Edward’s foot suddenly moves and rolls you under it. You’re thrown onto your back and forced to gaze right at the sweaty, dirty sole of the teenage alchemist. A droplet of sweat drips onto your face and soaks it with warm, salty liquid. The heat under the foot is also immense and you find yourself sweating too. At this point, however, you can’t decide what is your sweat and what is Ed’s.

“Listen up, slave! I’ve decided to let you lick my sole! Show me how much you appreciate your new master.”

“W-what?!” you reply at his insane order. Did he really just command you to LICK is foot? There was now ay you were doing that! “I-I can’t do that!”

“Why not, little man? Are you allergic to feet or something?” Ed says before he chuckles to himself.

“N-no…I just…I don’t want to!”

“Pfft.” Edward presses down a bit and forces your sweat into his sweaty foot. Your eyes widen and start to tear up as the horrifying smell of Ed’s foot is all you can take in. You start failing in desperation, but Ed keeps his foot firmly planted on you. “I don’t really care if you don’t want to do it. I’m your big, powerful master now and you’ll do as I say! If not, I’ll just punish you more…or perhaps just squish you like the bug you are?”

“N-No!” you manage to scream, despite your face being pushed into your giant master’s sole. “Please don’t kill me! I’ll lick your foot…I’ll lick your foot!!” you cry out, the threat of death working it’s charm on you. Ed smirks and lifts his foot a tiny bit so it’s no longer crushing you into the floor. You’re unable to move anything below your neck, but all you really need to move to accomplish Ed’s task is your tongue. You stare at the glistening sole for a few moment to prepare yourself for what you’re about to do. Ed starts to become impatient and gets ready to press down on you again, but stops when he feels something small and wet touch his foot. He grins widely and relaxes back on the couch.

Underneath his foot, you’re doing as you were told and licking the sweat from his foot. You whimper every time you swallow some of Ed’s foot sweat and groan as the foul stuff upsets your gut. Since you can’t move at all, you can only lick the same spot over and over again. No matter how many times you clean the spot of sweat, however, more quickly takes its place. You try to ignore the awful stench and taste and simply focus on staying alive. As long as you did what Edward commanded, you’d stay alive…right?

“That feels really good, bug. I bet Al would enjoy this-” Edward stops mid sentence and glances over in the direction of Al’s room. His brother was a pacifist and would probably get pissed at him if he found out he was keeping someone as a slave. He could picture Al shouting at him and demanding the little bug from him. “On second thought…maybe I’ll just keep you to myself for now.”
15213222112.title: Threats and Orders

choices: Once Al Has Gone Back To His Room, Ed Has Some More Fun
Ed Decides To Work Out With You Somewhere Else On His Body
152132221121.content:
"Okay, that's enough. Your master has another idea." Ed said smirking down at your pitiful form underneath his stinky bare foot.

Ed kindly lets up on the pressure but keeps you just under his foot so you can't run away. You are able to relax a bit at last.

"Hmm....I think I'll keep you in my boot, so Al won't find you. Heh, might even wear you as an insole!" Ed snickers at the idea of a man who was probably once taller than him squirming in his smelly boot.

Ed leans down and quickly lifts his foot and snatches you up before you even had time to consider running.

Ed brings you up to his face and sniffs you, "Yuck....Smells like my feet!" Ed chuckles as he brings one of his boots underneath you. The heat and odor that comes up from the inside is like steam from a volcano. These boots must have seen a lot of use just like in the anime and manga.

But now, Ed has two gigantic fleshy feet that are equally as smelly and sweaty, you can only hope Ed bathes soon.

"In ya go!" Ed grins at you once more before he drops you in and you land on the spongy bottom.

Definitely seen a lot of use....As you feel around on the spongy, squishy surface, you can feel the impressions of Ed's sole, and as you go deeper, your feet sink into his toe prints.

"Ugh....its getting smellier in here." You mutter to yourself as you go deeper. However your tour of Ed's footwear is interrupted when Alphonse's door opens and Ed quickly shoves his foot in, without a sock!

The light that guided your journey goes out and you trip over your own feet, landing in the indentation of Ed's biggest toe. You make sure you are between the big and second toe so you won't end up underneath the massive digit.

Ed's foot rushes to meet you, and soon you find yourself with your legs just under Ed's toe and your upper torso and head wedged in the toe crotch. Needless to say there is a fair amount of lint from his socks in there that you find yourself having to eat so you aren't smothered to death in the fuzz.

Outside of the boot, Ed is putting on a pretty good act for his little brother, having put both his feet back into their designated boots, he feels around with his toes to make sure you're not in a bad spot. When he discovers you are safe, he decides he can stop being so nervous. "Hey Al! Want me to fix us sandwiches or something?"

Al smiles, "You sure you can manage without me cooking us dinner?"

Ed smiles back, "Of course!" Ed and Al soon are sitting down to enjoy some good old fashioned sandwiches...With you still stuck in Ed's boot of course!
152132221121.title: Hidden In Ed's Boot

choices: Al comes out and suggests some late night sparing.
1521322211211.content:
As the two Elric brothers sat on their couch together eating, they conversed with each other. They mainly talked about their new experiences with their renewed bodies and alchemy stuff. You could hear everything they were saying, but no matter how much you called for Al’s help, he couldn’t hear you. The younger alchemist was completely oblivious to the third male in the room. He would never expect his older brother to be holding a captive slave…and under his foot to boot! (no pun intended)

After awhile, the two brothers finished their sandwiches and rubbed their stomachs with glee. Al sighed with satisfaction while his brother clutched his abs through his shirt and belched loudly. Al laughed before nudging his brother in the arm and calling him childish.

“Well, I think I’m going to head back to my room.” Al says as he yawns and stretches his arms. “Thanks for the sandwich, brother!”

“No problem, Al. You have a good nap.” Ed replied, patting his little bro on the shoulder. Al smiled before he got up and headed off to his room. Ed waited until he heard his brother’s door close before looking down at his boot and grinning. “How are you doing in there, shrimp?”

You shout out your obvious feelings about being shoved into another man’s foot, but your words don’t reach Ed’s ears. The teen’s boots are made from very thick leather in order to make his kicks even more powerful.

“I’ll take your silence as ’I love it in here, Master Edward!’. That okay with you?” Ed laughs as he flexes his toes, feeling you struggle between them. After grinding you between his filthy toes for a bit, Ed stands up and smiles as he feel you compress under his toe. He walks into the kitchen and grabs himself a glass of orange juice. With glass in hand, Ed starts aimlessly walking around the apartment. He picks up various pieces of trash and junk on the floor and tosses them into the trash bin. The entire time you’re pushed into the space between is toes again and again. A few times some of the filth gets into your mouth and you gag on it.

After cleaning up around the apartment a bit, Ed walks over to Al’s room and presses his ear to the door. He doesn’t hear anything…which means Al must be sound asleep. Ed decides to head outside and makes his way to the door. After walking down a few flights of stairs, he heads into the backyard behind the apartment building. The backyard is pretty barren, sporting no trees or bushes and only a couple chairs and a rundown fence. Regardless, Ed and Al usually use the open space for training.

Ed places his hands on his hips and gazed up at the night sky. A quarter moon hanged in the sky along with a few stars. Since they were in the city, Ed couldn’t see as many stars as he could back when he was little.

“Maybe me and Al should take a trip back home some time. I know he’d like to look up at the night sky again.” Ed look down at his black boot and grinned. “You could see it too…if you’re not already staring at my sweaty sole! I bet you’d like that more, wouldn’t you?”

You glared up where Ed’s voice was coming from. You couldn’t see his handsome face, but you knew for a fact he was grinning smugly right now…
1521322211211.title: Ed's Little Insole

choices: Ed Uses You To Wipe The Sweat and Stink Off Himself
15213222112112.content:
Ed decided he could use some training by himself. Ed stripped off his black shirt, leaving him in his black tank top. "Ahh...." Ed sighed in content as he let the cool air blow on his bare chest and arms. "This feels good!" Ed sighed again and began to stretch.

Ed stretched his arms over his head first, airing out his pits a little. Ed sniffed under both of them and grimaced, "Yuck...." Was all he said as he quickly put his arms down and began to stretch his legs.

He put one leg out with the foot standing up on it's heel, stretching his foot back and forth into you and spreading his toes all over you. Safe to say, you were getting one hell of a smell of Ed's unwashed foot.

"Now....on to the good stuff!" Ed said hopping back up.

Ed clapped his hands together and placed them in the dirt, with a few flashes of light, twelve training dummies made out of barren dirt stood there. Ed stood up straight and put his hands on his hips as he grinned at his handiwork.

"Hang on tight squirt! You're in for one hell of a ride!" Ed called down to you as he ran to the first dummy and punched it's head off.

When Ed started running, you were thankfully in a safe spot between his toes. However his foot began pumping out gallon upon gallons of hot sweat, all of which came down to his toe area, right where you were!

That is when Ed used the foot you were stuck with, to take out a few more dummies. You were tossed about in the boot, sweat splashing all around you like rain.

When only three dummies remained, Ed used his alchemy to make a weapon out of the chain link fence and clobbered the rest of them easily. Ed panted and was dripping with sweat. He collapsed into one of the lawn chairs after fixing the fence with his alchemy. "That was pretty easy....But its still so damn hot out here."
Ed said wiping his brow. Ed sniffed under his arm again and found the stench had increased tenfold. "Hm....I think I've found another job for you shrimpy!" Ed said with a toothy grin.
15213222112112.title: Ed Vs. The Dirt Dummies

choices: Ed has no mercy for criminals. Next stop: Edward's feet!
Ed shows you a bit of mercy.
152132221121121.content:
Edward sat up in the lawn chair and started taking off the boot that contained you. Once it was off his foot, the blond teen grimaced as he smelled how badly the bare foot reeked.

“Oh wow…” Ed says a she fans the air in front of his face. “Are you still alive in there?” Ed brings the boot to his face and looks inside. Despite being plastered to the bottom of his insole, you’re clearly still alive since you have the energy to shoot Ed an angry glare. Ed finds your expression humorous and reaches his fingers into the boot to recover you. As you’re peeled free of your prison, you begin thinking up what exactly you’re going to scream in Ed’s face. He couldn’t do this to you! He couldn’t treat you like some kind of sweat absorbing slave! You were…

Once you were fully out of the boot, all your energy seemed to melt away as you gazed at the titanic Edward. His muscular arms shimmered with sweat and appeared even bigger thanks to his workout. His black tank top was glued to his torso, leaving very little to the imagination. You trembled before the titan, reminding yourself that you are nothing before him.

“Haha, now that’s a better expression!” Ed says as he smiles at you. “You better be scared of me, shrimp. I could crush you like a grape with my FINGERS! Remember that next time you feel the need to glare at your giant master.

You gulp audibly. Ed places his other arm behind his head and brings you over to his exposed pit. As you near it, you sniff the air and your eyes widen with sock.

“Wh-what are you doing?!” you shout, plugging your nose to stop yourself from taking in the putrid odor. Edward doesn’t answer your question with words, but actions instead. His hand slaps you against his sweaty pit and begins rubbing you around it vigorously. Your hands are torn from your nose as you’re forced to breath in his armpit stink. You cry out and plead for him to stop, but your pleas are drowned out by gallons of fresh sweat. It smells absolutely rotten! You’d rather smell a corpse after Roy Mustang barbecued it!

“This is what you get for breaking into someone else’s house.” Ed says as he rubs you up and down his muscled arm, transferring the sweat on it to you. “You chose the WRONG house to steal from, kid. Your method could also use some work.”

Ed raised you over his chest and switched you into his other hand. As he did…

“Please! I’m not a thief! I wasn’t trying to-” you try to explain to him, but he shoves you under his other arm before you can get anywhere. You feel your eyes water and your nose burn as you’re forced to soak up his perspiration and B.O. After rubbing you all over his sweating arm, he dangles you over his face and grins at you. You’re coughing wildly as you try to get all the sweat out of your mouth. Your clothes are drenches and your hair is greasy with sweat.

“Nice look, thief. I can’t wait to see what you look like after I rub my feet with you.”

“No! No no no! Please!” you beg, bowing your head to Ed. “You’re the bigger man! You’re stronger than me and I’m just a bug to you!! Please don’t put me near your feet again. I…I don’t know if I’ll be able to take it!”

Ed stares at you blankly. Even though the two of you are around the same age, you look like you’re on the verge of crying. Ed begins to feel a bit of pity for you…or does he?
152132221121121.title: Edward's Sweat Rag

choices: You wake up on Edward's chest. He had fallen asleep outside on the lawn chair.
1521322211211211.content:
“Sorry, little guy, but that’s not going to work on me. I can tell you really regret your decisions, but you deserve every moment of this torture.” Edward explains, sticking with his belief that you were a thief trying to steal from him. “Now, let’s move on.”

“No! You can’t! I might die if I smell any more of your stink!”

“Well that sucks for you! If you do end up dead, at least know that you died smelling your master’s awesome feet!”

With that Edward sits up and brings is feet closer. Ed drops you on his lap as he takes off the boot that you weren’t in. You’re too weak to move and only watch as Ed pries the boot off, releasing a second foul-smelling foot. You’re picked up again and slowly brought to the sole of the foot. You weakly struggle in the giant’s grip, but even at full strength you wouldn’t have been able to make Ed’s pinkie budge. Ed chuckles at your fruitless struggles and wiggles his toes to taunt you more. Right before you hit the sole, you squeeze your eyes shut and keep them shut.

Ed smacks you into his bare sole and starts rubbing you over it, murmuring as your body not only absorbs his foot sweat but also massages his sole at the same time. You try your best to ignore what is happening, but the haunting smell of the teenager’s foot is a constant reminder that this is happening. One of your favorite anime characters was using you as a sponge to soak up his sweat. Never in your sixteen-year-long life did you imagine this happening.

“Make sure you get some good whiffs, shrimp.” Edward says as he sloes his eyes and relaxes his head back. He finishes rubbing you into his sole and starts forcing you underneath and between his toes. “These feet are going to be a big part of your life from now on! You’re going to worship them everyday, help clean them, and grow to love them! I’ll turn you into a dedicated foot licker, bug!”

You begin to cry as Ed doesn’t hold anything back. How could he be so cruel? Was it because he didn’t think of you as a human being? Whatever the reason was, it was clear he only thought of you as his property now. Part of you wanted to bite his foot right now and have him crush you, just to save you from this fate. You couldn’t bring yourself to do it, though. Dieing under the foot of a giant boy like some insect was just too humiliating of an end.

Ed finishes rubbing you over the top of his foot before he moves you to his other smelly sole. As you are rubbed into that one, he starts to taunt you some more.

“Maybe someday I’ll show you to Al and you can be his slave too! He may be a pacifist, but he also has a great sense of justice! He’ll understand that a germ like you deserves this punishment.”

By the time Edward has finished rubbing his foot, you’re on the verge of unconsciousness. You can’t even remember being taken away from his foot, only noticing that you’ve been dropped onto the teen’s chest. You’re covered in so much sweat and stink that you feel like you’re pressed up against his pits again!

“That feels a lot better!” Ed says as he stretches his less sweaty arms toward the night sky. “How do you feel, shrimp?”

You mumble something Edward can’t understand.

“What’s that? I didn’t quite hear ya!”

“Wh…wh-why?” you mutter, practically whispering.

“Why? I thought we’ve been through this? You broke into my house so I’m punishing you with a life of servitude!”

“Wh-why?” you repeat. “Ev-even…if I d-did break into your h-house…I don’t…I don’t deserve THIS.”

“Pfft. A thief today, a murderer tomorrow. I’m doing the world a favor by keeping you off the streets.”

You stare at Edward blankly before collapsing into the folds of his tank top. Unconsciousness saves you as you slip into it…
1521322211211211.title: Zero Mercy

choices: Failure! Ed Begins To Wake Up and Spots You
15213222112112111.content:
Your eyes shoot open as you feel a cool breeze blowing your hair. There is some sort of black material beneath you and you are glued to it by the cold sweat you have been in as you slept. You had the worst nightmare, it involved a giant Edward Elric and you serving him as his tiny slave. You hear something like snoring above you, and you unstick your face from the cloth, and look up. 1521322211211211121.content:
With you under his foot where you belong, Edward angrily stomps back into the apartment building and makes his way up the stairs. You scream and plead with him in his boot, but your voice is muffled by his rank sole. Ed’s powerful stomps nearly crush you each time and you realize he must still be holding back a bit to avoid squashing you before he can punish you. Still, your body is getting pummeled!

Ed enters his and Al’s apartment and locks the door behind him. Since it’s past midnight, he does his best to quietly enter to the kitchen and look through the cupboards. He doesn’t want to wake his brother up, but you don’t have that same concern. You continue to scream and yell and bang on his foot desperately.

“Would you shut the hell up!” Ed says in a quiet, yet angry voice. “You’re going to wake Al up!” Ed pauses for a moment and smirks. “On second thought, kick and scream all you like. No one but me can hear you, shrimp.”

The blond teen finally finds what he’s looking for and exit’s the kitchen with it. He makes his way into his own bedroom and sits down on the bed. He slowly removes his boots and places them next to the bed after reaching in and taking you out. With you in hand, Ed sits cross-legged on the bed and smirks down at you.

“This is what happens to bad slaves who think they can escape their masters.” Ed says as he once again slaps you against his bare sole. This time your face is pressed up against his sole, just under his flexing toes. Ed keeps you pinned against his sole and uses his teeth to rip off a piece of tape. He places his piece over you, effectively trapping you against his sole. You struggle in vain, as your body is perfectly held in place by the tape and your arms are pinned to your sides.

“Listen up, bastard. Being taped to my foot while I sleep is just HALF your punishment. You’re also hereby ordered to lick my sole from now until I wake up in the morning!”

Your eyes widen with shock. “Wh-what?”

“Don’t make me repeat myself, slave. You must lick my godly foot all night…non-stop! If I wake up and find you napping on the job, well…” Edward grins toothily and gives a low, vile chuckle. “Just don’t fall asleep.”

With that threatening warning stuck in your mind, Ed spreads his legs out and lays down upon his mattress. He takes his quilt and wraps himself up with it, leaving only his head and bare feet exposed. You just stare at the foot in shock as you wonder if he’s being serious. You have to lick his foot…all night?! That’s not possible! You look up the foot and wonder if he’s already fallen asleep…

“I DON’T FEEL ANY LICKING!!” Ed shouts, still in a voice that doesn’t wake his brother. You yelp in fright and begin licking your giant master’s sole obediently. Ed chuckles with satisfaction before going silent again. There you are, taped to your master’s foot as he sleeps, tasked with the mission of licking his mighty foot.

You start to tear up again, not only from despair, but also because of the terrible fumes that make your eyes itch. With your arms pinned to your sides, you can’t rub them. You just lay there against his sole, lapping up his sweat as salty tears run down your cheeks. At least you aren’t licking his toe jam too…that’s something…

1521322211211211121211.content:
Every time Edward’s boot slammed against the tiled floor of Central you were on the receiving end of a tremendous amount of pressure. The giant alchemist was reminding you with each step that he was the bigger man and could end you with any one of these simple steps. You felt like sobbing between those massive toes, and maybe you already were. There was so much foot sweat on your face that it was hard to tell…

“You’re late, Fullmetal.” was the first thing that came out of Colonel Roy Mustang’s mouth as the younger alchemist entered his office.

“Late? What are you talking about?” Ed replied, glancing at the clock and seeing he wasn’t late at all.

“You’re late by 23 seconds…” Roy finished, not even looking into Ed’s eyes and just continued to scribble something onto a piece of paper.

“Pfft, whatever…” Ed took a seat on the nearby couch and rested his feet on the table. Even with the pressure off you, Ed just squeezed you between his smelly toes in order to keep your punishment going. You tried to push the toes apart, but the blond’s little toe would be stronger than you at this size. “So, what’s today’s mission, Colonel? Fixing a bridge? Hunting down a fugitive? Or am I going to get stuck with a boring desk job.”

“None of those. This is your assignment. You’ll be heading to the other side of town.” Roy explained as he handed the younger male a slip of paper.

“Other side of town, eh? Sounds good!” Ed grinned as he took the document, imagining you suffering under his feet the entire trip there.

“As the document explains, you’ll be looking for the son of a local aristocrat. He ran away from home yesterday, bringing with him a few of his family’s prized treasures. The family wants both the items and their son back. We’ve received reports he was spotted around the spot marked on the map.”

“I see…” Ed scratched his chin as he glanced over the document. “Why would he steal some of his family’s treasures?”

“We don’t know his intentions. He could be selling them off to the black market, or perhaps he just wanted them for himself.”

“And what about the items themselves? What are they?”

“We don’t know that either…” Roy muttered with a sigh. “The aristocrat did not give us any details on what was taken; not even the number of items. He simply said they’re important and he wants them back.”

“Alright then! I’ll just find this guy, smack him around a bit, and bring him and the stolen items back to his family.” Ed said as he jumped to his feet, pressing his sole hard upon your small body.

“He’s the son of a rich aristocrat; please try not to hurt him too much.”

“Heh, tell you what; he won’t have to go to the hospital!” Ed exclaimed with a smirk as he cracked his knuckles. With that said, the Fullmetal alchemist left Roy’s office with a wave and ran out of HQ. As the teenager ran down the sidewalk, his sweaty feet pounded you into the boot like never before. The martial artist could run as fast as any cab could go, even if he was running a tad bit slower to keep you from becoming a smear under his foot.

“Heh, enjoy the ride, squirt!” Ed said to you. “After this, YOU’RE the one that might need to be hospitalized.”

15311.content:
You were watching one of your least favorite animes. Not by choice of course, your little brother had forced you into watching it with you by throwing a tantrum. He sat glued to the tv watching reruns of it on Toon Disney. You remember you used to be fascinated with it. Never got into Pokemon much. Just Digimon.

"Hey Joey...Would you go get me a soda?" You yawn.

He looks up from the TV, "B-But I'll miss the best part!"

"Look, I'm watching it with you aren't I? The least you can do is get me a frickin' coke!" You growl at him. He isn't intimidated however, but by chance it's a commercial and he quickly dashes off to the kitchen. "Dr. Pepper!" You shout after him.

That's when you hear someone go "Psst"

You look around the room for the source of the sound. "Over here dufus!" The voice says. You trace the sound and it's coming from the Tv! Your eyes bug out when you see none other than Tai from Digimon alone on the screen. If you didn't know any better, you'd say he was grinning at you.

"Hey.....Wanna see something cool?" He says with a mischievous gleam in his eye. You can only nod yes, not knowing what else to say to a cartoon character.

Suddenly there is a blinding flash from the television. You can't see, then you feel a jerking sensation as you seem to be being pulled towards the television.



Hours later your eyes fly open, you sit up. "Ugh....What a crazy dream." You mumble. You hear a chuckle from above. You look up to see a gigantic Tai grinning down at you.

"Welcome to the Digital World! My little slave!"

"W-What did you do!? Why am I so small!? Where's my brother?!" You scream up to him in sheer terror.

He holds a hand up in defense, "Whoa whoa whoa little man. You're brothers fine. In fact, You can look right over there and see him." He says turning you around to face a square looking portal that you can only guess is the gateway back home. Your little brother is just now coming back in with the drinks. He looks around, calling out your name. "Darn...I should've known it was a trick to get out of watching the show! I'm telling mom!" He calls out before running out of the room, throwing the sodas on the floor. To your horror, the gateway begins to shrink until it finally disappears, leaving nothing behind to show it was even there.

Tai turns you back around, "Don't worry slave, He might even join you soon....Heh heh heh." He laughs as he thinks up sadistic ways to break his new slave in.

“Hey, Matt, you made it!”

The pressure vanished as quickly as it came and you breathed a sign of relief. Your body still ached, but you tried to put up with it. You listened silently to the two boys outside talk.

“Sorry about that.” Matt said as he approached Tai, who stood up upon seeing Matt. “I got a little sidetracked. Anyway, how did it work?”

“Great, just like I told you. He came through healthy, except for a diminished size like we thought. How about you? Did everything work out?”

You listened to all this from inside Tai’s boxers. So Matt had a shrunken person too? These kids were insane!

“Woah, man. He looks like crap. What did you do to him?”

“Nothing much. The little guy’s been with my feet for the past few hours. He was easy to break.”

You glared up at them, trying to look unafraid regardless of how frightened you really were. Tai and Matt looked at each other, and both boys slipped one socked foot each out of their big shoes.

Matt was the first one to free his bare foot from the confines of the discolored sock. He sighed, lifting his foot into the air, he spread all of his toes, loving the feeling of the cool air blowing between them. "Ahhh..Please tell me I can go first." He said as he hovered his gargantuan foot above the tree stump. "Sure thing! I can wait for my turn with the shrimps!" Tai said as he put his still socked foot back in it's shoe. Matt smirked down at you both, with his big bare foot still hovering in the air. He pointed to the sole and then to you, before pushing you down with his toes, and laying it gently on top of you.

Matt's gargantuan toes knocked the wind out of you and you sprawled to the floor. You were then trapped beneath the massive odorous boyfoot. You could hear Joey screaming and sobbing but it was drowned out by Matt's voice.

15311112212221.content:
"Sniff it!" Matt's voice commanded from high above. You already could smell the odor of young boy foot all around you, You weren't going to willingly take a whiff of it thank you very much! But when Matt didn't see you sniffing his foot, he increased the pressure on your puny body. "I said sniff you little runt! What are you deaf?" He snarled spreading his toes and wiggling them mockingly all over your face. When he spread his toes, the odor was tripled in strength, not to mention bits of sweaty moist sock lint came flying out.

You couldn't take the pressure, your ribs had already begun to crack. So you lifted up your head between a crevice, and took a quick but deep sniff. Matt laughed at you from above as your face seemed to turn green. "Ha ha ha! Look at him Tai! He's turning green from the smell!"

Tai came over, holding his nose of course. "Pee-U Matt! Even I can smell it! No wonder the poor little guy is about to throw up hahaha!" Tai said shaking his head, but showing no sign of actual pity.

Matt straightened up and stood tall proudly. He seemed to be somehow strangely proud of his foot odor, especially when it was being used to torture little bugs like you!

153111122122212.content:
While Matt was looking at you with a proud, triumphed expression, Tai was looking at you with impatience. After seeing the amount of control Matt could enforce on the two bugs, Tai wanted a turn badly.

“Can I have a turn with them now?” asked Tai as he started to come closer to Matt’s foot. Matt threw his arm out in front of Tai and stopped him.

“No way! That was hardly any time at all! Just give me a few more minutes with them.” Matt told his friend, who was less than willing to allow it.

“But Matt, I know I said I’d wait my turn, but after seeing this I don’t know if I can!”

“You’re going to have to. Just wait over there and be patient. It’ll be your turn soon.” Tai didn’t like it, but he had to agree. He didn’t want to fight Matt over something like this; that’d just be silly. The disappointed teen sighed his agreement and left for a nearby stump. Matt watched him sit down and suddenly got an idea.

The pressure on you was removed as Matt lifted his bare sole off you and your brother. You couldn’t see clearly but could make out Matt’s titanic form dwarfing you. The two giants had been talking about something a few seconds ago, but you were too busy smelling Matt’s foot and getting dizzy from it to understand any of it. You looked to your side and noticed your brother next to you. He was just as disoriented as you and twice as scared. You reached a hand out to him when suddenly the image of your brother was removed by two giant fingers. Before you could think about what Matt was going to do to him, the giant DigiDestined simply moved him a few inches away from you. Was it to separate you? Or something else?

You turned back up to Matt who was now turning around from what you could tell through your blurred eyes. Your first thought was that he was done and giving you guys a break, but then realized that he was probably just giving his friend a turn to torture you. Neither was correct when Matt suddenly began to lean down. You watched in horror as Matt’s giant butt descended on you, the fabric of his jeans getting closer and closer by the second. You knew he was going slow just to torture you more. Joey had no idea what was happening, since he was too scared to look up. After what felt like a full minute, Matt’s butt finally made contact with the stump as he sat himself down. You heard your brother’s screams just before they were muffled by Matt’s left ass cheek. You were pinned under his right, the rough texture of his pants pushing you down along with the mound of muscle that was hidden behind it. The pressure was much worse than his foot, but at least it didn’t smell…yet.

“Hey, don’t crush them.” reminded Tai from his seating position. If they were crushed, he’d lose his turn with them.

“I know, don’t worry. I‘m not using my full weight.” responded Matt without looking at Tai. He was too busy looking down at his butt. Although he couldn’t see his two slaves, he pictured their smushed little bodies with his mind. The thought excited him even more. A few minutes passed and Matt knew it was almost Tai’s turn. He felt like doing one last thing to the two shrimp siblings before turning them over to Tai.

His fun was interrupted by an annoyed grunt from Tai, the goggle head was tapping his feet impatiently. “Alright you can have them” Matt sighed lifting his jean clad rear and freeing both you and your brother. “We should start heading back.” suggested Matt to Tai. “It’s probably starting to get dark out in the real world.”

“Sure thing.” Tai said before looking back down at their slaves. “What do you wanna do with them? Should we split them between us?”

“You’re going to separate us?!” you yelled up at Tai. Joey hid behind you with a frightened look on his face.

“Duh. They’re two of you and two of us. It’s perfect. Do you have a problem with that, willing slave?” You bit your lip as Tai grinned down at you. You didn’t have a say in the matter, but you didn’t want to leave your brother alone with one of these evil kids again. Suddenly, Matt put a hand on Tai’s shoulder and directed his attention to him.

“I have an idea, Tai. How about you sleep over my house tonight? We can have all sorts of fun with them together.”

“Oh? Are you show them pity?” Tai asked with an evil smirk. Matt chuckled and shook his head.

“Of course not, I just thought it’ll be more fun with both of them. We can each take one for ourselves tomorrow.”

“Sounds like a plan. That sound good, slaves?” Tai looked down at you once more. “Well, guess we better start walking. The nearest link between the Digital World and ours is about a half hour from here. And guess where you’re going to be?”

Tai started to strip off his shirt. Seeing this, Matt got the idea and also took his top off. When both boys were shirtless, Tai bent down and plucked Joey up from behind you. The boy didn’t try to scream this time as he was slapped into Tai’s armpit. Tai put his arm down and started to rub, greasing Joey up and getting him stuck to his pit. Matt grabbed you as well, but brought you up to his face instead. He poked one of his fingers into your chest.

If either of you try anything funny, like trying to escape, little bro will be taking a one-way trip in here.” Matt patted his stomach with his other hand. You nodded in understanding before Matt stuck you underneath his arm. Both of the young chosen ones slipped their shirts back on and started to trek down the mountain together. Both you and your brother endured their hot, smelly pits for the next half hour. Soon enough, Matt and Tai reached a small TV seating on a lonesome stump. Holding their digivices to it, the four of you were sucked into the TV. It felt kind of weird traveling between two different worlds (similar to when you entered the Digital World from your world). The two preteens appeared in Matt’s room through his computer.

“Your room’s a mess, like always.” Tai said as he looked around.

“Sorry about that.” Matt replied as he kicked a few random objects out of his way. He looked out the window to see that the sun was just going down. Both boys once again took their shirts off to get to you, then put them back on after putting you both on Matt’s bed.

“I’ll go tell my parents your sleeping over.” Matt left the room as Tai sat down on the bed next to you.

“You guys ready for some fun? Tonight’s going to be great.”

“Hey, TK! You there?” Tai yelled, his voice echoing across the mountain. Almost instantly, the short form of a little, blond-headed kid appeared from behind a nearby rock and started waving at Tai.

“Hey, Tai!” greeted Tai’s best friend’s little brother. Tai smiled and walked over to TK, leaning down and ruffling his hair when he got close.

“How you doing, buddy? Were you waiting long?”

“Nope.” TK blurted out as he shook his head. “I told Matt I was going somewhere and then jumped into the Digital World. Where have you been, though? No one’s heard from you in a week!”

“Sorry about that. I was looking for a certain something. After I found it, I spent the last four days getting here.”

“It must have been something really good if you spent that long getting it. Hurry up and show me, Tai!”

“Hehe, well, it’s not what I got that’s interesting, but what I got USING it. Lemme show you.” A moment later, Tai pulled his shirt over his head. TK wondered what he was doing, but saw that something was stuck in his friend’s armpit. Tai plucked you out of his pit an brought you to his face. “So, how were the past few days? Did you enjoy it?”

Before you could mutter a response, TK shouted out. “What is that?! I thought it was an action figure, but it just moved! Is that a person?”

“Yep. A tiny person I pulled out of another dimension. Wanna hold him?”

“Sure!” TK yelped with glee before practically ripping you out of Tai’s hand. He didn’t really understand the part about pulling you out of another dimension, but that hardly mattered. To the small child, you were a living toy. TK grasped you with both hands and brought you dangerously close to his large face. “Hi there, little guy. What’s your name? Where are you from? How old are you? I’m eight!” TK started petting you on the head like you were a rodent of some sort. You felt like your head was going to come off.

“S-stop that!” you yelled up at him. Despite the volume of your voice being reduced, TK still knew you had yelled at him. His face turned angry.

“Hey, Tai, he yelled at me!”

Tai had just slipped his shirt back on when TK spoke. “Really? And he was being so good during the trip here. I guess you better punish him.” TK explained before turning his attention to his clothes and muttering something about changing them soon. TK grinned and looked at you. The young boy walked over to some rocks and sat down on them.

“So, Mr. Tiny, how should you be punished first?”

154211112121112.content:
“Well, little guy, now that the big bad half-demon is gone, let’s get moving!” Miroku said to you with a hint of demand in his voice. You merely glanced in the direction of his voice, since you couldn’t see any other part of the giant monk from your position. You remained stuck to Miroku’s greasy foot and waited for him to peel you off. Maybe he would be a bit nicer than the cruel Inuyasha and stick you in his pocket. Unfortunately, the large man had no intention of taking you off his foot any time soon. He instead reached for his nearby sandals and started sipping them on. When you saw one of them quickly approaching you, you yelled for Miroku to stop. The feudal era god either didn’t hear you or didn’t care, because your stuck form was squashed into the squishy sandal without remorse. Your entire body was compressed underneath the monk’s might foot, effectively making you his new insole.

The good monk stood up, putting his weight on top of you and grinning as you tried to squirm out. He chuckled a bit and said, “Get comfortable, demon. You might be in there for days if I so desire. And keep squirming like that; it feels good against my tired soles.”

You screamed for someone to help you, but the only thing you got was more pressure as your giant master started walking out of the forest. You managed to move your left hand a bit and used it to beat against Miroku’s sole, but this only resulted in your fist getting soaked with male sweat. You gave up and lied there in defeat, breathing in male musk and trying not to imagine what you must look like to the world right now. Nothing but a bug to these giants…
154211112121112.title: A Good Insole for a Good Monk

choices: Miroku. He wants to show you to Shippo.
Shippo. He wants to show Miroku some new size changing fox magic.
1542111121211122.content:
It took Miroku an entire hour to find his way out of the forest. An entire hour of being pressed into his sandal and enduring his manly foot stink. When the monk finally emerged from the forest, he spotted a village nearby. It had a shrine next to it, so it must be the one he was looking for.

“Finally made it. I was beginning to fear that I made a wrong turn back there…” Miroku mumbled as he advanced toward the village. When he arrived, he almost immediately heard someone call his name.

“Miroku! What took you so long?!” a familiar voice called out to him. He looked over just in time to see a furry paw slam into his face and knock him backwards.

“You dumb monk! I was waiting here for half a day!” Shippo shouted angrily as Miroku caressed his face and got back to his feet.

“S-sorry, Shippo. My trip took a bit longer than I originally expected. Were you getting lonely with the others gone?”

“No! It’s just that the kids here kept chasing me and pulling on my tail! I thought I was going to die!”

“Hehe, now, now. I don’t think a bunch of kids could slay a mighty demon like you.” Miroku joked, earning him another glare from the small fox demon. “Anyway, I’m kind of tired, so how about we find someplace to rest?”

“Fine, just as long as there aren’t any kids around…” Shippo shuddered at the thought of another kid yanking on his tail. Miroku laughed and walked deeper into the village, searching for a place to stay. Meanwhile, you were still pinned under his foot and wondered if Shippo might be willing to help you.

…nah.

After talking to a few villagers, Miroku and Shippo entered a small cabin made for travelers. The inside of it sported a small table and a few sleeping mats, but not much of anything else. When they got settled, one of the two males spoke up.

“By the way, I have something I want to show you.”

The one who said this was…
1542111121211122.title: Here Comes Trouble...

“Inuyasha!” A distant girl’s voice called. “Are you almost ready?”

Inuyasha looked like he was about to snap at her, but appeared to think for a moment before he looked back at you. “You’re in luck, demon,” he grinned, “Kagome’s having all five of us stay in her time while we work out a bit of a plan for dealing with Naraku. I’ll have some fun with you there. Sweet dreams!” He flicks his clawed finger against the side of your head, knocking you out cold.

You awaken on a hard surface and see Inuyasha looking down at you. He’s dressed differently, with a red short-sleeved shirt and jeans instead of his usual robe and undergarments. “Kagome made me change into some of her stuff so I’d look more ‘normal’,” he says, “Kinda uncomfortable, but it’ll do. Anyway…”

You hear a gurgling sound and Inuyasha trails off. At first you think the dog hanyou is growling at you, but then you realize it’s his stomach. He smirks at the timing. “I ate a lotta of Kagome’s food, and I gotta take a dump somethin’ fierce.”

It’s then you realize that you’re in the bathroom. Inuyasha starts to pull down his pants, exposing his toned, muscular ass, which he places on the throne. “These ‘toilet’ things are pretty neat,” Inuyasha remarks, “I had to get taught how to use ‘em, but it feels way better than squatting to shit.” He reaches for you, and you’ve got no time to run before you’re in his grasp.

The demon’s jeans are around his ankles, and you can’t help but look at his bare thighs. His thick, drooping cock and balls also draw your eye; he notices, and considers where to put you.

15511.title: Simon

choices: Simon was joking and doesn't really think you're a Beastman.
155111.content:
You name was Jacob, a normal sixteen year-old walking home from a normal day at school. In your hands was your prized PSP, playing a downloaded episode of Gurren Lagann. You had just recently become fascinated by the show after a group of friends had introduced you to it. It was just so action-packed and crazy, you felt like a sky-diving experience would be similar. You were so wrapped up in watching the show that you didn’t notice the world around you begin to change. Only when the sidewalk under you vanished and the world begin to dissolve did you notice anything.

“Holy shit, what’s happening?!” you yelled as you fell into emptiness. Planets and star systems were zooming in and out around you and before you knew it you hit something hard. Groaning in pain, you stood up and looked around. You were now in some kind of room with metal walls and floors, like a secret base. What was strange, though, was that everything was gigantic! “Shit! SHIT! What’s going on? Where the hell am I? Crap, where’s my PSP?”

You turned around to spot your PSP lying on the ground nearby. Thankful that it wasn’t damaged at all, you started to run toward it until a loud crash knocked you off your feet. You stared in shock at the sight in front of you. A brown boot had just stepped in front of you, missing you by (to you) mere inches. The foot had also crushed your PSP! Straining your neck back, you looked up to see the face of Simon from Gurren Lagann looking down at you.

“Oh, hi there. What are you supposed to be?” he asked in an innocent tone. This was crazy. You’d shrunken and been warped to the world of Tengen Toppa Gurren Lagann. Plus, a giant Simon was now looking down at your tiny body. You couldn’t help but feel a little…excited. Sure, your PSP had just been crushed, but how many people get to be transported to such an amazing world like this?! And Simon, who you always thought was kind of cool, was standing above you like a god. He was dressed in his typical blue vest and brown pants. His vest was open to reveal his almost bare chest, save for his abdomen which was wrapped in white cloth. While you were still admiring his form and the aura he seemed to give off, Simon reached down and scooped you up into his hand. The hand rose to his face and you stared into his dark blue eyes. “I guess you didn’t hear me from down there. I’ll ask again: what are you supposed to be?”

You snapped out of your daze and gladly answered him. “Um…I’m a human. Like you.” This made Simon laugh, which kind of surprised you.

“A human? Seriously? I know we can be small sometimes, like me, but you’re WAY too small to be a human. No, I think you’re actually a Beastman! Probably crossed with a mouse…or a bug. Did you come here to spy on us, little Beastman?”

You shook your head. “No, I’m serious. I’m really a human. I must have been shrunken or something. Do I look like a Beastman to you?” Simon scanned over you and thought for a moment. It was true, you didn’t look like a Beastman. However, Beastmen were tricky and who’s to say they haven’t developed a way to hide their identities? After several moments of thinking, Simon grinned down at you. The grin kind of freaked you out as the joy of coming to this world started to fade.

“I think you’re lying. You’re a Beastman spy and I’m going to get what you know out of you! Either that, or I can make it so there’s one less Beastman in the world…” Simon cracked a smile. You were now officially scared.

15511111.content:
Simon lifted one glistening bare foot out of it's shoe. And immediately both of you were overcome with a horrid smell. Simon saw you wrinkling your nose and chuckled,

"Yep...I've always had chronic foot odor ever since the early days when I used to dig. Funny thing is that I make an effort to not show my feet in front of anyone so they won't have even more reasons to say I stink....Until now that is...heh heh"

He lowered you down down down until he finally felt it was safe to do, and he let you go. You screamed for a few short seconds before you hit the wet spongy, and reeking insole of Simon's leather shoe. You unstuck your face from a sticky glob of toejam and looked up to see him flexing his foot above you.

"Ready to talk yet?" Simon said, thoroughly enjoying having power over someone who was smaller than him for a change.

"I-*cough*....I swear I don't know anything Simon!" You cry up t o him. However you'd soon learn that that one slip of the tongue would cost you dearly.

"Wait a second! How do you know my name?" He demanded retracting his foot for a moment.

"I uh..." You stammer.

"I knew it! You are a spy!" He said before he crammed his sweaty bare foot into the well worn shoe. Trapping you underneath his foul smelling boytoes.
15511111.title: Foot Torture With Simon!

choices: Simon goes to check up on Rossiu.
Yoko demands that Simon and Kamina get washed up.
155111111.content:
It was cramp and hot in his shoe. The toes pushed you all the way to the front of his boot and crammed you under them. Your arms tried to pry his toes away, but they easily overpowered you. Simon kicked his boot around to make sure you were in tight.

“Get comfortable, spy. And wiggle as much as you want; it feels good.” Simon said as he smirked down at his shoe. He then started to make his way out of the room, each step shaking your world. The lower portion of your body received the most pressure, causing you to strain your head in discomfort. Simon strolled down the hall of the base until he reached a large meeting room. Seated in the room were several of his comrades, plus the Aday twins playing on the floor.

“Hey Simon!” screamed Yoko from across the room. “Look at you, you didn’t even shower! Do you like reeking to high heaven?” Simon stuttered before the older woman, until another a large hand landed on his head and another voice spoke from behind.

“Well of course he does!” came Kamina, entering the room after Simon and looking just as sweaty as him. “He’s a man, after all. Men enjoy the smell of hard-earned sweat. Isn’t that that, little guy?”

Simon chuckled nervously. “Yeah, sure thing, big bro.” Yoko sighed and mumbled something about them being idiot men. Simon looked around the room, then suddenly noticed something strange. “Hey, where’s Rossiu?”

Leeron, who was twiddling a pen in his fingers, answered Simon without looking up from the table. “That poor boy hasn’t left his room in days. I think he’s working on something big, but I am worried about the dear.”

You listened to the conversations above you silently. You had no control over the situation, so you just waited for Simon to move again.
155111111.title: Listening from the Shoe

choices: Kamina and Simon take turns washing you and each other
1551111112.content:
Inside your reeking prison the best you can do is hope that Simon will eventually relent and let you out and give you a proper chance to defend yourself, or somehow get free of his grasp and try to get help from one of the other people on Simon's team. The second option is probably your best bet at this point since Simon himself seemed hell bent on not even trying to listen to you. Maybe Kamina would be more forgiving, maybe Yoko would be lenient, maybe Leeron would be more understanding...

Suddenly, the shoe you're in lurches backwards and Simon's toes curl reflexively around you, forcing your face deeper into the sweaty flesh. You feel like you're going to vomit and pass out, in that order.

Outside the shoe Yoko had stomped over to Simon and Kamina, ready to read them the riot act for being so gross, and Simon had panicked at her advancement and fell over himself into Kamina. Kamina wrapped an arm around his shoulders and steadied him.

"Alright enough is enough! I don't care how much you two enjoy being covered in sweat and crud you're going to wash yourselves right now!"

"Fine, fine, if it'll get you off our backs we'll do it!" Kamina replied, turning Simon around and walking toward the bathroom. Yoko sighed and sat back down, rubbing her temples.

"I swear that man is going to be the death of me..."

As soon as the door to the bathroom was closed Kamina stripped naked and hit the water faucets, filling up a huge community bath tub that was sunk into the floor. Simon had thrown his jacket aside and undone the cloth around his stomach when he remembered you. He glanced over at his bro and wondered if he should tell him about you. There really wasn't any reason not to. Besides, Kamina was considered the leader around here, it would be wrong not to tell him about spies! With that in mind, Simon finished stripping out of his clothes and pulled off his shoes revealing your tiny body glued to his toes by the sweat. He pulled you off and jumped into the steaming water next to Kamina.

"Hey bro? I've got something to tell you."

Kamina grinned and patted his little bro on the head. "Sure thing! What's on your mind Simon?"

"Well I found a little Beastman running around! See?"

He held you up for Kamina to examine. After getting tossed around inside of Simon's shoe for so long, with no hope of being let go, you take this opportunity to jump up and shout, "You have to help me! I'm not a Beastman!"

Simon instantly clenched his hand in a fist putting pressure on your chest causing a gasp to issue from within. Kamina bends his dripping head closer to Simon's fist and looks into your scared and miserable face.

"Where did you find this guy Simon?"

"He was wandering around the hall earlier. He said he wasn't a Beastman but he knew my name! Besides, what kind of human is so small? He has to be a spy!"

Kamina looked surprised at this and said, "Hey, hey, hey! Simon, you can't judge a man just because he's small! The worth of a man is in his heart and soul, not his height! You of all people should know that!"

Simon looked shocked at what his bro was saying and shook the hand you were in. "Yeah, but it's just not normal! No human could possibly be so small!"

Kamina sternly held out his hand and said, "Hand him over Simon. I want to talk to him."

Simon reluctantly dropped you into Kamina's hand. You quickly rise to your feet again and peer hopefully into the even bigger giant's eyes. They were fierce, scanning your tiny body intently, taking in every detail. Kamina's hand was rough under your bare feet, callused from his time wielding a sword and piloting the Gurren. You hoped, you prayed that Kamina would be merciful and let you explain yourself. Finally, after five minutes of waiting, Kamina said, "Well you don't look like a Beastman. Where do you come from little guy?"

That was a loaded question. As best you can you relate what happened omitting things like your PSP which wouldn't mean anything to Kamina anyway. After you were done Kamina leaned back and closed his eyes, thinking. After a few minutes he finally sits up and grins at you.

"Well I don't know anything about other worlds but if you swear loyalty to Team Gurren than I don't care where you came from!"

You sink to her knees in relief, so happy that your trying time was now over. Simon looks at Kamina in shock and sputters, "Are you sure about this bro?"

Kamina flashes a thumbs up and replies, "Of course! Don't you worry Simon! If this guy does turn out to be a spy we can easily crush him! So what do you say little guy? Are you going to join us?"

You jump up and throw your fist in the air. "Yes I will!"

Kamina shouts out, "I like your drive kid! From now on you're on the winning team defending the planet!"

Simon smiled weakly and said, "Well if you trust him, then I trust him too!"

Kamina then proceeds to rip your clothes off and drop you into the water. "Alright guys lets have a great bath together and introduce our new friend to the rest of the crew!"
1551111112.title: Bath Time and New Friends

15511112.content:
While you had your eyes locked on the young giant, you suddenly noticed his body was covered in droplets of sweat. The palm you were on was also sweaty and he was giving off a lot of heat and body odor. He noticed your eyes scanning him and smiled.

“Yeah, I just back from a big battle with your comrades. That small cockpit can get really hot after awhile, you know? Yoko would kill me if she saw me like this. You wanna see?” you shook your head rapidly. “No? Too bad.” Simon’s hand curled around you and gripped you in his fist. He lifted his left arm up and his vest fell back to reveal a hairless, sweaty pit. Burying is face into it, Simon began sniffing it. He sighed and drew his head back. “Real smelly in there. Here, have a closer look.”

Without warning, Simon plunged you into his armpit like a stick of deodorant. You didn’t even have time to scream, but maybe that was better since none of the humid sweat got into your mouth. You were still pushed into the hot pit violently and dragged back and forth along it. You released the pit was, in fact, not completely hairless. Tiny blue hairs were present, only long enough to tickle your face and smear sweat over you. Simon retraced you from his pit and looked you over.

“How was that? Ready to give me some info now? How’d you get in here?” he questioned with stern-looking eyes.

“I…I don’t know.” you mumbled. “I was taking a walk and I suddenly ended up here! I swear, it’s the truth!”

“Yeah, sure, sure.” Simon said, not believing you. The giant boy switched you with his other hand and lifted his right arm up. He motioned you over to it and you whimpered for him to stop. Your pleas were ignored, though, as you were once again forced into the sweaty hell. “Make sure you soak up all of it, little spy.’

15532221.content:
If you had been told yesterday you wouldn’t have thought it were true. That you, Maine Charati a normal high school guy would be shrunk at your upperclasman crush’s feet. But it was true. And you loved it all.

Kazuichi Soda was your senpai, or your upperclassmen, in Hope’s Peak Acadamey. While you where a reserve course student you still hung around some of the ‘real’ hope’s peak students also known as the ultimate students.
Kazuichi was your biggest crush and you had tried several times to talk to him... though you would always back out in fear of rejection.
However you one day managed to build up courage to talk to him and you two became close freinds. You told him everything, (except your crush on him) even your fetish of being shrunk at a guy’s feet. Kazuichi seemed to take note of that and he began to work on a new project. You would ask, “What are you making?” He would usually respond with “Your Present!” You would try to ask him more but he would playfully tease you until you stopped.
One night you decided you would tell him about your crush after he gave you your gift. You got ready and met him at his house. Kazuichi had his typical shark toothed grin as you arrived and he immediately ushured you inside. You went to his room, which was a decently messy room. Dirty clothes were scattered across the floor and tools lined his desk and dresser. On the bed however you saw a small ray gun. Kazuichi smilled and picked up the ray gun.
“So you told me about your little fetish and i was thinkin’ how could i make my freind’s dream come true? Well then it came to me! Make a shrink ray and shrink him!”
You were both confused and amused.
At first you didnt think he actually made one. But then he pointed and shot it at you. You felt sick and fell back.
When you awoke you were 2 inches tall with giant socked toes covering your body like a sweaty blanket.
Looking up you saw Kazuichi’s concerned smile. He lifted you up and smiled “Well... what do you think?”
“W-wow Senpai! I love it!” Kazuichi blushed “well you know me. I’m a helpful guy.” You chuckled.
“So. Who do you want me to take you to? Im sure some of the guys will be willing to take you in.”
With a determined smile on your face you-
15532221.title: Kazuichi

155322211.content:
“I love you Kazuichi! Please be my master!”
Kazuichi was taken aback. “W-what!?” He asked blushing wildly. “You want me, to be your master!?” He was smiling and blushing.
You nodded and kissed his chin. “Please?”
Kazuichi looked lost in thought for a bit.
“Okay. I’ll be your master.” He said smiling. “So, how do you like your masters?” He asked in a teasing voice. He smiled at you
“Well i love a rough hard master thats also sweet and caring.” You said blushing.
“Well then, you got your man.” He said winking.
“Now lets get started.” He lifted his legs up onto his bed and set you down. Afterwards he pressed his feet onto you, squishing you between his sweaty black socks.

The itty-bitty Kiba was glued in placed by Naruto’s toe jam.

Naruto laughed high above him and released his toes, trapping Kiba in a world of rank, sweaty flesh. He flexed his toes a bit before saying, “Mmm, Kiba. You feel so good between my toes.” Naruto continued to flex his toes while smiling down at them. Kiba felt just like a speck of dirt, and would probably break just as easily if he wasn’t careful. After getting used to the speck between his toes, Naruto dried himself off and put his clothes back on before heading out the hot spring doors. He was about to begin a nice jog around the village to build up a good sweat when he heard his name being called from behind him. Turning around, he saw…

I told you that now's not the time for this." As soon as Naruto said this, he tried to escape from the hyperactive kid, but he just couldn't.

Naruto resisted. Konohamaru was such a nuisance! All Naruto wanted was to continue torturing Kiba, but he couldn't because of Konohamaru. "Hmm...A really tough training, huh?" In a flash, Konohamaru was the size of an ant.

To Konohamaru, everything got bigger. "Wh-What are you doing leader? Why did you made me so tiny?" Konohamaru stammered as he examined his surroundings. "You wanted training right? Well here it is. It's a test of endurance." Naruto removed his right sandal, while Kiba was under his foot in his left sandal. "But shoudn't you be the one smaller than me leader? I was already a lot shorter than you!" Konohamaru shouted to the towering giant. "Nonsense! You want to be strong right? Well, if you endure this, you will be." 1553311121111212211111111221121122112.title: Shrinking the brat

15533111211112122111111112211211221122.content:
The tiny academy student looked up in fright at the orange giant before him. All he wanted from his sensei was some training, but he ended up shrunken instead! Was this really going to make him a tougher ninja?

“You ready for your training, Konohamaru?” Naruto asked, wiggling his toes in anticipation.

“Here? Shouldn’t we go somewhere more private, like the training field?” Konohamaru asked back to his giant boss.

“Nah, no one’s looking. Here’s fine.” Naruto glanced around and chuckled. If anyone did pass by, they wouldn’t see the ant-sized kid unless they looked really hard.

“Well…what’s my training going to be, leader?”

“We’re going to test out your evading skills, Konohamaru. Get ready!”

“My evading skills?” Konohamaru looked confused, but suddenly understood when the giant Naruto raised his bare foot in the air and hovered it over him, covering him with its shadow. The boy’s face twisted into pure fear as he yelped and dove out of the shadow just as the foot started coming down. Konohamaru rolled out of the way by the skin of his teeth and the foot hit the ground behind him. The terrifying stomp created a gust of wind that blew Konohamaru a few inches away from the foot.

“Leader, what are you *cough* thinking? Are you trying *cough* to kill me?!” Konohamaru shouted as he fanned the dust out of his face.

“Hey, if you can’t handle my training, that’s not my fault. You wanted something tough and challenging.” Naruto explained to the tiny brat as he picked his foot off the ground and raised it over his shrunken pupil again. Konohamaru saw it coming this time and raced to safety, but the foot fell a bit faster this time and Konohamaru still escaped just in time. He wasn’t going to be able to keep this up…

“Leader, how long do I have to do this?” the nine-year-old shinobi asked, already running low on stamina.

“Don’t be a wuss, Konohamaru. You only dodged two so far. Dodge three more and you’ll complete the exercise, okay?”

“F-fine, but I’m not going to make it easy for you!” Konohamaru yelled up to his leader with newfound energy. The goggle wearing boy made a hand seal before shouting, “Shadow Clone Jutsu!” An explosion enveloped Konohamaru and after it cleared, three Konohamarus were standing where the one used to be.

“Oh, looks like you’ve been practicing…” Naruto complimented his student, even though he thought of him more as a slave right now. Naruto raised his bare, sweaty foot over the three look-alikes and stomped down just as they scattered, missing all of them. Naruto growled in frustration as he watched the three tiny bugs scurrying around him. “Which one is the real one, I wonder…”Naruto picked one and raised his foot over it, stomping down too quickly for the boy to escape. Naruto felt Konohamaru crunch under his giant foot and grinned in victory, but that grin turned to a scowl when he felt an explosion under his foot. The clone had dispelled…

“Wrong one, leader!” one of the remaining Konohamarus shouted. Naruto looked over at the two bugs and noticed they were grinning widely. Just a few moments ago the kid was scared for his life, but now it looked like he was having fun. It seems like the reality of his situation hadn’t sunk in yet…

“Don’t get cocky, kid! I’ll defiantly get you with the last one!” Naruto shouted back as he lifted his foot and watched the two targets run off in different directions, one left and the other right. The giant genin chose quickly and hovered his foot over…
