“...to be put in my sandal with my foot.” Naruto told is tiny Konohamaru as the boy stared up at him in bewilderment.

“I-In your sandal? Is that safe, leader?” the shrunken kid asked as he examined his teacher’s gigantic and sweaty foot.

“Sure it is! Just as long as you don’t get crushed under the pressure!” Naruto laughed out loud as Konohamaru chuckled nervously, thinking his boss was just joking. Naruto used his toes to grip Konohamaru around the waist and lift him into the air before discarding him onto his blue footwear. The tiny ninja-in-training laid down flat on his back and watched Naruto slip his foot into his sandal, slowly covering him in smelly make flesh. Soon Konohamaru felt his body and arms get pinned underneath the giant’s warm foot with only his head resting between two toes. Naruto grinned down at him before looking forward and taking the first step. Konohamaru felt himself go weightless right before a crushing weight fell upon his frail body. Konohamaru grunted and endured the pain, which lifted in seconds…only to come back a second later. Not only was the pressure difficult to put up with, but the only air Konohamaru could breath was contaminated with Naruto’s stinky foot odor. The boy gagged and wanted to cover his nose, but he couldn’t move his arms the slightest.

After several minutes of walking through the village, Naruto glanced down at his right sandal and saw his newest slave writhing with discomfort.

“Toughen up, Konohamaru! How do you expect to survive as my sla-er-pupil if you can’t even take the smell of my feet?”

“Sorry, leader. It just smells so bad…” Konohamaru coughed a bit more as he sniffed up some more sweat and stench.

“Get used to it, kid! That’s the smell of a mighty ninja like me!” Naruto said as he smiled proudly. “Besides, you don’t want to lose to Kiba, do you?”

“Kiba?! He’s taking this training to? Is he the same size as me?”

“Not exactly. He didn’t like being so small and tried to get back to normal, but ended up shrinking even more! I think he’s about a quarter your size…”

“Wow, that’s awesome!” Konohamaru grinned, imagining himself being bigger than Kiba and being able to push him around. The leader’s shrinking jutsu was really something.

“Hey, leader, I just got a great idea!”

Naruto sighed and rolled his eyes. Even at a few inches tall, the kid still couldn’t keep quiet. “What is it, Konohamaru?”

“You should use this shrinking jutsu to shrink Sasuke! You’d defiantly be able to get him back if he was really small!”

Naruto almost burst into laughter and suppressed it into a slight giggle. “Yeah, well, you never know…” Naruto replied, hiding the fact that Sasuke had already shrunk and been disposed of.

“And leader…”

“That’s it! New training rule: no more talking!”

“But-!”

“No buts!” Naruto glared down at his sandal and started to squeeze Konohamaru’s head with his toes. “Unless you want to be in MY butt!”

“Okay, okay! I’m sorry!” Konohamaru cried as it felt like his noggin was going to pop like a grape. Naruto released his head and muttered, “Good, now shut up.” before continuing his trek through the village. Konohamaru kept his mouth shut and just stared up at the towering Naruto above him. He was really taking this training seriously…

“Ow! What’s the big idea, leader?!” Konohamaru cried as he stood up and rubbed his behind.

“You’re going to act as my insole during the walk home. Think of it as more training!” Naruto said, knowing that Konohamaru would agree to anything if he thought it was training.

“So, this is more nose training, leader?”

“Yep, but not just that! The weight of my entire body is going to be coming down on you, so you have to endure the pressure too. This is to ensure that if an enemy ninja tosses a huge boulder on you, you don’t get turned into a leaf ninja pancake!”

“I understand, Naruto! I won’t get turned into a pancake no matter what!”

“Glad to hear it, now lie down on your back.”

Konohamaru did as he was told and laid himself down on the sandal. He watched as Naruto slowly slipped his rank foot back into his blue footwear. Soon Naruto’s giant foot was once again pressing down on him, but this time Konohamaru’s head wasn’t sticking out between his toes. The boy’s entire body was being smothered by his boss’s sole. Naruto sighed as he felt Konohamaru’s shrunken body squirm under his foot. It felt much better now.

“Your turn, dog breath!” Naruto pinched the puny Kiba between his fingers and brought him up to his smirking face. Kiba struggled hopelessly between Naruto’s tree-like digits, knowing the true nature behind the giant’s smile.

“Don’t do this, Naruto! It’ll be a miracle if I survive under your foot at this size! I’ll get squished for sure!” Kiba begged, now wanting to end up like Sasuke.

“Toughen up, Kiba. Part of being a great ninja is luck! So…good luck!” Naruto laughed evilly as he slipped off his other sandal and tossed Kiba onto its rough surface. As soon as Kiba landed, he scrambled back to his feet and tried to escape the shadow formed by Naruto’s quickly descending foot. The giant fox boy was too fast, however, and Kiba soon found himself laying on his stomach with Naruto’s titanic foot pressed down on him.

“Please, Naruto, I make a terrible insole!” the dog ninja pleaded, but Naruto couldn’t hear his muffled shouts. He was thinking the same thing, though, as he could barely feel the pint-sized Kiba under his sole. Kiba wasn’t making his right foot feel any better, but Naruto didn’t seem to care. The idea that Kiba was fighting for his life under his smelly, sweaty foot was good enough for him. Satisfied, Naruto began his trek back to the village.

It was a long way out of the forest and it didn’t help that Naruto got a bit lost along the way. Each step he took threatened to squash one of his slaves, and they probably would have been crushed by now if he was putting his full weight on his feet. By the time Naruto arrived back in the village, both shrunken shinobi were covered in their giant master’s sweat and were very weak from the smell and pressure being put on them. Kiba was in the biggest pickle, being so much smaller than Konohamaru. The smell would of knocked him out cold if it wasn’t for the constant weight that was being forced on top of him.

“Almost there, bugs.” Naruto whispered to himself. “Try not to become leaf ninja pancakes!”
1553311121111212211111111221121122112221.title: Leaf Ninja Make Great Insoles

choices: Kiba Foolishly Confronts Naruto, But He Gets Foot Tortured
Konohamaru Foolishly Confronts Naruto, But He Gets Foot Tortured
1553311121111212211111111221121122112221.content:
"Ow boy, I've never felt so good. It feels great having you two there." Naruto said as he moved his feet in the sandals, as he enjoyed the tiny ants under them. Konohamaru felt a bit uncomfortable. His leader's smelly foot was always pressing on him, and Konohamaru felt as if he was already beeing turned into a flat pancake. As if that wasn't enough, the nasty smell was making Konohamaru dizzy.




"H-Hey, lead-" Konohamaru couldn't finish his sentance as Naruto's foot was making itself comfortable over him. From all of this, Konohamaru felt like a true insole for his boss. Naruto didn't seem to care what happened to him, and he just wanted to have an insole. Konohamaru moved with all of his strenght so that he could see his leader's face from between the dirty toes.



"Leader, hey, I want to ask you something." Konohamaru shouted, so that the giant blond could hear him. "Ugh! You just never shut up! Just when I was enjoying the softness you and Kiba provided me with, you just had to ruin it for me!" Naruto said, as he began to get extremely annoyed by the brat. Even when he was normal size, he was just as annoying to him. Naruto could never get some rest at piece, even though sometimes he wished to teach Konohamaru a few things.



"Isn't it getting too much leader ? I mean...you did say that I was going to act as ...um... your insole, but this is just ridiculous! You are LITERALLY using me as one. If you were the same size, I'd never do that to you!"


"Really ? Didn't you enjoy it when you made Kiba smell your foot ?" Naruto said with a grin. "Well...I did...a little, but I'd never use him like you use us."

"Ofcourse you wouldn't. It's because you can't! He's still bigger than your foot, while you two are like ants to me." Naruto chuckled as he reached his house. He kicked off his sandals, and removed the two tiny ants from his insole. He opened the door to his room, sat on his bed and placed the shrunken ninja on the ground. He looked down at them grinning.


"Leader! Sorry, but I demand that you return me to normal size!!! I've had it for today."
"You're not going anywhere Konohamaru." Naruto said as he stamped his foot next to the tiny brat. Konohamaru clearly saw that he was just as tall as Naruto's pinky toe.


"I've also had it! I'm not going to be your foot toy forever!" Kiba growled in his wrath. Both of them were mad at Naruto, but Naruto sees that he's going to enjoy this.
1553311121111212211111111221121122112221.title: A too strong smell and a too strong pressure

choices: Konohamaru gives in and licks his new master's foot.
Konohamaru refuses to obey Naruto and attacks the foot instead.
1553311121111212211111111221121122112221.content:
Before any of them could say another word, Kiba suddenly took off toward Naruto. The giant fox boy watched amusingly as the speck-sized Kiba ran across his floor toward one of his feet. Kiba focused chakra into his own feet and ran up the side of Naruto’s foot. Once he was on top of the giant mass of flesh, Kiba began punching, kicking, and even scratching the top of Naruto’s foot. Unfortunately, Kiba was just too small to cause any damage to Naruto. His attempts to harm his master hardly registered with the giant genin.

“When are you going to learn your place, Kiba? You’re a bug to me. A bug!” Naruto taunted as he used his other foot to wipe the pesky bug off his foot. After the young shinobi tumbled to the floor, Naruto brought his foot over him and began to smother the tiny pup once again. There was nothing Kiba could do to fight Naruto, he could only lay there and allow the wall of sweaty flesh to dominate him. After awhile of smothering Kiba under his warm foot, Naruto picked the foot off the floor and inspected the bottom of it. Kiba was glued his sole and was struggling to free himself. No matter how much effort he out into his struggles, he wouldn’t budge. He was stuck to the giant’s foot like a fly trapped on sandpaper.

“You’re so weak, Kiba. That’s why you make a great foot toy! I don’t want to smush you, so just accept your new life already.”

“Screw you!” Kiba shouted and spit at Naruto’s face. The spit didn’t even reach the titan and Naruto just smirked.

“Fine, have it your way.” Naruto said before his face became obstructed by another wall of flesh. It took a moment for Kiba to realize that it was Naruto’s other foot! The cruel blond listened to Kiba scream for just a second before he brought his feet together and started grinding Kiba between them. He snickered in delight as he felt the tiny bug get rubbed down. His feet were really sweaty and he heard them make sick squelching noises as they rubbed against each other. Naruto’s other slave, Konohamaru, watched all of his unfold. He was finally beginning to understand that this was no training…Naruto had kidnapped the two of them and was using them like toys!

“Leader, please stop!” the little kid screamed up to the giant blond. “You’re hurting him!”

Naruto ignored the brat’s pleas and continued to rub his feet together. He rubbed Kiba down for a good few minutes before he finally separated his feet with a loud squelching sound. The dog ninja was stuck to his left foot, still conscious and twitching a bit. Naruto peeled the speck off his foot with a singe finger and let the genin drop to the floor. Without giving Kiba any time to rest, Naruto hovered his big toe over Kiba’s frail body and began to press down on him. Kiba screamed in agony as he felt the enormous digit slowly crush him.

“No!! Naruto, stop! You’re going to kill him!” Konohamaru cried out, tears streaming from his eyes. Naruto gave Konohamaru an evil look before chuckling and letting up a bit on the pressure. He was still pressing down on Kiba lightly and could crush the speck at any moment.

“I’m not going to stop just because you told me to, Konohamaru.” Naruto said to the small boy. “I can do anything I want with you bugs because I’m bigger than you! Now, make yourself useful and lick my foot while I’m teaching this mutt a lesson.” The orange ninja placed his right foot (the one that wasn’t torturing Kiba) in front of Konohamaru. The academy student looked at it for a few seconds before staring back up into Naruto’s sinister, blue eyes.

“Please don’t do this, leader. I want to go home!” Konohamaru yelled up at him.

“This is your home now, brat. I’ll take good care of you as long as you do as I say. If you don’t, you might find yourself a stain under my foot like Sasuke…”

“S-Sasuke? You…you crushed Sasuke?!”

Naruto nodded and replied, “Yup! Finally put that smug rival of mine in his place.”

“Naruto…how could you do that?” Konohamaru said in a combination of sadness and anger. He was sad that the shinobi he had always looked up to was treating him like this and angry because he hated this evil side of Naruto.
1553311121111212211111111221121122112221.title: Putting His Slaves in Their Place

choices: They're powerless and Naruto stomps them out one by one
One of the ANBU bites Naruto's foot
1553311121111212211111111221121122112221.content:
"Alright, leader. I'll do it." Konohamaru said, as he approached the sweaty foot. Despite hesitating, he began licking it. The taste was everything but pleasent. Naruto sighned a bit and felt Konohamaru licking it.


"I'm glad that you're so sensible Konohamaru. I don't want to hurt you. Though, if you had refused me, I don't know what I would've done to you...and you still don't want to know, right ?" Naruto asked as he glanced at him. Konohamaru nodded instantly in agreement.


Naruto then turned his attention to the tiny Kiba under his foot. "You know Kiba....I'm not the kind of person to torture people, but I can't stand it when somebody refuses me...especially not, when I have the advantage. I'll let you go this time, if you apologize nicely."


"S-sorry. I won't refuse you Naruto! But please, just stop it. I don't want to die! Not this way!" Kiba said as he was struggling from under Naruto's foot. When Naruto heard this, he lifted his foot from Kiba. Kiba was all dirty and sweaty and smelling like Naruto's feet.


"I'll give you a rest for now Kiba." Naruto said as he turned his attention to Konohamaru. Konohamaru was licking non-stop and he wasn't enjoying it. After some more of this, Naruto finally said to Konohamaru to stop licking it. Konohamaru thumped on the floor all tired.

"Sigh...I'm bored..." Naruto sighed as he ran out of ideas. "Well Naruto, how about you grow us back?" Kiba asked. "Grow you?! Why? So you can try to shrink me? Do I look that stupid to you?" Naruto asked him.

"Heh" Is all that Kiba muttered, as if saying yes. After all, Naruto wasn't really smart. "He has a point leader. I just want to be normal sized...PLEASE return us to normal!" Konohamaru begged the giant blond.


"First of all, I don't want to return you to normal. You're more useful like that. And second, I don't have such a scroll...a growing scroll."


"You idiot. It's in Tsunade's office. There are all kinds of scrolls there, including that. I think it was called "The Size Increasement Scroll" Kiba said trying to remember.


"Really?! Wow...I didn't know there was such a thing. You know what...? I'm going to use it!" Naruto said, as he quickly came up with a plan.

"Great! But you need to point the scroll at us, so you can grow us back to normal size." Kiba said as he lit up with happyness.

"Who said anything about growing you back? I plan to use it on my self. You know...get huge! I'm going to make the village pay for when they hated me!" Naruto said as he started getting himself ready to go outside.


"Way to go Kiba..." Konohamaru said as he glanced at Kiba. "W-well...I thought that he was going to help us." Kiba stammered. "Yeah right." Konohamaru responded.


"I won't take you two with me, just in case you manage to get you size back. I'll just leave in here." Naruto said as he pulled a jar over them. "Hey, you can't do this!" Kiba screamed. "Yeah? I can put you in another pair of sandals of mine, if you want..." Naruto chuckled. "Oh, shut up Kiba. You'll just make it worse again" Konohamaru said.

Naruto dressed himself and got ready to go outside. He locked the door to his apartament and took the shrinking scroll with him, just in case something came in the way. He reached the Hokage building and entered it. When he entered the hallway before the door to the Hokage's office, he took his sandals off to prepare his feet for the rampage.

"Naruto Uzumaki. Stop right there" a mysterious voice said from behind him. It was 3 ANBU members. "What do you want from me?" Naruto asked.


"Sasuke Uchiha has went missing. He was last seen with you. Where is he?" The ANBU leader asked. "Huh? How should I know?! I'm not his wife!" Naruto responded. "So you say that you don't know? How can we trust you? Do you have any evidence that you can provide us with?" One of the ANBU guys said.


"Listen, I'm telling you that I don't know anything!" Naruto said. "You'll come with us for interrogation." the third ANBU guy said as all three ANBU pulled out their swords. "It would be good if you don't resist. Now turn around so you can face us...and do it slowly!" The ANBU leader commanded. Naruto then reached for the shrinking scroll in his jumpsuit.

"STOP! What are you hiding there?" The ANBU leader asked. "Oh, it's nothing. It's just a scroll containing various jutsus. How about I give it to you, and in return you let me go? But I'll have to turn around so I can give it to you" Naruto said as he snickered quetly.


"Fine. You may." The ANBU leader said. Naruto turned around slowly so he was now facing the three ANBU members, and pointed the scroll at them. "What is it for?" the 2nd ANBU guy asked. "Well...it's for a SHRINKING JUTSU" Naruto said with a huge grin on his face. The three ANBU started shrinking. To them Naruto was getting taller, but they realized that it was not him who was getting taller, but it was they who were shrinking. They stopped shrinking when they were the size of his ankle.


"What is this?! Is this a genjutsu?" one of the ANBU asked. "Nope. It's as real as I am. And I've shrunken you to the size of ants." Naruto snickered.

"You tricked us!" The ANBU leader said. "More than that, what is he doing with such a jutsu? It's a forbidden jutsu!" the 3rd ANBU said.


"Bla-bla. I'm afraid that I can't let you go either now. If I do, you're going to call for reinforcements and things are going to get tough for me! So let's just get this over with." Naruto said as he grinned, and stomped to the three tiny ANBU members.


"Even like this, we're not going to go down without a fight. Scatter!" The ANBU leader commanded.
1553311121111212211111111221121122112221.title: Naruto's plan

choices: Meanwhile, Kiba and Konohamaru find a way to escape.
1553311121111212211111111221121122112221.content:
Naruto watched as the trio of ANBU scattered in different directions. They’re petty efforts amused the blond giant, who continued to stomp forward. The ANBU were supposed to be very intelligent and experienced ninja, but if they thought their tactics were going to work on someone his size, they were about to have the truth come crashing down on them.

Once the group had surrounded Naruto, the titan stopped and waited for their next move. Suddenly, tiny kunai and shurikens were flying through the air and cutting at Naruto’s legs. Unfortunately, the ninja tools were just too small to even penetrate the fabric of Naruto’s pants. When one of the ANBU noticed their assault wasn’t working, he decided to target Naruto’s soft spot: his bare foot. The man ran over to the fox boy’s foot, took out his sword, and swung. A small, barely visible cut was made in Naruto’s skin and the giant looked down angrily at his attacker. Before the experienced shinobi could react, the same foot he had slashed lifted over him and stomped down with unbelievable force. The two other ANBU watched in horror as their comrade was crushed instantly. Naruto smiled evilly as he continued to pulverize the insect’s flattened corpse, relishing in the crunching sounds it made. The ANBU duo got over the cruel death of their partner quickly and took this opportunity to attack. They both made a few hand signs and released two streams of fire at Naruto’s upper body. What would have been a devastating attack barely registered with Naruto, who only noticed the flames after he had finished crushing the first ANBU. The white hot flames couldn’t even singe Naruto’s jumpsuit, let alone harm him. Naruto responded to the attack by throwing a kick at the small men. One of them rolled to dodge while the other one took the full force of the blow and went flying several feet back. Before giving the ANBU the chance to stand up (which he couldn’t do anyway, since most of his bones had been broken) Naruto ran over to him and stomped down, squishing him as well.

“I thought the ANBU were supposed to be strong? You guys are even weaker than Konohamaru!” Naruto mocked as he finished squishing his second victim into paste. He turned his eyes to the last one, who was kneeling and clutching his left leg. Apparently, he hadn’t managed to dodge the blow completely. Naruto grinned and stomped over to the shrunken man, who looked up at the god-sized boy with fear.

“W-why are you doing this?! You’re a Konoha shinobi; why are you murdering your comrades?!”

“You’re the ones who pointed swords at me.” Naruto replied as he raised his bare foot over the injured man, who could clearly see bits and pieces of his comrades stuck to the dirty sole. “Besides, who would think of bugs as comrades?” Naruto gave the scared ANBU one last grin before stomping down.

A few seconds later, Naruto entered the Hokage’s office after dealing with the three pests and wiping their remains on the floor. As he closed the door, he muttered to himself, “I better find that scroll fast before someone notices the mess in the hall. Once I’m a giant, everyone in the village will be a bug to me!” Naruto smiled at the thought and began his search. He tore apart Tsunade’s desk, her bookshelves, and even looked behind the shelves and potted plants. It was a powerful forbidden jutsu, so it was only right that it was hidden well. Naruto wasn’t going to give up, though. The scroll was somewhere in this room and he was going to find it!
1553311121111212211111111221121122112221.title: Naruto Vs. The Bug Trio

1553311121111212211111111221121122112221.content:
"C'mon! Where the heck has Tsunade hidden the scroll?" Naruto said out loud as he tried his best to find the scroll. Naruto looked everywhere, even in Tsunade's desk but he found nothing. "Darn! Kiba said that it was in this office...then why can't I find it!?" Naruto pondered. Naruto was starting to loose all hope, when he noticed something really tiny beside the mess he made. Naruto walked over to the red piece, and noticed that it was a scroll. "Wait! Could this be it?!" Naruto hyped when he found the scroll.



"But why is it so small?" Naruto asked himself as he barely holded it with his fingers. He was afraid not to drop it, because he may not find it again. "Oh, boy. If Kiba saw this, he'd probrably do anything to get it. But so do I!"
Just as Naruto was starting to try and open the tiny scroll, he heard somebody going up the stairs. "Crap! If it's Grannny Tsunade, I'm going to be in big trouble." Naruto started to panic. The door quickly opened and in walked none other than Shizune.


"T-Tsunade-sama! There's a-" Shizune couldn't finish her sentence as she just saw Naruto. Tsunade was nowhere to be seen. "N-Naruto-kun...ugh. Thank God" Shizune said as she wiped the sweat from her head with her hand. "Naruto-kun, there's something wrong with the ANBU...I was just coming from a mission, when I noticed flattened remains of tiny ANBU corpses along the hall. I don't know what's going on..." Shizune said looking down. Naruto remained silent for a few seconds, until deciding to tell her. "I can tell you what's going on." Naruto said.


"Really? Then please do." Shizune asked Naruto. Naruto reached for the shrinking scroll in his jumpsuit and pulled it out of it. "I shrank them, and then I killed them..." Naruto said. "Wh-wh-what?! B-but...you'd never do something like that." Shizune said amazed by the shocking news. "Yeah, I wouldn't but they wanted to take me for interrogation about Sasuke. They were even going to cause me harm. That's why I decided that it would be I who would make the first move if things were like that. They were hostile towards me!" Naruto said. "Naruto...they are supposed to be hostile. That's their job." Shizune said annoyed by Naruto's stupidity.


"Never mind that. Give me the scroll." Shizune demanded as she held her hand expecting for the scroll to be given to her. "I don't want to turn you into paste Shizune. I've known you for a long time, so don't make me shrink you." Naruto said as he backed away. "Then I have no other choice..." Shizune took a few steps back and locked the door, locking them inside. "I also got this other scroll. It's supposed to make me huge. And I want it!" Naruto said as he pulled out the tiny scroll. "Naruto-kun! That's a S-class forbidden jutsu. Don't use it!" Shizune said.


"Eh...I would've already used it, if I knew the handsigns. Say...how about you tell me? If you do, I'll try not to stomp on children when I get giant. If you don't though, the village will start smelling like my feet and I'll squash everybody who tries to resist me!" Naruto threatened. "What's the matter with you!? You've always said that you cherished the village. You were the last person from whom to expect such a thing!" Shizune said. "It's true that I cherish the village, but I want payback for the times when I was isolated...when everybody called me a monster. Before I had any friends...that's why I want to pay them back tenfold!" Naruto explained.


"If you won't tell me, then I'll just use the same handsign that I use for the shrinking. Let's see if it works." Naruto said. "N-No! Don't do it!" Shizune screamed. Naruto ignored her and quickly made the handsign and then put his hand on the scroll. "Enlargement Jutsu...or what ever..." Naruto stammered. Just as he said this, he started growing, and growing until he broke the roof of the Hokage Mansion. Shizune almost fainted when she saw the blond get so huge. Naruto stepped out of the Mansion and looked at his surroundings. He was as tall as the Hokage Mountain. He couldn't belive it. The feeling was intoxicating. "Ohhhh boy...Tsunade-sama's not going to like this!" Shizune said as she looked at the huge Naruto before her. "Peee-uh! And what's that smell?" Shizune pinched her nose. "That's the smell of my feet. They're pretty sweaty and things are just going to get better.".


"Shizune! What's going on?!" Tsunade said as she saw the enourmous Naruto. "Tsunade-sama! Where the heck where you?!" Shizune asked. "Ughhh...welll...you see..." Tsunade stammered embarassed. "Aha! You were out gambling again! When this is over, I'm going to tell Jiraya-sama about this!" Shizune finished. "H-hey now..." Tsunade stammered again. "Hey Granny! How's the view from down there?" Naruto said as he mocked Tsunade. "You little twerp...what did you say?!" Tsunade said as he started to crack her knuckles. 'Ha! Little! Do you even realize the irony?" Naruto said as he stomped creating a big boom. "Heh...even at this size, I can still smack you down. After all, I'm one of the Legendary Sannin...don't forget that." Tsunade said. "Tsunade-sama! Be careful!" Shizune warned.

"Oh wait. The ground is so rough. Let me just enlarge my sandals." Naruto said as he made the handsign again and his sandals became the size of two houses. He then put them on, but that didn't mean that he couldn't take them off when he wanted. "Alright Granny! What do you prefer? Beeing my insole or letting me use you to wash my feet?" Naruto said as he stomped to her. "Ohhh! You're gonna get it now!" Tsunade said as he charged towards Naruto, who was pondering whether to wash his feet with her or use her as an insole.
1553311121111212211111111221121122112221.title: Naruto finds the forbidden scroll

choices: "...what if you were up against more than one? Shadow Clone Jutsu!"
1553311121111212211111111221121122112221.content:
Little did Tsunade know, not only did Naruto’s size and strength increase, but also his speed. She learned this the hard way when Naruto’s sandaled foot suddenly whipped at her. She only had time to throw her arms up in defense before Naruto’s giant toes hit her and sent her flying into a nearby building.

“Ha! Barely used any strength in that kick!” Naruto bellowed, putting his hands on his hips and grinning victoriously.

“Tsunade-sama!” Shizune cried as he ran over to the several pounds of debris that has burrowed her master. Suddenly, the debris exploded outward as Tsunade punched her way out. The blow from the giant Genin had injured her, but not critically.

“Lucky shot, brat, but it’ll take a lot more than that to defeat the Hokage!” Tsunade screamed at the titan before she took off again. Before she could take her fourth step, another figure appeared in front of her and stopped her in her tracks. It was Kakashi.

“Miss, please let me handle this. As the Hokage, you should get someplace safe.” the silver haired Jonin said as he turned to his superior.

“But, Kakashi…”

“Please, Naruto is my student, allow me to take care of him.” Kakashi interrupted and turned to Shizune. “Shizune, please take the Hokage somewhere safe.”

“Uh…right.” Shizune replied. “This way, Tsunade-sama.” The female Jonin led Tsunade away from the giant, much to Tsunade’s distaste.

After the Hokage was safe, Kakashi turned to Naruto to see that the giant boy had already stomped over to him and was gleaming down at him with a grin.

“Hey there, Kakashi-sensei! Do you plan on taking me on?”

“Naruto! That jutsu is forbidden for a reason! Stop this recklessness at once before it’s too late!”

“I think it’s already too late, Kakashi-sensei. Just a few minutes ago I used the shrinking jutsu to turn three ANBU into little red stains! And just this morning I crushed Sasuke!”

“You what?! Naruto, how could you?!”

“It was easy! It was just like crushing a bug. Now that I’m a giant, I can crush anyone that opposes me! You’re better off just being my slave, Kakashi-sensei!”

“No! I will stop you, Naruto! It’s my duty as your sensei!”

“Okay then, but don’t hate me if you end up squashed because of your ‘duty”.” Naruto bellowed before lifting his foot and slamming it down on Kakashi. He didn’t feel any resistance under his sandal, however, and raised it to see that the older ninja was gone. The masked ninja appeared next to Naruto’s face, his hand covered in lightning.

“Raikiri!” Kakashi yelled as he plunged his hand into Naruto’s cheek. The giant howled in pain as a gash was made in his cheek. His hand flew up to smash Kakashi, but the superior shinobi jumped off his pupil’s face and dodged the hand. He wasn’t done yet, though. As he fell, the copy ninja made a few hand signs and blew a giant fireball at Naruto’s left foot.

“AAAHH!!! Hot, hot, hot!!” Naruto yelled as he hopped on one foot, causing mass destruction to the area around him. Kakashi landed safely on the roof of a building and watched as the giant blew on his singed foot.

“You may have grown a bit, but you’re still not good enough to beat me in a fight, Naruto!” Kakashi shouted, angering Naruto some more.

“Don’t get cocky, bug.” Naruto said as he finished nursing his foot and grinned at the smaller man. He pointed at his cheek and Kakashi watched the wound he made quickly close up. Naruto’s growth seemed to also increase the Kyuubi’s healing power. “You might think you can fight equally with a giant, but…”
1553311121111212211111111221121122112221.title: Teacher Vs. Student

choices: Kakashi is Put in Naruto's Smelly Sandal
Naruto makes Kakashi watch as He Makes the Whole Village Smell his Feet
1553311121111212211111111221121122112221.content:
Naruto did the handsign and created two more shadow clones of himself. Although not the original, they were still solid and crushed what stood beneath them. Kakashi just stood there as he saw three giant Naruto's. As if one wasn't a problem, three would be a crisis.


"Well, Kakashi-sensei, what do you think of this?" Naruto asked as he and his clones took a step to Kakashi.


"But you forget Naruto. I can also use Shadow clones. Shadow Clone Jutsu!" Kakashi did a handsign and created at least 100 shadow replications of himself.


"Ugh! So many bugs!" Naruto scoffed. "You know what they say, don't you Naruto? Three times zero is still zero. While one-hundred times one is one-hundred." Kakashi said as all the shadow clones prepared to fight.

"So you consider yourself a one? And you consider me a zero? That's what I don't like about you, Kakashi-sensei! You're always too arrogant. You think that you're the best, just like Sasuke! But now, that I have this size, you're just a tiny bug that I can abuse as much as I want." Naruto said.

"You've got to be kidding me. Abuse me?! Don't forget that I'm a Jonin and that you're a mere Genin. If anyone's going to get abused, it would be you."


"Maybe if I was normal size, but now, my toes are bigger than you. Besides, those ninja that I shrank were ANBU, and yet they died underfoot...literally." Naruto chuckled. "Enough talk! Go!" Kakashi commanded as all the shadow clones started to attack. "That's boring, Kakashi-sensei." Naruto said as he stomped his foot over 40 clones crushing them flat in one step. Before he realized though, 30 other of Kakashi's clones threw 30 fireballs over one of Naruto's clone, and it dispelled. Naruto's other clone, lifted it's foot over them and crushed all of them as well. Only 30 more of Kakashi's clones were left. All of them, took out their kunais and enveloped explosive tags to them. Then, they threw all the kunais at the other clone of Naruto. They all exploded and Naruto's last clone dispelled. "You tiny shits" Naruto said as he hovered his huge sandled foot over them and stomped so hard, that the earth trembled as if and earthquake happened. "Well, I'm surprised that you managed to dispell all of my Shadow Clones, Kakashi-sensei." Naruto exclaimed.

(Ugh, I'm all out of chakra....and I'm no match for him. I need to find a way to return him to normal size and stop his rampage. If I can just manage to-) Kakashi's thoughs were cut off, as Naruto grabbed him in his sweaty hand. The giant blond stared evilly at his sensei. "You're out of chakra, Kakashi-sensei. You can't perform Raikiri nor do any more annyoing tricks." Naruto said as he started to grip Kakashi even tighter in his hand.


"Heh...clock's ticking, Naruto. Sasuke will be here any moment." Kakashi said. "SASUKE?!" Naruto shouted almost popping everybody's ears in the whole village. "What do you mean by SASUKE?! I shrank him and I crushed him!" Naruto said, still unaware to what Kakashi was trying to say. "I don't know what you're talking about. I and Sasuke were on a mission today. We returned an hour ago. That's why I was surprised when you told me that you crushed him this morning. But that can't be, as all of the morning we were on a mission." Kakashi explained.

"But...how? I was certain that was Sasuke. Hmm...so maybe that shrunken Sasuke that I wished for, was a replica created by my wish? And not the REAL Sasuke, but just an exact copy....with all of his thoughs, reactions and everything. It looks like it wasn't just a normal clone then." Naruto pondered outloud.

"I'm quite certain that he has already noticed his overgrown rival by now. If he hasn't shown up yet, then that means that he's just getting ready." Kakashi said. "Hahahaahahahahahahaha!" Naruto burst outlaughing.

"What are you trying to imply? That I should be scared? If you couldn't beat me, then he can't either. This is just a chance to have the pleasure of torturing him again." Naruto said excited. "Ngh! Let me go!" Kakashi demanded.

"You need to be punished for trying to attack me Kakashi-sensei, and my foot odour is anything but pleasent. You know that I bath rarely, and even you won't be able to take the smell from them. Now that you're this size, you don't even stand a chance and the smell is going to be worse! Hehe." Naruto said. "You brat!" Kakashi said angered.
1553311121111212211111111221121122112221.title: Kakashi's wrath

choices: Head back home and show his new size to Konohamaru and Kiba.
1553311121111212211111111221121122112221.content:
Naruto knew exactly what to do with his weakened sensei. The giant Genin sat himself down, plowing over several buildings with his giant, orange-clad behind. Once he was seated, he slipped one of his sandals off and placed the giant piece of footwear in the middle of a road. Naruto moved Kakashi over to the sandal and dropped in onto it. Before Kakashi could try to escape, Naruto quickly stomped down on him with just enough force to knock the wind out of him. Kakashi was temporarily paralyzed and could do nothing but watch the giant bare sole slip into the sandal and cover him. Once his sandal was strapped back on, Naruto stood up and grinned down at his sensei’s head poking out from between two of his toes.

“How’s the smell, Kakashi-sensei? Do you regret challenging me yet?” Naruto asked.

“Ugh…Naruto…stop.” Kakashi mumbled as the smell of Naruto’s foot was making him dizzy. It alone was enough to bring even the strongest of ninja to their knees.

“Why would I stop when I’m having so much fun?” Naruto asked again as he grinned and squeezed the poor Jonin’s head between his toes. “Just be quiet and watch your god rampage! You have a great view !”

Naruto chuckled evilly as he walked deeper into the Leaf Village. Everyone around him had fled during his battle, but the village was simply too big for everyone to flee in such a short time. It only took the giant Naruto a few steps before he arrived at an area where hundreds of people where in the middle of evacuation. When they saw the giant menace approach, they all screamed and fled from his massive form. Naruto merely smirked at the tiny insects, but didn’t acknowledge them any more than that. He wasn’t interested in the townsfolk just yet, he could play with them later. Right now he just wanted to experiment with his new size.

Naruto spotted a restaurant that had once kicked him out because they were scared of him. With much pleasure, Naruto kicked the building with his sandaled foot and watched it crumble into cloud of smoke. He did the same thing to a few other places he disliked, not caring of any innocent people got in the way of his foot. Most of the time they did…

Naruto found an apartment where several people he held grudges against lived. Unfortunately, the cowards had already fled, but that didn’t stop Naruto from stomping on the apartment and turning it too into rubble. After that, Naruto just stomped and kicked blindly while watching things go boom before his eyes. Every stomp of his left foot pushed his entire weight onto Kakashi, who didn’t know how much of this he could take. He may have been a hardened ninja, but no one had ever taught him how to survive against a giant!

After several minutes of destruction, Naruto whipped the sweat from his forehead and looked around at his work. He had turned several blocks of Konoha into smoking ruins…without even using any jutsu! No ANBU had tried to stop him; they were probably fleeing in terror too or protecting their precious Hokage.

“I think it’s about time I found the real Sasuke and showed him my new power. I bet he’s watching me right now and peeing his pants in fear!” Naruto grinned toothily and cracked his knuckled. He couldn’t wait to find that Uchiha punk and enslave him…again.

Wait…enslave?

“Oh crud! I forgot about my two other slaves!” Naruto looked by his feet to make sure he hadn’t stepped on his apartment. “Maybe I should go pick them up before I accidentally crush my apartment. They’re probably so pathetically small now that I’m bigger!” Naruto looked at his large hands and estimated that Konohamaru would be about the size of a gnat to him and Kiba a mere germ.

What should Naruto do? Search for his rival or head back home?
1553311121111212211111111221121122112221.title: A Force to be Reckoned With

1553311121111212211111111221121122112221.content:
"Well then...I suppose that I should find them. I wouldn't want to crush them...yet. Heh" Naruto chuckled. He stomped what was under him, and reached his house crushing everything on the way under his feet. He didn't want to ruin his house and just broke the window with one of his fingers. Although trying to just brake the window, he broke the entire wall as he was too big.


Cursing for braking part of his own house he reached for the jar where he placed them. The jar was so little, that he didn't even see what was inside. On the inside, Kiba and Konohamaru just saw orange skin. They didn't even have an idea what was happening. "I better enlarge those two. I can't even see them this way." Naruto muttered and took out the growing scroll. He cast a few handsigns and pointed at his hand. Kiba and Konohamaru quickly grew to their normal sizes. "Yeah! We're back to normal size!" Konohamaru cheered together with Kiba, only to turn their attention to the giant grinning face of Naruto.


"What? Cat got your tongue? You wanted your normal sizes, right? I granted your wish." Naruto chuckled. "So you did use that scroll I told you about? Look at you. You're a 50 foot giant blond teenager! You really let yourself go Naruto." Kiba pointed out and sighed. "I did that on purpose you moron. Just be grateful that I returned you to normal size." Naruto said.


"You only did that so you could tease us, because you couldn't see us considering your new size. Don't play the hero." Kiba noted. "Well...I suppose that I'll be setting for Sasuke." Naruto said. "Sasuke? I thought that you stomped him." Konohamaru pondered. "I thought the same. Turns out that he was just some kind of clone. A kind of a special one. All the better though. I lost my temper back then, and I smushed him. I'll try to make him suffer longer this time before smushing him again." Naruto grinned.

"I'll go easy on you this time, while I play with Sasuke. I'll put you two in my pocket, because you certainly don't want to be in my sandal, right?" Naruto asked chuckling. "Not if i ca-" Kiba began to say something but he was interupted by Konohamaru. "Uh, yeah, leader. Sure." Konohamaru said. "I won't let you blunder again, Kiba!" Konohamaru quietly said to Kiba. "Now that's what I wanted to hear." Naruto said as he dropped them in his pocket. "I'll take you out when I decide to torture you" Naruto said.


Naruto looked around his surroundings and pondered to where Sasuke could be. "Say, Kakashi-sensei. Where is Sasuke? You were last with him, so you should know." Naruto asked as he looked at his toes. Kakashi was in a really bad state. The nasty smell weakened him a lot. "Near...the...river" Kakashi mumbled unable to speak from the smell. "Near the river, huh? I suppose that you're talking about the river near the Forest of Death. All right, let's see." Naruto said and began to stomp his way to the river. It didn't take him long enough to reach it.

"Heyyyyy, Sasukeeee. Show up you ant!" Naruto screamed with the whole village hearing him. Naruto scanned all over for him, but didn't find anything. "Over here you loser." Sasuke calmly said from behind Naruto. Naruto turned around and saw his rival next to a tree. "Ah! There you are." Naruto said as he stomped to him. "What's up with that size you moron? Did you eat too much, heh" Sasuke joked.

"I see that you're still as over-confident as ever. You're the real one, all right." Naruto agreed. "Real one?" Sasuke asked. "Yeah. I wanted you 3 inches tall, so that I can give you some proper payback. It turned out that it wasn't the real one though. I have to say that I had a lot of fun with your clone, but unfortunetly he turned out as a red stain under my foot." Naruto chuckled. "Hn. Then that clone was weak." Sasuke said in a cool manner.


"Still calm, huh? I don't think that you'll be as calm when I'm finished with you. You'll smell my feet now, and then you'll take a bath with me in this river. I don't have a soap, but you'll do fine...again. I'll wash my WHOLE body with you this time, and I'm going to enjoy it." Naruto chuckled. Naruto took out Kakashi from his sandal, who had fainted from the smell and took out Kiba and Konohamaru. Naruto then placed them on the ground and threw his huge jumpsuit on them, so they couldn't move. The cloth didn't crush them, but they could not move. Naruto then started to remove the rest of his clothes, preparing for the bath he was going to have with Sasuke.
1553311121111212211111111221121122112221.title: Back with his slaves

choices: Naruto begins his bath with Sasuke.
Kiba manages to make a rip in the jumpsuit.
1553311121111212211111111221121122112221.content:
After Naruto pulled his black shirt over his head and tossed it away, the blond placed his hands on his hips and looked down to give Sasuke the evilest smirk he could muster. The Uchiha was still leaning against the tree and didn’t seem to be affected by Naruto’s new size. Any normal person would tremble under the shadow of the shirtless teen, but not Sasuke Uchiha. Naruto frowned, but he wasn’t going to give up just yet. Without warning, the giant took a seat and crushed several trees under his orange-clad ass. The resulting tremor carried enough force to knock Sasuke off his feet. Not wanting to show any weakness to Naruto, the Sharingan user quickly stood back up. He saw that Naruto was in the process of undoing his sandals, so he probably didn’t see him fall. Once the giant kicked his sandals off, he stretched out his legs and wiggled his newly-freed toes. The breeze blowing against his bare torso and feet felt nice.

“Okay, Sasuke, it’s time to smell my feet! I bet once you get a whiff of these, you’re attitude will change.” Naruto said, smirking down at the glaring Uchiha.

“Forget it, dope. I have better things to do then play Giant with you. Later, loser.” Sasuke turned his back to his oversized teammate and started walking away. Before he could increase the distance between them by five feet, a heavy weight came crashing down on Sasuke’s back and forced him into the ground. Without even standing up, Naruto had stomped Sasuke with one of his feet.

“Not so fast, bastard! I don’t think you fully understand the position you’re in, so let me explain again. You’re going to smell my feet until you’re on the verge of passing out, and then I’m going to use you to wash my ENTIRE body! Forget any dignity you had, Sasuke, you’re about to suffer ultimate humiliation!”

“Arg! Get your stupid foot off me, dope! It stinks!”

“That’s the point. Look who’s the dope now.” Naruto replied before he began tapping Sasuke’s small head with his big toe. Every time the big digit hit the back of Sasuke’s head, it forced his face into the muddy ground. “Like the taste of dirt, Sasuke? It fits a bug like you.”

Naruto continued to knock the wind out of Sasuke for awhile before rolling him over so he was facing him. He chuckled when he saw Sasuke’s face looked pretty beat up after just that. Sasuke writhed under Naruto’s foot, but the giant Genin wouldn’t budge. Sasuke tried to free his hands so he could perform a jutsu, but they were pinned to his sides.

“I’m warning you, Naruto, get this thing off me!”

“Or what? What’s a tiny bug like you going to do against someone as big as me?” Naruto mocked Sasuke with laughter before moving his foot so Sasuke’s vision was obstructed by the wall of flesh. Naruto began smothering his rival with his sweaty foot, giving the overconfident prodigy a good rubdown. “Oh man, you feel so good rubbing against my sole! I can’t wait until I’m rubbing you over everything else!”

Meanwhile, underneath Naruto’s jumpsuit, Kiba was making good use of the limited mobility he had to try and claw his way to freedom. The jacket may have been several times bigger than it should have been, but it was still just fabric. Kiba was a member of the Inuzuka Clan; there was no way his sharp claws couldn’t penetrate a simple jacket…

“Damn, this stuff is tougher than I thought.” Kiba muttered as he found himself making lesser progress than he had hoped. At normal size, it would only have taken a couple swipes to tear through this. Still, he was confident he could break through eventually. “Hey, mind helping me?” Kiba glanced over at Konohamaru, who was just laying down and waiting for their giant master to remove the piece of clothing himself.

“Oh, sure, I’ll just bite our way through.” the young academy student said sarcastically. Unlike Kiba, he couldn’t make his nails razor sharp. How was he supposed to help?

“Laying down and doing nothing isn’t going to help either. I don’t know about you, but I’m taking this chance to escape! While Naruto is preoccupied with Sasuke, I’ll make a rip in this jacket and slip out unnoticed!”

“Let’s pretend you do manage to escape and Leader doesn’t catch you; what next?”

“Uhh…I haven’t though that far yet. Right now I only care about getting out of here. It reeks of Naruto’s B.O.!”

Konohamaru agreed, but believed it was much more tolerable than the giant himself. He watched Kiba slowly tear his way thought the fabric of Naruto’s jacket. Was it a good idea to follow him if he managed to make a rip? The idea of freedom was nice, but if Naruto caught them...well, let’s just say he wouldn’t be happy that Kiba tore a hole in his favorite jumpsuit…
1553311121111212211111111221121122112221.title: Pre-Bath Torture

choices: Naruto feels a crunch under his foot
1553311121111212211111111221121122112221.content:
"So, Sasuke. How's the smell down there?" Naruto asked chuckling as he felt Sasuke move under his bare foot. Sasuke's face was touching Naruto's bare sole and it almost made him puke.

(Ugh...should I use the Curse Mark? It's going to take me a lot of chakra...but...no. I'm not going to use it, just because I'm under Naruto's sweaty foot...grrrrrrr. NO WAY) Sasuke thought, getting furious about what was happening to him."Get it off me, damn it!" Sasuke screamed from under the foot. "Heh, fine" Naruto said as he removed his foot from Sasuke. Sasuke just layed there, as if flattened by something, but still breathing. Naruto reached for him, and grabbed him.


"Pee-uhh! You stink Sasuke...like feet...hehe" Naruto grinned. "I think that you need...a bath. And since I do, we'll go together." Naruto said.


After that, he stood up and took a step to the river. He dipped Sasuke into the river, and pulled him out all wet, and choking from the sudden water pouring into his mouth. After that, Naruto started rubbing him against his armpits. Sasuke wasn't liking that. Even though it didn't stink as bad as his feet, it didn't smell any better either. "Mmm...liking it? I sure am." Naruto said as he enjoyed the bath.


Back under Naruto's jumpsuit...

"Almost there!" Kiba said tearing through the jumpsuit. (That moron...he's going to get smashed if Naruto sees what he did to his clothes! And he's going to take me with him along...sigh...) Konohamaru sighed as he was thinking. "You thinking to write a book or something?" Kiba said sarcastically. "I'd be better if you try scratching your way out as well..." Kiba said. "No thanks" Konohamaru responded. "Fine. You're on your own."

After a little while, Kiba finally managed to break through the jumpsuit, making a hole in it. "Finally!" Kiba said as he jumped and got out. "Ahhh! Fresh air!... So? Are you coming or not?" Kiba asked looking down at Konohamaru. "Ofcourse I am" Konohamaru responded as he jumped out too. After that, they turned their attention to the Giant Naruto who was rubbing something against his pits. They didn't care though, as he was facing the opposite direction and they could manage to escape. "Do you think it's Sasuke that's getting rubbed in his armpits there? Shouldn't we help?" Konohamaru asked. "Are you crazy??? Go near him, and you'll be stinking like his feet in no time. Besides, we shouldn't stay here. He could step on us, even if he doesn't see us." Kiba said and began running away.

"Hey! Don't leave me alone!" Konohamaru screamed. Kiba turned back facing him."Well Sasuke...let's get down to the next step." Naruto said as he pulled Sasuke out of his armpits. He was all sweaty and dirty.

"Oh! Look out!!!!" Kiba screamed at Konohamaru. "Huh?" Konohamaru said. The Giant Naruto took a step back and his foot was about to fall right onto Konohamaru. Konohamaru just stared at the bare flesh of Naruto's foot, shivering. "L-Leader!!! Down here! Don't step on me!" Konohamaru screamed with all the power he had. It was of no use however, as Naruto was too tall and he couldn't hear him. Konohamaru's eyes bulged as he saw Naruto's gigantic foot lowering onto him. If he didn't do anything soon, he was going to be crushed.
1553311121111212211111111221121122112221.title: Finally out

choices: Konohamaru tries to get to Naruto's pockets.
1553311121111212211111111221121122112221.content:
Konohamaru had mere seconds to react before he was crushed like a bug. His brain kept screaming, “Move, Konohamaru, MOVE!”

*crunch*

“Hmm?” Naruto glanced down at his foot when he felt something crush underneath it. Thinking he had stepped in Kakashi, the giant blond picked up his foot and inspected it. Instead of a flattened corpse, he saw the squashed remains of a log. “Oh, just a log.” Naruto chuckled and flicked the wood off his sole before turning his attention back to Sasuke. “Where was I? Oh right, the next step!” Naruto grinned toothily before dipping Sasuke into the cold river again. This time, he slapped the Genin against his hard chest and began scrubbing. Sasuke groaned with discomfort as his body was used to clean Naruto’s pectorals. Despite this humiliation, he refused to use the Curse Mark. Doing so would force him to admit that Naruto had surpassed his natural power.

Several feet away, Kiba ran over to a nearby tree where a shaken Konohamaru laid. He knelt by the young boy and shook his shoulder.

“Are you alright, Konohamaru? That was close one!”

“I…I know. He almost stepped on me without even knowing it. Leader…Leader almost killed me!” Konohamaru looked like he was about to cry.

“All the more reason to get the hell out of here. If we stick around and Naruto finds out we put a hole in his clothes, he’ll squash us both!”

“Actually, it was just you who made the hole…”

“Not the point! You’re still trying to escape with me! Now hurry up, you can stand right?”

“Yeah…” The academy student picked himself off the ground. “But, Kiba, what is escaping going to do?”

“What are you talking about? We’ll be away from Naruto, isn’t that enough?” Kiba asked, but Konohamaru shook his head in response.

“If we run back to the village, Naruto will just head back there too and cause more mayhem. We might end up dying in the destruction, without Naruto even knowing. I’ve been thinking, and I think the key to setting things right again is right under our noses!”

“I can’t believe you. You were almost crushed by your beloved Leader and you still want to risk your life? Why do we have to be the heroes?”

“If not us, then who? Just hear me out, okay?” the young boy appeared to have made up his mind.

“…fine, spit it out…” Kiba replied, cursing himself for not running away while he had the chance. The boy had a point, though. They would never be truly safe from the giant blond.

“If we can get our hands on either one of the scrolls, we can turn the tables on Naruto! I remember seeing Naruto put them in the pocket of his pants. We can use the scrolls against Leader!”

“I see. If we had the growing scroll, we could enlarge ourselves to Naruto’s size. If we had the shrinking scroll, we could shrink that bastard back down to size. There’s one problem with your plan, however. Naruto is still WEARING the pants! How are we supposed to get to the scrolls?”

“Simple; we’ll climb up the pants!”

“W-WHAT?! No! No, no, no! Your plan was good until that part. If we get anywhere near Naruto, we risk getting crushed under his gigantic feet! We should just wait until he takes off the pants and search through them then.”

“I’m sick of waiting! I’m sick of this entire situation! The keys to saving everyone is right in front of us!” Konohamaru yelled at the older shinobi, anger and irritation in his voice. “You can wait here if you want; I’ll be the one to safe everyone!”

With that, Konohamaru took off toward the half-naked giant. Kiba yelled to stop him, but he wasn’t listening to reason. He didn’t know if Konohamaru knew it, but he was acting just like Naruto did; always rushing head-first into danger. Always wanting to be the hero…
1553311121111212211111111221121122112221.title: Konohamaru uses Substitution Jutsu

choices: Naruto violently tramples Kiba under his smelly feet but doesn't kill him
Naruto smothers Kiba with his sole
1553311121111212211111111221121122112221.content:
As Konohamaru ran, he turned back to Kiba once again. "Are you sure you won't help me?" Konohamaru asked. "Sure I'm sure! If he sees me, things won't be good for me. And if he doesn't, I might get stepped on...just like you were going to be, just a few minutes ago." Kiba replied. "Tsk...coward!" Konohamaru said, and began running towards the giant Naruto. "Why that little...! If I get my hands on that shrinking scroll, I'll be sure to pay some payback to that brat!" Kiba groaned.



As Konohamaru runned, he was careful not to be spotted by Naruto. But that wasn't the only thing he was careful about. This time, he was also careful not to get stepped on, or otherwise he'd be turned into paste. After a while, he just made it next to Naruto's bare foot. "Ok. All I have to do now, is focus chakra on my feet, and start climbing until I reach the pocket!" Konohamaru said. And with that, he started running up. His running was shortly interrupted, as Naruto shifted and Konohamaru lost his balance. "Ahhh!" Konohamaru screamed. He quickly took out one of his kunai and stabbed it in Naruto's skin, so he didn't fell. "OW!" Naruto said as he felt something stab him near the knee. He turned around and grabbed Konohamaru.


"Konohamaru?! What the hell are you doing here?" Naruto's voice boomed, as he held Konohamaru in his right hand, and Sasuke in his left one. "Ummmm...I....ummm" Konohamaru stammered. "Hmmm?" Naruto said as he saw Kiba in the other direction. Naruto turned around and started stomping in Kiba's direction. "OHhhhhhhh maaaaaaannnnn! That brat blew it...and I'm going to get it now!" Kiba sighed in his great misfortune. He picked his head up as he stared at the towering over him Naruto who was holding Konohamaru and Sasuke in his hands.



"So you two got out, huh?" Naruto asked as he turned his attention to his jumpsuit. His eyes bulged as he saw a huge hole in his favorite jumpsuit. "Ahhhh! What have you done???!!!!" Naruto boomed. "Ehehe..." Konohamaru nervously laughed. (I sure wouldn't want to be in Kiba's place right now...but it's my fault that he's going to get it) Konohamaru thought. "You little shits! This was the only thing I had! And now...look at it! Grrr...WHO DID THIS???" Naruto angrily glared and started squeezing Konohamaru tightly in his hand, almost crushing him. "Ahhh, leader! Stop it! You're crushing me!" Konohamaru begged. "And I'm going to do that if you don't tell me who did this!" Naruto threatened. (Oh boy...) Sasuke thought. "I-I-It wasn't me! I-It was Kiba!" Konohamaru spoke. "Kiba?" Naruto asked as he loosened Konohamaru. "I'm doomed..." Kiba said.


"So...it was YOU, dog-breath!" Naruto said as he stomped his foot, creating an earthquake, which caused Kiba to lose his balance.
1553311121111212211111111221121122112221.title: Spotted!

choices: Naruto believes Konohamaru and uses him as soap too.
Naruto sees through the boy's lies.
1553311121111212211111111221121122112221.content:
The earthquake made Kiba fall right on his butt. As he hissed in pain, he noticed both of Naruto’s bare feet plant themselves firmly on either side of him. He looked up in fear as he realized that the hurt had just begun. Naruto scowled down at the ant-sized Genin before raising one of his dirty soles over him. Kiba screamed an rolled to the side just as Naruto’s foot came crashing down. The quake caused by the stomp could be felt all the way to the Leaf Village. Seconds after his foot hit the ground, Naruto lifted it back up and stomped down with his other foot. Konohamaru winced every time he heard Naruto stomp on Kiba, his mind filling with images of Kiba’s squashed form. This was all his fault…

Naruto continued to trample the same place again and again, as if performing some kind of dance of death. Kiba was surely dead by now, but Naruto kept inflicting overkill on the poor teen. Soon Naruto started to tire as shown by his heavily sweating body. When he finally ceased stomping, a veil of dust concealed the ground below him.
