The Kyuubi pondered for a little before responing. "So be it. I'll help you THIS TIME. Touch me." The Kyuubi said. Naruto slowly approached the fox and touched it's furr. The moment he did it, he was back in his room, sitting on his bed. The illusion was dispelled. He was really mad at Sasuke.


Forcing him to depend on the Kyuubi and making himself giant in a illusion had pissed off Naruto a lot. He then caught Sasuke trying to escape. "Not so fast you tiny shit!" Naruto said as he ran after Sasuke. One of Naruto's footsteps was so hard that it made Sasuke trip. "Wh-" Sasuke began to say but it was too late as Naruto had put a jar on him. Naruto moved the jar to his bed, while being careful so Sasuke could not escape. "What is this?! You were in my illusion! How did you escape?!" Sasuke asked.


"Jinchuuriki who can control the Tailed Beast inside them can't be affected by illusions. I need a partner who has to touch me so I can escape from the illusion. That partner is the Tailed Beast inside me." Naruto explained. "Damn it!" Sasuke cursed. "You'll pay for this..." Naruto cracked his knuckles. Sasuke just shivered. "...after I go jog." Naruto finished. "What?" Sasuke was surprised. "You stay here. When I come back, you better be ready" Naruto said. He reached in his pants and bringed Konohamaru out, only to noticed that he had fainted. "Haha. Must be really sweaty in there. I'll just put him in a seperate jar than yours, Sasuke. Just in case." Naruto said as he put Konohamaru on a table and put a jar over him. He then mischievously grinned, put his sandals on, opened the door and went out side. Sasuke noticed that grin and was concerned. What was Naruto plotting? He tried pulling off the jar but it was pointless. The only thing he could wait was for Naruto to come back.

*After 2 hours*

Sasuke heard the door open. In, entered Naruto all sweaty. "I see you couldn't escape" Naruto grinned. He looked over to Konohamaru, who still hadn't waken up. He took the jar off of Sasuke and placed him on the ground beside his bed. Naruto sat on the bed and grinned down at Sasuke. Naruto slipped his sandals off and a putrid smell was unleashed.

"My god! What's that smell?!" Sasuke asked as he plugged his nose. "Ahh. I smell victory." Naruto said as he pulled off the evilest grin he could do. Without any warning, Naruto lifted his sweaty foot over the tiny Sasuke and brought it down. "AUGHUGHAUGH! It reeks!" Sasuke jerked under Naruto's sole that was covering his face. "Do anything you can! Lick, sniff or kiss! And if you refuse to, I'll just use you as an insole to jog AGAIN. But this time, both my feet and sandals are sweaty and smelly, and you'll suffer like you've never suffered before!" Naruto commanded. Having too big of a pride, Sasuke was going to do everything but to obey.
1553311121111212211111111221121122112221.title: Naruto plays a game with the tiny Sasuke.

1553311121111212211111111221121122112221.content:
“Never! I’ll never obey a dope like you!” Sasuke shouted, despite having his face smushed up against Naruto’s bare sole. The giant blond simply smirked at his rival’s defiance and moved his foot so the dark haired Uchiha’s face was poking out between two of his toes.

“That Uchiha pride is some sturdy stuff, isn’t it?” Naruto said as he squeezed and grinded Sasuke’s head between his massive toes. The large ninja was amused by the way Sasuke’s face compacted. “Well, whatever. You’re right; you may never obey me. However, you know what’ll happen if you don’t?” Naruto grinned a wicked smile. Sasuke’s eyes widened and he shivered a little at the demonic look. “You’ll be dead…like a bug!”

Without saying anything more, Naruto clenched the tiny Uchiha with his toes and brought him over to his sandal. Naruto slammed his foot down upon the sandal, knocking the wind out of poor Sasuke. He moved his foot again so that Sasuke’s face was once again pushed up against his hard sole. Once he put his other sandal on, Naruto stood up and put all that healthy shinobi weight upon the bug sized Sasuke. The smaller shinobi screamed as his eyes watered from the massive amount of sweat and foot stench. The sandal was damp against his back and the foot was hard and foul smelling as it squashed him into said sandal. Sasuke had never smelled such hell and wiggled desperately to get away from it.

“Time for another workout!” Naruto announced as he stretched and took off into the village. The young boy was in such a rush that he forgot to lock his apartment up.

Naruto made his way into the empty streets of Konoha and jogged through them. Every inch of his body became soaked with perspiration. His face went red and it was anyone’s guess how much sweat was building up in those clothes of his. Under his foot, Sasuke was powerless before the larger, stronger ninja. The sole pinned him against the worn, blue sandal and prevented him from making any plans of escape. His clothes became drenched in sweat and stuck to his skin. The young boy’s eyes rolled into the back of his head as he just barely remained conscious. He wished again and again to receive the blessing of unconsciousness, but it wouldn’t come. It was as if cruel fate was forcing him to stay away and endure his suffering.

“Ahhh, this is great!” Naruto said as he wiped some sweat off his brow and turned the nearby corner. As he did, he was surprised to see a bunch of fallen rubble in his path. With nimble skill he easily jumped over the debris. “Heh, look at all the damage I caused…” Naruto glanced around at the ruined village. It looked like a tornado had hit it!

As the orange ninja ran, he didn’t know that a few other ninjas were watching him from a nearby rooftop. One of these ninjas was Shikamaru Nara, accompanied by two other chunin around his own age.

“Man, look at him go for a jog like nothing happened.” Shikamaru said as he shook his head.

“He’s not a giant anymore, though!” spoke the ninja to Shikamaru’s left. “This is are chance to ambush him.”

“I agree, but we can’t just go in there recklessly. Even at normal size, Naruto is a formidable opponent. Plus, as long as he has those shrink and grow scrolls, he has the advantage. If we get shrunk or he grows, we‘re finished.” Shikamaru explained as he scratched his chin. “Our best bet would be using my Shadow Possession jutsu to immobilize him. Then, once he can’t move, you two go in there and take the scrolls from him.”

“Good plan, Shikamaru!” complimented the chunin to the right. “We’ll take those scrolls and then it’ll be his turn to find out what it’s like to be small and weak!” The young ninja slammed his fist into his palm as he grinned.

“Just as long as I have the first shot at him!” came a voice from behind Shikamaru. The lazy ninja turned around to see none other than Kiba. The dog boy was still bruised up from the stomping Naruto gave him; his left arm was even in a cast.

“No, you’re injured. You shouldn’t even be here, but you insisted. If you want to help so badly, I have another job for you.”

“Ugh, fine. Just as long as I can teach that bastard a lesson eventually. What do you want me to do?”

“We know that Naruto has Sasuke Uchiha and the honorable grandson captured. I want you to head over to his apartment and see if he left either of them behind.”

“Hmph, fine. When I get back, I better see that blond headed dope the size of an ant!” Kiba scoffed and hopped off the roof, making his way toward Naruto’s apartment building. A few moments later, Shikamaru and the two other ninja jumped to another rooftop and continued tracking Naruto.
1553311121111212211111111221121122112221.title: The Tortured, the Vengeful, and the Lazy

choices: Kiba is shrunken and the torture begins.
Naruto is shrunken and the torture begins.
1553311121111212211111111221121122112221.content:
While Shikamaru and the other two ninja tracked Naruto, Kiba was making his way to Naruto's house. "I'll give that Naruto some payback...that Konohamaru is going to suffer too for making me smell his feet earlier. I haven't forgotten about that. I'll show him..." Kiba grumbled as he continued on his way.


"Phew. Man, I'm getting tired. I need a break." Naruto said as he stopped running and sat on the ground all tired and sweaty. "Phew...heh. How's is it down there Sasuke?" Naruto asked to see if Sasuke was suffering. Sasuke didn't have the strenght to answer and just began to wiggle. "Haha. Keep it that way. You'll be there for some time." Naruto chuckled.


Shikamaru and the other two ninjas stopped on a rooftop that was belonging to the house next to Naruto. "Is he talking to himself?" one of the ninjas asked. "Hmm...no. Something's wrong." Shikamaru said. "So? Are we going to attack him?" The other ninja asked. "It seems like we have no other choice. You two distract him. While he appoints his attention to you, I'll use my Shadow Possesion Jutsu to hold him. We'll then get the scrolls. Alright?" Shikamaru asked. "Right!" both ninja answered and prepared.


"Well...I think that's enough rest for now." Naruto said as he stood up. Suddenly, two ninja appeared infront of him. "Naruto Uzumaki! You are to come with us!" One of the ninja said. "Don't you ever give up?" Naruto asked as he reached for one of the scrolls. Just as he was about to pull it out...BAM!

"Shadow Possesion Jutsu...success." Shikamaru remarked behind Naruto. He slowly turned around so Naruto was now facing him. The other two ninja jumped to Shikamaru's side. "S-Shimakaru! What are doing?!" Naruto asked. "What am I doing? The question is what are YOU doing...Naruto?" Shikamaru responded. "What are you talking about? I didn't do anything!" Naruto said. "Don't lie to me. I know about the scrolls, and about Sasuke and the Honorable Grandson. All three are in your...possesion." Shikamaru said.

Naruto just frowned. "I also know about those three ANBU that were dispatched to do the task that I'm now dispatched to do. Their squashed shrunken remains were found. You have something to do with that, don't you?" Shikamaru asked. Naruto just sighed. "Yeah. They were really annoying and I decided to get rid of them. Let me go, before I decide to get "rid" of you too." Naruto threatened. "I don't think that's gonna happen. Just surrender already." Shikamaru said as he began to approach Naruto, who was mimicking his moves too. "Wait!" Naruto said. "What?" Shimamaru asked.


Naruto smirked. "Lift your toes on your left foot." Naruto said. "What are you talking about?" Shikamaru asked. "Hehe...you'll see." Naruto responded. Shikamaru thought for a second, but decided to comply with what Naruto said. Shikamaru lifted his toes on his left foot. With him doing this, Naruto also mimicked the same move. When Naruto lifted his toes, the tiny Sasuke's head could be seen. "No way! Is that...Sasuke?!" Shikamaru asked in confusion. "The very same one. Fortunately, I had taken him with me today. But this works in my favour now. I can still move my foot enough to crush him. It won't be pretty." Naruto grinned. (Damn. I didn't foresee this. Now what...) Shikamaru thought. "C'mon!" Naruto urged as he began to press on Sasuke. Sasuke screamed in pain, his body slowly crushed. "Ok, ok." Shikamaru responded as he undid his Shadow Possesion. "Ah, finally." Naruto said as he stopped putting pressure on Sasuke.


"Well...I guess I'll be returning home now. If you even try to ambush me again, OR if you follow me, Sasuke here will share the fate of an ordinary bug." Naruto smirked before setting off. "So we are just going to let him get away?" one of the ninjas asked. "We can't afford to put Sasuke's life at risk. Not all is lost though. Kiba should be at his apartament right now. I guess we'll just have to leave things in Kiba's hands." Shikamaru sighed scratching his head.

Back at Naruto's house, Kiba managed to sneak in. He entered his bedroom, and to his surprise he saw the shrinking scroll on Naruto's bed. "Haha. Looks like luck is on my side. Not only did he forget to lock his apartament but he also forgot the shrinking scroll. The growing scroll must be with him though." Kiba pondered. Just then he heard screams behind him. Konohamaru was in a jar on the table. Kiba saw this and peeked through the jar. "Heh. Serves you right. Let's see how you'll like my feet now, you puny brat!" Kiba smirked. Just as he was about to open the jar and take Konoahamaru, he heard Naruto's footsteps. He quickly hid behind the door. "Man. Don't tell me he got rid of Shikamaru and the others!" Kiba said. "Ah well...I'll get my revenge then...Sasuke must be with him too. Hah. I'll just get my revenge on all three." Kiba smirked as he took out the scroll.
1553311121111212211111111221121122112221.title: The plan unfolds

choices: Naruto had recovered just enough to take the growing scroll out of his pocket!
Naruto can't move a muscle and Kiba locates the tiny Sasuke.
1553311121111212211111111221121122112221.content:
As Naruto made his way to his apartment, he noticed his door wide open.

“Dang, I forgot to lock the door!” Naruto exclaimed. He knew he closed it, however, which means someone else must of entered! Gritting his teeth, the orange ninja snuck through the doorway and glanced around for the intruder. His eyes fell upon Konohamaru’s jar; the tiny boy awake inside. “Hey squirt, you’re awake! You see anyone sneak in here?” Naruto asked the shrunken academy student as he walked toward the jar. Before he could take a second step, Kiba jumped out from behind the door.

“Shrinking jutsu!” Kiba shouted, pointing at Naruto. The blond haired shinobi spun around to meet Kiba face to face.

“Kiba! What the-? I thought I cru-?” Naruto stopped when he noticed everything becoming bigger. His blue eyes widened in horror as he watched Kiba grin and loom over him. When Naruto stood only to Kiba’s waist, the handicapped ninja gave him a push that sent him onto his butt.

“How’s it feel to shrink, Naruto?” Kiba asked as he watched Naruto reduce in size. He was quickly becoming nothing but a bug to him. “How’s it feel to look up at someone for once?”

Naruto finally stopped shrinking when he was the same size as his victims. The small fox boy gaped up at the tower Kiba, not understanding how he shrunk or why Kiba was still alive.

“The look on your face is priceless.” Kiba spoke as he pocketed the shrinking scroll. “Wondering why I’m not a squashed carcass embedded into the earth? It’s all thanks to your terrible aim! You did do this to me, though…” Kiba pointed at his broken arm. “…and for that, you’re gonna pay!”

With that said, the large dog ninja slowly raised one of his sandaled feet into the air. Naruto snapped out of his shock when he saw the shadow engulf him. He jumped to his feet and took off in the opposite direction, ignoring the booming sound of Kiba stomping down behind him. As he ran, Sasuke (who had also been shrunken, now only a speck in comparison to Kiba.) was pounded into the sandal with each step. The small Uchiha had heard everything and was shivering at the idea that Kiba could now crush him between his fingers. He couldn’t believe how small he must be now…

“Hehe, run all you like, idiot!” Kiba thundered as he kicked off his sandals and made slow steps toward the fleeing Naruto. The genin was running as fast as he could, but he was barely covering any distance at all. Kiba played cat and mouse with him for about a minute before he grew tired of it. The giant raised his bare foot over Naruto stomped down. Naruto was hit hard in the back and forced to lie flat on his stomach. Kiba chuckled as he slowly grinded Naruto against his own floor, listening to the former giant scream in pain.

“Your torture’s just beginning, Naruto. Don’t think I’ve forgotten about Sasuke either! I know he must be with you, which means he must be speck size…just like I once was!” Kiba raised his foot off Naruto for a moment, but stomped it back down hard. He didn’t bring his foot down hard enough to harm Naruto, but it was enough to temporarily paralyze him. “Wait right there. I want to have the whole gang before me!” Kiba laughed and walked toward Konohamaru. He plucked the tiny kid out of the jar and held him before his menacing eyes. “Ready for some payback, brat?”

“Kiba, stop this!” Konohamaru shouted as he struggled in the genin’s powerful grip. “You’ve defeated Naruto, so just stop this! I want everything to go back to normal!”

“Ha! You think after you tortured me, everything can go back to normal? Forget it! It’s time to show you, Naruto, and Sasuke why I deserve to be the big man!”

With that said, Kiba turned around to see…
1553311121111212211111111221121122112221.title: Kiba's Victory

choices: Naruto and Kiba start foot torturing the tiny Sasuke and Konohamaru
Kiba wants to squash one of them
1553311121111212211111111221121122112221.content:
...that Naruto had recovered just enough to take the growing scroll out of his pocket! He made a few handsigns, making sure that he was faster than Kiba. In a flash, Kiba was just laying his foot on Naruto's normal sized body, with Sasuke growing a little under Naruto's foot, but stopped at the same shrunken size he was before Naruto was shrunken. Naruto quickly turned around and pushed Kiba's foot off him. Kiba just backed away as Naruto put the growing scroll back in his pocket.


"Ugh! Damn...when did you...?!" Kiba asked speachless. "Fortunately, I had it the whole time. I have a lot of luck today, haha." Naruto just grinned. Kiba put the shrunken Konohamaru on Naruto's matress, so he can attempt to shrink Naruto again. "Don't even bother." Naruto said, knowing Kiba's intention. "If you shrink me, I'll just grow myself. And I have the advantage. I can grow even more, and become huge. I'll deal with you easier that way." Naruto just chuckled.

"Oh, yeah? Well this time, I won't hesitate and the minute you're the size of an ant, I'll squash ya'. What's faster? Your hands or my foot?" Kiba asked smirking. Naruto just sighed. He took his sandal off and let the beat up Sasuke fall on the floor before putting it on again. "Hehe...there's your Sasuke." Naruto just chuckled. Kiba looked at the sweat drenched, beat up Sasuke. Sasuke's state was so funny, that he barely managed to supress his laughter. Kiba just chuckled quetly.


"So you're still doing that, huh? The stench of your feet Naruto, really took their toll on the tiny Sasuke. I can say that...from my OWN experience..." Kiba growled. "Oh, come on Kiba. That's past. You had your revenge on me right?" Naruto asked. "REVENGE?! All I did was pin you under my foot! YOU used me a few times as your insole, you made me smell your putrid feet and you even wanted to step on me! I have SO MUCH more to come back at you!" Kiba growled again.

"Well...I guess I kind of got carried away. Besides, I wanted to squash you because you had messed up my jumpsuit, but seing as how the hole you made into it, shrinked along with it, it's barely noticable now so I have no problem. Remember that time when we tortured that Sasuke clone? Why don't we have fun over him again? We'll be sure to include Konohamaru in the fun too this time" Naruto chuckled. Konohamaru just trembled when he heard that. Sasuke just barely stood up, when he heard about what had happened with his deceased clone. Kiba just looked over at Sasuke, and then looked at Konohamaru. "Isn't that a deal? We'll both have fun, and you'll get it back at them both...I won't miss this either though." Naruto chuckled.

Kiba thought for a second before deciding to answer. "Fine. I want to get it back at Sasuke because of Akamaru, who's currently in the hospital because of putting him in danger during that mission we had. And I also want to get it back at Konohamaru for that torture he gave me. I guess that if it's both of us, it'd be tougher for the both of them." Kiba said. "Great!" Naruto jumped up in joy. "Just one more thing before we begin. Give me the shrinking scroll." Naruto demanded. Kiba took it out of his clothes and handed it over to Naruto. Naruto put it back in his pocket along with the other scroll, and waived for Kiba to come next to him. Naruto sat on his bed matress and placed the tiny Konohamaru on the ground next to Sasuke at his feet. Kiba came and sat next to Naruto on his matress with now both towering over the tiny Sasuke and Konohamaru. Since Kiba had already slipped off his sandals, Naruto just reached for his own and pulled them off. He just wiggled his toes as he put his sandals next to Kiba's. Now it was time for both Naruto and Kiba to have some fun with their slaves.
1553311121111212211111111221121122112221.title: United they are

choices: A bare foot. Kiba had caught up with him!
A sandaled foot. Shikamaru wanted to check on Kiba and didn't notice Konohamaru!
1553311121111212211111111221121122112221.content:
As Kiba grinned down at the two small bugs at his feet, he thought about how long it’s been since he had that tiny Sasuke clone down there. He loved the feeling he got when he toyed around with him; the feeling of power and control. To think that all that happened just yesterday! Speaking of that tiny guy…

“Hey, Naruto. I was just curious…but how does it feel when you crush someone? Like that clone of Sasuke we toyed around with.”

“Hm? Oh, him! Well…” Naruto tapped his chin and thought. “It feels like snuffing out a cockroach. They squish so easily and the crunch they make sends a chill down your spine.”

“Sounds interesting.” Kiba replied with a wicked smile. “Mind if I test it out one of these bugs?” Sasuke and Konohamaru’s eyes widened in horror as they heard this. Naruto raised an eyebrow too.

“You want to squash one of them? I don’t know…”

“Come on, Naruto, what’s the loss? If you must have at least two of them at once, there’s a whole bunch of people we could shrink! Shikamaru and a few other chunin are right outside! I REALLY want to feel one of them crunch under my foot!”

“Hmmm…” Naruto scratched his blond hair. He could understand Kiba’s excitement; it felt really good when he crushed that Sasuke clone and those ANBU. It was true that he could just get a replacement later… “Alright, fine. If you have to squash one of them, make it Konohamaru. I still want Sasuke alive so I can torture him some more!” Naruto grinned down at Sasuke and flexed his toes above him.

“The squirt? Fine with me!” Kiba turned his attention to the mini-Konohamaru o the floor and smirked at him.

“W-what?! Leader, no! Tell him to stop, please!” Konohamaru begged, getting on his knees.

“Sorry, Konohamaru, but I don’t think you’ll make a good slave anyway. You’re just a kid who’s not even a full-fledged ninja yet. You tire out too easily and I have no interest in weaklings.” Naruto explained coldly before he turned his attention back to Sasuke and pinned the tiny Uchiha under his smelly bare foot. He laughed as he rolled Sasuke under the ball of his foot, his mind no longer on Konohamaru.

“B-but…leader, please! What about all that ‘training’ and torture I had to go through! Are you going to reward me for all that by…by killing me?! Please don’t, leader!”

“You shouldn’t be talking to him, brat.” Kiba said as he stood up and positioned both his feet on either side of the shrunken Konohamaru. “I’m the one you should be pleading with…” Kiba grinned toothily down at the younger boy.

“I…I don’t want to die…no…” the academy student choked out, tears running down his face. Kiba had no mercy for the boy who had tortured and humiliated him, however, and raised his bare foot over him.

“Better run then.”

Konohamaru screamed and took off, running as fast as his legs could carry him. Kiba stomped down where Konohamaru once was, blowing the boy forward with a shockwave. Konohamaru quickly got back to his feet and made a few hand signs.

“Shadow Clone Jutsu!” Konohamaru shouted as a cloud of smoke engulfed him and four tiny Konohamarus ran out. The giant dog ninja just chuckled at this, though.

“Hehe, you played this game with Naruto before. It won’t save ya…” Kiba stomped over to the nearest fleeing Konohamaru and stepped on him. The boy made a soft crunch under his foot…followed by a plume of smoke that revealed it to be a clone. Kiba just shrugged and looked at the three remaining boys. Thinking that the real Konohamaru would want to be as far away from him as possible, Kiba leaped into the air and came down on the Konohamaru that was leading the other two. Both his feet impacted the ground with a boom, knocking the other two bugs off their feet. Kiba grinded his feet into the floor, but felt another explosion under his feet.

“Damn, not that one either…” Kiba muttered as he scanned the ground around his feet for the remaining two. He did not see them by his feet, however, but found they were already closing in on the open door. “Heh…fast little buggers. I’ve had enough of this game, however. Time for you to go squish, brat!” Kiba once again leaped into the air and positioned his feet so they would come down on both of the Konohamarus. The two younglings looked up just as Kiba came down with a thoom, crushing them both. Kiba rubbed his bare feet into the floor, knowing that he was smearing the real Konohamaru under one of them…

“And that’s what you get for thinking you’re bigger than-.” Kiba began to say, until…

*poof* *poof*

There was a tiny burst of smoke under both his feet! Confused, Kiba looked a few feet away to see ANOTHER Konohamaru making his way out of the apartment.

“What the…when did he make another clone?!” Kiba growled in frustration and stomped after Konohamaru. The tiny academy student ran out the door and swerved right. He desperately looked around for somewhere to hide.

“Come on, come on! I can’t just be squashed! I have to hide before-!” Konohamaru stopped talking when he noticed a shadow engulf him. He had been so stricken with fear that he hadn't noticed someone had closed in on him. His eyes widened in horror as he looked up to see…
1553311121111212211111111221121122112221.title: The End of Konohamaru?

choices: Naruto starts using the Tiny Sasuke as a sweat rag for his feet and Kiba watches
Kiba starts to massage Naruto's other foot using the Tiny Konohamaru
1553311121111212211111111221121122112221.content:
It was a bare foot! Kiba had caught up with him! In a matter of seconds, the foot fell on Konohamaru with all the might it had. Konohamaru coughed as he lied on his back with Kiba's giant foot on him.

"I finally found you! You though you could run away from Giant Kiba huh?" Kiba chuckled in delight. "So what's going to be flattened first? The legs or the arms? I'm not going to hurry to squash your head. I want you to suffer and to feel like a bug at somebody's feet." Kiba snickered.


"K-Kiba! Please! Reconsider! I didn't do this to you when you were in my position! So why then?!" Konohamaru desperately asked. " I already said it. I just want to feel someone crunch under my foot. I want to feel big...and powerful. No wonder Naruto did all those things to us when we were tiny. He was getting pleasure because he felt...big. And now I know this." Kiba explained.


"B-But wh-wh-why?! You actually take away someone's life. Please don't do it Kiba. And like Naruto said, there are other people. I heard that Shikamaru and the others are out there. You can shrink him and crush him instead." Konohamaru offered. "You have a point kid....alright then. FOR NOW I won't crush you...but if you blunder or if you do something stupid you're gonna be a squashed bug!" Kiba threatened.

"Thanks a million Kiba!" Konohamaru lit up. "B-But...could you remove your foot from me? It's really heavy." Konohamaru said. "What?! Who said anything about that? I'm gonna have some revenge for what you did earlier to me." Kiba said as he pushed his sole over Konohamaru's face and pressed on him. "Mmmhh! Kihhh-baaa" Konohamaru's muffled screams could be heard. "Ahh! This is it. This feels great." Kiba signed as he felt Konohamaru squirm. After a while of doing this, Kiba finally removed his foot off of Konohamaru. Konohamaru just lied there, his whole body twitching as if squashed. "Now wasn't this great?" Kiba asked as he began to laugh.

"This is not funny!!!" Konohamaru screamed. "Ohhh...don't be like that." Kiba said still laughing. "C'mon. Let's see how your pal Sasuke is doing. Although mine have a faint odor, Naruto's feet really reek from all that training he does. We both know that. So however he is, he isn't well." Kiba said as he picked up the tiny Konohamaru in his hand and went to Naruto's bed.

Naruto was certainly enjoying himself. He was grinding his smelly feet in the ground with Sasuke suffering beneath. "Hehe. I knew it Sasuke. You were just born to worship my feet. You always said that I was the shortest from all the teams...well except Hinata. She's shorter than me. Do you still think that I'm the shortest?" Naruto asked as he pressed Sasuke deeper into the floor. " I want you to kiss my sole! Say that I'm bigger than you!" Naruto demanded. He positioned his sweaty sole over the tiny Sasuke's head and awaited for Sasuke to kiss it. Sasuke had realized that if he tries to oppose the giant that nothing good would come out of it. So for now he had decided to atleast comply with this nonsense. With much regret, he bringed his face closer to Naruto's sweaty sole and kissed it for a half second. "That's a good bug. Now say that I'm bigger than you and that you've always been a bug to me!" Naruto once again demanded.

"Grr...why you little..." Sasuke began to curse. "Little? I think that you're self deluding yourself. Now say what I told you if you don't want to be turned into a stain." Naruto grinned. Sasuke just frowned. "You're bigger than me Naruto. I've always been a bug to you." Sasuke just repeated. "Hehe." Naruto chuckled as he removed his foot from Sasuke. "Hey. How's it going?" Kiba asked as he came and sat next to Naruto. "Hm? I thought that you wanted to crush Konohamaru. What made you reconsider?" Naruto asked curious. "I'm doing it for the same reason, that you're keeping Sasuke instead of squashing him." Kiba said. "Oh? So you want to torture him?" Naruto asked. "Yeah. It'd be better...for now. Besides, what you said about Shikamaru and the others...we could just crush them instead." Kiba said snickering. "I thought that you worked with them." Naruto raised an eyebrow. "Yeah, but that was until I made a deal with you. I like being...big." Kiba chuckled. "Hehe. I know what you mean." Naruto snickered as well.

They just stayed in silence for some time, before Kiba spoke out. "Yuck! What's that smell? Man I almost can't breathe." Kiba said as he held his nose. Naruto just picked his own foot and took a whiff of it. "Hehe. That must be because of the jogging. Man...I sure could use some kind of rag to get rid of the stench and the sweat. It'll never go away ofcourse, but it'd make the air...cleaner." Naruto laughed. "Well I don't know, but just use something to absorb the sweat and odor. I can't take it." Kiba spoke still holding his nose. "Yeah, but I don't have a--" Naruto stopped as he looked at Sasuke. Sasuke looked back at him with an intimidated look. "Well...I think I just found my rag." Naruto laughed evilly as he picked up Sasuke. "Wait. You'll use him?!" Kiba asked in surprise. "Yeah. I need something to absorb the sweat and the smell from my feet. Sasuke's clothes are cleaner now...and, his body would do nice in general." Naruto said as he looked at Sasuke evilly. "Naruto, don't!" Sasuke said. "This'll stink a little...or maybe a lot. But I need a rag...and you'll do an even better job than an ordinary rag. Don't worry. You won't need to do anything. I'll just rub you around so you can clean me off of the foot odor." Naruto laughed. Without even noticing, Kiba got hard and he felt a bulge in his pants. What Naruto was going to do to the tiny Sasuke was really turning him on. Kiba wanted to see how Naruto was going to use Sasuke as a rag for his feet and soles. He wasn't getting hard when he was in Sasuke's postion, but he was getting hard by watching the smelly action unfold.
1553311121111212211111111221121122112221.title: Kiba's Revenge

choices: Naruto notices the tent in Kiba's pants.
1553311121111212211111111221121122112221.content:
Kiba watched as Naruto hoisted his right foot onto his knee and brought Sasuke down to it. He held the squirming little Uchiha right in front of the smelly sole, wiggling his toes tauntingly. Sasuke tried to break out of Naruto’s strong grip and get away from the hellish smell of his feet, but he no match for the giant Naruto’s strength. With a dark chuckle Naruto slammed the tiny Sasuke right into his sole. Without reliving any of the pressure, Naruto started dragging Sasuke up and down his sole. Sasuke screamed as his body and clothes soaked up the boy’s sweat and odor like a human sweat rag. Kiba just stared at Naruto’s foot as this happened, loving the way Sasuke was being so humiliated. The tent in his pants got bigger and the dog ninja pushed his legs together to try and hide it.

“Hehe…you like that, Sasuke?” Naruto asked as he pushed the shrunken genin’s face into a really sweaty part of his sole. The once proud Uchiha howled in disgust as he was forced to smell the terrible odor seeping into his nose. The giant, orange ninja smirked and chuckled as he rubbed Sasuke over his toes. He made sure to push Sasuke’s small head between his cheesy toes and twist him around, smearing his face with his dingy toe cheese. “Hehe…and after you finish scrubbing this foot…you still have the other one to do! Hahaha!”

As Naruto said this, a light bulb lit up in Kiba’s head and he glanced down at Konohamaru in his fist. The shrunken kid was staring at Sasuke with a look of pity. He was probably also glad that wasn’t him going through that torture. That was going to change…

“Hold on, Naruto! If you make Sasuke soak up all the sweat on your left foot too, you might drown him! We don’t want that!” Kiba explained with an evil smirk.

“Well then what am I supposed to do? I can’t just scrub up all the sweat on one foot and leave the other smelling like rotten meat!”

“Well then, it’s a good thing we have another sweat rag!” Kiba replied as he held up Konohamaru. When the young ninja-in-training noticed he was being held up, he glanced from Kiba to Naruto’s foot and gaped in shock.

“What?! No! I’m not a sweat rag! Don’t put me near those things…please!” Konohamaru shouted as he squirmed in Kiba’s fist.

“Hehe, not a bad idea, Kiba! Alright!” Naruto said with a big grin. Kiba grinned himself and nodded before jumping off the bed and kneeling before Naruto’s other foot. With Konohamaru in hand, Kiba lowered the panicking boy to Naruto’s sole. The dog boy’s other hand was kept on his nose, since he couldn’t take the smell of Naruto’s feet (which was made worst due to Kiba’s more sensitive sense of smell). Konohamaru saw the foot coming, but could do nothing but brace himself. He hit the foot with a thwack and was rubbed over it just like Sasuke. Naruto closed his eyes and moaned as Kiba massaged his foot with the younger boy. Konohamaru squirmed, coughed, and spluttered as his face was dragged over the sweat soaked foot bottom. Naruto moved Sasuke around to the top of his foot and started massaging there. He could actually feel Sasuke become damp under his fingers and wondered if he could squeeze any sweat out of his body…

“You little bugs can be used in all sorts of ways, can’t you!” Kiba joked as he twisted the young tiny between his leader’s toes. Konohamaru was feeling completely humiliated and wondered if it would have been better if Kiba had just crushed him. “Man, Naruto…your feet sure can sweat! It never ends!” Kiba rubbed Konohamaru faster over Naruto’s sole, making the poor slave feel like his entire body was going to be smoothed down flat!

“Hehe, well when you’re a strong ninja like me, you have to train more than anyone else! My body gets really sweaty and my B.O. hits the roof!”

“That’s obvious…” Kiba muttered as he got to massaging the top of Naruto’s foot. Both of Naruto’s feet were made (almost) sweat-free at around the same time. They still stunk, but not as much that they stunk up the entire room.

“Mmmm…that felt great.” Naruto said as he stretched his arms over his head.

“It was a lot more fun than I thought!” Kiba smiled before bringing the small Konohamaru to his face. “What about you, brat? Did you enjoy yourself?”

Konohamaru twitched in Kiba’s hand. His youthful face had turned pale and his clothes were soaked. He mumbled a reply to Kiba’s question, but it was unclear as to what he said…

“So, should we get started on your feet?” Naruto asked, making both Konohamaru and Sasuke cringe. Kiba stood up and looked down at his own bare feet.

“Mine?”

“Yeah, yours! They’re not as sweaty as mine, but why not give them a good massage?”

“Hmmm…alrighty then! They’re nothing like your feet, so I don’t think we need to worry about our slaves drowning in sweat.”

“Noooo…” Konohamaru and Sasuke whined together, their disgust left unheard by the giant duo.
1553311121111212211111111221121122112221.title: Double the Massage, Double the Fun

choices: Kiba gets it back at the tiny angry Naruto by imprisoning him inside his sandal
1553311121111212211111111221121122112221.content:
"Hey! You can't do this to us! We're already soaked in sweat!" Konohamaru voiced up. Naruto and Kiba looked down at him and sighed. Naruto just went near them and caught both of them. "Haha. You smell like my feet now." Naruto chuckled. "Very funny...YOU IDIOT!" Sasuke screamed up. "What's this? You want to die like a cockroach?" Naruto asked. Sasuke just frowned an turned his head in the other way. Naruto went near the bed, and Kiba hopped his feet on the bed, wiggling his toes.


"I hope you're ready to service me, my little slaves." Kiba said as he rubbed his foot against his other one. "Forget it! Fire Sty-" Sasuke couldn't finish as he dropped to his knees. Being soaked in Naruto's foot sweat had really taken it's toll on him, and he couldn't recollect his powers back. "Damn it." He muttered. "Kiba please! We're tired! Don't make us do this!" Konohamaru begged.

"Man, you really are useless! I guess I'll have to do this myself." Kiba said as he reached for Konohamaru. Konohamaru tried to run, but Naruto was on the other side, grinning down at him. Just as he turned around back to Kiba, Kiba had already captured him. He hoisted his foot, and without any warning slammed Konohamaru onto his dirty sole. Naruto grabbed Sasuke and prepared to return the favor Kiba did for him. Naruto began to massage Kiba's heels with the tiny Sasuke, who was just wiggling.


"Time for the toes, brat." Kiba said as he scrubbed between his toes with the Tiny Konohamaru. Konohamaru began to choke on the dirt. Naruto's feet had almost made him faint, but now Kiba's were going to finish him. On the other foot, Naruto also scrubbed with Sasuke between Kiba's toes.

"Oh, man. That felt so great. We should do this again" Kiba chuckled. Naruto just looked at Konohamaru and Sasuke. They were all dirty, especially Sasuke. Sasuke was barely breathing. Bits of Naruto's toe jam were still on Sasuke's hair and arms. "Naruto, I want more people to service my feet! And I want to crush someone! I say we go over to the Training Field and take care of Shikamaru and the others." Kiba suggested with a grin on his face. "Yeah. I feel like crushing some ninja under my feet too." Naruto grinned evilly as he wiggled his toes. Kiba wanted to tell Naruto about his boner, but he didn't want Naruto to know. He was really feeling turned on by what Naruto was doing though. "Man...when you torture someone with your feet, you're pretty hot." Kiba quietly said. "Hm? Did you say something? I heard "Hot"?" Naruto asked. "Oh, yeah. I was just saying that it was really hot in here." Kiba said. Naruto reached for the growing and the shrinking scrolls and grinned. He, together with Kiba were planning to shrink Shikamaru and the others and to crush them...literally. "Hey, Naruto. Give me the scrolls. I have a safe place to hide them." Kiba demanded. Naruto just nodded and gave the scrolls to Kiba. Kiba grabbed the tiny Sasuke and the tiny Konohamaru and placed them inside his pockets. "Why are you putting them there?" Naruto asked puzzled. " I just thought that they should rest a little. Servicing our feet, especially yours made them really tired." Kiba explained.


"After we take care of Shikamaru and the others, we'll go back here in your house so we could resume the fun." Kiba said. "Yeah...I guess you're right." Naruto said with a quiet tone as he slipped on his sandals. Kiba just reached for the shrinking scroll and bam! "Shrinking Jutsu!" He yelled. Naruto turned back and noticed how Kiba was quickly towering over him. In just a matter of seconds, Naruto was as tall as Kiba's toenail. After he did this, Kiba just put the scroll back in his pocket. "KIBA! YOU DOUBLE-CROSSER!" Naruto screamed up at Kiba, angrily. "Hey, cool it down Naruto." Kiba said. "WHY WOULD I?! WHY DID YOU SHRINK ME!?!?" Naruto screamed. " I just wanted you at this size. Don't worry. I'll put you in my other pocket. I just wanted you like so, incase you decided to shrink me." Kiba said. "I WOULDN'T HAVE DONE IT!!! GROW ME BACK!" Naruto hissed. "You shouldn't worry about that either. I'll grow you back the second we arrive at the training field, so we could have some fun. Until then however, you're gonna be this size." Kiba said. "I'VE HAD IT! AAAAH!" Naruto said as he charged toward his bed. Focusing chakra on his feet, he climbed it and jumped off, high in the air and he reached Kiba's face. "Man, what are you...?!" Kiba began to ask, as Naruto screamed in attack. "SMELL THIS! Ha!" Naruto grinned as he farted straight in Kiba's face, like he did in the Chunnin Exams. After farting, he set himself on his bed, watching Kiba squirm around the house. "OOOOHH! Disgusting! Ahhh!" Kiba said said as he wiggled around the hose, rolling on the floor from the smell, holding his nose. "Ha! No one can beat the Great Naruto Uzumaki!" Naruto proclaimed himself proudly. Kiba had recovered from the smell, as he stood up. It wasn't as bad as the Chunnin Exams as Naruto was tiny and so was his fart. Naruto began to sprint away, and tried to hide under his bed, but he failed as the Giant Kiba grabbed him. "Damn!" Naruto cursed. "What was that all about, you moron?!" Kiba shouted spit as he talked.

"I told you that I would return you back!" Kiba said as he slipped on both his sandals. "So how should I punish you now...hmm." Kiba pondered. "Let me go, Kibaaaaaaa!!!" Naruto screamed, tryng to break Kiba's grasp. "I know!" Kiba lit up. "You used me and Konohamaru as insoles when I was tiny too, right? You even used me 3 times! So I wonder...what would it be if I used you as my insole too. I bet it feels really comfy...well for me, anyways." Kiba chuckled. "Kibaaa! If you don't let me go, I'm gonna BEAT YOU TO A PULP!" Naruto thretened. "Hehehehehehehehehe...I'll make sure that your face is facing my sole! Like it was when I was tiny. I'll return you back to normal when we arrive, but you'll be my Great Uzumaki insole on the way to there. I wonder if I can buy tiny Naruto's like you to use as my insole..." Kiba mockingly pondered. "Kibaaa!! Just you wait! I'm going to get it back at you!" Naruto thretened. "It's time for you to smell something too." Kiba grinned evilly.
1553311121111212211111111221121122112221.title: Kiba shrinks Naruto...for the trip

choices: Naruto and Kiba reveal themselves and shrink the three chunin.
A fourth ninja appears and notices the plotting duo.
1553311121111212211111111221121122112221.content:
Kiba smirked at the tiny Naruto in his hand. The fox boy was having so much fun being the big one…suddenly becoming a bug didn’t amuse him very much. It was fun watching him scream his head off and squirm in his grip. After awhile Kiba decided he better get going and casually stepped out of his right sandal. Before Naruto knew it he was lowered onto the sandal and dropped onto the wet insole of the sandal. The orange ninja stood up and glared up at his giant friend.

“Kiba, I’m warning you! Turn me back to normal or else I’ll KILL YOU!” Naruto screamed as he shook his fists at Kiba. The dog ninja got a good laugh at the tiny boy before hovering his foot above him, shutting him up for now.

“Come on, Naruto. We’re friends now, remember? I’m just going to keep you under my foot until you calm down. Okay?”

“No! Not okay!” Naruto shouted just as he was about to perform a Shadow Clone jutsu. Before he could utter the jutsu, Kiba brought his foot down and slipped it into the blue footwear. Naruto’s bug-sized body was pinned under the sole and smushed into the sandal. Kiba sported a cheeky grin as he wiggled his toes and got his foot nice and comfortable in his sandal. Now that Naruto was dealt with, Kiba could focus on what was really important. The Inuzuka clan member strolled out of Naruto’s apartment, loving the feeling of Naruto under his giant foot.

“Hehe, what the heck were you doing making everyone else an insole, Naruto?” Kiba asked as he stepped out the apartment. “You make a great insole yourself!” Kiba walked out to the balcony and sniffed the air. Shikamaru and his comrades’ scents were starting to fade, meaning they’ve probably already left for the Training Ground. Shikamaru had told him to meet there if something went wrong. “Hehe, something about to go wrong…for you, Shikamaru!” Kiba laughed before jumping off of the apartment building and hopping from building to building. Each time his foot touched down on a solid surface it would press Naruto deeper into his sandal. The fox boy continued to yell at Kiba…and that’s all he could do. His arms and legs were pinned under the smelly foot, so all he could do was yell and get sweat in the mouth.

Kiba eventually make it over the walls of the village and ran into the woods. He hopped from tree branch to tree branch, sniffing the air so he could track the scent of his prey. Inside his pockets, Konohamaru and Sasuke were weakly holding on as they endured the bumpy ride. Both of them were weak from being used as human sweat rags and on the verge of passing out. Inside Kiba’s sandal, Naruto was also becoming weak from the stench of other dog ninja’s sole. Kiba glanced down when he noticed Naruto had stopped his shouting.

“That’s better. Now just sit back; we almost there.”

Meanwhile, at the Training Ground…

Shikamaru and the two chunin were resting by three wooden poles. This was the same location Team 7 had their first lesson with Kakashi. Shikamaru looked relaxed like always, but his two comrades looked pretty nervous…

“Shikamaru, why did we retreat?” one of the chunin asked. His name was Akai and he had red, messy hair similar to Naruto’s hair. His headband, however, was tied around his arm instead of his head. “It’s almost sunset; we could sneak in there while Naruto’s asleep!”

“He’s right, Shikamaru.” the other chunin added. This one’s name was Honda and he had dark brown hair which drooped down in the back. “We should steal that shrinking scroll and use it on him before he can use it on us!”

“I told you; it’s too dangerous.” Shikamaru stated. “That Naruto may be loud and obnoxious, but he can be sneaky now and again too. I don’t want to be sneaked up on and turned into a bug…that’s be troublesome.”

“Well, what about Kiba? Don’t you think we should save him?” Akai asked.

“Yeah. We failed to subdue Naruto, so it’s our fault he went in there and…never came out again.” Honda muttered, turning away in shame.

“I know, but there’s nothing we can do. He’s probably been shrunk and enslaved by Naruto. Although, with that injured arm of his, Naruto may of decided he was too useless to keep around and…” Shikamaru trailed off and sighed. “Let’s start getting ready. We have to report back to the Hokage that Naruto’s not a giant anymore.”

Shortly after Shikamaru finished his conversation, Kiba arrived near the clearing and hid behind some trees. He looked over at the three ninja and grinned toothily.

“Alright, time to get started!” Kiba exclaimed in a whisper as he removed his feet from his sandals. He looked down at the shrunken Naruto, who weakly sat up and looked up at Kiba. “Calmed down?”

“…yeah, whatever.” Naruto replied, looking away from the giant. “Just turn me back to normal and NEVER do this again!”

“Sure, we’re even now.” Kiba replied as he took out the growing scroll and pointed at Naruto. “Growing Jutsu!” Naruto felt the chakra surge through him as he quickly grew back to normal. He stood back up and grinned, happy to have his normal size back.

“Now give me those scrolls!” Naruto demanded. “They belong to me!”

“Hmmm…tell you what, I’ll give you the shrinking one. I’ll hold onto the growing one.” Kiba said as he handed Naruto the shrinking scroll. The blond boy sighed and accepted the deal. Once both genin were ready, they peeked over at the unexpecting trio with grins on their faces.

“So how do we do this? There’s three of them and two of us; one of us gets to crush one more bug.”

“First come, first serve I guess…” Kiba said, not really caring who he squished, just as long as he got to squish somebody.

“Hehe, alright…” Naruto grinned and cracked his knuckles. “It’s ninja crushin’ time!”
1553311121111212211111111221121122112221.title: Kiba's Revenge (Part 2)

choices: Akai is deFEETed. The smelly interrogation begins.
1553311121111212211111111221121122112221.content:
"So are we going to report back to Lady Tsunade?" Honda asked. "Man...I just want to watch the clouds." Shikamaru yawned as he scratched his back. "Yeah...how about we just report back and get this over with. I'm really tired. Besides, just because we're sand ninja doesn't mean that you can keep us waiting for ever." Akai explained. "Fine, fine. Geez...you're both a drag. This whole thing is one big drag. I just wish that I was at home watching the clouds instead of dealing with an over-sized Naruto." Shikamaru said. Honda approached Akai and whispered to him. "Are the preparations on the invasion ready?" he asked."Yeah. We're all set. Gaara and Kankuro will come. Temari though won't come as she has work to do back at the Sand Village." Akai responded. "Good. I suppose that Gaara is going to go berserk again like last time, right?" Honda said. "Yeah. This time we won't be defeated by Konoha. And that Uzumaki boy won't stop Gaara this time." Akai grinned. "So are you two coming or are you going to chat?" Shikamaru asked. "We're coming." Akai responded as he and Honda began to walk after Shikamaru.

Behind them, Naruto was slowly sneaking with Kiba back in the woods. Naruto didn't realize that although he wanted to just have fun, the two ninja beside Shikamaru are actually spies sent by the Sand Village. Naruto slowly snuck behind as he took the scroll out and pointed it at the three of them. "Shrinking Jutsu!" He quietly said as he grinned. Suddenly, all three shrank.

Naruto grinned as he approached them. Shikamaru's, Honda's and Akai's jaws fell down as they looked up at the enormous Naruto. "Naruto! What is the meaning of this?!" Shikamaru asked still confused. "What do you think it is? I shrank you." Naruto chuckled. "So you got rid of Kiba?" Honda asked. "Hmm...not exactly." Naruto pondered as he placed his hand on his chin. "Not exactly? What are you trying to say?!" Akai asked.


They soon saw Kiba coming from behind Naruto. "He's trying to say that I joined him!" Kiba proudly stated. "You joined him? I thought that you wanted to get revenge on him." Shikamaru stated. "And I did...well, sort of." Kiba chuckled. "Veeeeery funny, Kiba." Naruto said with a comical face. "Well that doesn't matter. I just want to step on one of your friends, Shikamaru. I want to feel them crunch!" Kiba exclaimed excited. All three of them just cringed when they heard those words. "Kiba! Come back to your senses! They're people! You'll kill them!" Shikamaru nervously. "No way Shikamaru! I want one of them to die under my foot! The other one will die under Naruto's." Kiba said. "And I just picked one." Kiba smirked. Both Honda and Akai trembled. They didn't want to die. Not under someone's foot...litterally!

"I want the guy with the long black hair!" Kiba exclaimed as he cracked his knuckles. Honda's eyes bulged out. "Kiba don't do it!" Shikamaru said. Kiba ignored him and took a step to Honda. "I bet that you never thought that you'd die under someone's foot." Kiba grinned as he raised his sandaled foot over Honda. Honda didn't move. He was patrified from fear. He had never thought that despite being a spy that he would die! And Kiba or Naruto didn't even know that! Kiba grinned evilly as he slowly began to lower his sandaled foot on Honda. Akai was speechless as well. "Kiba, STOP!" Shikamaru screamed as he began to run toward Honda. "Oh no you don't!" Naruto frowned as he grabbed the tiny Shikamaru in his hand. "UGH!" Shikamaru tried to break free from Naruto's grip but it was just too strong.

"W-wait! W-wh-why me?!" Honda asked trembling. "I just don't like you." Kiba said coldly. With that he lowered his foot on Honda and began to crush him. "Nghhh...Akkkaaiii...youuu have tooo...theee invassiooonnn...ghaaaa" Honda couldn't finish as Kiba pressed hard enough and smashed Honda in the ground. He twisted his foot, completely satisfied. When he lifted it, he just saw a red stain mixed with smashed flesh. "Man! That felt great!" Kiba said as he chuckled. "Yeah, I know right?" Naruto smiled as he dropped Shikamaru back on the ground. But Shikamaru had actually heard what Honda's final words were for Akai. "Time for red hair to be turned into red stain as well." Naruto grinned. "Naruto! Wait!" Shikamaru intervened. "Why should I?" Naruto asked him. "I want to ask him something. He may have important info." Shikamaru stated as he walked to Akai. "Info? What are you talking about Shikamaru...?" Naruto pondered clueless as ever. "I heard what Honda said to you. What invasion is he talking about?!" Shikamaru said looking at Akai. "Tsk...I guess that it's useless to hide it anymore. The minute they shrunk us I knew that we wouldn't manage to see your village DESTROYED!" Akai said. Shikamaru grabbed him by the chest. "So you're plotting something!" Shikamaru said. "Yes. We are. And I know where they're waiting for the signal. But you know what? I WON'T TELL YOU!" Akai said. Shikamaru pushed Akai on the ground. "Naruto, Kiba! You have to take him to the Leaf Information Unit! They'll manage to extract the information out of him." Shikamaru said.

"Ohh, maaan. This is ruining our fun!" Naruto sighed. "No. He's right Naruto. This puts the whole village in stake. This is serious. Our village might be truly exterminated if they invade!" Kiba said. "In that case take Shikamaru and go in my house. Stay there along with Konohamaru, Sasuke and him. DO NOT come out, got it? And give me the growing scroll." Naruto demanded. "What? What are you planning to do?" Kiba asked. "I'm going to help the village AND have fun. This is my perfect opportunity." Naruto grinned. "It's not fair! Why do you get to have that fun?!" Kiba asked. "It is fair! I want to deal with that tiny army. And you won't be left without any fun. Hello? Why do you think that I'm leaving Shikamaru, Sasuke and Konohamaru with you?! You can make them massage your feet or any of that stuff. They're yours. But give me the growing scroll." Naruto demanded again.

"Hmm...you're right." Kiba pondered as he grabbed Shikamaru from the ground and held him in his hand. Kiba reached for his pocket and gave Naruto the growing scroll. "Hey Naruto. What about Akai? You have to take him to the Leaf Information Unit so they can extract the information out of him." Shikamaru suggested. "Don't worry. Trust me. I'll do an even better job at getting the info out of him than they would." Naruto grinned down evilly at Akai. "You're probably asking yourself how he'd do that. You should trust ME now. You don't want to know." Kiba said as he put Shikamaru in his pocket. "Well, see ya." Kiba said as he took off.

"Heh...crush me if you want. You won't get any info out of me." Akai smirked at the blond giant. Naruto just laughed as he took off his sandals and placed them behind him. "Once you get a whiff of my feet, you'll WISH that I had crushed you." Naruto smirked. "Professionals wouldn't manage. What makes you think that you'd manage to get info? Akai asked. "If you were normal sized maybe I wouldn't manage to get any info out of you but at your tiny size my foot alone can make you suffocate in stench and you'd be willing to tell me. And then I'll get rid of you. Hehe, just my foot odor can torture you when you're so tiny" Naruto laughed evilly at the tiny spy.
1553311121111212211111111221121122112221.title: Shrunk down to size

choices: Akai is crushed before he can say anything.
1553311121111212211111111221121122112221.content:
Akai looked up at the towering fox boy with a smirk on his face. He was trying to keep a prideful and brave expression, but in truth he was scared out of his wits. If anyone tries to do something, you're going inside them." Kiba said. The three shrunk genin shivered as they looked at the gigantic sandals which had green fumes coming out of them.

Meanwhile, Naruto had just arived at the gates of Konoha. A 3000 man army was there looking at him silently. "Surrender yourselfs." Naruto said as he pointed towards the army. The army burst with laughter as they looked at the barefoot boy. "You've got to be kidding us. A mere genin against 3000 people?! You're bad at jokes." The army leader said as he laughed. "Not to mention that it's pretty weak of Konoha to send a mere genin against an army. Are you underestimating us?" The leader asked as all laughter stopped. "Oh yeah? And what if that genin was 40 times your size?" Naruto asked as he smiled. The army burst out laughing again. "Well, you don't look 40 times our size, Leaf brat. Infact you're like a runt. You're not very tall to begin with." The leader said again as he laughed. Naruto just took out the scroll, did a few handsigns and put it back in his pocket. "What? You called your mom?" A man from the crowd said as they still laughed. Naruto just grinned at this. They had no idea what was going to happen. "Alright kid. That's enough for now. Let's just finish you so we can destroy Konoha once and for all." The Sand Ninja leader said as he got serious.

Suddenly, the blonde's body began to grow in size. The army stared in awe and bewilderment as the blonde fox boy started to expland in size and slowly tower over them. "Y-You've gotta be kidding me." The leader said as he started at the blond tower as well. Naruto finally stopped growing at about the size of 100 feet. He looked down at the army with a huge grin on his face. Naruto's foot could atleast cover 800 shinobi now. "Like I said, what if I was 40 times your size?" Naruto asked as he grinned. No one dared to say anything. The army slowly pulled back from the giant. "Ao, climb that mountain over there. We'll have radio communications. I want you to have a good look of him and tell me what he's doing. From here, I can't pretty much tell." The leader commanded. The ninja nodded as he started to climb the mountain so he could get at the top. Naruto grinned as he looked all over at the army. They were like puny ants just waiting to be squashed. Naruto wiggled his toes in impatience. As he wiggled the toes, some of his foot smell came out. A big green "fog" reached a few shinobi who were close to his feet. They all began to wriggle as the green fog smelled awful. It was like a poison. They fell to the ground suffocating. After about a minute, they stopped wriggling, as they had literally died from the poisonous fog.

"What the heck happened?" The leader gritted through his teeth as he saw some of his shinobi fall to the groud...just like so. "Ao, can you tell me what happened?" The leader said through a radio communicator. The ninja over at the mountain's top was speechless. He realized what happened. "Well, sir...if I'm not mistaking, that green fog was...well...uh...foot odor." The ninja said. "IT WAS WHAT?!" The leader screamed. "FOOT ODOR?! Don't screw with me!" The leader yelled. "I'm not doing that sir. It came from his feet." The ninja said. "Grrrrrrrrrrrrr......that Konoha brat! Some of my men were defeated by FOOT ODOR?!" The leader screamed still not being able to assimilate that thought. 'No one...NO ONE has humiliated my army like this before! You'll pay..." The leader gritted again through his teeth.

"Oh, sorry. I haven't washed my feet from some time, and the smell is probably poison to you at that size. Hmm...hey, I got a better idea. I'll defeat most of your puny army just with my foot smell. That way less of you will have the unlucky fate of being smashed under them." Naruto grinned as he rubbed his sweaty sole with his hand.

"You've gone and done it now. Men, CHARGEEEEE!" The leader screamed as he pointed towards the blond giant. All the men lifted their puny kunai and shuriken in their hands and started to run towards Naruto's feet not realizing that they were running towards their doom.
1553311121111212211111111221121122112221.title: Konoha's Giant

choices: Naruto takes his time with the remaining ninja.
1553311121111212211111111221121122112221.content:
Naruto put his hands on his hips and stood tall before the Sunagakure army. Very tall. One hundred feet to be exact. The charging men tried stay strong as well, but as they got closer to the blond giant’s feet, they began to understand that they didn’t have a chance. The green fog that was Naruto’s foot odor met their assault head on and everyone in the front lines instantly felt its effects. Their shurikens and kunai fell from their hands as they dropped to their knees; clutching their throats. Naruto smiled as dozens of bugs writhed around him in agony…he didn’t eve need to lift a finger; just a toe. Even as their comrades suffocated, more Sand ninja attempted to get close to Naruto…only to meet the same fate. The bodies were quickly piling around the giant.

“Man, you sand ninja sure are pathetic.” Naruto said as he raised one of his feet and brought it over to a group of ninja. He wiggled his toes above them and watched as they all keeled over; unable to be so close to the foul foot. “You’re dropping like flies! I’m afraid you might MELT if I got any bigger…”

“S-Sir, they’re all…they’re all dieing!” shouted Ao’s voice over the leader’s radio. “We can’t get close to him!”

“Then try fighting him from afar!” shouted the leader, his face showing just how pissed off he was that his men were being killed off by mere foot odor.

“That’s not working either!” shouted a voice next to the army leader. He watched as hundreds of ninja threw their kunai and shurikens at Naruto’s feet, but none of them even made a scratch. Some ninja attempting using jutsu on the feet; firing wind blades, fire balls, and torrents of water at them. Naruto didn’t show any signs of pain or discomfort. He just yawned and took a step forward, killing off some more ninja with his toxic foot fumes. He noticed that fewer ninja were trying to attack him head on and instead resorted to using fruitless ranged techniques.

“Not going to come to me, eh? Well…I’ll just come to you!” Naruto grinned evilly and raised his right barefoot over the army. The men underneath Naruto’s shadow had no time to run and only watched as the instrument of their doom fell upon them with inhuman force. The bare, sweaty foot crushed several shinobi flat into the ground and Naruto enjoyed feeling their weak little bodies pop under his superior form. These were the lucky ones, however. They were given quick with only a moment to smell the foot before it squished them. All those that survived the footfall were doomed to a horrible demise. They tried to crawl away, but the green fog consumed them and they died within minutes. Long, musky minutes. “How does it feel to be crushed under the great Naruto Uzumaki?!” the fox boy shouted before stomping into the army again, turning several more proud shinobi into tiny stains on his sole.

“I can’t watch this anymore!” the leader exclaimed before making a few hand signs and thrusting his hands into the ground below. The earth under the giant trembled before two domes of earth formed around Naruto’s feet, sealing them. Naruto looked down annoyed at the attempt to stop him. “There! Now your demonic feet are sealed! Men, now’s our chance! Topple the giant brat!” the leader pointed at Naruto again and the remainder of his army (which was only a little under ¼ its original size) charged the teenaged behemoth. They attacked Naruto’s legs and lower abdomen with jutsu, but it all failed to even pierce his clothes. Some began running up the giant by focusing chakra into their feet.

“You think this can stop me?” Naruto asked, smirking at the leader. “You’re going to need something a lot more powerful!” The giant grunted as he started lifting his foot. The Suna leader watched with amazement as one of his domes started cracking and crumbling; ultimately shattering to pieces as Naruto’s foot burst out and came smashing down on some more ninja. Naruto did the same with his other foot while also using his hands to brush away all the ants that were climbing over him. Those that weren’t crushed by his tree-like fingers were knocked to their doom. One very unlucky ninja landed right between Naruto’s toes. The soft flesh cushioned his fall, but he spent the last minutes of his life in total agony and humiliation as Naruto’s odor became his whole world.

“W-We have to retreat!” shouted a frightened ninja.

“But there’s nowhere to go!” replied one of his comrades. Before either could decide on what to do, they and several other of their fellow ninja were cast into shadow. They looked up to see Naruto’s grinning face high above before his foot came down upon them. Naruto didn’t squish them like all the others, but rested his foot upon them and let them squirm and flail under his sweaty sole. Being so close to the source of Naruto’s stink and actually being drenched in his perspiration…the poor Sand ninja didn’t last a minute.

“Heh, snuffed out like bugs!” Naruto boomed before he pressed his foot all the way down, mashing their corpses into pulp. He grinned down at the leader of the army; the look of anger and hopelessness on his face was priceless. What remained of his army was in chaos; they had no idea what to do. If they tried to fight the invincible giant they would die like bugs. If they tried to run from him they would die like bugs. They were all doomed the moment they decided to try and invade Konoha.
1553311121111212211111111221121122112221.title: Foot Odor, the Ultimate Weapon

choices: Naruto Steps on The Little Buggers One By One
1553311121111212211111111221121122112221.content:
"Oh come on! Is that what this "army" can do? You're just pathetic!" Naruto boomed as he stomped on more ninja. "What are we going to do, sir? He's literally crushing them!" Ao's voice said over the radio. "You stay there at the top. We'll see what he does. I'm ready to die, but if he's thinking that I'll die like some BUG, then he's got another thing coming!!!" The leader screamed up at the giant.

Not much of the army was left now. About just 20 ninja, the leader and Ao. Mashed corpses could be seen everywhere flattened in huge footprints. "W-w-we're getting out of here!" the rest of the ninja screamed as they began to run away. "You cowards! COME BACK HERE! I'll have you assassinated the second I get back at the Sand! COWARDS!!!!" The leader screamed as he shook his fist. "Ao, get them back here!" The leader said by the radio. "Hey, Ao! Are you there?!" The leader seconded as he turned back to look at the top with his own eyes to find nothing. Ao had escaped himself! "NO! You cowards! ARGHHHHHHH!" The leader screamed as the threw the radio set. "Those idiots!" the leader cursed as he glared at the blond giant. Naruto was amused by this to no bounds. "Hahahahaha!" Naruto laughed as he saw everyone running away. "Gee, looks like your own people left you. Aren't you going to run away as well? Or...are you underestimating me?" Naruto said as he frowned at the puny ninja. "I'm not going to be defeated by some BRAT. Why don't you come back to your normal size, hm? I'll give you a good beating, you oversized scum!!!" The leader threatened.

"No thanks. It's sooo much better squishing your enemy like a bug. I could just smush you under my foot." Naruto grinned as he wriggled his toes, sending foul odor to the shinobi's nose. "God! Do you ever take a bath?! Your feet reek!" The leader said as he plugged his nose. "Hey, they don't smell! Everyone has odor problems. I just work very hard, unlike you!" Naruto said as he crossed his arms. "What a stupid brat! I'll defeat you, and then I'll---" "Man, I need to take a sit." Naruto groaned as he interrupted the leader. He turned over and positioned his gigantic orange clad butt above the tiny shinobi. "Hey what are you doing?! NO! Nooooooooooooooooooo!" the leader screamed as the gigantic butt came down on him. "Ugh, I needed to sit down. Soo, what were you saying?" Naruto grinned as he asked the leader who was crushed to death under his butt. Naruto grinned as he let out a fart on the smashed lump under him. "Ooops." Naruto innocently spoke as he chuckled. He did a few handsigns and shrank down back to his normal size.

"As far as I know, Gaara and that creepy puppet guy should be somewhere around here. I better go find them...and take care of them for good." Naruto grinned as he put on his sandals, and went out further into a forest. It was not long before he noticed a building which looked suspicious. His suspicions were confirmed as he saw some of the sand ninja who ran away from him earlier. "This must be where Gaara and that guy are." Naruto thought as he snuck in the building. It wasn't even a building. It was something which looked like a secret base to Naruto. Naruto slipped his sandals off as he entered the base, hiding them in a corner so no one would notice. The sandals were making too much noise on the wooden floor for him to keep them. Naruto gasped as he heard Kankuro's voice coming from a room.

"Ugh, I better join with the others." Kankuro said as he was alone in the base, with the other ninja supposedly going back to the Sand. Naruto carefully looked in the room to see Kankuro...AN INCH TALL! "What the!" Naruto's eyes bulged as he was surprised. He didn't even do that! "Good thing I shrank myself to this size. If that Naruto guy gets here before I leave, I'll be able to sneak away unnoticed. Heh...this must be the best escape plan I've ever came up with." Kankuro said to himself as he was proud of his idea not even thinking that this might backfire on him. "So he shrunk himself, huh. And he's thinking that I wouldn't notice him! Is he thinking of me as some stupid guy?!" Naruto gritted his teeth in a comical way as he held his fist. "Hmm...I guess I'll play along." Naruto made an evil grin as he wanted to show Kankuro how wrong he was.

Naruto then deliberately started to stomp his bare feet into the floor, so he would make Kankuro aware of his presence. "Ah, someone is coming!" Kankuro said as he jumped on the floor, sticking himself to the wall, hoping that whoever was coming wouldn't notice him. Naruto then entered the room with his hands on his hips. "Someone must be here! Oh, where ever they could be?" Naruto said pretending that he didn't know about the inch tall Kankuro on the floor. "Crap! It's that Naruto guy! I better beat it before he sees me!" Kankuro said as he looked up the giant orange blond. Naruto took a step forward and placed his bare foot right next to Kankuro. "I better not see any small ninja or they'll end up as stains under my heel." Naruto suggested as he still pretended not to have seen Kankuro. Kankuro gulped as he heard that. He scrunched his nose as the orange foot was emitting a nasty smell of sweat. "They smell horrible! Uagh!" Kankuro said as he held his nose and started to run away, which was absolutely nothing for the blond ninja.

The smell was getting weaker and weaker as Kankuro was managing to get away from the foot. Just as he thought he got away, the smell became as strong as ever. Kankuro's eyes bulged as he saw a huge shadow over him. He slowly turned back to face the giant, only to see a sweaty orange sole and Naruto's grinning smile. "Heheheheh...got you." Kankuro grinned. Naruto raised an eyebrow as he saw three other tiny ninja come out of nowhere! He hadn't seen them! "You honestly didn't think that I didn't notice you noticing me, did you?" Kankuro said as the three sand ninja stood next to him. "So what? You're ants." Naruto giggled. "We're strong ninja. That's what we are." Kankuro said with a smirk. "No, you're not. You're 4 bugs that I want to step on." Naruto mustered an evil smile as he twisted his bare foot into the floor, imagining as if he was twisting their tiny bodies under his mighty heel. All 4 of them gulped, but wouldn't go down without a fight.

choices: Naruto heads back into the village to get some lunch.
Naruto does some real training to build up a sweat for his slaves.
1553311121111212211111111221121122112221.content:
“Let’s see how much stink you can take before you give in.” Naruto says before unzipping his orange jacket and slipping it over his shoulders, leaving him in his black shirt. The fox boy lifts of his arm and sees that it’s really damp under there. Nevertheless, he takes a big whiff of his pit. Afterwards, he recoils in disgust and waves his other hand in front of his nose. “Pee yew! You’d have too be tough as nails to survive in there!” Naruto smirked down at Konohamaru as he pulled up his sleeves, exposing his lightly haired armpits. “Are you tough as nails, Konohamaru?”

“You bet I am!” Konohamaru shouted, pumping a fist in the air. “I defiantly won’t pass out!”

“Good answer!” Naruto shouted back as he picked up the shrunken academy student and, after giving him one last smirk, shoved him into his rank pit. The boy didn’t struggle in his grip, but winced a bit as Naruto’s short pit hairs pricked him all over. He only started to acknowledge the horrible stench when the giant put his arm down, trapping him in there. “You’re next, doggy boy!” Naruto called down to the pint-sized ninja, who was still collapsed on the ground from his experience with Konohamaru. Naruto pinched Kiba between his fingers and, using just one of those fingers, pushed him into his other pit. Because of Kiba’s powerful nose, ridiculously small size, and the fact that he was tortured by Konohamaru seconds ago, he stayed conscious for about three seconds before he took one sniff of Naruto’s B.O. His face twisted with agony and he passed out. Naruto, seeing that Kiba wasn’t moving, just chuckled and lowered his arm.

“Haha, what a weak pup.” Naruto mocked Kiba, not caring whether his fellow ninja was dead or just unconscious. His attention turned to his right pit, where he could feel Konohamaru squirming. “Yeah, keeps squirming like that, kid! I’ll know if you’re still conscious if you keep moving.”

With both his slaves tucked away in his pits, Naruto leaned back against the tree trunk and relaxed while listening to the noises of the forest. Because only a bit of light filtered in through the trees, the forest was pretty cool and Naruto didn’t get much sweatier than he already was. That didn’t mean he didn’t stink like a cart full of moldy cheese, though…
