15533112.title: Shikamaru (Pre-Shippuden)

choices: Shikamaru Uses You As An Insole
155331121.content:
Shikamaru had been sent on a mission by himself. Of course he thought it was a drag, just like everything else involving work. He was in a dark forest when something caught his eye. He thought it was a bug and almost passed it by when he noticed that this bug was the size of his pinky finger, and was wearing jeans and a T-Shirt!

"Hmm?" He said as he stooped down and couldn't believe his eyes.

"What the hell?" Shikamaru said picking it up by it's leg.

He held it upside down in front of his face, his eyes scanned it's body, sure enough, just as he'd thought, it was a tiny human.


By the time that Shikamaru picked you up and held you upside down at eye level. You were between the stage of being asleep and awake. However when Shikamaru did this, you became fully aware that you were hanging upside down from a great height. At first you thought it was just a dream, but then you felt Shikamaru's less than gentle hold on your foot. You rubbed the sleep out of your eyes and yawned, then you saw his gigantic face peering at you like a child who had discovered something new.

You started to scream, and Shikamaru was surprised that it was pretty loud for your size. He cupped a finger over your face and told you quite simply, "Shut up squirt!"

His finger was smothering you, Shikamaru realized this and took his finger away to find you gasping for air. He chuckled smugly, realizing how he could have killed you with but a finger.

"Man...This mission sure is a drag.....Lucky I got a puny like you to make it interesting!"
155331121.title: Shikamaru's Discovery

choices: ...the smell of food. Shikamaru stops in a small village for a bite to eat.
...the smell of salt water. Shikamaru rests for a bit at a beach.
1553311211.content:
“I know just where to put you, puny.” Shikamaru said as he bent down and undid his sandal. Once it was off, he casually dropped you onto it. The bottom of the footwear was really sweaty, you could only imagine what the foot must be like. You were about to know first hand as Shikamaru lowered his foot back into the sandal. You yelped in terror and tried to run away, but got pinned anyway. Half of you was compressed underneath the shinobi’s sole while the other half was trapped between his toes. It smelled horrendous, like Shikamaru hadn’t bothered to bathe in weeks. He probably thought it was too troublesome. The foot was also sweating like a pig, the perspiration slowly making its way into your clothes. The toes wiggled around you and splashed droplets of sweat in your face. Despite your uncomfortable position, you were helpless to do anything but look up at the ninja’s smug grin. Your position gave you a great view of his gigantic, towering form. He had total control over you

‘Well, time to get moving, I guess.” Shikamaru scratched the back of his head and continued his trek through the dark forest, which expansive treetops blocked much of the sunlight. You felt the giant’s foot lift up and come back down, the simple movement putting some pressure on your fragile form. You tried to ignore the pain and the view of the giant and tried to focus on what was happening. One minute you were drifting off to sleep and the next you woke up in the world of Naruto, the size of an insect, and being used as an insole for Shikamaru! How did you end up like this? You had no answers, and wondered if you would survive long enough to get any.

After about ten minutes of walking, the young shadow ninja decided to speed things up a bit and started jumping from tree branch to tree branch. This was bad for you, as the pressure being put on your body was increased as the giant jumped. In addition, you saw first hand how fast the speed of a ninja was. The world was going by you so fast that you could barely make out anything anymore. The movement, combined with the stench of Shikamaru’s foot, started to make you dizzy. You hoped he stopped soon.

Fortunately, Shikamaru sensed something other than the forest ahead. The smell of the air was different and he could see light. He was still a bit far from his destination, but it wouldn’t hurt to take a quick break here. Perhaps he could play with his tiny find a bit…

The smell in the air got stronger as he got closer. It was…
1553311211.title: It Begins Underneath Shikamaru's Foot

15533112112.content:
Shikamaru leaped from the last tree and into the daylight, emerging in a warm and treeless environment. The young shinobi took a few steps forward, leaving a few impressions of his sandal in the sand. He took a big breath of fresh air and exhaled. He had heard his destination was near a beach and was hoping he’d come across it.

“This is nice. I can’t even remember the last time I visited a beach.” Shikamaru said to himself as he kicked off his sandals and planet his bare feet into the warm sand. He made sure to clutch you between his toes, so instead of being sent flying with his sandals, you were pressed into the sand with his foot. You tried to ignore the heat against your back as the giant wiggled his toes in the sand. You usually liked the beach, but now the sand was practically cooking you. You continued to look up at Shikamaru as he slipped off his jacket and fishnet shirt, leaving him bare chested. He just put his hands on his hips and stared into the sea, daydreaming. You tried to look away from him, but his gigantic and superior form kept pulling your gaze back. He was like a god to you.

You suddenly noticed said god was leaning down, his treelike fingers spreading his toes and grasping you. You were pulled free of his foot and brought up to his face. He grinned at you and continued to grin as he sat down upon the beach and then laid himself down on it. You were carelessly dropped onto his tanned chest; it lifting and dropping as he breathed.

“Take a break. You probably need it after all that time in my sandal.“ The giant said to you as he leaned his head back against his arms and looked up at the clear sky. He thought he’d just lay here for a bit and soak up some rays.

“Don’t you have a mission to get to? Should you really just be laying down on the beach like this?” you questioned as you stood up on the boy’s chest.

“The mission isn’t going anywhere.” he sighed as his eyes were transfixed on you again. “Just relax. Isn’t this place a lot nicer compared to that damp, dark forest?”

You had to disagree. Ever since waking up in this world, the only thing you’ve known much about is Shikamaru’s raunchy foot. Now you were on his chest and it was starting to get hot and moist from the sun. Shikamaru saw your discomfort and it brought a smirk to his face.

“Not comfortable, eh? That’s okay, I know someplace you can relax.”
15533112112.title: Procrastinating on the Beach

choices: Shikamaru falls asleep and you manage to free yourself.
Shikamaru decides to go for a quick swim.
155331121121.content:
"In my sweaty, rank pit!"

“No!” you plead, but Shikamaru’s hand is already heading for you. You immediately turn around and make a dash across the lazy boy’s chest, toward his stomach. You don’t get very far as a shadow engulfs you and Shikamaru’s palm smacks you against his abdomen. The impact makes an audible splash as his palm hits a layer of sweat. He grabs you by the back of your t-shirt and brings your hurting body back to his face.

“Please don’t try to run away from me. It’ll become too much of a drag to stop you every single time.”

Before you can gather up enough strength to struggle, the shadow manipulator brings you down to his left pit and sticks you against the damp flesh. He starts to lower his arms and only releases you once his arms as squished you firmly into place. He rotates his shoulders a bit to get comfortable before placing his hands on his stomach and resuming is gaze into the sky. Inside the pit, you attempt to struggle against the relatively hairless skin. The few hairs that do exist serve to smear more perspiration in your face. You’re forced to breath the fumes released from his pit and wonder if you’ll run out of oxygen anytime soon. You might sweat yourself to death before that happens. His pit is scorching hot and the heat from beach doesn’t help at all.

Your world suddenly flips and you accidentally slam your head into a pool of fresh sweat. Some gets in your mouth and nose and you cough hysterically. There’s also some in your eyes, but you can’t move your hands to rub it out. You’re forced to shut your eyes as they burn and hope your tears can wash it out. Your giant captor has rolled over onto his stomach, allowing the sun to beat down on his bare back. You hear him sigh in bliss and silently hope he gets sunburn.
155331121121.title: Stuck in the Armpit of a Ninja

choices: Shikamaru isn't alone at the beach...
Shikamaru puts his clothes back on, but leaves you trapped in his navel.
155331121122.content:
"Nice and snug in my bellybutton!"

“What? Are you serious?” you asked, taking a glance behind you at the ninja’s smooth belly, interrupted only by his navel.

“Do I look like I’m kidding?” he asked back as his hand grabbed you and enveloped you in darkness. His hand was sweaty and covered in sand, but you didn’t have to but up with it for long as you were quickly brought down to the boy’s stomach and pushed into his navel. You struggled furiously but the shinobi was leagues above you in terms of strength. When he finally took his hand away and brought light back to your world, you found yourself chest-deep into his bellybutton. You watched him look at you past his chest and smirk before pushing you all the way in with a single finger.

He was right about one thing: it was snug, but not in the comfortable way. You were trapped by walls of moist flesh and unable to move an inch. Your mouth was right next to some lint and you couldn’t help but get some in your mouth when he pushed you down. Unable to move at all, you were forced to swallow the glob of filth. All around you were the noises of his inner body. The sound of his stomach gurgling worried you a bit; what if he planned to put you in there? His stomach wasn’t the only thing around you, as his powerful abdominal muscles hugged you from all sides. You wondered if he’d forget you were in here and unconsciously sit up, effectively crunching you like a nut. You shuddered in fear and tried struggling some more, hoping you could get yourself out. A few minutes later and you hadn’t moved an inch. He, on the other hand, was moving.

You felt the muscles around you tense and put pressure on you as Shikamaru got to his feet. Luckily, he was still aware of your existence and made sure his body didn’t crush you. You still felt like you could burst any second, though. You waited for the lazy ninja’s fingers to pull you out, but they never came. What was he doing out there?

1553312.content:
You are Kaoru Shin, a fourteen year-old Genin from Konoha and not a very good one at that. You graduated from the academy only two years prior and with less-than-average grades. Your team mates were embarrassed of you, your parents never had time for you, and all your missions either ended in failure or with you in the hospital for several days. Despite all this, you walked through the Leaf Village with a proud look on your face. Why? Because everything was about to change. On your last mission (which ended horribly) you had learned a new jutsu from a strange old man while passing through a port town. The jutsu supposedly had the power to shrink anyone it was used on. Thinking that this could be your chance at becoming a successful ninja, you decided to test it. But on who? There were plenty of people around, but they all seemed boring. You wanted to use it on a fellow ninja to show that you were better than they were. After several minutes of searching through a market district, you came across the perfect target. The familiar sight of a Leaf headband was all you needed. You casually strolled over to the ninja, who was apparently buying something from a stall.

“Hey, could I speak with you for a sec?” you asked from behind the shinobi.

“Hmm?” the ninja turned his head to look at you. In that moment, you grinned and made a few quick hand seals. There was a loud poof as your vision was obstructed by a pink cloud. When it cleared…you were looking straight at the ninja’s sandaled foot.

“AHHH!!!” you shouted as you jumped back. “W-why did I shrink?! Why am I four inches tall and not him?! THIS WASN’T SUPPOSED TO HAPPEN!!” You were overcome with panic and tried performing the jutsu again. Nothing. “Stupid old guy tricked me! I’m gonna…”

“Hey, where did that guy go?” asked the ninja, looking around in bewilderment. You looked up at the now giant form of…
1553312.title: An Unlucky Genin

choices: No way! Honesty IS The Best Policy!
15533121.content:
"GAH!" You screamed again as you saw, high above you, a giant Naruto! He was looking around for you in every direction, except of course down! You quivered in fear, knowing how mischievous Naruto was, and what if he found out what you had planned to do to him? Then by chance, he looked down at his sandals. You and the shinobi locked eyes for a moment, before he began to reach down for you.

You screamed and tried to scramble away but he was too fast for you. He scooped you up from beneath and held you up to his face. "Wow......You sure are tiny! What happened to you?" He asked innocently.

"N-N-Nothing sir!" You said quivering and sweating daggers in his palm.

"Hmm......'sir'.....sir.....I like it!" He said with a cheeky grin.

Then something apparently clicked in the goofy ninja's mind. "Wait a sec! Were you trying to do this to me!?" He said immediately gripping you in a fist, his smile turning to an angry glare.

What do you do? Would you risk lying to this gigantic Naruto?
15533121.title: Naruto

choices: "I guess we should look for a way to return you to normal."
"If you idolize me so much, you can be my new pet!"
155331211.content:
Crap. If Naruto found out what you tried to do, he’d kill you! You’re only chance was to lie and hope he believed you.

“No, of course not! I would never think of trying to shrink the great Naruto Uzumaki!” you answered quickly. Naruto watched you carefully as you shivered in his grip. You wondered what he was thinking behind those blue eyes of his.

“So…you’re saying you shrunk yourself purposely? Why?” he asked, turning his head to the side. Since you already lied, you may as well make up a story.

“Well, you see…I’ve already idolized you, Naruto-sama! You’re an amazing ninja and I really want to be like you. I thought if I used a shrinking jutsu on myself I could sneak onto you and be with you all day long! Please forgive me, sir!” You bowed your head to finish what can only be called a major suck-up. The orange ninja gave you a strange look and chuckled a bit.

“I always like a fan, but shrinking yourself? That’s going a bit too far, don’t you think? You’re kind of weird. What’s your name?”

“Kaoru. Kaoru Shin.”

“Ah, well Kaoru. You must be one die-hard fan of mine. You can hang out with me if you want. You just had to ask.”

You chuckled nervously. “Yeah, sorry. It’s a bit too late, though. I can’t seem to return to normal size.” Naruto’s eyes widened as he heard this.

“Really? Wow, that sucks.” The two of you remained in silence for a couple moments before Naruto spoke up again.
155331211.title: A Tiny Fan

1553312112.content:
"Hey!" Naruto suddenly shouted.

You jumped, the silence shattered in a second. You looked up at him and said, "W-what is it?" You were still nervous. There was no telling what this unpredictable giant would do.

"If you idolize me so much, you can be my new pet!" Naruto said this with a big grin on his face, like he knew he was saying just the right thing to make your day. You, on the other hand, had a totally blank look on your face.

"What?" you asked in a deadpan voice.

Naruto laughed and said, "Speechless huh? I would be too! I mean, I'm pretty amazing and now you get to spend all your time with me!"

You shook your head a little and said, "But...but...what about getting me to normal size?"

"Why would you want to go back to normal size? You already went through this much trouble to be close to me, you can't turn back to normal, so you can be close to me for the rest of your life! Doesn't that sound great?"

No! No it didn't! It sounded hellish! Who would want to be at the whims of a massive trouble maker? Your life would constantly be in danger! As you thought this, Naruto noticed your hesitation and his face grew stormier. He gripped you more tightly and said, "Unless of course you were LYING before and you really WERE trying to shrink me. Because if you were...I'd have to punish you!"

You took the hint. You quickly shook your head and said, "No! No! That sounds absolutely wonderful! I would love to be your pet Naruto!"

You bent over as best you could and kissed his hand. Naruto smiled again and said, "Good! Then it's settled! Come on little guy! Let's go!"

He tucked you into his jacket pocket before running off. Well this was just great! You were in an even worse fix now! Naruto had absolutely no intention of helping you and was keeping you like a kid who keeps a mouse. And, judging by Naruto's personality, it would be quite hazardous. The jostling finally ended after about five minutes of constant, nausea inducing motion, and Naruto's hand appeared again, reaching into the pocket and pulling you out. The sun was blinding after being in the dark pocket for so long. When your vision cleared you noticed you were
1553312112.title: Better a Pet than Dead

choices: Naruto forgets you're in there and starts draining the broth.
Naruto remembers you're in there and plucks you out.
15533121122.content:
You were at Ichiraku Ramen, Naruto’s favorite place to eat. The giant blond placed you down on the counter, behind a few salt and pepper shakers so Teuchi and his daughter couldn’t see you.

“Hey there, Naruto!” Teuchi greeted with a kind smile. “What’ll it be today?”

“One bowl of pork ramen, please. Extra large!” Naruto replied, his mouth watering at just thought. Teuchi nodded and went into the back with Ayame to prepare the order. When they were gone, Naruto turned to you and smiled down at you. “You ready to pig out, Kaoru? My treat!”

“Thanks, I guess, but how am I supposed to eat ramen at this size?” you asked, not even capable of holding a pair of chopsticks right.

“Don’t worry about that!” was Naruto’s only response before turning away from you and waiting impatiently for the food. By the time Teuchi came out with Naruto’s steaming hot bowl of ramen, but teen looked like he was going to die from starvation. As soon as the bowl was placed in front of Naruto, the fox boy reached for his chopsticks and began chowing down. After gulping down the first mouthful of noodles, he mumbled a thanks to the restaurant owner before picking up several more and slurping them down. After consuming a piece of pork, Naruto took a second piece, but only took a big bite of it. He brought the remaining portion of the pork down to you and urged you to take it. You did and thanked him before stuffing your face. What was only a small, insignificant piece to Naruto was an entire helping to you!

Several minutes later, you had polished off the pork and was already getting full. Naruto was still eating away; even he could finish such a huge bowl too quickly. Teuchi and Ayame knew Naruto’s eating habits all to well and purposely packed the bowl with a lot more contents. When Naruto glanced down at you and noticed your empty hands he said, “I guess you liked that! You should try this broth; it’s fantastic!”

Before you could get a say in whether you wanted to try it or not, Naruto picked you up with the chopsticks and dropped you into the ramen. You landed with a small splash and quickly swam back up to the surface, gasping for breath. Luckily, the ramen wasn’t as hot as it was when it had first been brought out. It was kind of warm and steamy, kind of like a hot spring.

“Well, since I’m already here…” you say to yourself before dipping your face into the broth and gulping down the warm liquid. Maybe it was just because you were so small and the tastes were intensified, but the broth tasted delicious! After swallowing your third mouthful, you noticed Naruto wasn’t picking at the ramen anymore. Looking up, you saw that he was staring right at you with envy in his eyes.

“Man, it must be awesome to swim around in ramen! I wish I could do it; it’s always been a dream of mine.”

“I thought your dream was to be Hokage?” you ask the genin.

“What? Oh, right! Swimming in ramen is my second dream.” Naruto laughs and you laugh along with him.

“It’s pretty nice, I guess. It’s like a hot spring with yummy tasting water. I’m going to smell like ramen now, though…”

“Is that a bad thing? You’ll smell great! Good enough to eat!” Naruto laughed with you again, but this time your laugh was more of a nervous chuckle. Naruto could probably eat you at this size. It wouldn’t be very hard.

After your little discussion about Naruto’s weird dream, you both went back to eating your lunch. Every now and then you would swim over to a piece of meat and nibble on it. You knew well enough to stay away from those giant chopsticks, though. Naruto could easily mistake you for apiece of meat and snatch you up without looking. Speaking of not looking, Naruto was acting kind of odd while he ate. His eyes were closed and every mouthful he savored was followed by a moan as it went down his gullet. This must be how he always eats ramen; completely entranced in the smell and taste while oblivious to the world around him. Once Naruto had slurped up the last of the noodles, the bowl was now empty…save for you. Like he always did, Naruto put down his chopsticks and picked up the bowl with both hands, ready to drain the remaining broth from it.

“Um…Naruto, don’t forget to take me out.” you reminded, but Naruto wasn’t listening. His eyes were still shut and his mind was currently in his ramen paradise. “Naruto!!”
15533121122.title: A Meal to Remember

choices: Naruto suddenly remembers you're in there and gets you out
Naruto doesn't remember...but you're not digested either...
155331211221.content:
"NARUTO!!!" You gave one last futile shout as Naruto tipped the bowl up, the broth draining in a tidal wave towards his open maw. Within seconds you could feel yourself getting pulled towards the dank cavern. You quickly turned your body and started swimming for you life, dodging left over chunks of meat and vegetables. Naruto was insatiable however and didn't pause to take a breath or anything. He just kept drinking and drinking, tipping the bowl up higher and higher. Your arms and legs felt like they were on fire they were exerting so much effort to keep yourself from becoming a snack for for the hungry fox boy. You glanced behind you and saw Naruto's enormous face looming almost right behind you! You gasped and strained, forcing yourself to move faster. Suddenly, a shadow engulfed you. Still looking ahead you saw Naruto's lips pass by overhead, his teeth hanging down like stalactites in a cave. You felt yourself fall onto the wet, slippery pink muscle that was Naruto's tongue and continue sliding back. His powerful throat muscles were dragging you closer to his belly.

"NARUTO! HELP ME!!!" You screamed frantically hoping against hope that Naruto would hear you, but he could not. He was lost in a ramen flavored fantasy, his senses all focused on enjoying the noodles, broth and meat...unfortunately for you you WERE the meat.

Your muscles cried out in protest as you attempted to escape this fate, but it was all futile. The cavern slammed shut, throwing you into a darkness that reeked of ramen, Naruto's breath, and the sweaty scent of your own fear. Naruto swished the brother around in his mouth, savoring the taste. You felt yourself get tossed around, slamming into his teeth, getting washed under his tongue, getting pressed to the roof of the mouth, before Naruto finally gulped, sending you and the broth down his esophagus. The tight muscles massaged your body all over as it dragged you down, down, down until you passed through the end of it and landed with a wet plop onto a pile of soggy noodles. You quickly got to your feet and ran to the stomach wall, slamming your fists against it. "NARUTO! SAVE ME! PLEASE!"

This was bad. Not only had you shrunk yourself in front of this hyperactive ninja but now he had eaten you! You thought giving yourself over to Naruto would save you from a fate like this but instead it had condemned you! Talk about bad luck! There might still be a chance though if Naruto could hear you.

Naruto, however, merely burped and patted his belly. "Thanks Teuchi! That was great!" He pushed the bowl towards the man and got up, walking away. He smiled as he remembered how good the ramen had tasted. He still couldn't remember that you were in the bowl he had just finished eating and he couldn't hear you screaming his name. His burp had flushed most of the air out of your environment, leaving you light headed. Another one would probably send you into unconsciousness. You didn't know how long you had before the digestive juices started eating away at you. So you resolved to get yourself out of this fate. You put your hands together and attached chakra to to the soles of your feet. Closing your eyes you concentrated until you were sure you had it before running towards the stomach wall. Your feet clung to the living wall and you ran up it, heading for the esophagus again. You had never been very good at this but it was amazing what a life or death situation could do to help you succeed. You managed to jam our arm into the closed exit and force your body into the tube.

Outside, Naruto suddenly felt something moving around in his stomach. He held it worriedly and said, "Oh wow...what's going on in there?"

Unfortunately for you, as usual, the only way anything was getting back up the esophagus was through vomiting. Naruto kept his gorge down and, therefore, you were soon tossed back into the soup of his stomach. Damn...was there no way out?
155331211221.title: Food for Though

choices: You wake up to Naruto watching over you.
You wake up, but Naruto isn't in the room.
1553312112211.content:
Naruto looked down at his stomach and jiggled it a bit, feeling his ramen lunch swish around in there. The familiar sound of his stomach gurgling brought a smile to his face. “I guess you enjoyed that as much as I did, didn’t you?” Naruto said to his gut as he patted it again as continued toward his apartment.

Patted…petted…pet…

Naruto’s eyes went wide as he suddenly remembered you. He reached his hands into his pockets to see if you were there, but all he felt in them was loose change and a few balls of lint. The blond did a 180 and rushed back toward Ichiraku. Once there, he stormed in and began searching the counter top for you.

“Oh, hey Naruto.” Teuchi greeted the young ninja again. “Did you forget something?”

“Um…yeah. I think…” Naruto mumbled as he moved the salt and pepper shakers aside. You weren’t here either…but that could only mean one thing. Naruto’s face turned white as he touched his stomach.

*gurgle*

The fox teen bolted out of the restaurant, leaving a very confused Teuchi and Ayame to exchange glances with each other. Naruto ran through the village, but not too fast. If he moved too quickly, he risked speeding up his digestion process. He looked around desperately for somewhere secluded and finally found an empty alleyway with no one around. Naruto ran into the ally, took one last glance around to make sure no one was looking, and reached two fingers into the back of his throat. Upon touching his uvula, the expected response began…

Naruto clutched his stomach before puking out his lunch on to the rocky ground. He hated wasting a good meal like this, but he had no choice in the matter. He couldn’t digest his meal when you were PART of that meal. After about half the contents of his stomach were expelled on to the ground, Naruto wiped his mouth with his sleeve and spat out the bad taste in his mouth. His eyes began scanning over his vomit, searching for anything that wasn’t a ramen noodle, piece of pork, or vegetable.

“Oh, please don’t be too late! I couldn’t have digested you that fast!” Naruto started to sweat at the thought of finding your burnt skeleton or of you still being in his stomach, succumbing to his enzymes. He was just about to reluctantly initiate another gag reflex when he spotted something in his discarded lunch. Something humanoid. Naruto plucked it out of the soupy mixture and shook a bit of the juices off. Just as he thought, it was you. You were unconscious and a little red from the intense heat of the teen’s powerful stomach, but you’d live. Naruto sighed and wiped some sweat from his forehead.

“Oh man, that was a close one! Another minute or so and you might have been Uzumaki food! It’s going to be a lot tougher than I thought keeping someone as small as you around.”

With you safely gripped in his hand, Naruto ran toward his apartment building. Once there, he headed for the kitchen where he gently cleaned you off with a napkin. Once you were decent, he walked into his bedroom and placed you on the bed. Sitting down next to you, the genin looked at you closely while thinking about what he was going to say to you when you woke up. You would probably hold some contempt toward him for eating you…
1553312112211.title: Saved in the Nick of Time

It was around dinner or six to seven when you wake up.you feel hot and cool at the same time you feel a burning pain all around you on a soft cloth.you though what happened to you was a to you was a dream until you open your eyes, you slowly start to stand up and look around to see that your on a bed that was made for a giant. you felt a sudden pain in your stomach as you realize that its not a dream and your still small. you start to think about how you got so red. once you remember you wonder how you got out of naruto's stomach.

you then came to the conclusion on how you smell that he puked you up just in time.you then heard a loud flushing noise.suddenly naruto came into view.you looked up at him as he came closer."looks like you finally woke up i was starting to get worried"said Naruto.as you looked up at naruto you noticed a more worried and cautious look in naruto's facial expression."well i wouldn't even be alive if it weren't for you" you replied.

With each bit of your explanation about trying to shrink the future hokage. Naruto began to look more and more furious. When you finally finished, he was gripping you so tight you were surprised that your ribs didn't snap. You couldn't struggle very much since your arms were pinned to your sides. "So...you were trying to use a shrinking jutsu on me huh? Well lucky me! Looks like I'm the one who gets to punish you!" He said through gritted teeth. You whimpered.

"But I can't let anyone see you, at least before I'm ready to share you..." He said quietly, his eyes shifting around to passers by.

155331212.title: No way! Honesty IS The Best Policy!

1553312121.content:
As Naruto arrived at his apartment, he kicked of his sandals before closing the door and putting a small bag of his purchases on the kitchen table. After that, he strolled into his bedroom and planted himself on his bed. After untying the knot in the back of his headband and letting it come loose, he looked down and expected to see your shrunken form. However, you were no where in sight. For a second the teenage ninja thought you had escaped on the way here until he noticed a small pair of legs kicking wildly between his eyes. He smirked and looked up. There you were, plastered by sweat to his forehead.

“Just hanging around?” he laughed as he peeled you off his brow to look at you. You scoffed at his bad pun and looked away. So much for telling the truth. Naruto examined you for a moment, thinking of all the things he could do with his you under his power like this. You deserved it for trying to shrink him. “So, little guy, what’s the name of the idiot who’s jutsu backfired?” You didn’t want to answer him, but felt it was a good idea to do so.

“K-Kaoru Sh--”.

“Oh, Kaoru is it?” he interrupted before you could finish your last name. “That means fragrance, right? Well in that case, you should smell my fragrance. I got one big body dripping with it, especially since I’ve been outside all day training and shopping. So, Kaoru, I think the first phase of you punishment will be..."
1553312121.title: Naruto Punishes You When He Gets Home

choices: ...stay strong long enough for a final sniff.
...withdrew, unable to take the final sniff.
15533121211.content:
Naruto swung his legs onto his bed and bent them so his feet were resting on their heels side-by-side. He then placed you in front of them so you got a front row seat to the wall of stinky skin. You watched the sweat drip down them as the giant ninja flexed his toes. It smelled bad even from this distance.

“Sorry, Kaoru. I haven’t showered in awhile. I’ve been too busy with missions and my training to worry about that. But hey, that just means there’s more for you to smell!” he grinned toothily like a little kid. You definitely didn’t want to go near his feet, so you began to back up. “Don’t even think about it! You gulped as you looked up at Kiba's massive body. This...couldn't be happening! Of all the horrible luck. This was just like every other venture you've tried in your life. You really were completely useless and now you were a few inches tall in front of a boisterous dog ninja. You fall to butt and just sigh despondently. Of course this doesn't last as you're quickly, and roughly, grabbed up in Kiba's hand and brought before his massive face.

"Hey! What the hell do you think you're doing kid? Were you trying to shrink me?" Kiba shook the fist you were in, rocking your head back and forth. It was all too much. You suddenly burst into tears. Kiba jumped in surprise at this sudden display of emotion.

"Hey...stop that. What are you, like five? Man up!" He looked uncomfortable watching you cry. But you couldn't stop.

"I hate my life!" You shouted. "No matter what I do stuff like this always happens! My team hates me, my family wants nothing to do with me, and I have no friends! I'm such a loser! And now I learned a useless jutsu and got myself in a horrible mess. I don't care anymore. Just kill me."

You slumped down in his hand and waited for your fate. You just didn't care anymore. Kiba looked down at you in shock. "Geez kid! Talk about a poor attitude! What, you're just going to give up because of a few set backs?"

He opened his hand walked over to a more secluded spot, looking down at you. "Listen, this kind of thing happens in life. Do you know who Naruto is?"

You nodded. Everyone in the village knew who Naruto was. He didn't exactly keep a low profile. Where was he going with this?

"He's had a pretty crappy life himself. No family, no friends, he wasn't very good at anything, always getting in trouble...but if he was in this situation he'd fight! He wouldn't just cry and roll over! So stop acting like a wuss and get with the program!"

You nodded slowly and said, "You're right. I can't just give up! I can still practice and train and become a great ninja!"

"That's the spirit! Now turn yourself back to normal size and start improving yourself! I'll let the fact that you tried to shrink me slide. Just don't let anything like this happen again!" He said that last thing with a stern look.

You nodded again and made the hand signs to release the jutsu. "Release!"

....

....

"Hey...why aren't you turning back to normal?" Kiba asked, looking over you.

"I...I don't know! I'm stuck!" You shouted looking nervously up at Kiba. The world was already a scary place...but. now, trapped at this tiny size, it was absolutely terrifying. You started to shiver, wondering what was going to happen to you. Kiba frowned and looked you over. He stood up and said, "Well I can't just leave you here like this. You're coming with me."

He put you in his pocket and started moving. You were even more nervous now. You knew Kiba could be a little...rough. But he had just given you good advice and had said he'd let your indiscretion slide so maybe he wasn't all bad. You decided to just wait it out and see what happens. Finally, the movement stopped and Kiba pulled you out of his pocket. You looked around. You were in what you assumed was the dog ninja's room. It was your typical teens room, messy, clothes strewn about, a cluttered desk, the bed was unmade...and there was a pervading smell of teen musk. It was strong...but not unpleasant. You looked up at Kiba who was smiling at you.

"Alright kid, you're going to be staying with me until we can figure out a way to help you. But if you want to stay with me you're going to have to do something to earn your stay. Since you're too small to do much around the room you're going to have to do things for me! Got it?"

"S-sure. Thanks for taking me in." You replied, wondering what he meant.

Kiba sat on his bed. "Sure! We might as well make the most of this and have some fun!"

You smiled and said, "So, what do you want me to do?"

Kiba looked down at you and said, "Something personal, since you can't do anything to help around the house."

He dropped you on the ground in front of his sandal clad feet and said, "I've been walking around all day and my feet are sore. Why not rub em down for me?"

You looked at the huge feet in front of you and hesitated. This...could be difficult. You weren't sure what to do. You could always ask him to do something else. But Kiba might not like that...he was being really generous taking care of you and he might not like you being ungrateful. What should you do?

When he reached the top, Delia was still standing in front of the door in a daze as she tried to recall anything ‘awesome’ her son had received.

Gary didn’t know exactly which room was Ash’s. He probably would have checked every room if he had not heard the boy’s familiar voice behind a slightly opened door. Gary pushed the door all the way open and witnessed Ash standing in the middle of his room, repeatedly stomping his foot against the wooden floor.

“I bet you regret trying to escape now, huh shrimp?” Ash spoke to his shoe as he continued to punish the floor with it. He didn’t notice Gary until the later closed the door of his room. “Oh, hey Gary! How are you doing?”

“Skip the formalities, Ash. What did you want to show me? I don’t have all day; I’m a very busy guy.” Gary said as he folded his arms across his chest.

“Yeah, yeah, let me get him. You’re gonna love him.” Ash slipped his socked foot out of his shoe and picked the footwear off the ground. Gary watched as Ash turned the shoe around in his hand and something fell out of the opening. The ten-year old adventurer tossed his shoe away and grasped the object in his hand tightly. He approached Gary, who noticed he was holding something like a miniature person.

“Is that a doll? You still playing with dollies, Ashie boy?” Gary started to laugh hysterically until Ash shoved his ‘doll’ in his face. Gary got a better look at it and realized it was moving on its own. It seemed to be a very small teenager, perhaps a few years older than themselves.

While being held in Ash’s grip, you took in as much fresh air as possible. You knew by the way things were going that you weren’t going to get much of it. After discovering you trying to escape, Ash had stuffed you back into his shoe and punished you by stomping you into the insole repeatedly. He might have been teaching you a lesson: try to escape again and he really will stomp you to death.

As you blinked your eyes open, you came face-to-face with another youthful boy. It was Gary Oak, Ash’s long time rival. What was worse than one giant ten-year old? Two.

“Ash, what the heck is that?” Gary asked, poking you with his finger to make sure you were real.

“He’s a Team Rocket spy! I caught him sneaking around in my room.”

“Team Rocket? But…he’s not wearing a uniform.”

“Duh, because he’s in disguise! He was going to steal my Pokemon. Too bad for him they aren’t here right now.” Ash grinned widely, taking pleasure in your ill luck.

“So let me guess…you’re punishing him.” Gary was still bewildered that his friend was holding a tiny person in his hand. Did Team Rocket really possess this kind of technology?

“Yup! Want to join in?”

Gary looked at you one more time, using his big, black eyes to gaze into your own small ones. You knew Gary was a lot more mature and serious than Ash. Sometimes it was hard to imagine that he was just 10. You hoped that the giant trainer could see the desperation in your eyes and realize the mistake his rival had made…

155332222211112122.content:
“Bring him over here, Ashie boy. Time for him to gaze up at his new god.” Gary said in an almost demanding tone. Ash would usually get angry at the tone, but this time he didn’t really care. He gave you one last grin before dropping you in front of the seated Gary. You stood up and almost immediately fell back down again as you stared up at the towering figure of Gary. The preteen trainer gave you an evil smirk as he raised both his damp, socked feet over you.

“Ready for these bad boys, bug?” Gary asked as he flexed his toes.

“Please…don’t do this. I never did anything to you!” you yell up at him, but he replies by scoffing and slamming one of his dirty socked feet on top of you. Your body was pinned under his sole while his toes casually gripped your head and smushed you into the fabric of the sock. The smell was far worse than Ash’s and you wanted to wiggle free, but Gary was making it so you couldn’t even move an inch.

“I don’t really care. I’m your god now and it’s the job of subjects to please their gods.” Gary explained to you as he smothered you under his sock, enjoying the feeling of your body under his control. After a couple minutes he took the sock off you and you were able to wobble back to your feet. This, however, made Gary displeased. “Did I say you could stand, bug?”

You looked up, confused, just as Gary moved his foot in front of you and flicked your face with his big toe. It felt like something hard was just tossed into your head and you went flying back. After a few tumbled you came to rest directly between the socked feet of your other god, Ash. The black haired boy grinned down at you and hovered his foot over your fallen body. Instead of stomping down on you like you expected, he used the foot to kick you back over to Gary. You slid across the floor until the young Oak’s foot stopped you. Once again you were smothered in wet, smelly sock and whimpered into the fabric. Your tears, however, were simply absorbed into the sock and added to the gallons of sweat that they had soaked up.

“Do you think there are any more tiny Rocket spies around?” Ash asked his rival, glancing around suspiciously.

“Who knows?” Gary responded, not really listening to Ash’s question. He wasn't entirety convinced you were with Team Rocket, but that didn’t bother him. All he cared about was that you were small and he was big. He loved being the big shot around town and now he had a tiny slave to worship him like a god.

As Gary rolled you under his foot, he sighed and wiped his forehead. Looking at his sleeve, he saw it to be drenched in sweat.

“Isn’t it supposed to cool down when night falls? Why is it still so hot?” Gary complained as he wiped his sweaty palms on Ash’s bed.

“We’re in the middle of a massive heat wave.” Ash replied, also looking quite sweaty. “It doesn’t help that my air conditioner is still in storage. I have to remember to set it back up tomorrow…”
155332222211112122.title: Gary's Time to Shine...With Sweat

Gary pulled his shirt off first, then Ash followed him. Now both boys were shirtless and sighing contentedly. "Ahhh...." They both sighed as they threw their shirts on the floor. "Hey Gary, do you smell something?" Ash asked.

Gary sniffed, "Pee yew! Yeah!"

The boys lifted their arms and sniffed underneath them, tracing the smell back to their pits. They stopped sniffing immediately once they'd got a good whiff of the source. "I think it's us! Ha ha!" Ash laughed along with Gary.

Gary grinned, "Yeah...." He then looked down at you at their socked feet. "Hey little dude! Wanna help us with something?" Gary asked you with a mischievous smirk.

You weren't stupid, and you knew what he meant immediately before he even said it. Ash however was a little slower on the uptake. And Gary had to whisper to him his idea, an evil grin then started to form on his face.

Gary reached down and grabbed you, bringing you up to his smirking face. Without another word, Gary lifted his arm and stuffed your head into his left armpit. He twisted and swiveled you around, coating you in his greasy boysweat. There was no hair, but Gary's pits made up for it by being extra stinky and ultra sweaty.
Gary taunted you as he used you to get rid of his B.O.

"Smell good? Yeah you know it does." Gary laughed hysterically as he took you out and shoved you into his other pit.

After he was done he tossed you to Ash...
1553322222111121222.title: Two Sweaty, Shirtless Boys

choices: Ash tosses you to Gary and heads for the bathroom.
Ash takes you into the bathroom with him.
15533222221111212221.content:
One moment you were in a sweaty, sticky hand. The next, you were flying through the air and caught by another sweaty, sticky hand. You attempted another futile protest, but Ash didn’t even take the time to grin down at you. As soon as you were in his hand, he raised his left arm and shoved you into his armpit. Right now, these kids didn’t think of you as some shrunken human. You were just a stick of deodorant to be passed between them. Just like Gary, Ash twisted and dragged you all over his hairless pit. You were starting to get sick, but not just because of the smell or the taste of these boy’s pit sweat. You were supposed to be older than them, but they were dominating you so easily. It was humiliating and you wished you were back home. Instead of answering your prayers, your giant god just mocked you some more.

“How’s it smell in there, shrimp? Worse than Gary, right?” Ash asked as he smiled triumphantly. It wasn’t enough that he was forcing you to smell his B.O., he had to torture you with words too.

“You wish, Ashie boy!” Gary taunted as he folded his arms across his bare chest. Even though he was having fun with him, Gary refused to be inferior to Ash in any way. Even if it involved who was smellier.

By now, you were practically an expert on preteen perspiration. You where covered from head to toe in both youngster’s sweat. This didn’t stop the giant Ash from switching hands and shoving you into his right pit. You were soaking up sweat in this pit for about five seconds before a knock on the bedroom door alerted the boys.

“What are you two doing in there? You sound like you’re having a lot of fun.” came the voice of Ash’s mom.

“We’re just talking about our travels, mom.” Ash lied, knowing his mom would probably believe him.

“I see…and will Gary we spending the night?”

Ash glanced over at the other shirtless boy for an answer. Gary took one look at the tiny teen trapped in Ash’s pit and his answer was obvious.

“Sure, Mrs. Ketchum. I’d love to.” Gary replied, giving a thumbs up to Ash.

“Oh, how wonderful! How many years has it been since you and Ash had a sleepover? I’ll go make you boys a snack right away.” Soon after saying this, Delia’s footsteps could be heard leaving Ash’s door. A few seconds later, however, they came back. “By the way, what’s that awful smell? I can smell it from out here!”

“Uh…that’s…” both boys stuttered nervously.

“I knew it, it’s you boys! Just because you’re off on your adventures doesn’t mean you can neglect to bathe regularly. If you’re going to be staying in my house, I want both of you to take a bath tonight!”

“Aww, but mom…”

“No buts, young man! What reason could you possibly have for smelling like a Skuntank?” Delia shouted back, making both youngsters jump.

“Yes, mom.”
“Yes, Mrs. Ketchum.”

“Good. Gary, you can wear some of Ash’s pajamas. Just like you used to when you were little!”

The boys listened to Delia whistle happily as she headed back down stairs.

“She’s always ruining the fun…” Ash whined, shoving you harder into his pit to express his annoyance. He was pressing you so hard into his flesh that you thought your face would break.

“It’s not so bad, Ash. In this heat, we’ll start sweating again in no time. Plus, a cold bath will feel nice on a night like this.” Gary explained while fanning his face with his hand.

“I guess you’re right.” Ash replied, taking your tortured little body out of his pit. “I’ll take mine first so I can get it over with…”
15533222221111212221.title: Ash's Pits Await!

Gary Wants a Foot Rub First
155332222211112122211.content:
Ash carelessly tossed you over to Gary, who caught you just as Ash left. Gary smirked and looked down at your tiny frail form. You were shivering with fear in Gary's hands. Gary noticed this and snickered.

"What's the matter shrimp? You aren't scared of little old me are ya?" Gary said bringing you closer to his face, ignoring the way you smelled now.

You didn't answer and shook even more.

"You cold or something?" Gary said looking concerned, even though he really couldn't care less about you.

You couldn't answer, you were too scared.
Gary sighed and lifted his arm, in turn causing you to struggle for freedom in his hand.

Gary just laughed quietly at your feeble attempts to escape. "Don't worry squirt...This is just to make sure you won't get away while I do something." Gary said as he tucked you deep into his still sweaty armpit and lowered his arm, trapping you inside.

The sound of running water could be heard from the bathroom down the hall, Ash probably would be in there awhile, unless he thought he could sneak some stink past his mom by not scrubbing very well. Gary ignored the water and began to peel his sock off.

When the sock came off, lint flew everywhere and Gary sighed a long sigh. "Much better....My feet need a certain shrimp's tongue to cool them off." Gary said lifting his arm after he had taken off the other sock. You gasped for air as Gary reclined on the bed with you at his big, sticky, sweaty, linty bare feet.
155332222211112122211.title: Alone Time With Gary

choices: "I think you're ready to lick them."

1553322222111121222112.content:
“Time for you to worship your god’s young, perfect feet, bug. “ Gary told your frightened, still shaking form. You watched as he flexed his toes and you couldn’t help but imagine yourself getting squished underneath them. It was certainly possible.

“I don’t want to do this!” you yell at him, still showing some residence to your master. “Just let me go before Ash comes back!”

“Blah, blah, blah! Stop complaining, shrimp.” Gary responded as he slammed his heel against the bed, shaking it enough to make you lose your balance and fall onto your face. “I don’t really care what you want. What I want is what’s really important here, and I want you to cool off my hot feet with your tongue. Before that, though, you can get used to them by giving them a good rub.”

“W-what? N-no!” you decline and start to crawl back.

“Don’t be like that, bug. It’s not like I’m forcing you against them or anything…unless that’s what you want.” Gary smirked as he cracked his knuckles in an attempt to frighten you. It worked as you practically dove for his feet and started rubbing the sweaty sole. You watched Gary’s expansive form lie back on the bed as gave a sigh of approval. The large boy focused on the feeling of your tiny hands rubbing his much larger feet. It wasn’t the best foot rub, but yet it was also the best Gary had ever had (and trust me, he’s had plenty). Gary Oak had always had people flock around him like a celebrity, but having a small human to worship him like this was one hell of a power trip.

“I could get used to this.” Gary muttered as he closed his eyes and pictured himself doing all sorts of things to you. “I wonder if Ashie boy would consider selling you to me. If not, I could always steal you from him. What’s he going to do about it?” Gary laughed out loud, his booming voice startling you a bit. “What do you think about being my slave, buggy boy?”

“I…uhh…” you don’t know what to say, but your silence wasn’t the answer Gary was looking for.

“I asked you a question and I expect you to answer.” Gary cracked an eye open and gave you a glare.

“I…would love being your…slave, M-Master Gary.” you choke out the words like they’re dirty.

“Good answer.” Gary took the foot you were rubbing and replaced it with the other. “Now do this one.”

You rubbed his foot without anymore words being exchanged between you. Everything was silent except for your occasional cough as you took in too much of the young trainer’s foot fumes. Once you had rubbed as much of the sole as possible, your god’s voice spoke up once again…
1553322222111121222112.title: Rubbing Before Licking

15533222221111212221121.content:
"I think you're ready to lick them. So get to it you shrimp!" Gary said in a deadly quiet voice. You looked in front of you at the giga ten year old's feet....they were very sweaty and ultra stinky. Were you really going to lick them?

You got your answer soon enough when Gary got impatient and thundered, "Lick!" causing you to rush over to his heel and begin lapping at it.

Gary chuckled in amusement as he leaned back against Ash's pillows and closed his eyes again, relishing in the power he held over a tiny human being. You however, were getting far less enjoyment out of this. The stink and heat coming off of Gary Oak's feet was tremendous, and the sweat tasted salty and burned your eyes when it seeped into them when you pressed your face against his foot.

Soon you had covered most of Gary's sole in saliva, after you did the same to the other foot he placed both feet flat on Ash's sheets and spread his toes invitingly. You looked pleadingly up at Gary's cruel, amused boy face. But he only glared at you, "What? You thought you were done? Not a chance shrimp! Now get to licking my toe cheese outta there before I make you into a new batch!"

Just as you were approaching the gap between Gary's toes, Ash came in wearing pajamas. "Hey Gary, your turn....And get your feet off my sheets! You're getting toe crap all over them!" Ash yelled at Gary.

"Blah blah blah. Whatever. Hey, since you're all cleaned up and won't be able to torture him for awhile, let me take him in the bathroom and use him as soap!" Gary said, and without waiting for an answer, he swiped you up and ran into the bathroom and locked the door.
15533222221111212221121.title: Gary's Toe Licking

choices: You make it out of the bathroom.
155332222211112122211211.content:
After locking the door, Gary grinned at you as he placed you on the sink. He walked over to the tub and turned on the warm water.

“M-Master Gary, you’re not really going to use me as soap, are you?” you ask, watching as Gary started to undo his pants.

“Of course I am, slave!” Gary answered without turning around to face you. He then pulled down his pants and his underwear with them. You had a great view of his cute, young ass, but now wasn’t the time to admire such things! You watched Gary reach for the soap dish and removed a small slab of soap from it. “Ashie boy hardly left me anything, see? That’s where you come in!” Gary put the soap back and turned to smirk at you.

Gary turned off the water once the tub was full and walked over to you. He snatched you into his fist and grinned amusingly as you struggled. The young trainer walked back to the bath and lowered himself into it. Once he relaxed into the water, with only his head and chest visible, he dropped you into the lukewarm water. After doing this, the giant squirted some shampoo in his hair and rubbed it in. Once his hair was covered in bubbles, he laid down in the water and let his hair rinse in the tub. This simple movement caused a large wave to sweep you toward the back of the tub. When Gary leaned back up, another wave sent you slamming face-first into his chest.

“Haha, eager to be my soap, shrimp?” Gary asked, picking you up in his giant hand. You saw that Gary’s hair, usually spiky, was drooping wet and made him look much different. You didn’t have mush time to take in the sights, however, as Gary quickly grabbed the small soap fragment in his other hand and mashed it into your body. He lathered you up with soap before slapping you once again against his hard chest. He dragged you across every inch of the smooth skin, making sure to clean it all. Knowing where he’ll probably scrub next, you take a deep breath as Gary dunks you underwater and drags you across his flat belly. When you break the surface again, he lifts his arm and scrubs his armpit. He ignores your whimpers and soaps up his arm next. You’re being given no time to rest in this ordeal as he switches hands and scrubs his other pit and arm. To finish up his upper body, and swings his arm behind him and washes as much of his back as he can.

After a quick dip in the water, he brings you up to his grinning face and asks, “How are you holding up, soap?”

“Please…stop.” you manage to whisper.

“Stop? Why would I stop when I still need to do my legs! Haha!” Gary laughs as he uses the remaining soap bar to lather your body up more. Once you’re ready, he lifts one of his legs out of the water and starts scrubbing his thigh. After that his knee, followed by a long drag down his leg to his foot.

“You did a good job of licking my foot clean, but we still need to get between those toes!”

Gary forces your small, frail form between each one of his toes. You try and close your eyes and pretend your somewhere else, but it doesn’t work so well. Toe jam gets all over your body and some smears over your lips. You accidentally take it in and groan at the taste. After getting between his last two toes, the giant preteen repeats the process with his other leg. When he’s all done, he dips you in the water again and brings you up to his face.

“So how was it, slave? Don’t you feel squeaky clean now?”

You cough and splutter something Gary can’t understand. While the water may be washing away all the grime you had picked up off of Gary’s body, you don’t feel the least bit clean. Not at all.

Gary pulls the stopper from the tub so the water can drain before standing up and exiting the bath. As he does this, you slip out of his soaked hand and land on the soft rug.

“Oops, sorry about that, shrimp!” Gary mocks as he grabs a towel. You stare up at your young god as he dries off his hair and body before wrapping the towel around his waist. “I’ll be right back. I have to get some pajamas out of Ash’s room. You just sit tight and don’t move!” Gary warns you as he leaves the bathroom, leaving the door open a crack. Despite his warning, you wobble to your feet and set your eyes on the door.

“I have to get out of here. I…have to find a way back to normal!” you say to yourself as you wobble weakly over to the door. Being used as soap by a giant boy was not a fun experience and it’s left your body very weak. While your muscles scream at you to stop, you push yourself to the door in hopes of escaping these two cruel trainers.

1553322222211.content:
Your eyes opened. Where were you? You examined your surroundings, and realized that something wasn't right. You could swear that this was a bedroom. The thing was, it was massive! You began to pace, and wondered what was going on. It didn't take long for you to figure it out, as you heard the door behind you open. Was that... Ichigo!? This couldn't be real, there was no way that THIS could be real!

"Are you okay?" Ichigo asked.

You looked up to him, and compared yourself to him, realizing that you appeared to be about eight inches tall. You tried to keep a straight face as you felt that you should ask a question. "Y-You're not going to hurt me, right?"

Ichigo laughed, looked down at you and smiled. "Why would I hurt you?" I've always wanted a pet... and I found you outside my house, so technically, I own you. And as long as you do what I ask you to do, you'll be fine!"

You looked up at him, completely shocked. You had always believed that Ichigo was kind-hearted! "But..."

He sat down against the wall, and asked, "But WHAT?"

"N-Nothing!" You retorted. "Nothing at all!"

Ichigo smiled. "Good! Now that you know who's boss..." you watched in horror as he slipped his shoes and socks off, and placed his bare feet on either side of you, "...you can massage my massive feet!"

You stared in awe at Ichigo's bare feet. You could tell that they were at least 3 inches longer than you were tall! Ichigo tensed his toes, and pushed his sole against your face, yelling, "Get to it!"
