You open your eyes and look around. As your eyes begin to refocus you notice that everything is larger than normal. The last thing you remember is reading the bleach manga and then a bright flash of light.

You take the time to take a look around to try to figure out where you are and see if you can find someone to help you.

As you are looking round you here footsteps and go towards them, when you reach the person you see the bear feet of Jinta Hanakari.

You try to attract Jinta's attention and when he looks down he notices you and a wide dark grin spreads across his face.

"What have we got here. I think you will make a nice..."
155332222221222.title: Jinta

choices: You Scream and Try To Run Away
15533222222211.content:
Your name is Tim, you are 12 and are a Sonic the hedgehog fanatic! Today you were excited about catching the season finale of Sonic X.

You had everything you needed, chips, popcorn, and sodas by your side on the couch. You hit the power button on the remote to the TV....nothing happened. You groaned, being the typical lazy teen you were you didn't feel like getting up once you had found your comfortable spot. "Batteries must be dead." you growled as you stood up and approached the television.

However as you approached it a golden ring like the ones in the Sonic games appeared on the screen. You panicked, thinking this to be some sort of whacked out Sonic version of The Ring, then you saw a grassy field in the middle of the ring, you felt yourself drawn against your will towards the television. You tried to stop yourself but you couldn't help but reach out and touch the middle of the ring. When you did you blacked out.

You awoke to the sound of thunder, it was like it was inches away from you, fearing that a terrible storm was going to hit, you opened your eyes and tried to get up. However the sky was a beautiful blue, cloudless. You looked around as you sat up, two large mountains colored red and white stretched up on either side of you into the clear blue sky.

You heard the thunderous sound again, this time directly above you, and you felt something wet dripping on your head. You reached up and felt the top of your head and pulled your hand back in disgust, it was covered in a slimy.......spit?

You looked directly above you and there, grinning down at you, drooling on you and chuckling madly, was your beloved Sonic The Hedgehog! Only he was gigantic!
15533222222211.title: Sonic

155332222222111.content:
You couldn’t believe your eyes. There he was, the fifteen-year-old blue hero himself…except a giant! His green eyes were staring at you intently and he kept on chuckling like a kid who was playing with some bugs. You just stood there, frozen in fear and not know what you should do next. Should you try talking to him?

“Um…S-Son-” you stuttered to say, but stopped when you noticed Sonic preparing to spit on you again! You screamed and dove to side as the giant glob of saliva hit the ground next to you, making a huge splash. You were so pathetically small…maybe just an inch compared to the huge hedgehog.

“Damn, missed.” Sonic muttered as he wiped his mouth with his left hand. You not realized that Sonic was a danger to you and did the only thing you could think of: run for the hills. It didn’t go very well, though, as Sonic easily snatched you up between his thumb and index fingers. He WAS the fastest thing alive, after all. “And where do you think you’re going, little guy?” Sonic brought you in front of his face and smirked at your tiny form. He couldn’t believe this was a human he was holding…

“W-what did you do to me?!” you scream while attempting to wiggle out of Sonic’s fingers. The speedster had a tight hold on your waist, however, so you weren’t going anywhere.

“I don’t know, really. Tails could probably explain it better than me. Basically, I took this ring here…” Sonic bent down and grabbed a small ring identical to the one that was on your television screen. “…and used it to bring you here while also shrinking you. Tails is a genius when it comes to these things…”

“I don’t get it…why would Tails made something like that?”

Sonic raised an eyebrow as you asked this. He was curious as to why you acted like you knew Tails so well, but shrugged it off and replied, “Because ever since we came to this world, all the humans have been so much taller than us. Even the kids are taller then me! So, Tails and I decided to get ourselves a little slave to make us feel BIG, if you know what I mean. We couldn’t just make a shrink ray, though. People would notice when someone suddenly vanishes. You, however…you’re not from this world.” Sonic cracked an evil grin. You couldn’t believe the words that came out of his mouth. You were still having a hard time grasping your new situation. One minute you were normal twelve-year-old about to watch Sonic X, and the next you’re being enslaved by the main character?!

“I’ll give you a bit to take all this in. In the meantime…”
155332222222111.title: Your New Hedgehog Master

choices: Tails' Workshop (Perhaps Tails Isn't There Though)
A Nice Secluded Spot Under A Tree
1553322222221112.content:
You looked at him funny after Sonic said "....I'm putting you in my armpit!" Why on earth would he do something like that? Sure he didn't have pockets, but....

You didn't really have time to think this over when Sonic lifted up his blue arm and sniffed underneath the hairless, yet clearly dripping wet flesh under there. "Mmmm....I love the way I smell after I've run a long distance on a long hot day. I don't use deodorant of course. And I only shower when I've got a place to stay. Humans usually say I stink.....But what do humans know anyway? I've always wanted to teach a human to learn to love it...now I get the chance!" Sonic chuckled happily as he gladly stuffed you roughly into the dripping wet armpit.

You were small enough to fit nicely, but that didn't mean you were comfortable in the unhygienic hedgehog's pit. It smelled of rotten meat and soon you were coated in his sweat like a second skin.

That is when Sonic put his arm down and began to run.

It was bad at first, what with his arms rubbing you into his pit as he swung his arms, purposefully making it worse for you. That was when he began to pick up speed and soon the world was going by him. How he kept from tripping and cracking his skull open you had no idea, but as he began to sweat even more in the hot sun, it was made all the more worse for you.

He sped through the field until he was at last where he wanted to be which was...
1553322222221112.title: "...I'm putting you in my armpit!"

choices: Sonic makes you clean the inside of his shoes.
15533222222211122.content:
You felt Sonic come to a sudden halt. One moment he was running at unimaginable speeds, the next he was standing still like he never moved an inch. You’d say he was amazing…if he didn’t currently have you tucked into his armpit.

“Would you look at that,” Sonic spoke, placing his hands on his hips. “A tree in the middle of a field! Perfect for some shade!” Sonic strolled over to the trunk of the tree and sat down, leaning his blue back against it. As he got himself relaxed, he lifted his arm and pulled you from your sweaty prison. He gripped you tightly between his two fingers like you were an ant and brought you before his big, green eyes. “How was the smell, little bug? Pretty bad, right? I’ll make you appreciate it eventually.”

You trembled between the hedgehog’s fingers, scared out of your wits. You started squirming, hoping you could squeeze out of the speedster’s glove.

“Why are you squirming, little buddy? Haven’t you had time to understand your new position?”

“No! I don’t understand! Why are you doing this to me?” you cry out, your struggles becoming more desperate as the giant hedgehog growls in frustration.

“You STILL don’t get it? Your old life is over, kid. You’re now my slave along with Tails and anyone else we decide to share you with.”

“Bu…but I don’t want to be a slave!”

“Oh? Well okay then.” Sonic opened his hand so you fell into the center of his palm. You watch, tearfully, as the gloved hand slowly closes around you. “I’ll just crush you and use that ring to get another slave. I’m sure the next one will be a lot more cooperative.”

You see sonic smirk wickedly before his fingers block your few and you feel his fist compress you. The teenage hero begins to slowly squeeze you and you scream in pain. You feel your insides begin to squish together and the pain that comes with it is like nothing you’ve felt before in your young life. It’s even worse than that one time you sprained your leg a couple years ago…

“N-no! Stop, Sonic! I’m sorry, I’ll be your slave! Please don’t crush me!”

“Hehe, that’s a good boy.” Sonic coos as he opens his sweaty palm and lets you lie down in it for a few moments. Soon your dropped onto the grass in front of his and the towering hedgehog stares down at you with a gleam in his eye.

“Now, slave, it’s time for your first task. Even an ant like you can be useful…”
15533222222211122.title: Relaxation and Cruelty

155332222222111221.content:
Sonic reaches down to you, at first you think he's going to pick you up between his fingers and do the same thing all over again. Then you see he's just pulling his shoes off. "Man...these things are stuck like glue! Must be cuz I've worn them without taking them off for so long! Heh heh!" Sonic chuckled as he finally managed to pull his right shoe off with a pop!.

He sighs in enjoyment as he wiggles his toes in the air, spreading and allowing a cool breeze that conveniently blows to pass between them. This breeze however passes the raunchy odor even quicker than normal over to you. And boy is raunchy the correct word! His entire foot is blue just like most of his body, but you can see blackish filth from the inside of his shoe spread all over his sole as he sets it down in front of you, toes still wiggling teasingly.

Sonic pays no attention to you as he peels off his other shoe, setting them both by his side, he leans back against the tree trunk and laces his hands behind his head, eyes closed.

You start to inch away from the fetid feet, when something hot and sticky falls from the sky and lands on top of you, trapping you in the grass like gum. It stinks like Sonic's feet, you can guess it is toejam that has become dislodged and fallen on top of you, conveniently stopping your escape. Not like you were gonna get far anyway, Sonic had plans for you.

Sonic opened one eye when he heard the frustrated noises you were making, the sticky goo was like tar, it was warm and foul. Sonic saw you laying there and burst out laughing. "Ah ha ha ha ha ha ha! That's cool! I didn't even have to bring my feet to you, they went to you themselves!" Sonic laughs at his joke and reaches down to you, he wipes off the gunk that has you locked in place. To your disgust, he sucks his finger that is coated in toejam clean! "Yum!" He licks his lips.

"Now...to business." Sonic says positioning his feet so that they are on either side of you.

They radiate heat and stench, and you yourself are starting to sweat! However Sonic just waves his blue feet from side to side and hums, "Lets see....How about some worship to service your new master? My feet deserve the royal treatment after all the running I do!"

"You can start by...
155332222222111221.title: Trapped In Toe Gunk

choices: You do a good job of licking out the toe jam.
You miss a bit of it and are punished.
1553322222221112211.content:
“You can start by cooling them with your tongue! As you can probably feel, they’re really hot from being in my shoes for so long.” Sonic commands bringing his blue feet closer to you and thus increasing the amount of heat that washes over you. YOU’RE the one that needs to cool of, but Sonic only seems to care about his own needs. Sonic starts to reposition his feet so one of them is standing on its heel and directly in front of you. You stare up at it in awe; it’s like a big, blue building! At your size of a mere inch, Sonic’s foot is unbelievably huge! Just one of his toes could probably crush you into paste.

“S-Sonic….how-?”

“I know what you’re thinking, little buddy. How is someone as small as you supposed to clean my gigantic feet? You won’t know until you try, so get trying!” Sonic stomps the earth with his other foot, scaring you enough to make you dash over to the foot in front of you. You stop when reach his massive heel and begin touching it. Despite being a blue hedgehog, Sonic’s skin feels very human. As you pull you hands away, you feel them unstick from Sonic’s sweaty foot. You look at the thick, gooey liquid that covers your hands. You have to LICK this stuff? “Hurry up, slave, before I get angry again.”

Not liking an angry Sonic, you press yourself against the filthy heel and begin licking. Sonic sighs in contentment as he feels your nice, cool tongue flick against his hot foot. You, on the other hand, groan in disgust as you taste the teen’s sweat coats your tongue. You have to put up with it or else Sonic will dispose of you, so you continue to lick as much of the foot as you can. Eventually, you’ve licked as much of Sonic’s foot as you can from the ground.

“You’re doing a swell job, little buddy. Now start climbing!” Sonic orders as he flexes his foot, showing several curves in his sole. At your size, these curves are like ledges for you to hold onto. You do as Sonic commands and start to climb the wall of blue flesh, licking as you go. Sonic moans as he feels your tongue brush against the more sensitive parts of his foot. You climb up the foot as if it was a rock wall, your clothes quickly becoming soaked with the giant’s sweat. The raunchy smell fills your nose and a few times it dazes you enough that you lose your balance and almost fall. Somehow, you manage to stay on Sonic’s foot for a full half-hour, licking it as if it was some kind of giant candy. If it was candy, whoever made it should be fired and shot…

“Don’t forget my toes, little man.” Sonic reminds you, wiggling his toes and causing a few crumbs of toe gunk to fall off. A few of these boulder-sized chunks almost hit you, but you manage to avoid them. You climb up tot eh top of Sonic’s foot and make your way to the crevice between his big and index toes. You look into the space and almost puke at the sight. Blackish toe jam has filled the spaces between each of Sonic’s toes. The stuff reeks of sweat and moldy cheese, but you know you have to clean between his toes as well. Gulping hard, you approach the large pile of filth and begin licking it up.

“This is disgusting…why is Sonic making me do this?” you ask yourself after swallowing some of the gross toe jam. “Can’t he do this himself? He seems to like the taste…”

“Make sure to get between all of them, slave. If I see even one splotch of filth, you’ll be severely punished!”

“Yes, Sonic…”

“That’s MASTER to you, human.”

“Yes, Master…” you sob a bit as you say this. You can’t believe you’ve been reduced to this. Nothing but a tiny toe cleaner. Some prize you get for being a big Sonic fan…
1553322222221112211.title: From Sonic's Fan to Sonic's Slave

choices: The Hellish Ride to Tails' Workshop (Your POV)
The Enjoyable Run to Tails' Workshop (Sonic's POV)
15533222222211122112.content:
Sonic suddenly moves his foot, bringing it up to his face and causing you to fall out of his toes and into the dirt below. He inspects his toes, spreading them, intending to check between each and every toe. He frowns a bit and 'hmms' as you pray that you did a good enough job.

Suddenly Sonic's giant blue foot slams down in front of you, making you jump. "You pathetic human! You barely cleaned out two toes of their cheesy contents! Now I'm gonna have to punish you!"

You see Sonic's gloved hand reaching for you and you begin to crawl away, however the speedy blue titan is far faster than you even at normal size and quickly brings you up to his face. "I'm going to visit Tails! But you ain't riding shotgun on the way there!" And with that, Sonic carelessly throws you into his shoe. You land with a thump, on the squishy bottom.

You take a small sniff, and instantly regret it. The smell of sweaty blue hedgehog feet is everywhere, and its about to get a hell of a lot worse. The lights go out, you turn around just in time for Sonic's sockless blue foot to pin you down and shove your face under his toes.

"Get a good sniff of my foot...you puny human!" Sonic laughs as he puts on his other shoe and begins to run so fast that his feet hardly touch ground. But that doesn't mean his feet aren't building up heat and sweat inside those iconic red and white sneakers!
15533222222211122112.title: A Hedgehog's Insole

choices: Tails doesn't appear to be there.
155332222222111221122.content:
Sonic laughs as he takes off, knowing the trip to Tail’s workshop is going to be hellish for you. While the cool air that washes over Sonic’s body keeps him from tuning into a sweaty hedgehog, his feet are trapped in his shoes and therefore sweat more and more with every mile he runs. There have been times when Sonic took off his shoes and found them filled to the rim with sweat. He was only running to Tails’ workshop, so there shouldn’t be any threat of you drowning. You’re defiantly going to be one sweaty kid at the end of the ride, however…

“Hehe, looks like he’s enjoying the ride.” Sonic says to himself as he feels you writhe under his foot. Sonic relaxes his arms behind his head and closes his eyes, taking in the full enjoyment of his run. He still continues to run despite his relaxed state, since he knows the way to Tails’ workshop by heart. The several mile run would usually take a car several hours, but for Sonic it only took a few minutes…

“I can’t wait to show Tails his invention worked. He’s going to be so-” Sonic stopped when he noticed he was running toward a train track and a train was just coming into view. Instead of crashing into the train like something going his speed should do, Sonic effortlessly comes to a complete stop inches from the moving train. He places his gloved hands on his hips and whistles as he waits for the train to pass.

“How are you holding up, human?” Sonic asks as he looks down at his shoe and squeezes your head with his blue toes. He feels you struggle against his grip fruitlessly and it makes him smirk. “Tell you what, kid. I’ll take you out if you start licking…”

Sonic waits for a few seconds, not feeling anything but your struggles. Suddenly, he feels something small and wet slurp against the crevice between his toes and it makes him shudder with delight. That was too easy. His new human slave was already starting to break.

“Haha…good slave. But you know…” Sonic watches as the train finishes passing him and speeds off into the distance. “…I lied.” Sonic hears a small scream from under his foot before he takes off once more, running across a nearby lake.

Sonic soon arrives at Tails’ workshop and switches to a walking pace as he makes his way inside. The workshop is pretty large and filled with mountains of tools and devices. It’s such a mess that even though Sonic couldn’t see his fox friend anywhere, he was probably hidden somewhere by a tower of junk.

“Hey, Tails! You here? I have some good news for you, buddy!” Sonic shouts as he walks deeper into the workshop. He notices your struggles have died down a bit and he flexes his toes around your head to check if you’re still alive. Sure enough, he feels some movement in his shoe as you beat against his toes. Having a tiny slave was going to be so much fun…
155332222222111221122.title: Sonic's Pleasant Run

1553322222221112211222.content:
Tails poked his head out from behind a pile of books and lifted up his goggles, "Oh hey Sonic! What are you doing back so early? Did the ring work?"

Sonic greeted his friend and began explaining all about you and what he'd done to you. Tails' grin got bigger and bigger with every detail, once Sonic was finished with his story. Tails inquired as to where you were.

"I wore him as my insole on the run over here! Wanna see him?"

"Boy would I!" Tails said eagerly, he tossed his goggles somewhere in a pile of junk and sat down on the floor with Sonic as his bud began to slip off the shoe containing you. Once it was off, Tails stuck up his nose at the rank odor that steamed off of Sonic's foot. But out of respect for his older friend he didn't say anything.

Sonic sighed and wiggled his blue toes in the air, feeling slime and sweat slosh between them. It'd been so long since he'd bathed, and he was planning on making it even longer, just to torment you.

Sonic put his foot down, and Tails looked closely. There wasn't anything in his toes though. "Um...Sonic...There's no one in there."

"Huh!?" Sonic pulled up his foot with his hands and inspected it. Sure enough, you weren't on his foot anywhere. "Hmm...He's probably in my shoe."

Sure enough, when Sonic shook his shoe upside down, you fell out onto his palm. "Hey squirt! Thought you'd escaped! But then what are the chances of that huh?" Sonic chuckled as he curled his tree trunk like fingers around you. You whimpered as Tails scooted over to get a look at you.

"This is gonna be so much fun Sonic!" Tails said after looking at you for awhile.

"Yup!" Sonic smirked as he pulled off his other smelly shoe.

Tails chuckled and pulled off his own shoes, revealing his own overworked sweaty bare feet. "Ahhh...My feet are soooo sore from working in this lab all day."

Sonic grinned, "How about we have our little bug slave give us both foot rubs?"

"Great idea Sonic!"

You heard this of course, and didn't want any part of going back to Sonic's feet, you didn't want the new experience of Tails' feet either! However it wasn't like tinies got a choice in what they did when they were slaves to giants.
1553322222221112211222.title: Two Giants are Better Than One!

choices: You shout out at Tails in a rage!
15533222222211122112222.content:
Sonic’s grip on you loosened a bit as he placed you down on the floor between him and Tails. You looked up at the towering young anthros above you and couldn’t help but shake in your shoes.

“Aww…look at that; the little human’s scared.” Tails chuckled and smiled down at you sinisterly.

“Heh, he’ll get over it soon enough…hopefully.” Sonic replied as his large, blue feet moved closer to you. Sonic laughed and wiggled his toes with joy. “I think I’ll be getting my foot rub first, bug. That okay with you?”

“No fair, Sonic! You’ve already played with him, and I was the one who created the ring! Why do you get to go first?” Tails’ questioned, clearly not happy. Sonic just rolled his eyes and stuck a finger in his ear.

“Calm down, little buddy. I’m older so I’m the Elder Master to this bug. Besides, don’t you want to watch him rub my feet?”

“Hmmm…” Tails looked down at you and then at Sonic’s big, sweaty soles. “Yeah, I guess you’re right. I’ve always wanted to see one of these humans put in their place.” The young genius’s blue eyes gleamed as he imagined all the fun they were going to have.

“Now…start rubbing! It should be easy for someone who’s already licked me feet.”

You gulped continued to shake as you looked over the large feet in front of you. Even though you had licked them…even though you had suffered underneath them…they were STILL not a sight you could get used to. Nevertheless, you couldn’t refuse Sonic…your master. Bad things would happen if you went against their orders…very bad things. You reluctantly walked over to Sonic’s left sole and started rubbing. The teenaged hero grinned toothily as he felt your small hands rub against his soft, greasy soles.

“Yeah…just like that…a little to the left, though.” Sonic hummed and leaned back, loving the feeling of being treated like this. Tails just sat there with his legs crossed; his sky blue eyes fixed on you. He couldn’t wait to have you rub his equally sweaty orange soles. The little fox boy giggled to himself, making you a bit nervous.

“S-Son-I mean-M-Master, this smell is t-terrible…” you complained while coughing. You didn’t get an answered and looked up, past the male’s chest, to see that Sonic’s face high above. His eyes were closed and his mouth was curved into a smile. He either couldn’t hear your petty complaints or just didn’t care. You sighed with aggregation. You walked over to his other foot and proceeded to rub that. The toxic smell leaking of f the blue foot was intense; it made you sweat and your eyes water.

Suddenly, you felt a warm and stale air hit you in the back. You turned around to see Tails’ gigantic face inches from you. You shrieked and backed up against Sonic’s sole. Tails chuckled childishly and stared at you while he laid on his fluffy belly.

“Wow, you’re so small…that ring worked like a charm!” Tails laughed again, blowing hot air into you as he did. Sonic, upon noticing there was no rubbing going on, looked down to see what the problem was.

“Hey, Tails, don’t bug the slave when he’s trying to work!”

“Awww…but Sonic, I want a turn now! I’m his giant master too!” Tails grinned widely and sat up; his large, orange-furred body rising before you like a mountain. You couldn’t believe this giant fox was just eight-years-old! To think such a young kid had ruined your life…and now you had to rub his feet?!
15533222222211122112222.title: Can't Get Enough Of Those Blue Feet!

Tails demands you to lick his feet

Sonic and Tails started laughing at your pitiful cries and attempts to push the giant stinky feet away till Tails brakes the laughter by shouting " well get rubbing slave". After hearing this you pulled your arms out of his grip and started to rub. Tails feet was littered with filth and was rubbing off on your tiny body, also the smell was getting worse by the minute.
