155332222222111221122221.title: It's Tails' turn now.

15533222222221.content: Choose the Yu-Gi-Oh character you want to shrink around.
15533222222221.title: Yugi

1553322222222121.content:
"Gah, my head..." you moaned to yourself, holding your head as you lay flat on your back. You slowly open your eyes and look around. "W-where am I?"

You carefully got to your feet and looked around. How odd. Everything seemed to...huge! You could make out a massive bed in one corner, a huge sock was laying almost right next to you, a gigantic desk was in another corner, a truly gargantuan closet was slightly open, clothes spilling out from it, and the carpet you were standing on came up to your waist! You were truly tiny, that much was clear. The only question was...how? You closed your eyes and thought back to what you had been doing. You were on your computer in your room...a quick glance revealed that this was, indeed, NOT your own room. You had been surfing the web, checking out a bunch of different sites, while watching Yu-Gi-Oh on the T.V. and your computer had started freaking out. The monitor had blinked and started making an electronic buzzing sound, smoke had started pouring out of the tower, the lights in your room had started flickering and the volume on the T.V. had increased to the point of it being screamingly loud. The next thing you knew you had felt an immense pressure in your head, you had fallen over onto your back and blacked out. Waking up, this is what you found.

"So something my computer did made me shrink...I guess..." you said to yourself, pacing a little. "But it also transported me somewhere...but where....and how was all of this even possible?"

Before you could even begin to figure out an answer to this burning question the door behind you opened up with a bang. You jumped and looked behind you. There was a pair of massive bare feet just in front of you, the toes rising up twice your height! It really helped to truly showcase just how small you were. Your eyes traveled up, past a towering pair of jean clad legs, to a t-shirt covered torso, two strong arms hanging on either side of it, a dog tag of some kind dangling from this giant's neck, a mop of dirty blond hair on his head. Wait a minute...this outfit...that hair...could it be?

"J-Joey?!?"

There was no mistaking it. This towering behemoth was none other than Joey Wheeler....or...Katsuya Jounouchi...or whatever you wanted to call him. Aside from him being a giant of immeasurable proportions to you he was also quite fictional, making this situation even more insanely crazy than it already was. Somehow your computer managed to knock you out, shrink you, and transport you into a fictional T.V. show all at once. Your brain hurt even trying to think up a logical explanation for it. You sighed and just shook your head. Whatever. You're just going to have to deal with this. You looked up again and saw that Joey was looking around his room, not moving from his spot. It didn't take him long to find whatever it was he had been looking for, and he moved over to it. You could only look up in awe as you saw his massive foot lift from the ground, pass over your head and land with earth shaking force dozens of feet away. The second foot followed suit, propelling this massive teen forward to his desk. He sat down and turned on a lamp, pulling out his deck of cards and shuffling through them. This was as good a time as any! He was distracted! You had to get his attention before he started moving around again! You began to run as fast as you could toward his desk, the waist high carpet making it difficult to move. You rand and ran and ran but you never seemed to get any closer. You stopped to catch your breath, the desk still so far away. This was ridiculous. But you had no other choice. You kept at it.

Luckily, Joey was at his desk for quite a while, swapping out cards and thinking up strategies. It took quite awhile, but you managed to reach the desk. You slumped against the chair leg, catching your breath again, before heading over to the foot. You touched it, the skin soft with a slight scent of male body but no visible stink. He had probably recently showered. You pulled back your fist and punched the foot. Nothing. Not even a twitch. Okay...new plan! You leaned forward and bit the foot as hard as you could. This seemed to register as the foot twitched and Joey scooted his chair back, looking down at his foot. What does he see?
1553322222222121.title: Weird Doesn't Begin to Describe It...

choices: A pair of socks. He's going to put them on!
His alarm clock. He's going to take a short nap.
15533222222221211.content:
When Joey looked down underneath his desk, you thought you had been successful in getting his attention. You hoped the giant blond could help you; both in getting you back to your world and protecting you from the many dangers of this gigantic one, himself included. You watched Joey lean down from his seat and reach a hand toward the floor. You thought he was about to grab you and braced yourself to be held by those tree-sized fingers. Unfortunately, Joey’s fingers just missed you and instead scratched the spot where you had bitten him. After a couple seconds the giant duelist leaned up straight again, pushed his chair back in, and went back to fixing up his deck. Damn it all, he hadn’t seen you! You were just too puny and blended in well with the teen’s rug. If Joey had laid eyes on you, he probably thought you were just a speck of dust or something that was hardly worth his attention.

“What am I supposed to do now?” you ask as you lean your back against Joey’s foot and rack your brain. If only you could make it easier for Joey to spot you. …that’s it! He didn’t see you before because you were hidden by the rug, but if you were to climb on top if his foot, he would have to see you! Your brightly colored clothes would stick out against his peach-colored skin.

You turned around and faced the boy’s bare foot. Setting your mind to the task, you spread your hands over the soft skin and dug your nails into it. You began to climb, pressing your small body against the foot for support. Joey was completely oblivious to you scaling his foot; your fingers pressing into his skin didn’t even register to the titan. Your first attempt to the climb the foot didn’t go so well. You accidentally slipped soon after starting and fell back onto the rug. Knowing you couldn’t give up, you tried a second time. You managed to climb half-way up the foot, but Joey happened to move his foot before you could reach the top. This simple movement flung you right off his flesh and sent you plummeting to the ground. Luckily, the rug was soft and softened the impact. As you laid there, recovering from the fall, you wondered if you could do this. No…you had to! Joey could get up at any moment; this was your best chance to get his attention. You jumped back to your feet and rushed over to the foot once again. You put all your energy into climbing as fast as you could; time was limited. As the saying goes, third time is the charm. You manage to scale the entire foot and roll onto the top of it. You lay there for a moment to catch your breath and stare up at he huge behemoth. You started to wonder…what if he still didn’t see you? What if he reached down to scratch his foot again but didn’t look down when he did it? His massive fingers might crush you!

“No…I can’t think about that right now.” you tell yourself as you flip onto your stomach and prepare to take another bite out of the young duelist’s foot. Before you can…

“That should do it!” you hear Joey say high above you. It was the first time you heard the giant speak. Suddenly, Joey scooted out of the desk and stood up, the slight motion causing you to start rolling down his foot. Before you could tumble over the edge and put all your hard work to waste, you quickly grab onto the small hairs that protrude from Joey’s foot. This stop’s your movement, but not his! Joey pushes his chair back into his desk, slips his deck into his pocket, and starts walking. Every rise and decent of his foot threatens to propel you right off it, but your grip on his foot hairs prevents that. You feel like you’re on some kind of theme park ride…without the safety measures! Thankfully, the ride is brief as Joey is only walking over to his bed. He seats himself down upon the comfy mattress and reaches over to the nightstand nearby. What’s he reaching for?
15533222222221211.title: Are You Making Things Easier or Harder?

choices: Joey was meeting someone (Tristan, Yugi, etc)
Joey was picking something up from the store. (Quick stop, then heads back home)
155332222222212111.content:
You watched in horror as Joey's huge hand closed around a pair of thick cotton socks. He lifted his foot, the one you weren't on, and swiftly pulled the sock on, covering it completely in a few seconds. Oh crap! That was going to be you next! You have to do something...but what? There was nothing you COULD do!

"HEY! HEY! JOEY! LOOK DOWN HERE! ON YOUR FOOT!"

Your screams might as well have been whispered. Your voice must have sounded like a pathetic squeak to the mountainous teen. The sock was bigger than a circus tent, slowly laying down on the ground in front of Joey's gigantic toes. You could only stare as the cotton prison slid slowly over the foot, rising above your head, the heel lifting slightly to allow the garment to clothe the entire foot. As soon as he pulled it up the ceiling descended on you, pinning you to the top of the foot. The heat was intense, your tiny body pressed into Joey's warm, heated foot. This wasn't good...you were already starting to sweat! How long could you last in here? You could hear the springs on the mattress uncoiling, indicating Joey was standing up. He began to walk, your sweaty hands starting to lose your grip on the slightly oily hairs. This was getting worse by the second! You couldn't hold on like this forever! Joey walked for a few minutes, each step shaking you like an earthquake, before stopping. Thank goodness! You were starting to relax again when everything went dark around you, the heat increasing exponentially. What the heck? What was going on? You tried to look and then it hit you. It was so obvious! Joey was putting his shoes on! Damn! He was leaving the apartment!

As Joey ran down the stairs, then down the street, the heat in his shoe started to become unbearable. Huge globs of sweat started forming, running down his foot. You were sweating yourself, your body and clothes dampening. Suddenly, a drip of sweat ran over you, soaking you to your skin and rolling past. You were now saturated in the duelist's sweaty scent. It was cloying but his foot wasn't dirty so the smell was bearable. Still, it was not a pleasant feeling to be covered head to toe in sweat, baking in an oven like environment. At least things couldn't get much worse.

And, of course, life loves to prove you wrong today. Joey stumbles over a crack in the sidewalk, jostling his foot more roughly than with just a simple walk. Joey quickly catches himself and keeps walking, forgetting the incident almost instantly. To you, however, it was a devastating event. Before you even knew what was happening, you were tossed head over heels into the air, your sweaty hands slipping cleanly off the hairs, tumbling down his foot. Suddenly, the foot ended beneath you as you tumbled off the skin between Joey's toes, falling through the air, the two towers of toe flesh falling upward past you. You felt your body go limp. You'd heard that, if you ever fell a great distance, making your body totally limp could save you from death. It seemed to work quite nicely. You bounced off the bottom of rubber shoe and landed between Joey's toes. With every step, you rolled up the toe section before being slammed into Joey's sweaty feet. Back and forth this went, over and over again, until Joey mercifully stopped. You took a deep calming breath and instantly regretted it. The air was stale, hot, and filled with the scent of sweat. What was it, a hundred degrees outside? Why did Joey stop anyway?
155332222222212111.title: Imprisoned by Socks

choices: It's a blessing in disguise. Joey spots you on the chicken leg.
Joey eats the chicken leg without knowing you're stuck to it.
1553322222222121112.content:
As you laid there at the bottom of the sock and between Joey’s massive toes, you started to hear him talking to someone. The thick walls of the shoe muffled his voice, so you couldn’t hear what he was saying. Honestly, you didn’t care. You just wanted him to take off his shoes and socks so this hellish ride would end. After a couple minutes, Joey stopped talking but continued to stand in that same spot. What was he waiting for? Perhaps he was talking to a clerk of some kind and was now waiting for them to get back? A few more minutes passed and you could tell the blond giant was starting to get impatient. He began tapping his foot against the ground, unknowingly tossing you around again and slamming you against his raunchy feet some more. Finally, after about ten minutes, Joey started talking again and you heard something like a paper bag being grabbed. You didn’t have long to wonder what it was, however, because Joey was on the move again! His foot lifted into the air, flinging you into the crevice between his toes, and then dropped down, causing you to hit the rubber bottom of the shoe. This happened again and again as Joey walked down the sidewalk. That short stop had been somewhat nice, but now it was back to this. It wasn’t all bad, though. At least you weren’t under the ball of his foot and being crushed by it. That would probably hurt…

Joey made his way back to his apartment, although you didn’t know this. By the time he unlocked his door and opened it, you were barely conscious. The whole ordeal had been very tiring and you regretted every climbing on top of his foot. If you had just stayed on the floor, this wouldn’t be happening.

Suddenly, you felt Joey stop again. As you got started on guessing the reason, you felt your world shift as Joey stepped out of his shoe. You saw the shadow of something pass over you and then grip the end of the sock. It was Joey’s hand, and he was taking off the socks! You quickly grabbed handfuls of the cotton material and when Joey tugged his sock off, you went along with it. The skilled duelist carelessly tossed his sock away and walked away. When the coast was clear, you quickly crawled toward the opening of the sock and leaped out of it. You smiled happily as you took in a big breath of fresh air. No more giant, sweaty foot!

You quickly remembered your original objective and glanced around. It looked like you were in a giant kitchen. You spotted Joey nearby, standing at the counter and opening something. Since he was acting so casually, you guessed you must be in his apartment again. You watch from a safe distance as the towering teen turns around and strolls over to the kitchen table. In his hands are a paper cup filled with soda and what looked like a small bowl of chicken. It all suddenly becomes clear. Joey must of went out to pick up lunch somewhere and bring it back home to eat. All that torture you went through…just because he felt like going out for lunch.

Joey seated himself at the table and began chowing down on his lunch. Those pieces of chicken looked like they were covered in some kind of sauce, and boy did they look good. Joey was certainly enjoying them, judging by the way he hungrily stripped the meat of the bone. You caught a whiff of the chicken and started to drool. You needed to get his attention…maybe he’ll share his lunch with you.

Your eyes traveled underneath the table where you spotted Joey’s two bare feet. As much as you detested them and wished to stay clear of them, you knew you had to get Joey’s attention somehow. Thankfully, the kitchen floor was made up of white tiles, so if you tried biting his foot again he should spot you this time. You dashed under the table and made your way to the titan’s feet. You messed up before, but now you were defiantly going to get his attention!

…or so you thought. The truth of the matter was, as soon as you got within a yard of those two giant feet, you knew you weren’t going to be able to get his attention. No longer did the feet smell simply of male, but they now reeked! The short time they were in his socks and shoes had turned them into smelly, sweaty monstrosities. You weren’t getting near them...and you defiantly weren’t biting them!

“Why is this happening to me?” you ask yourself as you fall to your knees. “It’s just one stroke of bad luck after another! I’m never going to get his attention! Lady Luck must have some grudge against me.” You look down at the floor, stand up, and begin walking away from the feet. You needed to think of a new plan, and being near those raunchy things wasn’t going to help keep your head straight. As you came out from under the table, you muttered, “Please just help me here! All I’m asking for is a tiny bit of luck. Throw me a bone, already!”

“Shit.” you heard Joey curse above you. When you looked up to see what had happened…

*WHAM*

Joey had dropped a chicken leg…which had fallen right on top of you. The bone end of it had whacked you hard, knocking you out cold. If that wasn’t bad enough, you had ended up underneath the meat part of it. When Joey reached down and, just like his mother told him not to, picked the chicken leg up…you came with it. Lady Luck must really, REALLY hate you…or she’s just a bitch.
1553322222222121112.title: You Asked for It

choices: You feel kind of greasy from the chicken. You need a bath.
15533222222221211121.content:
You groaned and held your head. What happened? Your eyes felt too heavy to open. You must have had one massively weird dream...oh yeah...you dreamed you had shrunk and got transported into the Yu-Gi-Oh universe. You snorted and laughed a little. How silly. Like something like that was even possible. You sighed and opened your eyes slowly, a bright light shining in your eyes. Early morning light always shined directly on your face. You blinked a few times and saw a strange, orb high above you, shining light down. It almost looked like a ceiling light but...it was way too big and bright to be a ceiling light though. You looked around and saw a massive dresser, a huge bed, a floor that was sooo far down...oh crap. It wasn't a dream.

You sat up and saw you were laying down on a bed of cotton, inside a tiny box. Well, tiny to a normal human. It was quite comfortable for the teeny tiny you. There was no way this was an accident. You couldn't see him around, but Joey MUST have spotted you and put you here. The door suddenly opened and Joey appeared with a bottle cap and a a small amount of food in each hand. He walked over to the desk and sat down, setting the things in his hand down before looking carefully in the box. He grinned when he saw you were awake and said, "Hey! You're finally awake!"

His voice was deafening. You held your ears and shouted, "Damn! Not so loud!"

Joey frowned a little and then whispered, "Sorry...I didn't think that would be so loud."

You sighed and shouted, "It's okay!"

Joey pointed at a small pile of chicken sitting next to a bottle cap full of water. "Here. I got you some food."

You eagerly jumped off the make shift bed and started eating the food. You had to lower your face to the surface of the bottle cap water and slurp it up to get a decent drink. Joey just watched you with an amused look on his face as you ate and drank. Soon, the chicken was gone and most of the water with it. You sighed and leaned back against the cap, happy that you finally got some food and that Joey was paying attention to you. You looked up and jumped a little seeing his massive face staring down at you. You looked into his eyes and said, "W-what?"

Joey whispered, "Well, who are you? Why the heck are you so small? Where did you come from?"

You stood up and said, "First, can you tell me how I got here on the desk? The last thing I remember is getting hit on the head by a giant chicken bone."

Joey laughed a little and said, "Yeah, sorry about that. After I picked it up I noticed that you were stuck in the meat. You're lucky little guy! I almost ate you alive! I thought you were a dirt speck or something on my food."

You gulped and laughed weakly. "Y-yeah...Thanks for making this bed up for me."

Joey gave a thumbs up and said, "No problem! I couldn't just leave you on the cold wood."

You smiled as Joey scooted closer. "Now it's your turn. Who are you and where did you come from? Why are you so small?"

You shrugged and said, "You're not going to believe this, but here goes: My name is Daniel, I have no idea how I got so small, and I come from a different universe."

Joey blinked a few times and then started laughing, loudly. It ran through your body and made your ears hurt. He eventually stopped and said, "Oh man! Sorry little guy but that's just nuts!"

"Oh really? And your life has been perfectly normal right?" you countered.

Joey thought about it for a second then said, "Yeah...I guess you're right. Anyway, I'm not sure I can do anything to help you."

You nodded sadly. "I'm just glad you finally found me. I was worried I might get crushed!"

Joey smiled and said, "Don't worry. I'll take care of you for as long as it takes! Consider yourself lucky you ended up with me little guy!"

You smiled as Joey flashed another thumbs up. He was a little goofy and a little dumb but he was a good guy. You felt like you were in capable hands.
15533222222221211121.title: Finally Found

choices: During your bath, someone visits Joey.
155332222222212111212.content:
As Joey put his hand down, he noticed your clothes are covered in grease from the chicken you were stuck to. Your face was also covered in sauce from the chicken you had just eaten.

“Looks like someone needs a bath.” Joey says. You notice his eyes are staring right at you and you look down at yourself. He’s talking about you, and boy is he right. You stink like chicken…

“I guess I do…but how am I supposed to do that at this size?” you ask.

“Don’t worry, little guy. Joey has a plan!” the blond teen replies proudly as he lowers is hand into the box and pluck you up. He placed you in the palm of his other hand and heads over to the of the two doors in his room. This door connects to a bathroom and a pretty small one at that. After switching on the lights, Joey places you on the sink and turns the water on. You now understand that you’re going to be bathing in the sink.

“Um…is it really okay for me to take a bath in your sink?” you ask as Joey turns the water off soon after switching it on. Since you were so small, the water level only needed to be a few inches or so.

“Sure, little guy. My sink is your sink!“ Joey replied as he turned away from the sink and headed over to his bathtub. He reached into it and pulled out a bar of soap and some shampoo. You watched him place the two objects next to you before placing his hands on his hips and locking eyes with you. The two of you just stared at each other until Joey finally spoke up, “Well, are you gonna undress?”

Your face turns beat red. “W-What? Undress? You mean…here?”

Joey blinks and suppresses a snicker. “Don’t be shy, little guy. We’re both guys here, right? I’ve got all the same parts as you…although a tad bit bigger.”

“But…”

“Look. I’m not leaving until you’re all set. I don’t want you accidentally falling off the sink and breaking your neck!”

You stare up at the giant teen for a few more moments before you lower your head in defeat. It doesn’t seem like he’s going to be leaving and you don’t want to stand here all day smelling like barbeque. With a heavy sigh and a smile from Joey, you begin stripping down. You try to move as fast as you can, but your sticky clothes are difficult to remove. The entire time Joey watches you with hawk eyes and you feel incredibly embarrassed. You’ve undressed around other guys before during gym class, but this was different. You were so puny and he was so massive. You knew the duelist’s intentions were good, but it was like he was dominating you with his stare…

When you finally stripped down to your birthday suit you walked over to the middle of the sink and looked down at the small puddle at the bottom. Before you even thought about sliding down there, you felt two tree-like fingers grip you around your naked waist and lower you into the sink.

“What are you doing?!” you shout as Joey releases you. The teen looks a little surprised by your sudden burst.

“Sorry, little guy. I just wanted to help.” he replies.

“Well you could of asked first.” you mutter under your breath, blushing a bit before sitting down in the sink. You wait for Joey to leave the bathroom but for some reason he’s still there, staring down at you. “What’s the matter?”

“Wha-? Oh, sorry!” Joey exclaims as he picks up the shampoo bottle and squirts some of it onto his finger. He lowers the finger into the sink and allows you to take a bit of the shampoo to put into your hair. You thank him as you start scrubbing your hair. While you do this, Joey breaks off a small piece of the soap bar and drops it into he water. It floats next to you until you’re ready to use it.

“Well, I’ll leave you to your bath, little guy.” Joey says as he picks up your discarded clothes. “I’ll try to wash these while you bathe.”

With that, Joey exit’s the bathroom, leaving you alone at last. You relax in the water and allow the shampoo to rinse out of your hair.
155332222222212111212.title: Bath in the Sink

1553322222222121112121.content:
As you took your bath, Joey moved around the apartment, looking for something you could use as bed. He didn't how long you would be staying with him so he wanted to be ready for any inevitability. He had some cotton balls which would make a good pillow for you, a scrap of cloth for a blanket, and a match box you could easily sleep in. That would be good for the nights. He didn't want to just leave you laying out anywhere. With the matchbox, he could at least be assured that you'd be somewhat safe. He was about to carry it all to his room and come back into the kitchen to wash the clothes when he heard a knocking on the door. He looked confusedly at it, wondering who it could be. He wasn't expecting any visitors of any kind today. He set the cotton, cloth, and matchbox down on the table before heading to the door. He opened it up and saw Tristan standing there with a big grin on his face.

"Hey there Joey! You don't have to look so surprised to see me!" Tristan said, patting Joey on the shoulder and walking in.

"What are you doing here Tristan?" Joey asked, closing the door.

Tristan opened the fridge and started poking around. "What, can't a friend drop in to say hello? Do I need a reason these days?"

"I guess not..."

Tristan opened a can of soda and guzzled it down, belching as he finished it. "Whew...you don't mind right Joey?"

"Nah, I got plenty more soda." Joey answered.

Tristan opened up another and started drinking. "Man, we don't do enough stuff together any more Joey. It always seems like there's something else to worry about in our lives. The only time we ever hang out any more these days seems to be when the world is in danger. Remember the old days, when we used to hang out at the arcade, and the pizza place and stuff like that? I miss those days."

Joey smiled and said, "Yeah, of course I do!"

"Then let's go! Neither of us has anything to do so let's have some fun!"

Joey's smile faded a little and he said, "I can't today...I'm taking care of something today."

Tristan groaned and said, "Really? That sucks man! Aw well I guess it can't be helped. Can I use your bathroom though? I gotta go pretty bad."

Joey shrugged and said, "Yeah, go ahead."

It wasn't until Tristan had closed and locked the door that Joey remembered you were currently bathing in the sink! He was about to knock on the door but decided against it. There was a good chance Tristan wouldn't even notice you. Once he was out of the bathroom Joey could get him to leave and then he would be in the clear.

Tristan wasn't kidding. As soon as the door was locked he was standing in front of the toilet, unzipping his pants and pulling out his dick. He sighed as urine started flowing like a river. You, who had been relaxing, suddenly sat bolt up as you heard the sloshing water sounds. Looking up, from your angle, you could only just make out his hair. The sounds of Tristan peeing when on for awhile before the deafening flush went off and next thing you knew, he was standing right over top of you. You gaped up at him, his monolithic body stretching high above you. He was quite an impressive sight. His hand reached down and you realized, with a thrill of horror, that he was going to wash his hands! You could easily drown from the sudden flood! You waved your arms and shouted, trying to get his attention. Do you succeed?
1553322222222121112121.title: Unexpected Visit

choices: You're not in there anymore, but somewhere on Tristan instead!
15533222222221211121212.content:
You tried your best, but your luck with getting giants’ attention isn’t very good. Tristan turns the nozzle and a stream of cold water is released into the sink. The sudden gush of water sweeps you off your feet and you quickly find yourself floating as the water level rises by the second. You’re forced to start swimming to keep yourself above the surface. Suddenly, a shadow passes over you as Tristan places his hands under the faucet and wets his hand. His giant hands break the stream of water for a moment, allowing for a short respite.

“Tristan!” you shout as you wave one of your arms at him. “Stop the water! Please!”

Unfortunately, your chances of him hearing you are even less likely now that the sound of the water drowns out your voice. The high school student removes his hands from the faucet after a few seconds and reaches for the bottle of soap nearby. As the stream of water resumes, you continue to swim and try to remain above the waves created from the water. To Tristan, these waves are small, but to you they’re life threatening! Can’t Joey hear the water running?

Outside the bathroom, Joey is in the kitchen and is in the process of washing your clothes using another sink. This explains why he isn’t rushing into the bathroom to save you; the sound of this faucet covers the one in the bathroom. Just another slap from Lady Luck…

You watch as the massive teenager squirts some soap into his palm and starts rubbing his hands together. Once his hands are covered a thin layer of soap, he places them back under the faucet and washes them off. The waves stop again, but now something even worse is happening. The soap from Tristan’s hands seeps into the sink and creates bubbles on the water’s surface. You attempt to swim above the bubbles, but you’re too small and they start covering you. You’re forced to shut your else, knowing full well how much it hurts to have soap in your eyes. With your eyes closed, you don’t see Tristan lower his hands into the sink.

You feel something push against you and force you under the water. Tristan is unknowingly pushing a small human under the surface of the water as he rubs his hands together. Thankfully, you’re at least saved from being pulverized between his palms. Instead, you’re whipped around the water, unable to swim to the surface as long as Tristan is washing his hands. You can only keep your mouth and eyes shut until he finishes.

He finally removes his hands and you waste no time in breaking the surface. You gasp for air and open your eyes. The soap bubbles have spread out enough so they don’t get in your eyes, but that suddenly becomes the least of your worries. You’ve opened your eyes just in time to see Tristan lower his hands back into the water a second time! Unlike before, he’s lowering them with his palms facing upward. His hands lower into the water on either side of you and you watch them move until they’re directly under you. Oh no…he’s about to splash water in his face! If you don’t move quickly you’re going to…

“Ahhh!” Tristan sighs as he splashes some water onto his face. He’s a bit sloppy and some of it ends up on his shirt. He ignores it uses the nearby towel to dry off is hands and face. Once he’s all set, he lets the sink drain and leaves the bathroom. As he walks to the door, he passes Joey who has just turned off the kitchen faucet. “See you later, buddy. We’re defiantly going to spend time together during my next visit!” Tristan tells his best friend as he pats him on the shoulder. As his fellow classmate leaves his apartment, Joey notices his shoulder is a little damp from Tristan touching him. Why would that be?

“Oh crap…” Joey mutters as he rushes into the bathroom. He looks into the sink and sees…
15533222222221211121212.title: Water Ride

choices: You climb up or down to get Tristan's attention
Tristan does something to make you fall
155332222222212111212122.content:
Joey's eyes widened in panic. No...no no no no no no no! It couldn't be! He ran into the bathroom and looked all over the sink. It was possible that he wasn't looking hard enough. You were tiny after all, practically a bug. His eyes scanned methodically but he still couldn't see you. He checked underneath all the soap, the bubbles, the drain was still plugged so you couldn't have fallen down there either. He slammed his fist against the sink. Where could you be? An idea suddenly bloomed in his head. What if Tristan taken you? No...he wouldn't just kidnap someone like that...What if you had somehow gotten stuck on his body? On his hands or face or something? Joey bolted from the bathroom and ran out the door. He looked around but Tristan was long gone, large crowds walking up and down the sidewalks. Wherever he was, it wasn't here. He pulled out his cellphone and dialed Tristan's number. Unfortunately he went straight to his message box. That meant that his phone was either off or out of batteries. He waited for Tristan's voice to stop giving instructions on leaving a message, the tell tale beep letting him know it was time to start talking.

"Tristan! This is Joey! Call me as soon as you get this message! It's important!" Joey hung up after saying that and closed the door to his apartment, locking it as he did so. He wasn't about to just sit around and wait for Tristan to call him back. He ran, heading towards Tristan's apartment. There was a good chance he was heading back there, but an equally good chance he was spending the day out on the town. First things first though. He would check Tristan's apartment.

Meanwhile, Tristan was indeed walking around town. He was heading to a video game store to see if they had anything new, hands in pockets, trying to figure out why Joey, who was apparently all alone in his apartment, didn't want to spend time with him. He shrugged and just kept walking. Whatever he was doing it must have been important. He pushed open the door and walked into the game store.

While this was going on, you were clinging desperately to a shirt fiber, soaking wet and shaking like a frightened puppy. Tristan's every movement caused his body to shake, like a moving mountain, rocking you left, right, up and down. Your arms were already getting tired, clinging to the shirt, Tristan's warm, hard chest behind you. You had looked around as Tristan left the apartment, the people in this world blurry and gargantuan, moving mountains just out of view. It was terrifying to imagine getting lost in this place. You needed to get Tristan's attention and fast. You just hoped you had better luck getting Tristan's attention than Joey's. You looked up and then down. You could try and climb up to reach Tristan's bare skin and try to irritate it enough to get his attention, but there was no guarantee he wouldn't just swat you or brush you off, or smash you under his fingers as he scratched. Likewise, you could climb down and try to get to his hands or a pocket. It would be safer sitting in a pocket than just clinging to his shirt. Neither of these ideas were very appealing but there was little else you could do. You took a deep breath and started moving.
155332222222212111212122.title: Back to Square One

choices: Pull out the chain and inspect it. He had felt something tapping against him.
1553322222222121112121222.content:
You decide to climb up his shirt instead of down. His neck was closer than his hands and you didn’t like the idea of clinging to his shirt for too long. There was still the risk he would brush you off or even crush you, but climbing down had its own risks. If worse came to worse, you would just have to deal with it when it happened. You were lucky with Joey, you might be just as lucky with his fellow jock classmate.

As you climbed up to the collar of his shirt, Tristan was looking around the video game store unaware of the little bug on his chest. He had searched all over the store, but nothing caught his eye. The games he was looking forward too weren’t coming out for awhile longer. Just as he was about to turn for the exit, he saw something at the corner of his eye. It was a large TV hooked up to a game system in which shoppers could play. The console was currently running a demo version of a flight simulator Tristan had been looking forward to for months. Like a little kid in a candy store, Tristan jogs over to the TV before anyone else can take the controller.

Meanwhile, you’ve made good progress in climbing Mount Tristan. You were close to the top when a series of loud sounds and flashing lights grab your attention. Curious, you turn around and see that Tristan is playing a video game on a giant TV. To him the TV was already bigger than the one he had at home, but to you it was larger than a movie screen. The sounds from the game, which could be heard across the store, were ear piercing to you. You tried to ignore it and turn back to continue climbing up the folds of the shirt. This was your chance to make some good progress while the giant wasn’t in motion.

“Man, this game is awesome!” Tristan exclaims as he uses his fighter jet to shoot down three enemies with one shot. “Yeah! Eat missile, chumps!’

“Figures he would like war games.” you mutter to yourself as you climb. You knew from watching the anime that he had a military deck. It was only right he would also enjoy military-style games. While you were in the middle of these thoughts, you realized you had reached the end of Tristan’s shirt. Your hand brushed against a few small hairs and you breathed a sigh of relief. The hard part was done with, now you just had to punch and scratch his skin so he notices you. Hopefully he won’t mistake the feeling of your tiny hands as a simple itch…

As you hoist yourself up the shirt and prepare to scratch his neck, a loud booming sound came from behind you. Tristan had just blown up the enemy’s base and the result was the sound of a very realistic explosion. You were taken by surprise and thought that something had actually exploded in the store. You lost your grip and fell…forward…right into the space between Tristan’s chest and his shirt.

You screamed as you tumbled into the shirt and desperately reached your arms out to grab something. His shirt, his chest hairs, anything! Luckily you do grab a hold of something, but it’s not what you were expecting. Apparently, Tristan had decided to wear a necklace today and that was what had saved you from a plummet into the teen’s shirt. It was a simple silver chain and your hand had went through one of the links.

“That was really close…” you tell yourself as you look down into the abyss of his top. It’s kind of dark, so you can’t make out every detail of his expansive body. You do know that you’re probably between his pectorals. “This isn’t so bad. Kind of humid, but at least his skin is still in reach.”

The chain suddenly swayed as Tristan finished the demo he was playing and turned away from the TV. The sudden movement sent your nude form swinging right into his beefy chest. It was like hitting a brick wall…

“Ouch! Son of a…” you curse as you use your free hand to rub the side of your head. You had better get his attention soon before you slammed into him enough times to knock you out. If that happened, who knows where you’d end up.

You hold onto the chain with both your hands and start kicking his skin. At first your weak blows don’t register with him, but after the tenth kick you witness light flood into the shirt. Tristan had reached his hand in to…
1553322222222121112121222.title: This is No Game

choices: Tristan drops you in his shirt pocket
15533222222221211121212221.content:
You looked up after your tenth kick and saw what might as well have been the hand of God descending on you. Tristan had finally noticed you! The massive fingers grabbed the chain and slowly eased it out of his shirt, holding it up to his eyes. He scanned it, your tiny arm waving wildly while the other clung tightly to the now moving chain. Tristan's eye seemed to land fully on you a few times but he never seemed to actually SEE you. Throwing caution to the winds, you maneuvered yourself so that your legs were wrapped around the chain. You waved both arms and shouted your lungs out, hoping against hope that Tristan would finally be able to see you.

Luckily for you, this is exactly what happened. The massive brown orb focused down on you and widened in shock. Tristan brought his other palm up and you gratefully dropped down onto it. The necklace dropped back under his shirt and Tristan just stared at you for awhile. Suddenly, his huge fingers closed over you, plunging you into a stifling darkness. The world shook around you, knocking you on to your ass as Tristan moved around. Where he was going, you had no idea. The shaking darkness lasted for a few minutes before light was flooded back into your world as Tristan opened his hand and looked down at you. You looked around and saw huge gray walls surrounding you, a tiled floor, and it appeared that Tristan was sitting down. It didn't take long for you to figure out you were now in a bathroom and Tristan was sitting on a toilet. He had his pants up so thankfully he just came in here to talk to you in private...you hoped.

Tristan bent over and looked you over, poking at you with his other finger. You tried to push it away but was totally helpless to stop him. He chuckled at that then said, "Who or what are you?"

You shouted back, "I'm a human! Just like you! I'm just...really small!"

Tristan laughed again and said, "Well, how did this happen? Did you lose a duel or something and this is your punishment?"

You shook your head and said, "No, nothing like that...I...well, it's going to sound crazy, but I'm from another world!"

Tristan snorted and said, "Yeah, you're right, that DOES sound crazy. Why should I believe you? How do I know you're not some weird spy sent to watch me?"

You rolled your eyes, a look that he didn't notice. What, did Tristan actually think he was important enough to be spied on? Maybe...but either way this wasn't a path you wanted the conversation to take. You waved your arms and shook your head and said, "Why would I have tried to get your attention if I was a spy?"

"That's true...but you could be lying and just saying that you got my attention on purpose to throw me off!"

His expression was darkening every second, his eyes filling with suspicion. This wasn't good...

"Listen! I promise that I'm not a spy! I'll prove it!"

Tristan narrowed his eyes and said, "How?"

"Easy! Just take care of me for a week! I'll be in full sight, you can watch me at all times, and if I do something suspicious you can catch me at it!" This was a dangerous proposition. Tristan might consider you going for a walk to be suspicious. This was almost like giving him a blank check to do whatever he pleased with you. You didn't want to become the plaything of a god like teenager. Not to mention any kind of rough play could kill you at your minuscule size. Tristan appeared to be thinking about it.

"Well...alright. It's not like you could anything to hurt me anyway. My little toe is stronger than you!" Tristan grinned as he said that. This only served to make you feel even more uneasy. Maybe getting his attention wasn't such a good idea...

"Okay! Well, I was about to head home anyway so now I can take you with me!" Tristan said, the grin on his face not abating. "The only question is...where should I put you?"

Tristan looked over his clothes and his body, trying to think of a good place to put you. He finally comes to decide on two different places...now, which was better...
15533222222221211121212221.title: Foreboding Meeting

choices: There's a knock at the door. Is it Joey?!
Tristan comes back with some clothes you can wear.
155332222222212111212122211.content:
Without saying a word, Tristan hovers you over his breast pocket and drops you in. Smiling down at you, he says, “Sit tight, little man. We’ll be home in no time!”

You nod, which for some reason makes Tristan blush and turn his eyes from you. You felt him start to walk as he made his way out of the store and through the city. As he walked, you occasionally looked up and saw glimpses of other people and buildings pass by. You didn’t dare poke your head out of the pocket, since any sort of action might support the idea you were a spy or something. Sometimes, you would catch Tristan looking down at you in the pocket. His quick glances only lasted a second or two, but it seemed like he was really interested in you. Then again, how often do you find a tiny teenager attached to your necklace?

You finally saw the scenery change when Tristan walked into a building of some sort. It must have been his apartment building, and he was now heading up the stairs to his designated room. Once the teen was in front of his door, he unlocked it with his key, headed on through, and closed the door behind him. You heard him lock the door and kick off his shoes before making his way into his bedroom. Soon after he entered his room, his giant hand plucked you out of his pocket and brought you up to his face.

“Here we are! Home sweet home.” Tristan looks at his messy desk and, using one arm, sweeps all the junk onto the floor. He then drops you onto the desk and takes a seat, his eyes immediately gluing to you.

“Okay, first things first. We’re going to go over some ground rules.”

“Rules?”

“Yes, rules. You’re going to be living with me for a week, so I need to make sure you understand who’s in charge. Rule #1: You must do everything I say. Think of yourself as a new recruit and I’m your commanding officer.” Tristan grins as he says this. Somehow you imagined he would not make a good high ranking soldier. “Rule #2: I must always know where you are. Don’t go wandering around or moving when I tell you to stay put. I wouldn’t want to think you’re trying to escape or something. And finally, Rule #3: Staying with me isn’t free! You have to pay your rent, but since you obviously can’t pay with money, you’ll have to pay some other way.”

“Um…how, exactly?”

“I…don’t know. I haven’t thought that far yet, but I’ll defiantly think of something! You better be ready for it.” Tristan points a finger at you and you nod, showing you understand. “Now, why don’t we start by you telling me why you were in my necklace.”

“Well…I was in Joey’s sink when you were washing your hands. I ended up on your shirt when you splashed water in your face.”

“I see…wait, what the heck were you doing in Joey’s sink?!”

“I was…taking a bath.”

“Well, that would explain the lack of clothes…” Tristan’s travel downward slightly and you instantly turn away from him.

“Um…can I get something to wear?”

“Haha, I don’t think any of my clothes would fit you, little man. Although…” Tristan scratched his chin. “I think I have some army toys from when I was a kid. You might be able to dress yourself in an army uniform or something.”

“That would be fine.” you tell him, simply wanting to cover up.

“Okay, I’ll see if I can find something in this mess.” Tristan laughs nervously as he looks around his pigsty of a room. “This might take awhile…don’t even think about moving while I look.”

The titan turns his back to you and starts looking around his room. You sit down and wait for him to find something. Hopefully you won’t have to spend the entire week nude. As you wait, your start thinking of Joey. He had really wanted to help you and you thought you were safe with him, but then this happened. You missed Joey’s smile and the way he handled you gently. Somehow you knew Tristan wasn’t going to be as gentle…
155332222222212111212122211.title: Tristan Lays Down the Law

1553322222222121112121222112.content:
"Alright! It took awhile but I managed to find something!" Tristan said, sitting back down at his desk. He dangled an outfit over your head. It was indeed an army uniform, beige camouflage pants and shirt. He dropped them next to you and you picked up the pants. They were a little big...Tristan noticed and said, "Hold on, I'll get some string you can use as a belt."

You pulled on the shirt and found that it fit more like a night shirt than a regular one...which meant you were even smaller than a child's army toys. It helped put things into perspective for you once again. You were tiny, fragile, and totally dependent on these massive teenagers. At least Joey had seemed like a nice, reliable guy. Tristan was obviously trying but he was still in a state of suspicion concerning you and he had laid down those rules pretty fast. You couldn't help but wonder what sort of things he had meant you could do when he said you had to pay rent somehow. What was wrong with him? Joey saw a helpless kid in need of help and he instantly started taking care of you. Tristan was immediately suspicious and had started slapping rules on you. At least he wasn't doing anything to hurt you...yet. You sighed and just hoped that Joey would notice you missing and at least start to put two and two together.

It didn't take Tristan long to return with a length of string you could use. He dropped it next to you and you pulled on the pants and tied the string around your waist, knotting it tightly in place. This kept the pants up, but the cuffs were still under your feet. You bent over and rolled them up, until they were just above your ankles. You had done the same with your shirt. You looked yourself over to see how everything fit...you looked completely ridiculous. You looked up at Tristan with a pained look on his face and he shrugged and said, "Sorry little man that's all I had. It's better than being naked right?"

You nodded and said, "So now what are we going to do?"

Tristan seemed to think about it. He could ask you to do anything he wanted. That was Rule No. 1. You were a little leery of that rule. It was bad enough that he was planning on extolling some kind of rent from you, but what else would he want you to do? You had seen that gleam in his eyes earlier when he mentioned his army toys. You were pretty much nothing more than a toy to him now. You just hoped he treated you like a human and not a toy. Suddenly, he rested his head on his arms and stared at you, his eye only a few feet (to you) away. You stumbled back, your heart racing in shock from the sudden movement.

"So, what's it like being so tiny?" he asked. He had a look of genuine interest on his face. You thought about it and said, "It's really kind of scary. I mean, everything is like a million times bigger than it normally is. I'm totally at the mercy of anyone who finds me, a stray breeze could not just knock me over, but actually carry me away, insects and rodents are like giant monsters now..." you shuddered after saying this. You never thought too hard about that before. You just hoped there wouldn't be any such creatures in Tristan's apartment. He had a pretty big smile on his face.

"Yeah...I'm kind of like a god to you aren't I?" A god? You didn't like that kind of thought process...not one little bit! You shrugged and said, "Um...I guess you could look at it that way..."

Tristan laughed and straightened up, his massive body a wall of flesh and clothes above you. "This is actually pretty awesome! I have my own personal little guy to do anything I want with! And you have to do whatever I say, no matter what!"

Crap. This was exactly what you were hoping WOULDN'T happen. It seemed like everything was happening today the exact opposite the way you wanted it too. Tristan smirked down at you and pushed you over with his finger. He barely had to touch you. You got knocked back a few feet and landed hard on your butt. "Ouch! What did you do that for?" you asked angrily.

"Because I could." Tristan said, his smirk looking more and more evil. "What are you going to do about it bug boy? Remember, you're mine until you've proven you're not a spy, so I wouldn't get an attitude if I was you!"

You winced and lowered your head. He was right. There was nothing you could do against a man so mind bogglingly bigger than you. He could smash you under a fingertip after all.

Tristan noticed your sudden quiet and laughed. "Good. Looks like I'm getting through to you."

He leaned back and stared at his ceiling, thinking up something he could do with you. He had a lazy smile on his face, totally at ease. He wanted to come up with something good. After a few minutes he straightened up again and said, "Alright! I got it! You're going to play a game of endurance!"

"W-what kind of game?"

"I'll give you a choice! Game 1! Swim for Your Life! I drop you in a glass of water and see how long you can swim before you get sucked into my mouth!"

You looked up in horror at him. He couldn't be serious! A game like that could easily kill you! You were about to argue when you remembered your position. You held your tongue and hoped that Game 2 would be better.

"Game 2! Dodge or Die! I set you on the floor and you have to dodge my huge feet! Let's see how long you last before my foot comes down on top of you!"

That was even worse! These were both deadly games! It was like choosing between dying by firing squad or dying by electric chair! Either way you were screwed! Tristan crossed his arms and said, "Don't worry though. I won't kill you either way and if you win I'll reward you in some way. You don't have a choice whether or not you play, just which game you play. So, which is it going to be?"

You weight your options for a few minutes and look up at Tristan, your decision made. You choose...
1553322222222121112121222112.title: Tristan comes back with some clothes you can wear.

choices: You manage to beat Tristan at his game.
You get swept into his mouth.
15533222222221211121212221121.content:
“Swim…for Your Life.” you answer, not really sure if it was the right choice or not.

“Hehe, this is gonna be fun.” Tristan replies with a smirk before snatching you up between his thumb and index finger and raising your small body up to his eyes. “We can play the other game some other time.”

As Tristan’s hand falls to his side and he makes his way into the kitchen, you mutter to yourself, “Yeah…if I survive this one.”

Once inside the kitchen, Tristan removes a glass from the cupboard and fills it to the rim with water. He then carries the glass over to the kitchen table, sits down in a chair, and raises you over the water.

“Are you a good swimmer, bug boy?” he asks you.

“I…dunno. I’ve been to the beach a lot and always go swimming.”

“Oh? You like the beach? So do I! Maybe we’ll go sometime.” Tristan grins before releasing you and dropping you into the glass. As you plummet toward the water, you hold your breath and cover your face with your arms. Your ant sized body plops into the water, barely making a splash. You quickly swim to the surface and take a breath of air. You open your eyes and see Tristan looming over you with a big smirk on his face. “Remember, you have to swim against the current to avoid ending up in my mouth. If you manage to avoid getting sucked up before I drain the entire glass, you win! If you enter my mouth, you lose!”

The water ripples as Tristan grabs the glass with his giant fingers and brings it up to his mouth. Your entire vision is taken up by his handsome face and you start to wonder if it’s possible to beat someone this big at anything. Tristan gives you one last grin before saying, “Okay, soldier! Get ready to…Swim for Your Life!!”

With that said, the game begins. Tristan slowly tips the glass and you see his large, pink lips part. The water in the glass begins to drain into his mouth at a slow rate. He’s not consuming too much water at first, so you simply after to paddle backwards to keep ahead of the current. After a few seconds the glass is tipped a little higher and it starts to feel like you’re in a stream. Your weak paddling isn’t going to cut it and you turn around to really start swimming. The glass vibrates as you hear Tristan chuckle behind you. How can he be enjoying this so much? You’d like to see him chuckle if he was the one swimming away from a giant teen!

The force of the current grows stronger and stronger with each inch Tristan tips the glass. You look back and see his Adam’s Apple bob up and down as his stomach is filled with liquid. You imagine yourself falling down his esophagus and ending up in his belly. That wasn’t going to happen, however. Tristan had said he had no intention of killing you, so why worry? Then again…accidents do happen. Tristan might not be able to control what goes down his throat and what doesn’t and accidentally swallow you. He might close his eyes at the wrong moment and not see you enter his mouth. You were so tiny that he probably would never notice.

“Calm down. Just calm down…” you tell yourself as you continue swimming, ignoring the waves of clear water that splash into your face. “Even if that did happen, he’d just puke me back out…right?” Yeah, he’d defiantly do that…as long as he didn’t think of you as too insignificant to bother with.

As you were thinking over these fears, the water left in the glass suddenly shifted violently. Tristan took the glass away from his lips and placed it back on the table. The waves continued moving back and forth for a few moments before finally coming to a rest. You looked up and saw Tristan throw is head back and sigh with satisfaction.

“Ahhh! Nothing like a nice glass of H2O on a hot day.” Tristan says as he wipes his mouth with his sleeve. He looks down at your confused face and smirks. “Sorry, little guy. Even big gods like me have to breath. Shall we resume?”

Without waiting for your answer, Tristan’s fingers wrap around the glass once more and brings it up to his lips. You got ready to swim, set on NOT getting sucked into the titan’s mouth if you could prevent it.
15533222222221211121212221121.title: Swim for Your Life

choices: Tristan lays down and orders you to explore his body
Tristan traps you somewhere on his body (feet, navel, armpits, etc.)
155332222222212111212122211212.content:
Tristan smacked his lips a few times before putting the rim of the glass against them, tipping it up and resuming his guzzling. You were already pretty worn out. To Tristan, this was just a simple glass of water he was drinking to quench his summer thirst. But for you, it was a life and death struggle to avoid getting swallowed like a pill. You put your whole body into it, your arms slicing through the water, your breaths coming in ragged gasps as the icy depths pulled you closer and closer to Tristan's mouth. You chanced a glance behind you and saw a terrifying sight. Water crashed and swirled, falling out of the glass like a waterfall, pooling in his mouth before getting gulped down with a sucking sound that came straight out of your nightmares. His hot breath frosted the glass with every exhalation, his eyes focused on your tiny struggling form, an evil glint showing that he was very clearly enjoying this.

You focused ahead and kept pushing yourself. You weren't going to lose! This sadistic game that seemed to come out of nowhere wouldn't keep you down. You'd show Tristan what you were made of! The bottom of the glass was nearly in view! Just a few more seconds and you'd be home free! The glass tilted again, making you almost swim up a waterfall as Tristan gulped down the last remnants of the water. Unfortunately, he had tilted the glass to such a degree, that with the last of the water, so, too, did you end up. With a sinking sensation in your stomach you watched the bottom of the glass tilt fully above you, your body falling down, down, down the glass tunnel, drips of water still emptying into Tristan's grinning maw.

With a splash you landed in the heated cavern that was Tristan's mouth, his teeth surrounding you like powerful, deadly structures, ready to crush and grind anything that strayed too close. You swam desperately toward them, trying to escape from this prison of hot flesh. With no warning, the teeth came crashing down with a sharp *click!* sending you into utter darkness. You still pushed and swam, fear and panic filling your mind as you heard the loud, swishing gulps of Tristan drinking the water in his mouth, the currents tugging at you and your baggy clothes, drawing you deeper and deeper into his mouth, almost directly over the pit that would send you to your doom.

Luck was on your side, however, as Tristan finished swallowing the last of the water, allowing you to land on his slippery tongue. You got to your feet and ran as fast as you could along it, trying to escape from falling down the throat. Your world was suddenly turned upside down as Tristan's tongue flicked, sending you rocketing up against the roof of his mouth before you were pinned down under the tongue. Light flooded your world again as Tristan opened his mouth, his huge fingers plucking you out from under his tongue. He put you on his palm and held you up to his face. He shook his head and said, "So close, but you didn't quite make it soldier."

"That's not fair! You cheated!" you accused, still scared that you had had such a close call. Tristan laughed and said, "That's no way to talk to a superior officer! You're going to have to be punished for that!"

Tristan dropped you roughly on the top of his desk and stood up. He slowly peeled off his jacket and shirt until he was standing over you, his bare, muscled torso filling your vision. He was truly a frightening and powerful sight to behold. He flexed his bicep and grinned.

"See this bug boy? This is what you're up against! I would suggest now mouthing off again! To make sure you don't, you're going to get up close and personal with this body!"

You gulped. What did this power hungry teen have in mind?
155332222222212111212122211212.title: Game Over...You Lose!

choices: Tristan heads to his very own workout room.
Tristan heads into his living room.
1553322222222121112121222112122.content:
As you stared up at the titanic Tristan, the brunet just smirked down at you and decided he was going to make you feel as weak and puny as possible. He started flexing some more, making sure you knew how much work he had put into each and every one of his muscles. As you watched him strike pose after pose you were constantly reminded that you were in an anime. Most of the characters in anime had perfect bodies. No acne, no blemishes, no scars. Just a flawless body that looked like it was cut from marble. It would seem that not even a character from a card battling anime was an exception.

“Like what you see?” Tristan asks as he puts his hands on his hips and smirks down at you. “Maybe if you’re good, I’ll let you worship me.”

“W-What?” you mutter, snapping out of your trance. “N-No, that’s alright. I think I…understand what I’m…um…up against. You can put your shirt back on…”

“Hmm? No way, bug boy!” Tristan shouts at you before he reaches down and picks your tiny little body up between his fingers. You’re once again brought before his giant, youthful face. “You can’t just look. You have to experience!” With you in his right hand, Tristan suddenly raises his left arm over his head and reveals his hairy, sweaty armpit. He turns to face it, burrows his nose into the hair, and takes a deep sniff. “Mmmmmmhh. You smell that, bug? That’s the smell of a real man!”

You unconsciously sniff the air and immediately regret it. The moment Tristan had removed his shirt he had released his body’s foul odor into the room. The air had quickly become stale and difficult for a small life form like you to take in. You covered your nose with your hands, but this did nothing to stop your nostrils from feeling like they were on fire.

“Haha! Judging by the look on your face, I take it you can smell it! Better get used to it, cause that’s all you’re going to be smelling for awhile!”

Before you could even ponder what he meant, Tristan’s hand suddenly jerked forward…right toward his pit. You barely had time to scream before his fingers made contact with the hairy flesh. Your back was pushed against the sweaty skin, your new clothes instantly sticking to it as if it was flypaper. When Tristan removed his fingers, his thick armpit hairs brushed over you and you became stuck deep within the “forest” of the teen’s armpit. One of the airs laid itself right over your mouth, so you kept yourself from speaking to avoid getting a mouthful of wet hair. You still needed to breath, however, and doing so was a hellish experience. It was even worse that being trapped in Joey’s sock!

“Enjoy your punishment, soldier. Let it be a lesson to you!” Tristan exclaimed before he lowered his beefy arm and your face was pressed up against a bulging muscle. With two walls of sweaty skin compressing you, you knew you weren’t going anywhere. You could only sit there and listen to Tristan’s footsteps as he walked. As he walked, his arm was rubbing against his torso and smothering you with sweat and hair. You were being completely overpowered by this giant with nothing but the smell of his male musk and bodily fluids. It was degrading and unfair…especially since Joey had allowed you to take a bath just an hour previously. Now you once again felt dirty and in desperate need of a bath…a bath Tristan would probably never give you unless it involved him having fun somehow.

As you wallowed in your misfortune, another thought crossed your mind. Where was Tristan going? There was still bits of light peeking in, so he hadn’t put his shirt back on. Surely he wasn’t going to head out into public without a shirt, so he must still be in his apartment. You knew very little about his home, so you had no idea what was in it that could amuse the teen.
1553322222222121112121222112122.title: Pitting you Against A God's Body

choices: You land in Tristan's pubes...he was naked!
15533222222221211121212221121222.content:
Suddenly, the world stopped moving. There was silence except for the sound of Tristan's body's inner workings, and what sounded like springs...was he on his bed? The silence was broken by loud voices, flashes of light visible in the spaces between Tristan's body and arm. After a few minutes Tristan started laughing. From what you could tell...it seemed like he was watching TV! You sighed in relief a little bit. This could have been so much worse. Unfortunately, as soon as you breathed out you had to breathe in the foul, salty stench of Tristan's armpit. With all your rotten luck it was a hot day. The space, with a heavy arm on top of your back and wiry hairs in your mouth was boiling hot, feeling like Hell's sauna. You couldn't even tell whether the sweat dripping off your face was Tristan's sweat or your own sweat. It all mangled together in a warm, wet brew that soaked your whole body and invaded every single one of your senses. All of this was punctuated by Tristan's laughing. After what felt like hours of this torment, you finally lost consciousness.

A few hours later you slowly revived, looking blearily around your surroundings. You lifted your head slightly with a sickening squelch. Something felt off...was there...a breeze blowing? You twisted your body around and saw a welcoming sight. Tristan had lifted his arm! You were still suctioned onto his warm, wet flesh but you could clearly see the couch below you! Tristan had draped his arm over the back of his couch, revealing your frail body to the fresh air of his apartment! Well...the relatively fresh air of his apartment!

As you were mentally celebrating this turn of events a huge, rumbling snore filled the air. No way...Tristan had fallen asleep! This was like a dream come true! Now was your chance to escape from this torment! You needed to get back to Joey, and fast! You...all the excitement drained out of you as you remembered your situation. You pretty much an ant, a piece of lint to the god like beings of this world. Even if you scaled down Tristan's body and managed to reach the floor, what then? It could take days just to get to the door of his apartment! The idea of making your way to Joey was completely ludicrous. Oh, if only you weren't quite so small! Even though... You were getting rejected every time... And no matter what you tried, you always ended up failing... At least the few friends you had were always there to cheer you up. Sure, they were no one special, but at the same time, they were always there for you. Your guys always treated you better than the ladies did... And here you thought beating Jaden in a battle would've gotten you that prestige... And here you are now, in the hands of the boy.

"H-Hey! Are you okay?!" Jaden asked, wiping a tear he saw falling from your eye. There was no way he was going to release you, but at the same time, things wouldn't be much better for him if his new little toy suddenly decided to disappear... Forever. "Hey... C'mon, cheer up, okay? I-I'll make you do something easier! It won't be hard on you at all, okay!?" He asked.

You wiped your eyes, and sniffled a little. Everything might be okay... Being Jaden's slave shouldn't be too bad...

"Okay, you ready?" He asked with a bright smile. "Okay! Here goes!"
155332222222221112.title: The Forbidden Rub

15533222222222122.content: Did you really want Jesse? Or did you want someone else instead?
15533222222222122.title: Or someone else?
