1553322222222222.content: How about Fairy Tail? In a world where magic rules, size changing isn't completely outrageous.
1553322222222222.title: Fairy Tail

15533222222222221.content: Now to pick our first giant. Let's start with the main protagonist, Natsu Dragneel.
15533222222222221.title: Natsu

choices: Natsu asks why you're so small.
Natsu thinks this is part of your battle strategy.
155332222222222211.content:
Your name is Walter and you’re an 18-year-old traveling mage. You had never been interested in joining a guild and would rather do things your own way. When it came to magic, you didn’t have a specialty, but learned a variety of techniques while on the road. While not an expert at any of them, you held a large arsenal you could use to surprise any opponent.

On this particular day you were visiting the town of Magnolia and decided to stop by a diner for lunch. The waitress soon brought you your order of grilled steak and a glass of lemonade. As you picked up your fork and knife and cut into the juicy slab of meat, you saw the same waitress carry a large tray of good to the booth behind you. As you popped the first bite of your meal into your mouth, you wondered who could eat such a large portion of food. As you chewed and swallowed your steak, you suddenly heard the most obnoxious and disgusting sounds behind you. Whoever had ordered that foot was eating it like a complete pig. The sounds of chewing, slurping, gulping, tearing, and sucking were quickly making you lose your appetite. Your patience finally reached its limit when the loudest burp you had ever heard was released behind you.

“Hey, do you have any manners?!” you shout at the customer while spinning around. The pink haired individual turned his head with a “huh” and glared at you.

“Are you talking to me?” he asks as he swallows an entire chicken leg, save the bone. His stare is telling you that this is one guy you do not want to mess with. It’s the look of someone who’ll punch your lights out for just bumping into him. And his eyes…you swear you saw sparks in them.

“Um…sorry…” you mutter before turning your head back to your own plate. The man behind you says nothing and goes back to eating. As you take a sip of your lemonade, you begin to wonder why that guy seemed so familiar. Looking around, you noticed none of the other customers were batting an eyelash at him. Were they used to his rude eating habits? As you were chewing on an other piece of steak, it suddenly dawned on you. That pink hair, that white scarf, that black waistcoat…and that stamp right below his right shoulder! That was Natsu Dragneel, the Salamander from Fairy Tail! You began to sweat as you realized you had just yelled at someone so powerful and infamous.

“Sir, are you enjoying your meal?”

“Huh?” You turn to see the waitress from before. “Oh, yes, it’s delicious. However, I must be going so I’m afraid I won’t be able to pay for it.” You place the payment for the meal next to the half eaten steak and begin to walk toward the exit.

“Wait a moment, sir. You forgot to pay for your friend’s meal.”

“What?” You turn around and give the waitress a puzzled look.

“The person who sat behind you.” the woman points to the empty seat where Natsu was sitting. The remains of his meal were scattered all over the table. “He said you were a friend of his and would pay his tab.”

“…WHAT?!”

***

“Aaaah, that really hit the spot.” Natsu said to himself as he patted his toned stomach.

“Hey you, wait up!”

Natsu turns around and sees you running toward him. You had finally caught up to the bastard in the middle of an alleyway behind some buildings. You slowed down as you got closer to the fire mage and glared at him angrily.

“What’s your problem?! Do you have any idea how much your meal cost? I just threw away almost a week worth of spending money!”

“Huh?” Natsu scratched his head as he tried to remember who you were. A light bulb then lit up in that spacious head of his. “Oh, it’s you! Thanks for the meal, buddy!”

“I am not your buddy! Why did you tell the waitress that?”

“Well, I just thought you’d like to pay for my meal since you seem like an expert on manners. So thanks again; I appreciate it!” Natsu smiled toothily. He was really starting to piss you off…who cares if he was the infamous Salamander?

“Look, “buddy”, I’m not letting you get away with ripping me off like this! You’re gonna pay!”

“You wanna fight?” Natsu smirked and clenches his fist. It suddenly bursts into white hot flames and you take a step back. You begin to sweat, but it’s not because of the heat.

“Don’t underestimate me! I know just the magic to cut you down to size!” you exclaim as you point your index finger at the Fairy Tail mage. Natsu changes into a fighting stance as he realizes you’re a mage too. You smirk as the tip of your finger begins to glow with a multicolored light. He won’t be able to dodge this magic. “Reduction!!!”

Light floods out of your finger and fills the area. Natsu shields his eyes with his arms as the light becomes to bright for him to look at. You too cannot stare directly into the light and close your eyes. You feel the light all around you and it seems to cut you off from reality. You keep your eyes shut for several seconds until the light fades and it’s safe to open your eyes.

“Okay, let’s see how small he got…” you say to yourself as you look forward. To your absolute shock, you see that everything is bigger. The small strands of grass that poke out of the stone road are as big as you are! The sky seems so much higher up and you feel a small breeze threaten to knock you down. “Wh-what’s going on? Why did I shrink too?!” You don’t understand at all. You had used Reduction to shrink things before…although never human beings. Damn it, what a setback! “I better reverse the magic or else…” You pause for a moment. “SHIT, I don’t know how to reverse it!!”

Your thoughts are interrupted when you hear a loud booming sound. You hear it again, this time closer. You think someone his heading toward you and you know their close when the booms are followed by small quakes. When the maker of the booms comes into view, you stare up in disbelief at the towering form of Natsu. Why…why didn’t he shrink?!

“Where did that guy go?” Natsu questions as he glances around. “Some kind of teleporting magic?”

You watch as Natsu’s two giant, sandaled feet land directly in front of you. You can’t get over how gigantic he his…you barely reach up to his toes! The towering teen glances around, expecting you to attack him any second now. Your mind begins to wander and you think about what he’ll do to you if he finds you like this. Your question is soon answered…

“There you are!”

You snap out of your trance and look back up to see Natsu staring directly at you. You begin to tremble in fear while the intimidating mage simply stares at you. What’s he going to do? Your position right now couldn’t be any worse…this might be the end of your traveling days...
155332222222222211.title: The Traveling Mage and the Dragon Slayer

choices: Natsu quickly checks in then heads home
Natsu gets into a fight with Gray while at the guild
1553322222222222111.content:
Natsu stares at you without a single expression on his face. Your trembling gets even worse. What was he going to do? Those huge feet could crush you without a second thought! After you were so nasty to him, what reason did he have to NOT crush you? It wouldn't even be considered murder! He could just scrape you off his foot like a bug! It wasn't looking good at all...

Suddenly, Natsu's face broke out into a huge grin. He started laughing and pointing at you, holding his stomach as he doubled over. "Oh man! That's hilarious!"

Your fear quickly turned to confusion. "H-hey! What's so funny?"

Just a few seconds ago you were worried about becoming a smear! Now...you were actually yelling at him?!? Natsu didn't seem to care. His laughter eventually subsided and he sighed, wiping away a tear. "You are! I mean, you go through all this trouble, getting up in my face, and then, just when we're about to start you shrink yourself into a bug! That's a brilliant battle strategy!" The sarcasm was dripping from his every word.

You flushed and muttered, "Shut up you giant idiot. I can't plan for everything..."

Natsu bent down and looked you over. "This is actually pretty cool! You're just like a little toy!"

He shoved his foot close to you, his toe bumping into your body, making you stumble back.

"Oh wow! My toes are bigger than you! Forget toy, you're a BUG!"

You kicked his toe in annoyance and said, "Stop it! I'm a respectable mage! I won't be treated like an insect!"

Natsu flashed you a mischievous grin and said, "Tough luck kid! You made a huge nuisance of yourself, yelling at me, and trying to start a fight with me! Maybe you'd like to meet my foot and learn your place!"

He stood up and lifted his foot up, his heel still firmly planted in the dusty street. He hovered his foot over you dangerously and all your anger evaporated. You just wanted to live! Let this idiot say whatever he wanted if it meant you could escape and undo this damn spell!

"W-wait! I'm sorry! Please don't kill me Salamander-sama!" Sama? HIM?!? You grit your teeth. If it helped you live for now...you could always come back and blast this idiot later.

Natsu seemed to like that since he moved his foot aside and smiled at you. "That's more like it! About time you apologized!"

Without another word he reached down and scooped you up in his hand, holding you tightly. "What the hell are you doing?!"

Natsu shook his head and said, "Like I said before, you have to know your place. I'm a great and powerful mage and you...are a bug. So, you'll make the perfect pet!"

P-pet?!? No! This wasn't what you wanted at all! You opened your mouth to protest when Natsu said cheerfully, "It's either that or getting stepped on! That's the only fate for a bug!"

Your mouth snapped shut. Better to be a living pet than a dead smear. This would give you ample time to try and figure out a way to reverse the spell. You looked up at Natsu and said, "O-okay...I guess I'll be your pet then."

"I know, I already decided." Natsu said simply, dropping you in his vest pocket. "Now stay put bug boy! I have to check in at the guild, then I'm heading home and we're going to have some fun together!"

Your blood ran cold. Fun? What would a crazy guy like the Salamander think is fun? You shuddered. Maybe you wouldn't survive this ordeal after all...
1553322222222222111.title: Put in Your Place

choices: Natsu makes you service him somehow.
Natsu has you explore his giant body from head to toe.
15533222222222221111.content:
After dropping you into his pocket, Natsu strolled silently out of the alleyway and onto the main street. No one had seen both you and him enter the alleyway, so no one questioned why only he left. The pink haired teenager made his way toward the Fairy Tail guild while you attempted to keep your balance inside the pocket. Despite your attempts, every movement Natsu made caused you to jumble around in the pocket. It didn’t help that the giant’s body heat (which was unusually high) was making the inside of the pocket heat up. It wasn’t long before you began to sweat.

“I’m back!” Natsu shouted as he entered through the doors of the guild. He was greeted by a crowd of his fellow mages.

“Hey, Natsu!” greeted Macao. “We didn’t think you’d be back for another day.”

“Really? That job was a piece of cake!” Natsu replied, slamming his fist into his palm. “I need something more challenging.” Natsu turns his head to the master of the guild, Makarov. The short, elderly man was sitting in the same place he always was. “Hey, Master, let me take on another S-class job!”

“For the 100th time, Natsu, no.” Makarov replied instantaneously. “You know the rules: only S-class mages can take on S-class quests.”

“Pfft, fine.” Natsu turned away and headed for the door.

“Leaving already, Natsu? Why not stay awhile and have a drink?” Wakaba asked, holding his mug up.

“Maybe later. I have some things to take care of back at home.” Natsu replied before waving and exiting the guild.

“How strange…Natsu usually always spends his time here. I wonder what he has to take care of?” Mirajane pondered.

***

Natsu entered his apartment building, which was close to the guild, and made his way up to his apartment number. Upon reaching it, he fumbled with the knob a bit until he realized it was locked.

“Where did I put that key…” Natsu mumbled as he searched his pockets, but found nothing but you and a few coins. “Ah well…” Natsu held his fist back and punched down the door, sending it flying into the apartment and splitting upon impact with a wall. You climbed up the pocket and peeked out to see what the noise was about. Your eyes widened when they fell upon the ruined door. That was overly extreme…

“Home sweet home!” Natsu exclaimed as he walked into his apartment. The place was a mess; trash everywhere, dirty dishes still in the sink, and several scorch parks decorated the walls. Natsu clearly did not use the money he got from jobs to renovate his home, so what did he use it for? Dumb question; food.

“Um…shouldn’t you do something about that door?”

“Haha, I think my home security is the last think you should be worrying about, kid.” Natsu replied as he grabbed you by the back of your shirt and dangled you before his face. “You should worry about yourself; being my pet isn’t going to be easy.”

Natsu walked into his bedroom which, like the rest of the apartment, wasn’t much to look at. I mean, his “bed” was nothing but a sleeping bag. The Salamander stood in the center of his room and placed you on the floor. He placed his hands on his hips and grinned down at you.

“Okay, bug boy, let’s have some fun. You understand that you’re my pet now, right? That makes me your great and powerful master. Understand?”

“Yeah, whatever…” you replied, folding your arms over chest.

“Really? I don’t think you do. Words are just words, after all. I think you need to be shown why you’re the pet and I’m the master.”

“H-how?” you ask, fearful of what his answer’s going to be.

“Well…”
15533222222222221111.title: Pet and Master

choices: Natsu Wants Some Foot Licking Going On Down There
Natsu Wants a Foot Rub...with your face!
155332222222222211111.content:
Natsu “The Salamander” AKA: your new master, was grinning down at you as he decided the most appropriate way to show you who was in charge here.

The rosy haired man tapped his sandalled foot on the floor as he ‘hmmed’

Which in turn caused a small earthquake for you with each tap of his mighty foot.

“I’ve got it!” Natsu said grinning even wider as he pounded his fist into his open palm. He smirked down at you, on your butt from the mini earthquake his foot had created. Natsu fell down on his butt, making for an even bigger earthquake than his foot.

This one made you fall back and bang your head into the floor, “Owwww…” You said rubbing the back of your head. “Pfft….weakling.” Natsu snickered as he slipped off his sandals.

Once you recovered from your bump, you opened your eyes and saw two immense bare fleshy soles waving back and forth in your view.

The toes were wiggling tauntingly. Natsu smirked and boomed, “A bug like you should get acquainted with my godly feet! Since one day you might find yourself reduced to a smear underneath them. Heh!”

This made you quiver in fear before the mighty feet of The Salamander who you had pissed off. Much to Natsu’s delight as he inched his feet close enough so that your face was pressed into his sole. Which expanded in all directions like a mountain of soft, wet flesh. It was then that you got your first whiff of the fire mage’s fittingly sweaty feet. And it was ungodly. Natsu’s toes wiggled above your head as your face was pressed deeper and deeper into the squishy flesh. Then Natsu made his first command as your new master…
155332222222222211111.title: Natsu's Feet

choices: Natsu pins you under his foot and smothers you.
Natsu grabs you and rubs you against his foot himself.
1553322222222222111112.content:
The large, muscular Dragon Slayer smirked down at you as rubbed his sole into your face. You had been a fool challenging him, and he was set on making you regret your actions.

“Okay, runt, time for you to carry out your first task as my tiny slave!” Natsu booms. “And that task is to give my hot, smelly feet a good rub!”

“What?!” you reply as you push yourself away from the giant mage’s foot. “No way! There’s no way I’m rubbing your disgusting feet! Who do you think you are?”

“I’m the big guy who can crush you like a bug!” Natsu exclaimed, pointing a thumb at his heaving chest. “You WILL do as I say, or you’ll find yourself smeared out under my foot sooner than expected.” Natsu moved his feet closer to you, bringing the rank smell of them closer as well. You coughed and stared at the two walls of flesh. They really could crush you like you were nothing. To this giant Fairy Tail mage, you WERE nothing!

“F-fine…” you surrendered and slowly approached one of the fleshy soles. You placed your palms onto the hard, yet strangely soft, surface and started rubbing. Not three seconds later, the giant Salamander retracts his foot and causes you to fall forward onto your face. “Ow! What the hell was that for?!”

“Stupid insect, I didn’t finish! I want you to give my feet a nice massage…with your FACE!”

“You want me to WHAT?!”

“I said I want you to rub my soles with your face, bug boy. Use the rest of your body too, but no hands!”

“That’s…your…FORGET IT! That’s gross and-!” you stopped talking when Natsu started glaring down at you menacingly. Your legs started to shake under the god’s gaze.

“You think you can call your master’s feet gross and get away with it? I should snap those little twigs you call arms! In fact…” Natsu grinned toothily and cracked his knuckles. “…I think I will! Then you’ll have no choice but to use your face. Come here…” Natsu leaned forward and reached for you. Your eyes widened as you imagined those tree-sized fingers snapping your arms with no effort at all.

“Okay, okay! I’ll do as you say; please don’t!” you cry as Natsu’s fingers are just inches from your minuscule form. The giant simply smirks and sits back again. His two bare soles lay before you as he awaits your service. You gulp and approach the foot once again. This time, with much reluctance, you push your body against the living wall and rub yourself into it. Natsu sighs as his sole gets rubbed down with your form, making him feel big and powerful.

“Mmmm…that’s good! Don’t forget to dig your nose into it and smell it!”

You grumble at this and turn your head so your nose is buried into the sweaty foot that is Natsu Dragneel’s. The musky smell of the sweaty mage assaults your nose and makes your eyes water intensely. Natsu doesn’t take pity in your suffering and just leans back with his eyes closed. The massage lasts a full ten minutes, with you going back and forth between the giant’s two feet. When the ten minutes pass, you stand before the towering Natsu a soaked mess. Your hair and clothes are stained with perspiration and your skin is tinted red from the immense heat that radiates off Natsu.

“Why’d you stop, slave? My feet could still use some more rubbing!” Natsu smiles and wiggles his toes in anticipation. You, however, do not share his enthusiasm.

“I can’t…it’s so hot…” you reply weakly as you wipe some of your own sweat off your face. “Let me just rest a bit…”

The giant Natsu doesn’t take your desire for a rest kindly and scowls down at you. He wants the rest of his foot rub now, whether or not you’re willing to give it to him!
1553322222222222111112.title: Face the Foot

15533222222222221111122.content:
You were so weary that you didn’t notice the angry fire mage scowling down at you. You just assumed he would understand that you were fatigued. Pleasing a giant wasn’t easy! Pleasing a giant Natsu was near impossible! Unfortunately, because you failed to please him, your next plight began. Before you even noticed, Natsu reached down and snatched you off the floor. You suddenly found yourself off the floor and enwrapped by the teen’s massive digits. Natsu brought you up to his face and your vision was filled with his scowl.

“Rest? You want to rest after just that? You really are a pathetic weakling!” Natsu shouted, blowing hot air in your face. The giant Fairy Tail mage suddenly began squeezing you. At first the pressure was just uncomfortable, but then it soon became painful and you started screaming in agony. This guy was crushing you to death and he wasn’t even breaking a sweat! Natsu saw that you were in pain and it amused him, turning his frown into a smirk. “Hehe, look at you. You’re so weak that I could probably do this to you at your former size!” Natsu snickered a bit and laughed at your puny being. His laugh soon ended, however, and he resumed scowling at you. “Alright, bug, time to continue my foot rub!”

“B-but…I can’t!” you blurted out as Natsu stopped trying to turn you into putty in his hand. “You trying to crush me hasn’t helped, either!”

“Heh, don’t worry about it, bug. If you’re too weak to fulfill your simple duties, then I’ll just help you!”

“How are you going to help me rub your-?” you started to say, but was interrupted when Natsu took you away from his boyish face and brought you down to his feet. Instead of dropping you onto the hard floor like you thought, he instead smacked you against his sole! “AH! What are you-mmmmmffft!!” Your complaints were muffled when Natsu smushed your face into his sole and started rubbing you into the sweaty flesh. You screamed as you were handled like a sponge, wiping up the drops of salty fluid as you were dragged across the sole.

“Mmmm…yeah. Your small body against my tired sole feels great!” Natsu comments as he starts rubbing you into the hard some harder and faster. He didn’t seem to care about your wellbeing; treating you like you were an inanimate object meant to be used by him. He didn’t just rub over his soles either, but also the top of his foot and his ankle. You were helpless in your struggles; the toned giant far too strong for you. Natsu made sure to slip you between his toes as well, rubbing you into the pockets of toe jam and cleaning them up against your will.

Once the powerful Dragon Slayer had finished using you on his right foot, he did everything over again to the left. AT this point you had ceased your struggles and screams, too weak to continue them and knowing they weren’t doing anything but making this experience worse. After Natsu finished giving both his feet the good rubdown they deserved, he opens his hand and lets you lay upon it.

“That was great, bug boy! You make a good sweat rag! Maybe next time I can use you to scrub the rest of my body!” Natsu grins toothily and flexes his arm. The last thing you see before you blank out from the in toxic smell of musk and sweat is Natsu’s bulging bicep. The last thing you hear is his laughing…
15533222222222221111122.title: The Helpful Mage

155332222222222211111221.content:
Natsu noticed you had fallen unconscious in the palm of his hand, "Heheheh, how weak." He snickered as he tossed you up and down in his palm, catching you and tossing you up again repeatedly. The Salamander wasn't worried about home security, but he didn't want people snooping in on him and his business. So without any effort at all, he lifted the door and fitted it back into the door frame.

The Fire Mage laid down on his sleeping bag with a sigh, it was kinda hot in this room. He reached over and fitted one foot back into it's sandal, but for the other one he smacked you into his foot with your face directly under his toes before putting on the footwear. "Heh." He smirked as he stretched out his legs and felt your tiny head droop between his index and third toe. He laughed out loud at this, knowing you'd wake up to a pocket of sweat.

Just to make sure you didn't escape, Natsu got under the covers of his sleeping bag and zipped it up. He grinned as his head was filled with all the ideas of how he was going to torment you the next day.

ZZzzzZZzzzzZZzzzZZZZZzzz

Morning came sooner than expected, with his eyes fluttering open to the bright sun streaming through the window and his arms coming out of his sleeping back to stretch, Natsu unzipped his sleeping bag and pulled out from inside it. He felt you squirming already, and it felt good! What a great way to wake up! And, as he'd predicted, your head was still clamped between his sweaty toes. He grinned as he sat indian style on top of the sleeping bag and observed you in his toes.

"Hello bug, have a good sleep?" Natsu yawned.

But you were unable to answer due to the pocket of sweat in the toe crotch, But that was ok, Natsu wasn't expecting one as he gave you a tight squeeze.
155332222222222211111221.title: Bedtime With Your Giant Fire Mage

choices: Natsu goes for a morning jog.
Natsu's stomach growls. He needs more food now!
1553322222222222111112211.content:
“Today feels like a great day!” Natsu exclaims as he stretches the rest of his body. The fire mage hops to his feet, slamming down on you and making you yelp in pain. Your cry is muffled by his cheesy, sweaty flesh and Natsu doesn’t even notice it. The giant strolls over to the window and looks out it, taking a deep breath of air. He looks up at the hot sun and smiles. “Better than great, in fact! I have a tiny little bug to play around with.” Natsu curls his toes around you again and makes his way into the kitchen, stepping on your shrunken body with each step. “What better way to start the morning with a nice meal!” Natsu snickers and pats his exposed stomach.

The teen begins opening his cabinets, searching for something to eat. Unfortunately, he finds nothing but dust, crumbs, and empty boxes. He takes out a box of cereal and shakes the contents out, but all he gets his a single stale piece. The Salamander opens another cabinet and spots a cockroach scurry by. Sighing, Natsu slams the cabinet shit and folds his arms over his chest.

“Looks like I need to do some shopping…but there has to be SOMETHING I can eat!” Natsu whines and glances around again. His eyes finally land on a loaf of bread next to the toaster. With a grin, Natsu takes two slices of bread and pops them into a toaster. When he tries to turn the toaster on, however, he finds that the bread won’t go down. Further inspection reveals that the plug is broken. “Grrrr!!” Natsu bangs the counter with his fist, causing the two pieces of toast to shoot into the air. While they’re airborne, Natsu opens his mouth and released a torrent of fire onto the pieces of bread. When they fall into his hand, they’re now a light golden brown. Natsu smirks and opens up the fridge.

“Ick, smells like something rotted!” Natsu fans the air in front of his face. “Doesn’t smell as bad as me, though!” Natsu chuckles and take out the butter. After lathering his toast up, the Dragon Slayer sits down at his table with a glass of milk and begins eating. As he chews his first chomp, his eyes look under the table to find you still squirming under his foot. “I bet you’re hungry too, bug. Well, your breakfast is right in front of you!” Natsu spreads his toes and wiggles them. “Lick up all the toe jam you can find, slave!”

You scream something in response to this, but it’s muffled. Natsu thinks it’s something like “You can’t be serious!” or “There’s no way I’m eating that!” Natsu doesn’t care what you really said, though. Knowing it was something disobedient-like, the giant responds by giving your head a quick clench with his toes.

“No back talk, little guy. Do as I say or else you’ll BECOME toe jam!” Natsu chuckles and grinds his toes together. The immense pressure his toes are inflicting upon you is enough to make you comply. Natsu feels your tongue start slurping against his flesh and smiles with content. He takes a sip of his milk and other bite of his butter and toast.

Between his foot and sandal, you’re being tortured with a breakfast of sweat and foot filth. The taste is so horrible that you have to stop for a minute to breathe (even though you’re breathing in his foul foot odor). Every time you do this, Natsu squeezes you lightly with his toes to make you continue. The sound of his munching high above you sounds like he’s devouring something huge. How can someone make so much noise from eating toast?!

After a few minutes, Natsu polishes off the last of his toast and licks the crumbs from his fingers. “That wasn’t very filling, but I can always grab something toe eat at the guild.” Natsu says as he pats his abs. “How’s your breakfast, pet?” Natsu looks down at his foot and notices you’re still licking like a good slave. “Hehe, must be enjoying it.”
1553322222222222111112211.title: Now For Some Breakfast!

choices: Natsu meets Gray at his apartment.
Natsu has some more fun with you at his apartment.
15533222222222221111122112.content:

What had you done to deserve this?

Eventually Yoshimori took his feet off you and tugged on the blue thread. You were pulled up to him and caught in his fist. The nenshi was dispelled and your teenage master held you in front of his boyish face for a few seconds; surveying your weak form.

“Don’t think I’m done, ayakashi. I’m just getting started! I’m going to make you wish I didn’t see you sleeping on my floor and accidentally stepped on you!”

You gulped loudly as you looked into Yoshimori’s cruel eyes. Now you had the sickening image of the young giant stepping on you; flattening you into a pancake. Needless to say it wouldn’t be very difficult for him…
155332222222222222111.title: Barrier Master Becomes Slave Master

choices: You managed to finish al the notes! Just... written at a smaller size.
Times up! You failed to complete your task!
1553322222222222221112.content:
Just as Yoshimori was about to set you on the ground for more play, he happened to glance at the time. "Crap! Is it time for school already!?" He shouted. Without a second thought, you were dropped into his pocket as he ran around the room, getting himself ready for the school day. Before you knew it, you were dropped into his front pocket on his shirt. "Now you stay there!" He said sternly. "If I catch you trying to escape, I'm going to squash you flat!"

You gulp as you look into the eyes of the acclaimed "average-looking" boy. He sure could pull off that dark, yakuza look...

Without a choice, you lay down into the pocket, sighing a little as you do. There's not really much you could do or say to get out of this.

"Hey! Tokine!" You hear Yoshimori shout. You remember Tokine. A real passive-agressive bitch, but at the same time, had a more level head than Yoshimori did. Maybe... If you could just pop out at the right time, she'd be able to save you! As a precaution, you look over your body, to make sure you're not wearing any brown. The last thing you wanted was for her to think you're a cockroach and want you dead!

As luck would have it, you wore green. Hopefully now you wouldn't be mistaken for a bug. "Tokine!" You hear Yoshimori shout again. "Hey! Wait! Why're you heading that... way..."

By the sound of his voice, it sound like Tokine left Yoshimori behind! It was typical of her to not give Yoshimori the time of day...

------------------------

Yoshimori sat at his desk, and reached in for his pillow. "Geez..." He brushed it off, and laid his head in it. "Ah! Right!" His large hand reached into his pocket and plucked you up. "Now then... What to do with you..." He said, smiling devilishly.

Before his friends could get to him, or before he could think of an idea, the teacher walked in. "Alright, class! I hope you're hands are ready, because you're going to be writing a lot of notes!" He said firmly. The entire class groaned.

Yoshimori then looked at you. "Hey... You could take notes for me..." He said.

"N-No way! Your mechanical pencil is way too huge!" You argue with the boy.

"Oh yeah..." Yoshimori took out the pencil, clicked it a few times, and broke off the tip. "Here you go. Get to work." He held up his hand and made a nenshi, tying it around you, giving you just enough room to move around, but not to run away.

"If you do well enough, I'll be convinced you're a good ayakashi, and I'll set you free." He said. "But if you DON'T... Well I'll just feed you to the other ayakashi later tonight!" He said with a dark grin.

Come the end of class...
1553322222222222221112.title: School Daze

15533222222222222211122.content:
"...And that completes today's lesson." The teacher said, finishing up their lecture. "Memorize these notes. They'll be on your quiz tomorrow." As the bell sounded, you were panicking. Yoshimori was about to wake up from his littlenap, and you were nowhere even CLOSE to being done!

In a panic, you scribbled some stuff down. "Yoshimori is the best!" "Praise Lord Yoshimori!" were amongst some of the comments left there.

"What are you doing?" A voice chimed in with a dull tone. Yoshimori had woken up not too long after the bell had rang. He looked down at you, half-asleep, but fully aware.

"I-I'm sorry!" You shout up at the boy, "I couldn't do it! The teacher was going way too fast, a-and I couldn't keep up, and--"

"Hey!" Yoshimori said noisily. "Stop! I told you what would happen!" The nenshi tightened around your arms. "You're coming with me tonight to be fed to the rest of your kind!" He told you cruelly. All you could do was whimper as your fate was set in stone. There was no avoiding what was sure to be the inevitable.

---------------------------

"Now... To find someone who'd eat a bug like you..." Yoshimori said later that night. He was all dolled up in his usual kekkaishi garb, looking around.

"But Yoshi, that's not--" Madarou began.

"Hang on, Madarou!" Yoshimori shouted at the dog spirit. "I gotta find an ayakashi that'll eat this smaller one!" He told his companion.

"But he's not... Hey! Wait up!" Madarou said, following after Yoshimori who was already marching away.

Yoshimori kept surveying the area. However, to his dismay, there just seemed to be no ayakashi wandering the school this night! Maybe Tokine was just trying to show off by taking care of all of them so there would be none for him. Not like Yoshimori really had a problem with that.

"Aha!" He said, looking at a new, strange ayakashi. It had three eyes, and claws that were dripping with... who knows what!?

"How about that one!?"Yoshimori asked. Before you could even reply, he tied another nenshi around you, and held you in his fist. "Well, been nice knowin' 'ya!" He said, tossing you out to the giant beast. You landed about halfway between you and Yoshimori, luckily making a soft landing in an overgrown patch of grass. Looks like Lady Luck had at least some sympathy for you... You could've splattered on the cold, hard ground!

The beast turned, and saw the glowing string. However, he didn't see you... He saw the much more filling kekkaishi that was on the other end of it!

But you didn't know this. All you could see was this huge creature looking in your general direction! You quivered as it began running right for you, it's footsteps creating monsterous stomps as it moved. It started going faster... and faster... Right for Yoshimori!

"Hey! What're you doing!? You're supposed to..." Yoshimori immediately retracted the nenshi. "Ketsu!" He shouted, creating a barrier. He just missed, and the beast jumped right over it. It dove forward, just managing to cut Yoshimori with one of it's stingers.

"Yoshi!" Madarou shouted.

"Hang on! I got it!" He said, "Ketsu! Metsu!" The beast was caputred and dematerialized in a matter of seconds. Yoshimori managed to work through the pain as the strange venom was already coursing through his veins. "T-Tenketsu!" He called. The remains were sucked up into Yoshimori's spear-like staff.

Your head slowly creaked over. You were free! But you couldn't believe your eyes as you saw...
15533222222222222211122.title: Midnight Meal Gone Wrong

choices: The night goes on without event.
155332222222222222111221.content:
Yoshimori was slowly growing up, his entire body starting to enlarge. His clothes were growing tight on his body, slowly becoming less able to stay upon the expanding boy's body!

"Y-Yoshi! That was an Okihito!" Madarou said to Yoshimori. Yoshimori was too doubled over in pain to say anything, but he at least offered a groan in response, as his body was starting to burst with new size. His clothes were already starting to slowly tear at the seams. "It's an ayakashi that infects its victims with a special venom to make them bigger, thus making more of a meal out of them!"

Yoshimori just made a noisy moan as he continued to grow. Out of pure compassion, you had been running back over to see if Yoshimori was okay. This was, of course, only to realize that Yoshimori was getting larger, becoming more of a force to be reckoned with.

You, however, were the last thing on Yoshimori's mind, as he was still growing larger and larger. He eventually topped off at ten feet, three inches. He wasn't a giant, but among everyone at school, he would surely become a force to be admired! Or feared, if so he desired.

Yoshimori's joints cracked as he stood at his new height. He rubbed his head as he looked around. "Aw geez... What just happened...?" He said, his body throbbing a little as he still felt sore.

"Yoshi..." Madarou said under his breath. You had to admit, you were pretty intimidated yourself by the titanic boy that stood before your micro-sized body.
155332222222222222111221.title: Once Upon a Midnight Dreary...

155332222222222222122.content: And that's all the gratuitous Japanese you'll be getting from me. How about Yoshimori's older brother Masamori?
155332222222222222122.title: Oniisan?

1553322222222222221222.content: Okay, what about Yoshimori's YOUNGER brother Toshimori?
1553322222222222221222.title: The Other Way

15533222222222222222.content: How about some Yu Yu Hakusho?
15533222222222222222.title: Yu Yu Hakusho?

155332222222222222221.content:
You're sitting on your couch watching an episode of Yu Yu Hakusho. The episode that happens to be playing was the one where Yusuke was fighting the demon Rando. As Rando recited his reduction spell into Yusuke's ear, something strange happened. The television screen started to grow brighter and brighter and you lost consciousness.

In time, you woke up. Feeling incredibly groggy, you shake your head and stand up only to find that you weren't in your living room anymore. In fact, it was kinda dark and hard to see. You could hear noises coming from outside and they sounded pretty loud and coming from everywhere. Suddenly, your entire world seemed to lift up in the air and you were blinded by the light caused by what seemed to be the very ceiling being ripped away! Some of the light is replaced with a face that you recognize. The face smiles and says, "Hey, look! A new toy!"

Who was this person?
155332222222222222221.title: A strange turn of events!

1553322222222222222211.content:
Your vision starts to clear as you continue staring up as you make out a large mass of bright red with some white sticking out of it, attached to a pale object that looks kinda like a face. Blinking a couple times, your vision clears up completely and you see the gargantuan face of none other than Jin the Wind Tamer! You thought he was incredibly hot in the show, but not like this! You shout up at him, "Where am I? What have you done to me!?" He chuckles and answers you in his incredibly adorable, fast-talking irish accent, "Well tha's easy! Y'see, I found a catalog layin' around the flat, probably been delivered by a messenger or some such. Interestin' li'l catalog, too! Had a whole buncha things in it fer demons tae enjoy! Well I eventually flip to one of the last pages and lo, before me very eyes, an advertisement fer sellin' shrunken humans! I grinned and chuckled a' the idea of ownin' my own teensy little human toy to do with wha' I wanted and I rung up the guy. Rando's the name, I think, then I sent 'im the payment and 'e sent ye over! Kinda funny, though. I didn't actually think the article was even legit and he'd send me some kinda enchanted doll er somethin'. Not the real thing! And now 'ere you are, ready for me to enjoy!"

Jin leaned back as he laughed, reavealing just how big he was compared to you. You were barely an inch tall to him and, considering the plush interior of the box and how small it must be, you must have been put inside of a box normally used to hold a small piece of jewelry. You look up at the gargantuan wind demon. You were still in massive shock over what happened, but you can't deny just how amazing your position is right now. You can do little more than stare at Jin's massive physique. He was certainly built, but he had a somewhat childish face and demeanor, despite clearly being a full-grown adult. Jin grinned down at you, "Aww... ye like what ye see, little one? It's tae be expected, I s'pose. Women and men alike go abs'lutely crazy over me an' I know how tae use that fer my advantage! If yer tha' interested, perhaps I'll leave the decision to what tae play up tae you! What'll it be?"
1553322222222222222211.title: Jin the Wind Tamer!

choices: One hell to the yes, please
1553322222222222222221.content:
Character time! Let's start with the sexy Sebastian Michaelis~
(by the way, just to shorten things, the next page will have Grell as an option, then Undertaker, then Ciel, then Cluade, then Alois, then Pluto, then Ronald Knox, then William T. Spears, then Snake, then Finny, then Bardo, then Tanaka??, then I'll make another list from there...whew...)
1553322222222222222221.title: Sebastian

15533222222222222222211.content:
Black Butler, one of your favorite animes of all time. You know the characters, the plots, the background, all that stuff, a true fan. But...lately...you've become a bit obsessed with it. o much so that it's gotten into another obsession of yours....macrophilia. Not that that's a problem, no, of course not. But now you've been having those little fantasies of what it would be like not only to meet the characters, but to meet them at a mere few inches, able to fit inot their hands and everything that stems from that little dream.

Of course, life sucks, and fantasy is fantasy. Sighing, you know you can only wish...

After deciding to take the long route home, cutting through an older part of town, you spot an old pawn shop. You'd seen it before, yeah, but never bothered going in. But it was one of those life-changing days(although it didn't seem like it), so you walk in anyways, browsing the aisles of dusty souvenirs and oddities and such. Suddenly, a pendant catches your eye....it couldn't be...but it was.

There was a small necklace with the emblem of the demon's contract seal. You knew its markings well, and quickly snatched it up, approaching the register with your fanpiece of merchandise in hand. After giving the little bell a couple rings, a man in a dark suit and bowtie comes up, hair slicked back and a wry grin. "Is that all?" He asks, pointing to your find. You nod, glad to have stumbled upon it. "Good, good. That's a special item right there. One of a kind...I think...anyways, that'll be...hmm...." He tilted his head, mulling it over, "Eh, what the heck, five bucks. No one else has wanted that for years, anyways."

You happily pay the guy and continue your walk home, putting on your new little trinket. Again, though, those thoughts keep coming back....

The sky above looks dark, rainy, really. No, just dark....like nighttime...like...sleeping...

You close your eyes for a moment...

Then joly upright. You don't sleepwalk. What was...You then realize you really must've just dozed off. But around you is not where you remember being. It's a tiled floor, nothing too special, but very, very spacious. You look up, seeing wherever you are is huge, practically a mansion! Grinning you stand and start walking around.

And a large shoe comes down right next to you. Startled, you dash over to the wall, looking up, but you can't even see the face of the large black figure that shadowed you. Large figure. A giant. You squeal inwardly, and feel the need to approach him, but he continues his walk. Without warning, you shout out at him, trying to get his attention.

The man turns, and lo and behold, it is the Sebastian freaking Michaelis. You nearly faint when you see his blood-red eyes. But...were they looking at you? And with what emotion? Hopefully he wouldn't consider you a speck out of place in the perfect mansion...but that was only if he saw you...
15533222222222222222211.title: Sebastian

155332222222222222222111.content:
You felt both fear and awe as the crimson eyes of the giant butler fell on your form. From Sebastian's perspective you must be a mere speck on the floor, only slightly bigger than a thimble.

Sebastian hummed as he tilted his head before striding towards you, despite his proper steps you felt the ground thumping like that of a controlled earthquake. You fell onto you back but didn't have time to groan as the polished dress shoes landed on both sides of you.

You gulped as from the large feet were the towering black pant legs leading to the demon butler, looming high as a skyscraper. Sebastian grew a sly grin as he looked at the tiny form between his feet, both closing off escape for the tiny creature.

"My what a strange sight, i don't recall news of a guest. Especially one of your size.", Sebastian coyly spoke as his suave voice boomed down.

You tried to speak but failed as you felt truly small before the demonic giant.

Sebastian grew a smirk as he....
155332222222222222222111.title: In A Demon's Sight

choices: Was intrigued, and took your offer
Was annoyed, no more delays in crushing you
Was amused, so he decides to make your crushing long...
1553322222222222222221112.content:
The crimson eyes narrowed as Sebastian took in your small form, a mere speck like that of a termite. His foot alone was like a house in how big it was, you probably could fit in the center of his heel.

Sebastian's smirk grew as he suddenly rose his long black leg, your sky was replaced with the large heeled sole of his dress shoe.

You widened your eyes as the sole rose into the sky Sebastian's intentions were clear as he clenched his fists and positioned the foot above you. "W-wait I'm not a bug please don-!"

"I am well aware of what you are.", the demon's deep voice cut you off. Sebastian looked amused as he held his foot above you, he could simply crush you into paste but he wanted to make your fear last.

Sebastian mockingly tilted his stomper back and forth. "You are a human, much like my master and the other inhabitants of this mansion. However, you are a mere insect here, your soul as well as your body is a puny presence in this world that I'll guess your not orginally from?"

You were in shock, feeling helpless as not only did the giant butler degrade you but he seem to know of you being transported here!

"Ple-!", just as you were about to beg for mercy, Sebastian held up a gloved finger and cut you off as he sternly gazed from above his black clean dress sole.

"You want to plea for your life? None of that, I'd rather you look at the shoe that will end you rather then squeal pathetic ramblings.", Sebastian said in a nonchalant scolding manner while keeping the threatening edge.

The butler suddenly grew a larger smirk as he rose his foot above knee level. "Now then, let us see if your body will be crushed as quickly as a insect. Don't move.", Sebastian ordered before slowly bringing his foot down.

You were frozen in fear, the demonic smirk was covered as the polished dress show filled your vision as it had the intent of crushing you. The ground shook as Sebastian's heel crashed down to the floor, the sole looming over.

"Farewell, I'm sure your blood will adorn my shoe nicely.", Sebastian said slyly as he began to step his foot down and bring the hard leather sole mere inches from flattening you!

Snapping out of the frozen state you ran towards the tip of the shoe. Darkness shrouded the area as Sebastian slowly brought down the dress shoe. Him wanting to draw out crushing you was an advantage as the shoe hadn't quickly stepped down.

You hopped towards the light just as the hard sole was touching your head. However this wasn't victory as your waist didn't escape and was pinned beneath the tip of Sebastian shoe.

Luckily Sebastian paused before flattening your still trapped legs. The butler sighed as he brought a hand to his forehead. "I told you to stau still! You could have been crushed all at once, but now i have to break you in two pieces."

Just as the weight on your legs increased and Sebastian was about to crush them you let out one last plea. "Please stop! I-i'll serve you!"

Sebastian looked amused as he momentarily lifted the pressure on you. The demon...
1553322222222222222221112.title: Still A Insect

155332222222222222222112.content:
"Ah, Finny. What is it?" His low voice comes as a surprise, seeming even deeper. And surely he didn't think you were Finny? You turn to see the blonde gardener run up, skidding to a halt just a foot(well, more like a few feet, to you) away. "Ah, Mr. Sebastian, s-sir..." he sounded worried, "I, uh...w-well, the crysanthemums out front...I just used only the teensiest bit of weedkiller, I swear!"

With a sigh, Sebastian replies calmly, "No worries, I'll take care of it after I finish up my own little matter. But next time," he steps closer, leaning into the gardener with a slightly unsettling smile, "Remember that we do not use such harmful chemicals on the flora. Weed them out by hand..." he pauses , then adds, "Without accidently uprooting a tree." Finny exhales and nods, dashing off. The butler turns to continue about his business as well, starting to walk off.

You couldn't just let the demon get away! With a mad dash, you run over to the tip of one of the shoes, jumping on top just as it's lifting in step. Quickly, you scurry over to the pant leg, hanging on just at the butler's ankle.

The hallway whizzes by, like riding in a car...or maybe with the up and down of the steps, it's more like a high-speed carousel. After a few moments of that, which seems to drag on to you, he turns and enters the kitchen, getting down a cup and saucer to place on a cart. A couple seconds later, the teapot whistles, and he efficiently takes it up and places it down as well, grabbing a couple of cakes that were on the counter, as well.

"Would you mind getting the dinner preparations right this time?" He says, and you notice Bardo enter the room, tossing a cigarette in the trash. "Aye-aye! Of course, Mister Sebastian!" He salutes, then goes to the pantry to pull out ingredients.

As Sebastian grabs the cart, you realize the base of it is low enough for you to hop on. With a quick jump, you're sitting at the bottom of it amongst a couple of pitchers of cremes and such, like one would see in some fancy restaraunt. He wheeled the cart out, and you could guess where he was heading.

After a quick ride, Sebastian paused and knocked on a door. "Young master?" He called, "Evening tea is ready." Ciel's voice replies with a brief, "Come in," permitting the butler entry.

Now was your chance, the cart in Ciel's room and Sebastian stopped before the master's desk. You hop off, landing back on the butler's shoe, and start to scale his pant leg. Although that's being a bit difficult. Maybe there was another way up...? Or maybe now would be a good time to try calling out. After all, that demon obviously had excellent hearing, right?
155332222222222222222112.title: A little too small...

choices: ...maybe you better wait here up here. Wouldn't want to upset a certain demon.
...then again, when would you get a chance like this again? Go explore his room!
1553322222222222222221122.content:
Jumping up and down, you cry out as loud as you can. "Hey! D-Down here! Sebastian! Gahhh..." You stop as it seems Ciel's talking to him right now, his voice much louder than yours. Sebastian smiles and bends down, reaching under the cart to grab one of the cremes.

Before you can even, a gloved hand snatches you up tightly, then thrusts you into an oversized pocket. After fidgeting around, you finally get sort of comfortable and peer your head out.

"...for tonight's guests. They happen to actually be from a rival company, hoping to negotiate something. I want everything to be in order," Ciel says, taking sips of his tea, a slice of some cake lying beside that, "Including the dinner preparations. Nothing is to be scorched..." Not a second later, there's a knock at the door, "M-Mister Sebasitan, sir?" It was Bard's voice, "You, uh, mind helpin' me out with something? I can't seem to get the turkey at the right, uh, temperature..." Ciel gave his butler a look, saying, "In other words, please keep Bard busy with something else while you make the meal."

Bowing respectively with a brief "yes, m'lord," Sebastian turns and exits, and, to your surprise, moves his hand and stuffs your head back into his pocket. This confirms he knows you're there, but also that he'll deal with you later. Sighing, you adjust yourself inside the silken material and wait for Sebastian to take you back out. It was kinda of nice, though, and at least the butler hadn't mistaken you for a pest. Although now you were suspicious....

He'd ever-so-casually just plucked you up, like he knew exactly what you were. Not only that, but he seemed to be treating you like something to do later on on a schedule, like he'd planned this! You tried to peer out once more, catching a glimps of a partially-charred Bard trying to explain his mishaps, something about too much cooking oil and matches. However, once more, the butler casually shoves your head back down. He could even tell when you were just a tad out of place!

Huffing, you decide to stay still, waiting instead. After a few moments, you hear Bardo leave, and youre quickly whisked up out of the pocket.

Face to face with the demon himself. His eyes scan you over briefly, and he lets out a sigh, "I really don't have much time for you. I've got too many things to do at the moment, as you see. So, if you will please just be patient and still, I shall get back to you in a moment." He pauses, waiting for a reply.

Without thinking, that fanatical side of you just squeals at the sight of him, but you quickly cover your mouth, "U-Uh, okay, I guess. But...y'know, it seems almost like you were expecting me to show up. Do you know what happened to me?"

"I do have some speculations, but again, now's not the time. I will attend to you after I've finished my work." He starts to lower you back into his pocket, but you protest some, wanting to stay out, as it is kinda cramped in there. "W-Wait! Maybe I can just stay out for a moment. I'll stay out of the way, don't worry." Immediately, he places you on the counter, replying hastily, "Fine, but keep clear."

Backing up over to the edge, you sit and watch as the butler flawlessly pulls out some spices and herbs and marinades, while at the same time tending to the half-burned turkey and repairing it with ease. It was these moments, watching his perfection, that you had come to grow a real favor to Sebastian over the other characters. You swore at some moments, in his haste, that the demon would purposely dramatically pause to let the kitchen light shine over his face, like on of the freeze frames in the anime, or a manga panel, then continue on with the preparations.

In minutes, the dinner was back in the oven. Clapping his hands together once in conclusion, the butler grinned, "Excellent. Seems I've finished that a whole minute early. So," he grabs you up, "Perhaps, for now, I should put you somewhere a bit more convenient for the night." Without saying where, he exits the kitchen, putting you in his jacket pocket this time.

Moments later, he pulls you right back out, and sets you on a table. After gazing around you in awe, you know where you are. "This is...your room, isn't it?" The butler nods, and you giggle a bit, "This is amazing. So--"

He places a large finger over you, as if shushing you, "As I've stated before, I still have other business to attend to. After that, though, I will return. Please stay put for the time being."

He briskly walks off, shutting the door and leaving you alone, a mere two inches tall, in his room. Walking to the edge of the desk, you look out. It looks exactly the way it's portrayed in the manga, pristine and perfect. You look down, seeing a chair that's seated right in front of the desk your on, and beyond that is the butler's bed, a closed window right above that. At the other end of the room is a wardrobe, and right by the desk is a fireplace. Overall, you find it's actually a lot nicer than your own room.

Something at the corner of the desk catches your eye, a little partially opened drawer with paper clips in it, and some string. You could probably climb down with that. But he did tell you to stay put...
1553322222222222222221122.title: Shout for help!!!

choices: Sebastian walks in to save the day. Yay!
No one can help you now~!
15533222222222222222211222.content:
After a few seconds of thought, you go with the more exciting choice and rush over to the opened drawer, pulling out a paper clip to use as some support, and a string for rope. Tying one end of the rope to the paper clip, which you attach to, of course, a large stack of papers, you scale down the leg of the desk until your feet hit carpet.

Gazing, up, you find that being this low to the ground really makes everything seem even bigger, and makes you feel so much smaller. Although where to go first...

A breath goes down your shoulder, making you freeze. Someone, someone very big was behind you. Turning, you come face to face...with one of Sebastian's cats. You know Ciel doesn't let the butler have them due to allergies, so Sebastian most likely kept this little secret in his room, away from the master. It's a cute thought, knowing the demon had a soft spot for cats, but now it seemed a pain, as that feline was eyeing you like you were some kind of toy or catnip or something.

Meowing low, the cat reaches out a paw and swats at you, barreling you over despite the fact that you had your hands up to slow the blow. You tumble until your head comes to a hard snack against the chair leg. Standing, dizzy, you look up to see the cat's paw bat you again, sending you flying under the bed.

After taking a moment to recover, you scoot as far under the bed as possible, seeing the feline's yellow gaze at the edge of the bed. It licked its whiskers and twitched and ear, tail flicking as its eyes scanned over you, as if calculating how to best torture from this point on. And slowly, like it was trying ot to startle you, its little mouse, it placed a paw forward.

You ran like hell to the far stand of the bed, jumping up and grabbing onto the rail. Mustering all your strength, you try to hoist yourself up like you were doing a pull-up. With an amused purr, the cat inched closer, practically grinning.

At last, you get a leg over the rail, pushing yourself up on it. A blast of air fluffs your hair, making you peer down to see the cat looking up at you, its nose twitching just a centimeter away. With a playful meow, the cat reaches up a paw and taps you, an action that is enough to make you loose your balance and slip.

The cat's whiskers tickle you as he inspects with curious sniffs, almost making you let go. It ceases, and you let out a breath, looking at the cat's large eyes.

A light pink tongue brushes you roughly, followed by a soft purr. Panicking, you pull yourself up and out of the way of the cat, scrambling up the metal frame of the bed. Growling, the cat swats up at you, nearly catching you. Quickly, you climb up, almost at the top.

The claw catches one of your legs, sinking in. Letting out a scream--with probably sounded like a rodent squealing to the cat--you let yourself be dragged down a bit, the pain too much. You don't even know how deep the wound could be, but you don't dare look, instead trying to focus on escape. The claw eases out, preparing to strike again and pull you down to the floor.

The paw hits empty air, though, as you've already booked it to the top of the bed, panting. Looking now at the wound, you feel like you were stabbed or something. There's blood, too much of it to really see the wound or how deep it is. A whimper escapes you, but you wipe back the tears as a soft thud lands at the other end of the bed.

Peering over the pillow, you see the cat glaring at you, tail flicking madly in the air as it growls. Looking around, the closest hiding spot you can find is in the pillow case, so you dive in.

The cat pads over, half-growling, half-purring, its head reaching down to sniff around the entrance to your little hiding spot. Its other paw steps on the pillow just behind you, making you scoot forward. With a satisfied murr, the cat uses this tactic to try and get you out for some more playtime.

choices: Eren takes you back to the barracks like he said
155332222222222222222221.content:
"Name?"

"Luciano Ricci."

"Age?"

"15 years old."

The doctor nodded to himself as he wrote this information down. You shivered slightly as you sat in the quiet man's office, stripped down to nothing but a simple pair of underwear. You're a skinny boy, too weak to have enlisted in the army like you originally wanted, with pale skin and fiery red hair. You had a steely glint in your eyes as he watched the doctor write, adding your name to the records for this strange new experiment. You had originally heard about it weeks ago. The army was looking for any young men who were willing to fight to defend humanity through undergoing trialed experimentation. No health check was required, no background check, no questions asked. You had immediately jumped at the chance, grasping at this final opportunity to actually be useful in the effort against the Titans. No matter how many times you had tried to enlist in the army, the result was always the same: you were just too weak. You didn't have the constitution required to use 3D maneuver gear. You were too sickly. You were too much of a risk. The shame boiled inside you as you remembered these assessments.

"At least now...now I'll be able to DO something!" You thought, clenching your right hand into a fist.

"Very well Luciano. I believe you know why you are here?" The doctor asked, sitting down on a stool opposite you.

"Yes doctor. The trialed experiments." You said immediately, nodding your head.

"Precisely. However, we have not divulged exactly WHAT these experiments are. Before I ask you to sign the waver, you must know that--"

"Doctor!" You interrupted desperately, leaning forward slightly, an almost hysterical expression on your face. "Please...my brothers...they've all DIED out there, fighting those monsters. You don't know what it's like...to be left behind...unable to fight...to be so USELESS! I don't care WHAT these experiments are for or what they'll do...just...do them already!"

The doctor's calm facade broke, but only for a moment. He pushed his glasses up higher on his nose and said, "Very well. Then please sign right here."

You quickly took the pen and scrawled out your full name, practically throwing the paper and pen back at the doctor in your excitement. The older man got to his feet and filed the paper away, picking up a needle and tapping the syringe lightly. He squeezed the plunger, a thin stream of clear liquid flying into the light. He walked back to your side, wrapping a piece of cord tightly around your upper arm before gently rubbing a cotton swab over the crook of your left arm. Once it was completely prepped, he poked the needle into your vein, depressing the plunger completely. The liquid felt like ice as it traveled into your body, coursing through your veins, making you shiver and feel lightheaded. The icy feeling didn't last however. Soon, a burning sensation replaced it, becoming more severe as time went on! You started to sweat, falling back onto the bed, your whole body shaking uncontrollably! Just when the pain was becoming too much to bare...you passed out.

***

"Oooogh..." You groaned, slowly sitting up, holding your head. "What....was that supposed to do?"

Your vision was a little bleary as you looked around, eyes unable to focus. You seemed to be on some kind of...broad, white plain, stretching out on all sides of you, as big as a field. "How did I get here?" You mumbled to yourself, slowly getting to your feet. Your vision was returning bit by bit, the strange, featureless plain starting to look more familiar...You looked up and around, taking in what seemed like a familiar location...the doctor's office...just...so much bigger! Everything inside it appeared to have expanded several times larger than was normal, the "plain" you were on actually the bed! You start to breath faster, feeling panic starting to set in. Before you could do so much as twitch, however, the door opened, thunderous footsteps reaching your ears as someone entered the room. You gazed up in awe at the man before you, standing taller than any Titan you had ever seen, bright green eyes staring intently down at you. He had short brown hair and was dressed in a familiar uniform, that of the infamous Survey Corp. He leaned forward slightly, eyes focusing more on you, making you take a step back.

"My name is Eren Yaeger. You are?" He asked in a formal tone.

"M-My name is Luciano...R-Ricci..." You said in as loud a voice as you could muster, quivering in fear at this giant man before you.

Eren nodded and said, "Good. I've been selected to be your guide for the next few weeks of trials."

"W-Wait...what kind of trials ARE these anyway?!" You shouted, completely confused.

Eren raised an eyebrow, folding his arms across his athletic chest. "Didn't the doctor explain?"

You winced slightly as you realized you had cut him off, not giving him the chance to explain what any of this was about. "N-No..." You said, without elaborating.

Eren sighed slightly and said, "Currently the doctors that live inside the walls are working on a serum that can greatly enhance human size and strength, similarly to how I....I mean...similar to the Titans." Eren seemed to sweat slightly before continuing. "Basically, we have a far greater chance of beating these monsters if we can fight them on their level with our own ingenuity and skill."

"But...why am I so tiny then?" You asked, confused.

"Simple. It's much easier to shrink a human body than it is to safely make it grow. The plan is to shrink down willing test subjects, those around the same age as those actually enlisted in the army, and observe them, to make sure no ill effects develop. With this information, we'll be able to hopefully restore you to normal size and, using your blood as a base, develop a formula to safely enlarge already human sized individuals."

"H-Hopefully?! You mean I could be...STUCK like this?!" You said desperately, the full weight of your hasty decision descending upon you. "N-No way..."

Eren's steely gaze seemed to harden even more. "You signed up for this experiment willingly. Don't even think about trying to back out now that things look grim."

"Easy for him to say..." You thought bitterly. "He's not stuck as a bug among humans..."

Eren's enormous hand suddenly reached out and grabbed you, his tree trunk like fingers a bit rough as he lifted you into the air, up to his face. "I'm taking you with me back to the barracks for now. But you will be accompanying me at all times and do exactly as I say. Understood?"

"Yes sir..." You said softly.

"Good." Eren said, tucking you safely away inside his shirt pocket.
155332222222222222222221.title: Experiment to Save Humanity

choices: As Eren runs, you start to slip under the foot!
Eren feels a tickling in his boot and finds you, not happy at all.
1553322222222222222222211.content:
Eren's large fingers pressed down tightly on your midsection as he made sure you were deep in his pocket, patting it once to make sure you'd stay still before walking out of the office. To you, it was like being in a large hammock, your tiny body easily able to stretch out fully at the bottom of the pocket, the lip of it raised at least ten or more feet up above your head. It really gave you a sense of just how tiny you really were, making you shiver slightly. It suddenly dawned on you that you were almost completely naked! It seemed completely illogical that your underwear had somehow shrank with you so you must have been changed at some point. The thought made your cheeks burn slightly. "The least they could have done is give me some decent clothes..." You muttered to yourself as you leaned against Eren's chest, closing your eyes slightly.

The steady back and forth motion of the pocket, mixed with Eren's strong, consistent heartbeat was making it hard for you to stay awake. It was almost like being lost at sea, though the constant presence of a human life right next to you also made you feel extremely protected. It almost came as a shock when Eren stopped moving, his gigantic index finger and thumb plucking you up from out of his pocket. He brought you up to his face and said, "We're here."

Without another word he dropped you down on a large table, filled with at least a dozen little buildings, much like a village built for dolls. Your eyes widened slightly as you took this all in. Just how many people were taking part in this experiment? Eren sighed as he rolled his shoulders, watching you calmly as you walked up to the nearest building, opening he door and glancing inside. It appeared to be sparsely furnished but not unlike your own house. It was a simple, two room structure. A bed was pressed up in the corner, a small desk was at the opposite end, the other room containing a little toilet and a small bucket that was filled with water. You sighed slightly at that. It was foolish to think there would actually be running water. You were about to step outside when the roof suddenly lifted off above you, revealing the titanic Eren staring intently down at you. "Is he always so...intense?" You thought to yourself, staring silently up at him.

"This is where you'll be staying when you're not with me. You'll sleep here and you'll eat in the barracks. It's the big building right in the center of the "town"." Eren explained before pointing at a small trunk you hadn't noticed when you first walked in at the foot of the bed. "A change of clothes is in there. We only had enough time to prepare two outfits for you so don't mess either of them up. You can get one washed at the end of the week."

You nodded slowly at every direction he gave you. So this was what life in the military was like...regimented and precise. You opened the trunk and pulled out a simple linen tunic and pants, quickly pulling them on, glad to have something covering your pale, weak body. Eren watched this entire process unnervingly. "No shoes?" You asked him, looking up through the roofless house. It was almost like gazing up at some kind of god...

"No time." Eren said simply, reaching in and grabbing you again. "You're going to have to learn to move faster as well. I can't constantly be holding back and waiting for you."

Before you could so much as squeak out a response, you were pushed back into the pocket, much to your frustration. Determined to not be kept down, you quickly got to your feet and reached your arms up, gripping as much of the pocket material as you could, pulling yourself up. With Eren walking, it was almost impossible to climb. After only a few minutes of climbing, your hands moving painstakingly slowly as they reached up over and over again, you had barely raised yourself even a foot (relative to you of course), your body dripping in sweat, staining your new clothes already. It didn't help that every time Eren increased his speed, no matter how minor it was, you found yourself getting smacked back against his hard chest, nearly dislodging you every time.

Finally, at the brink of exhaustion, you managed to reach the lip of the pocket. You draped your aching arms over it, hanging half out, panting, sweat dripping from your forehead, disappearing into the wind before it could so much as touch Eren. Looking down you're struck with an intense feeling of vertigo. Eren's massive boot clad feet strode with purpose against the stone street, his eyes trained forward. You watched in slight horror as he stepped fully on a ladybug without even noticing it, the crunch audible even to your tiny ears. That could just as easily be you, if you weren't careful. You shiver slightly at the thought, almost wanting to drop back down into the pocket. Before you could make that decision for yourself, however, Eren started jogging down a flight of stairs, the sudden downward motion jostling your tiny body, sending you tumbling head over heels, right out of the pocket! You tried to let out a scream of pure terror and only managed a hoarse gasp, your body plummeting down past Eren's chest, his tight stomach, and past his waistline. Just when you thought it was all over, darkness enveloped you. You could feel yourself sliding against some tough material, the heat around you increasing greatly, a musky scent invading your nostrils. It wasn't until you were suddenly pressed up against a huge, peach colored, slightly damp mound that you realized what had happened.

You had fallen right inside Eren's boot!
1553322222222222222222211.title: Start of a New Life

choices: Throw caution to the winds: Try to contact Eren in someway!
There's just enough room in the boot to try and climb out, over the foot!
15533222222222222222222111.content:
The temperature inside the boot was so hot as to be unbearable. Every second inside it felt like being within an increasingly hot oven, sweat already forming on your brow before sliding down your face, the same effect happening right in front of you on Eren's colossal foot. A large bead slowly trickled down the side of the foot, running directly into your face, the hot, salty liquid covering it like you had been splashed in the face! You sputtered and spit, pushing yourself back, bracing yourself against the musky flesh. You had barely managed to create a relative inch of space before you felt your bare feet slip against the leather, sending you directly under Eren's foot! Moving without thinking, you rolled, hoping against hope that, in the darkness, you were heading for the toe of the boot rather than the heel! Luck seemed to be on your side as you felt the rough enclosure of the toe section, just as Eren's foot came down directly behind you with a world shaking THOOM!, your tiny body bouncing up and down against the roof and floor of the boot. Groaning, you quickly turned over, wedging yourself into the tiny area of the boot, face to face with Eren's gigantic toes. The big toe alone appeared to be nearly as long as your own body, each one capable of smearing you into a red paste if you weren't careful. You gulped, watching as the toes seemed to clench slightly, bending at the joint, before rising slightly from the bottom of the boot, pulling it upward!

A sense of vertigo engulfed you as you were rocketed into the air, nearly dislodging your minute form from your hiding place, all because of the simplicity of the young giant taking a single step! The bottom of your stomach dropped out as you were suddenly plummeted back down to the ground, the force of the boot striking the hard road bouncing you again, your limbs already beginning to ache with the effort of holding yourself in place. The process repeated itself again and again and again, each time a fresh bruise blooming. It didn't take long before you started to slip, your body finally coming loose as Eren stepped down particularly hard, the next rise sliding your body down, right in the path of Eren's descending toe! You could barely muster a yell, the intense heat and brutal beatings rendering you weak and defenseless. Immense pressure suddenly pressed down on your entire torso, compacting your ribcage to the point you were sure it was going to crack, the sweaty digit effortlessly pinning you against the moist material of the boot. You gasped in pain, struggling slightly, trying to push against this unrelenting force...only for it rise off you again, bringing you a moment of respite to take a deep, gasping breath...only to swallow a mouthful of Eren's sweat, the hot liquid making you choke and sputter. Before you could even begin to recover from that, the toe was upon you once more, practically crushing you with pressure! It was like a torture out of Hell, repeated endlessly as Eren lightly jogged from the barracks to the training field, intending to practice with the other members of his division. He had no idea that you were currently trapped underneath his big toe, pinned down like a bug. You were so small you didn't even register as an annoyance!

Finally, after what felt like hours of torture, Eren stopped, standing still at the edge of the practice field, scanning it for signs of his friends. Inside his left boot, you let out a pained sigh of pure relief! Even though you desperately wanted to rest, you knew Eren probably wouldn't stay still for long. You briefly thought about getting Eren's attention, whether it be by rubbing or biting, but immediately squashed the idea. If you somehow managed to register any kind of recognition on Eren, he would probably only press down lightly, pulping your body as easily as he would a grape, probably not even noticing as he washed your remains off in the shower. You gulped, lifting your arms up over your head. When you had initially ended up under here, your arms and legs had been spread just enough that you could wrap them both around the toe, which you did, shimmying your little form out from under the toe, the slightly rough, musky flesh gently gripping and rubbing against you as you did so. You couldn't help but blush as you felt your crotch rub against it as well, a strange feeling passing through your mind and body. A feeling of...reverence? Acceptance? It was almost similar to a feeling you had once before, when you had spotted a particularly handsome man in a crowd, an immediate feeling of...attraction. You shook your head wildly, sweat flying from your face in tiny particles as you did so. This was NOT the time to be feeling some kind of weird...SOMETHING for a part of the human body that was currently able to kill you! Maybe the injection was starting to mess with your head...You grunted, pushing yourself out from under the digit just as it rose up once more, sending you tumbling backwards, head over heels into the toe section of the boot! You barely managed to brace yourself again, your eyes darting all over the boot, searching for some kind of solution...ANY kind of solution!
15533222222222222222222111.title: A Hellish Journey
