In the time left before the exam, me and Izuku trained together as hard as possible. We rotated between a regular workout at normal size, and attempting to control my quirk better at small size.

I soon gained some control by calculating my energy. By concentrating hard enough I could shrink and grow back, but if I used up all my energy I will automatically shrink again.

While we trained, I attempted to know more about Izuku's trainer. But he always seem nervous and said they want to keep their identity private.

Finally after months of anticipation, the exam was here and after a rude welcoming by Bakugou and Izuku nearly falling, we made it inside. Things immediately started off bad when hero Present Mic came out and I was the only one who clapped, though I did get a cheerful thumbs up from the loud hero.

Soon the challenge came for us to get points by fighting the robots. I was able to take three down by shrinking myself with a concealed knife, and cutting the wires from inside. Still after the third point, I began to feel tired and couldn't risk shrinking or I'd be stuck.

I was brought out of my thoughts when I saw the 0 pointer and Izuku running towards it! I threw away my knife, unaware of it hitting more robots. I soon saw Izuku jump and use a....quirk!?

After the robot was destroyed and Izuku was saved and taken to be looked at, i tried to find my weapon but with no luck.
~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~
Back at Izuku's home I tried to cheer him up with a foot rub, but even that didn't do anything. While I felt defeated, i couldn't help but feel a tinge of hope would fall on us.

As we went to bed, I walked up the pillow to Izuku's sleeping face and gave a light peck on his nose. Smiling and curling up to his warm cheek.
~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~
After some time, I received my letter from U.A, and since my parents were once again gone in a trip, I went to Izuku's. Arriving I was surprised when he happily informed me he was accepted. I soon opened my package and watched in surprise as All Might appeared in a suit.

"Greetings young Hudo! I'm here to inform you that your exam was a success! You managed to take down 5 eniemes alone, but it was that sixth shot that made the robot malfunction and detonate the remaining ones! I look forward to seeing you start your hero academia!", and with that All Might vanished.

Izuku was excited and all I could do was jump off a chair and shrink, making simulated skydiving. Izuku though panicked, laughed and caught me in his palm.
~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~
It was soon the first day of high school and me and Izuku walked to school in the U.A uniform.

On my first day I was.......

Looking up i find All Might now donning his hero costume. His costume put his muscles on display and never have i felt more small. Still All Might was here again and this time I won't freeze.

"All Might! Down here!", I shouted and waved my hands.

All Might brought his gaze down but it was aimed behind me at Bakugo and his group. " Have to fear young heroes! For I am HERE!", All Might beamed brandishing his smile.

Bakugo and his group cheered at the hero's arrival, All I could do was pale.

"Tell me young heroes, what seems to be the problem"
"It's this bug All Might! It's bothering us"

I paled more then possible. Looking up i saw All Might finally set his gaze on me. I also saw Bakugo giving me the same look he gave before putting his foot into the same sock I was In. A toothy smirk.

All Might raised his brow a little as he bended down bringing his hulking form closer as his striking eyes gazed at me. I prayed that he recognize a human and not a insect. Finally All Might rose back up to his titan height.

"This is certainly a strange insect you found". Oh no...

"Now then young heroes! How do you propose we deal with this villian?"

Wait, what!

"You should throw him in the trash!"
"We should see what's inside it!"

Bakugo's smirk suddenly grew even bigger as he spoke up.

"SMASH him with you're boot!"

All Might's head perked up at this. "SMASH with my boot?"

"Yeah! Snuff out the villian beneath you're sole!"

"Ha! Ha! Right you are my boy! Then I won't delay any further!"

All Might set his gaze you again.

"Now villian, your evil ends here. I shall squash your evil with justices stomp!"

All Might's toned right leg suddenly began to rise. The clean white sole of his boot hung over me waiting to be stained. I was frozen in fear. Bakugo was right All Might doesn't see a human, he sees a bug.

"Now! Prepare to be crushed with justice!",All Might yelled clenchin his fists and bringing his foot down.

It seem to go in slow motion for me. I saw All Might's triumph face be blocked by his sole. The large heel came towards me as one last sound echoed in my head.


SQUELCH

Looking up in surprise, you immediately recognised the familiar spiky red hair of your classmate Kirishima. The hardening quirk user had his backpack slung over one shoulder and was looking around in confusion.

"Huh, that's strange. I thought Hudo was gonna come hang out at the Arcade with us after school?" Kirishima said, his voice coming out in a louder booming tone to your now miniscule form before he placed his bag down on the ground.

"Kirishima, I'm down here!!" you shouted up to him, cupping your hands to your mouth before remembering the futility of it, there was no way your voice would reach his ears.

But wait!

Reaching into your pocket and fishing out a small headset device.

This was created by resident UA tinkered and Support Class Prodigy Mei Hatsume, after finding out about your Quirk and the dificulties you often faced, she deviced a small headset device which rested in your ear and had a small microphone coming down to your mouth, it projected your voice out of a small but powerful speaker mounted to your head.

She also somehow (You couldn't comprehend any of her technobabble on the best of days, but were thankful nonetheless) made it capable of shrinking with you, as long as it was on your person when you shrank.

Clicking the side and waiting a moment for it to turn on, you attempted to communicate once again.

"Kirishima, down here!"

Your eyes widened at the sound of your voice not projecting any louder than normal, blinking twice you reached up and removed the headset, turning it to it's side you saw a flashing red set of letters which made you groan out in annoyance.

Low Battery

"Oh come on!! Seriously!?" You exclaimed, before remembering you probably hadn't turned it off earlier thay day during training....

Though luckily, Mei had planned for this too, and had installed a safety measure which would work in most cases if the circumstances were right.

The headset could be charged at full size via a wall socket or have batteries inserted in it, or in emergency situations if you were stuck in tiny size, it could be recharged via solar energy.

Quickly flipping the switch on the interior of the headset to solar charge, you put it back on and turned back to Kirishima.

"Oh well, I might as well get going, don't want to miss meeting the others" Kirishima said to himself.

"Crap! He's about to leave" you said quickly thinking of a way to hitch a ride, before deciding and......

1553322222222222222222222222222122311.content:
Looking at the giant pair of booted feet which stood before me, I peered up as far back as I could to see who it was.

And as I did, a chill went up my spine as I finally made out the titanic figure standing there sternly, it was the Number 2 Hero, Endeavour!

Normally people would be amazed and in awe of seeing one of the top heroes standing before them....or in my case, above them. But I was one of the people who didn't look at Endeavour in such a positive light, despite his large arrest rating and villain defeats he had to his name, he was still brash and unfriendly to most people who came across him, not to mention the large amounts of property damage and injuries that often occurred when he was involved. There were also whispers among some secretive chat rooms about his behind closed doors activities, but he had the money and influence to keep any claims from becoming to public.

Quite frankly, I thought he was an Asshole

But currently, he was an Asshole who towered above my insect like form, and looked even more intimidating than normal, his fire covered hair and beard flickering in the soft breeze, arms crossed and eyes narrowed forward in an almost glare like expression.

He seemed to be looking at someone beyond the gate, but I couldn't make out who it was.

Hearing the crunch of his boots shift on the ground, I looked up and around hastily, trying to see if there was anyone, ANYONE! Else around who could help me, but saw no one in the immediate area.

In a split second decision, my body began moving as I ran towards Endeavour and leapt up onto his boot (which thankfully wasn't covered in fire at the moment) as he started walking. Gripping the leather as much as I could, which was luckily made easier from the tiny almost invisible scratch and scuff marks which to me made great points of purchase. Endeavour continued walking at a stiff pace, making me jostle around as I struggled to stand, waiting for his boot to come down to the ground again before taking off into a sprint and gripping the leg of it, grabbing hold of the nearest lace which to me looked like a large chord which I could grip with both arms, I began to make the climb upwards.

Climbing and free running were skills I had picked up over the years, mostly as a means of traversing around while shrunken....not that it did much good in some cases, especially when Bakugou would move faster than I could move and I often wound up under his shoe or in some rare cases, on his chair before being smothered under his ass.

"Yeah! That's were worthless insects like you belong you little shit!" I could hear his voice echo in my head, before shaking it off and continuing to climb upwards.

Before too long I had made it up to the opening of his boot, gripping the edge and pulling myself up, gripping his pant leg to steady myself as I looked up once more, there was still a way to go, though maybe if you could find a spot where you could be felt? Which was unlikely as his hero costume's material, while having some give to your tiny size was relatively skin tight, showing off each of the Number 2's bulging and defined muscles.

As you contemplated what to do next, you were suddenly caught off guard as.......
1553322222222222222222222222222122311.title: Endeavour

15533222222222222222222222222221223112.content:
Suddenly without warning, I felt Endeavour's boot shift slightly as his hand reached down and tugged at the side of the opening, not looking down as he did.

This caused me to loose my footing and slip down underneath the boot's opening and plummet down below before I could grab hold of anything.

Letting out a scream, I found myself slowing as I impacted against the side of his calf, which was was bare and below the end of his pant leg, sliding between the his calf and the tight interior of his boot until I finally came to a stop, my body trapped between him and the boot.

After a few moments I began to regain my senses, I tried to look around but my body was squeezed firmly in place, not that it would do me much good as I was surrounded by darkness, unable to see a thing as the tightened boot left almost no room for any light to enter.

The second thing I noticed was that the inside of his boot wasn't exactly a pleasant place to be, understandably as a pro-hero he regularly patrolled in them, and even though he surely had multiple sets of boots, they all know doubt got a good wear.

Thus I was surrounded in what was practically a sauna of body heat, perspiration, leather and Endeavour's foot odor which made my nose wrinkle in distaste, unable to bring a hand up to shield my mouth or nose I was forced to inhale the thick pungent scent.

The Number 2 not having worn socks underneath his boots, which made the experience all the worse for me.

This wasn't the first time I'd been stuck in a piece of footwear, Bakugou had subjected me to the inside of his shoe once before while in class, as well as PE. Though it was a side effect of his quirk that his feet also would sweat more than normal, the same nitro glycerine infused liquid that his hands produced, though luckily he couldn't ignite the ones around his feet or else I'm sure I would have suffered even more under him.

A rumbling sound caught my attention as I struggled to move once more, the sounds of the outside world muffled through the exterior of the boot as Endeavour kept walking.

Though after a few more seconds he came to a halt and I could feel the surroundings again shift.

Did he feel me!?

Beginning to wiggle again as much as I could, I felt a surge of hope well up inside as light poked through as Endeavour once again shifted his boot, his foot sliding up slightly and freeing me.

Well, freeing me from being trapped against his calf, as I fell down further and onto the moist spongey insole, taking a moment to cough and gag at the moist feeling of landing on a bed of his foot sweat and absorbed odor.

Standing up I was aware that I could now see, the first thing the still dimmed light showed me was the dark imprints of Endeavour's toes and heel inside the giant (to me) boot.

Looking up towards the opening, my eyes widened as....

If someone were to describe Sura Sawada, the best answer would be a background character. The teen was the kind of person you don't know is there intill he speaks.

Sura himself noticed his lack of presence and often used it to his full advantage. Sitting in the back of class, using his phone, and sometimes even skipping class. However this talent wasn't always effective, and a snitch who payed too much attention ratted him out to the teacher.

This coupled with his low grades had him sitting in the back of 1-D, to the back of 1-E. First arriving, Sura tried to fall back into his invisible routine but it proved to be more difficult. The students in 1-E unlike his previous class seem to actually want to get to know him.

Alongside that the alien that blew up the moon was his teacher, and in one day was already nicer then his old teacher. Though it could be since his aim was terrible and Koro-Sensei hardly had to dodge.

Sura had begun to open up to others more, though he did keep a secret that others would find quite strange.
~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~
It was another morning and already it showed bad omans would be affecting Sura's day. He had slept through his alarm, burnt his toast, and nearly got hit by a car. At the end of it, some strange vile of liquid fell out and Sura had taken it out of curiosity and manage to miraculously arrive in time.

After a day of hijinks, and Karasuma trying to help him with his aim. It was time to head home. Having forgot something, Sura made his way back inside the now empty classroom. However, as he turn to leave he bumped into a desk.

CRACK

Hearing the sound, Sura reached into his pocket and felt the vile broken and his uniform wet. He soon pricked his finger on a sharp piece of glass. Taking the finger out of his pocket, he noticed the liquid of the vile being absorbed into the cut. Before he could question it, Sura began to feel light headed. As he tried to make his way to the door, he blacked out.
~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~
Finally coming too, Sura immediately noticed a problem. Everything around was huge!

Looking at all the desks that towered over him like skyscrapers and the lone anti sensei bullet that was almost as big as him, Sura began to panic a little. Before he could freak out, he heard a loud sound. The door to classroom was opening!

As the door opened Sura saw........

info.description:
I visit this site a lot, browsing through the stories and even adding a few additions of my own. I’ve decided to try and start my own interactive. The plot is the usual: you’re suddenly shrunken in an anime world.

~Rules and Guidelines~
1. This is a male only story. If you want a giantess or SW story, there are more than plenty. Females can still be there as background characters, but no interaction.
2. Practically any sort of interaction is accepted. Go wild.
3. No one-line chapters, unless it’s a choice chapter.
4. Try to use a basic amount of grammar. Punctuation and capitalization isn’t that hard.
5. Shrinking did not make you invincible, so death endings may be added without limit.
6. The main giant of a storyline cannot suddenly change without warning. For example; Sasuke jumps through the window, steals you from Naruto’s grasp, and escapes.
7. This starts out as a shrinking story, but can also become a growing story. You or/and an anime character may grow.
8. Don’t make a sudden ending. For example; Naruto puts you in his sandal and puts it on. You become his insole for the rest of your life. (The End)
9. Don’t spam. Spam includes nonsense writing and stopping a storyline because you claim it “doesn’t make sense”.
10.Have fun.
11. NEW RULE. ADDED 2/20/12 From now on you are not allowed to add JUST choice chapters! This is the same rule as in my "Beneath his Notice" interactive. If you add any choice chapters you MUST also add a real addition to the story. If you do not and several hours have gone by I will delete the choice chapters.

Edit: I made the above rule larger because it seems many of you simply aren't getting it. Don't bother adding a choice chapter if you aren't gonna add a REAL addition immediately after. I'm just gonna delete your choice chapter(s) and the only thing you would have accomplished is wasting everyone's time.
